1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag bskad du/ sarba kA rbA sa su ts+tsha la n+t+ra ma sa rba brgyas ma phyog DA kin+tI dz+wA lasam+b+ha ut+tar taH/ bod du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus
1b2(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
1b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// ma lus lus pa med par grub// rnam rtog med pa'i sems pa ni// de kho na nyid nges par gnas// sems dpang sangs
1b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsad ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'dod chags chen po
1b5(rnying rgyud): bde chen po// bde chen rdo rje chen po pas// rdo rje 'dzin dang ldan cig pa'i// bde gshegs mgon khyod rnams kyis bzhugs// thams cad mchog gyur 'dod chen
2a1(rnying rgyud): deng ma thag nga ga 'an// srangs sa rnams cad sanyam rgya du// du pa das pa na pa 'jam/ rnam pa ma ya
2a2(rnying rgyud): las// rtog pa'i don 'di gang la gsungs// ci yi slad du'ang rgyud phyi ma// dang po'i sa cho ga ji ltar lags// gdod ma tha ma med nyid yang // rdo rje sems dpang de bzhin te// yig 'byuji ltang
2a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa lags// sngags phyung ba yang ci 'dra ste// shin tu dga' dang bzang nyid de// rdo rje snying po gtso bo che// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin
2a4(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po yang // byang chub spyod pa rnams ci ltar// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yang // sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum po mthar byed dang // phyag rdo rdo rje yang ji ltar// dang po rigs
2a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed ji ltar lags// 'dod pa'i thar pa rnam partsi// mgon po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal// thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags// ji ska dang rdo snying po byung // nyi 'i ting ngo dziltar// bde ba chen
2b1(rnying rgyud): don padang ma chug snang zhugs// dkyil la ba dang kar gsungs su zhum// dbadag mi 'jug// theg ga dab pa'ang khya / das zla ba di skang bshad pa lags// gas da da nga // dngag
2b2(rnying rgyud): ci 'dra de bzhin te// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni// rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bslang du nyid dang // de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang // thams cad dgug dang mchod chen dang // rang gi byin rnabs
2b3(rnying rgyud): sogs sgrub pa// de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang // dam pa dang ni don dam pa// dum pa'i yi ge grub don du// thams cad mi gsung 'os ma lags// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor pa mkha' 'gro ma snya ma bde ba'i mchog las de 'o na
2b4(rnying rgyud): nyid thams cad nges tshig gi rtog pa ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi gtso chen pos// the tshom dag gi tshogs gsan nas// don dam 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don rgyud yin zhe
2b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi rtog chos dag las// sems can don du yongs su rtog/ de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// 'di la ji ltar rgyud kyi ma yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rab tu 'brel bar bshad// phyi mgong du phyung ba yin//
2b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid gsang ba gsang chen rnams// de yang rgyud ni phye mar 'dod// de la ji ltar dang po'i sa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun tu rab gnas pa// rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog/ bde chen dgyes pa chen po de// dam pa'i yi ge gzhung
2b7(rnying rgyud): yas 'ang // zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar gdod ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ yi ge ka sogs rgya yig mtha'// nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya// yi ge sogs te yi mtha'// phreng
3a1(rnying rgyud): na su na na du/
3a2(rnying rgyud): sa / sasmras ga sa rnams
3a3(rnying rgyud): bas mi// rnams sa drang ga da kyi ma kyi sa mang bdag to kyidangos thams ni/ derisam sa dpa' 'as 'a ngo// del bco ma me da dus dag shan/ drangs phra brten po
3a4(rnying rgyud): byed pa bla pas zha ni sa sa// / sa pasang ste/ da nga
3a5(rnying rgyud): smrasan sa sa smras tha sa smra
3a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa zhesapa / sa smranas/ da sh+tha skyes sa// 'tha~M pa /
3a7(rnying rgyud): sa bla sun du sa / sun su sun pa
3b1(rnying rgyud): pas grus/ du smra na sus du/ sad pa na
3b2(rnying rgyud): bzhan pa caganyis dgo dang ldan la sog mig pa// das sogs nges pa na / dbang bani sa sa pa sa/ rnas can sa bya nas sa/ gamigs pa ga sa nasan/ mye 'ju sa
3b3(rnying rgyud): shes dag tu ldan rna la dzin/ khyod pa thams cad dang byuganas// detha mas pa // gnasab byed pa nal/ da ma na gtas // dag 'a chu kyis byung // da migs
3b4(rnying rgyud): bzhizhis pa las// gnas panagajig dang ldanapa/ mag bri pa'i gnas/ rnas ca ba nang da/ mig pa / gas bang tshig stedzin/ // gnas pa gdug
3b5(rnying rgyud): bkra// sum rgyaca brgyad byer ba shes// de ni rje zhi par rnam par bstsu// bde brjen po rgya rkyen gyi// mA mongs pa brtag pa'o// hU~M rbu bcug cig la gnas pa/ shige me nga yang dag spyad// de mig bcang pa la gnas pa/
3b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad ba dag ni ldan pa te// 'o sum bzhi dang // TIg sa da ngos brtson 'o// de mi kun bcoMl/ gnas ma bdun dang mig gnyis pa la ga pa'i// thaMd me ldan par// gleng tham la sogs
3b7(rnying rgyud): 'o// rdzas bya 'i mtshig sadu nagasus // ga ga 'ang rdzu/ ngas sa// dpas pa ldan pa'o// thas gdus na gyi ga gnas// sa
4a1(rnying rgyud): du bya bya//
4a2(rnying rgyud): rgyu
4a3(rnying rgyud): bcig sa gyu masabarta ga bzhini// 'i rigs pa sa pa/ di d+hi dgas mnan/ ma lda pa mau rgyags pa ga/
4a4(rnying rgyud): na zla
4a5(rnying rgyud): de namig la gnas 'o// yo ldan // de mig badz+ra
4a6(rnying rgyud): na
4a7(rnying rgyud): ma / /
4b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor la// chos kyi drung gi phyag rgya na/ zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal du sems dpas gasbyangs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// nyi shu rtsa bzhir bu mig pa/
4b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa nyi shu ba ldan ni// khrag 'thang zhes pa'i rgyal po che// chog drag lkug chad gyur pa'o// re'u mig nyi shuH bsgril// gnas pa 'og na bcu dgrar ldan// re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang / stong ba
4b3(rnying rgyud): tshig drug ldan pa'o// rtog drag dang ni rtsa bzhi pa// gnas pa dbus nas bcug cig ldan// del mig bcu gnyis pa sbyong ba'i// chog drag ldan par 'dod pa'o// de mig bcu bzhil gnas pa// dog sde 'dzin
4b4(rnying rgyud): pa nyi shu gcig/ bcu gnyis pa dang chog drag can// gsum pa can de bshad pa'o// de'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la// chog drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba// lha mo sdod chen mA paM
4b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod// re'u mig nyi shu d+d+ha bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas gnyis pa can// de bzhin thig leng ror ldan// thig le 'byung gnas gsum pa ste// dbus nas bcu pa gang yin pa// rtag tu chog drug ldan pa ni/
4b6(rnying rgyud): dmar chen sogs pa'i lha mAM yi// bzhi pa dag ni phyung ba'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa'o// dbus lus drug pa gang yin pa// thig le rdo ldan pa'o// re'u mig de bzhin 'grub
4b7(rnying rgyud): pa// drag zeng ngos brgyan po'o// redu mig bcud dgral gnas pa// thig le ros brgyan pa'o// lha me mda' rnon 'dzin sogs kyi// sa bon byung ba dngo mtshar// lha mo me tog ma sogs kyi// sa ngon byung brjon bstan yin// gang dag blo lung bstan pa pang /
5a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs sa mthun pa sa nas// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rnasams dpas dgra ngas gsungs so// ma'a' ba sgyu gA'i kyis lu dang kyi chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i zug tu shes pa'o// de'i ga nyi shu d+hA bzhil// gnas pa brgya dgu ga mya
5a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// nyi sh+tsa ga drug sbyong ba na// bdag kyi dbang phyug smin// de mig brta sgril gnas pa'i// tshig gnyis phyo bzhin no// rang miganyi gu rtsa bzhil// gnas nas dbus nas dgra bldan// rtag par thig dang 'dzin// gnyis pa yin 'angs
5a3(rnying rgyud): grags/ migs na / gnas par dpag sa rnyan/ ga rgyas pazhis/ gdus pa dang shes brtsegs ma ldan/ rdzog drug ldan ni zhi 9/ gnya ma'i chung pas grags// daja mag te \u0f7f zhing lda/
5a4(rnying rgyud): dris dgra ba'i thig ler bcas// reT mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nus brtu lU dang ldan no// de'i myig bcu gcig la gnas pa// tshig drag gis ni sbyong ba'o// de'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// sum hu rtswa brgyang pa dang ldan// tshig drug mnyem por skyong ba
5a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa/
5a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma garA gyi dbang phyug gI dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// dpyas nas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// bcu gcig pa dang ldan pa ste// bAdz+ra dag+na zla ba gats+tsha ga wa ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba yin// dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa// rna chos thig le
5a7(rnying rgyud): gzug gi zhal// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa// re'u mig nyi shu gnas dang spyod// chog drag ldan pas gnyis pa'o// re'i mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan// chog drag lhan cig can dang ni// gsum pa
5b1(rnying rgyud): sun gas pa yod// 'jam ba gnas// bca cig dang ni lan// dan mig pazlab na la gnas pa// chag drug ldan pa 'dod pas/ rlos tha gyu byu gnas// dub sdu ga nas byung thud // da sa byas gag 'das/
5b2(rnying rgyud): ga leng ngos bcan pa'o// den mig b+h+yaHbrji gnas// dbus nas bcwa gsum pa dang ldan// gadrug mnyam par ldan pa ni// rdo rje rje me sgra dag rin// lha mo gling tham grogs can// zla ba'i dkyil 'a khor skyed skyes yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
5b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpas gsungs te/ don nyi na 'a kyil la lar gyi chos kyi yig 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes par// dbu mig kyi thartsa bzhir gnas// te zla rtsa bdun zhes spyong ba ste// rdo chos thig la gtsug can ni// bral khor thams cad 'dral bar// cig btu
5b4(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa// bcu dgu pa dang ldan pa ste// nyi shu chog drag sbyor ba ste// sna tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin// re'u mig nye shu rtsa bzhir gnas// gnas pa chog drag ldan pa 'dod// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje kuT ma zhes grags so//
5b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpa rdo rje bang ba rten po rdo rje sem snang pas ga~M sungs te/ mchog gi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phrag cha shes pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mukha' 'gro ma sku ma bde ba'i mdzug las chos kyi yi ga 'byung ba'i
5b6(rnying rgyud): stebargya dgri pa 'o// / ri mi gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// kyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyang rje// de yi nang dran pa 'thong pas// oM l-i gsogs kyang ze da \u0f7f// shang thugs 'das ng+ya yi Ta// sgyo gas 'dab mang tsali rje// rngabazigs ma
5b7(rnying rgyud): dri ning bden bya/ rdzab lnga li bas dra na// mig tu dang kun ci gang// dab brdzun 'dab ma nas brtsams te// yang la la rnam par gdug/ dbang ldan 'dab mang byer mdu// sagazha na 'jug par bya// mimathams 'ad ba da
6a1(rnying rgyud): yi ge Sha ni 'dug par bya// badren la 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ges ni 'jug par bya// rlung mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol d+ha// yi ge ha ni 'jug par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbyung tu
6a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' dra gang yin pa// thig le dang ldan yi ge oM// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa gang // sgra yig oM ni sbyad bar bya// bden bral gyi la gnas pa la// 'og tu rma yig u sbyong ro// shar gyi 'dab ma gnyis pa ni// drabs las dbu med bzhin no// skyon
6a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbu ma la// me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin no// bden thal phyi rol gnas pa gang // de nas byang gi dang po'o// dbus nas dbu ma 'i sbyin gan sa sa// de tshe khyod kyi gang byar 'gyur// oM yig chog drug dang ldan pa// de'i mna' dra tshor 'gyur// ste nas dbu
6a4(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa// chog drag dang ni ldan pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa// u yig thig le stong par bya// dbus kyi dbu ma gang yin pa// thig les mgo nas mdun pa dang // rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa// oM yig tshig drug sbyor bar bya// bden bram
6a5(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi phyi rol du// sgra yi A ni sbyor ba ste// ma mtshams 'dab ma ga yin pa// bang gi dang mor bzhin yang // bden thal phyi rol pa bzung nas// byang gri dang po pa yang yin// dbus nas dbus ma bzung nas kyi// khyod kyi gong bu man 'dra 'byung //
6a6(rnying rgyud): nasu thog sbyin byas nas// dzarje sams dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// snronas tham gang yin ga// rtog drug drung ni ldan par bya// dbustanas da // seMnas dbu
6a7(rnying rgyud): ma ma sa 'di ma napa/ bar 'gyur ba yo// nga mi dam nga kyi// mams na du rgyud// ga yang nga bye cu// gapa shA ba gyur zu sa// marjes rgyang rdzu su
6b1(rnying rgyud): dang po ldan par bya// kra yig i dang myang nas sra// 'od kyi gong bras pa yin// 'dun bral gyi ro la gnas pa la// sgra yI/ a dang ldan par bya// de bzhin dbang ldan 'dab ma dang // bla yig i ni sbyor ba'o// shur gyi da po pa dang ni// de nas nga mra'i tha ma dang // zung chu
6b2(rnying rgyud): dang po pa bzung nas// a med rtag tu 'gyur bar bya// de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis// mda' du rab tu grub pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig uni sbyor bar bya// thig le
6b3(rnying rgyud): gnon nas su// de nas dbus nas dbu ma'o// lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams pa dang sbyor bar bya// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig e dang ldan par bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa gang // gla yig e ni sbyor bar bya// shar gyi dang
6b4(rnying rgyud): po bzung nas su// lha yig e ni sbyor ba'o// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig e ni spong ba'o// rlung mtshams kyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig u ni spor bar bya// thig le dngos mnyam spyod na// skal bzang skal bzang 'gyur ba yin// zhes
6b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le yis ni brgyan par bya// de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang // lho nas dgu ma de bzhin te// me yi mtshams dang mnyam par ldan// yi ge a yis bsdu bar bya// chub nas ta ma bzung nas
6b6(rnying rgyud): su// sa yig o ni sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbu ma 'i za ma dang ldan par// ma mtshams lan gnyis brjod nas su// mudz+ra nas dang por ldan 'gyur bya// rtag tu a med brgyad pa ni// rdo rje kha b+h+rUM 'dzin ma yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das
6b7(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// cho ga drag yo ni sbyor bar bya// dbus nas debu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pas ni ldan po yin// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra lig a ni
7a1(rnying rgyud): sbyor bar bya// dbus nas tha mar bzung nas su// zla yig e ni spong bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma gzung bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma la gnas pa// sgra yig mi rna spong bar bya// byang nas
7a2(rnying rgyud): dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// me mtshams 'dab ma sbyor nas su// thig le dngos bsdu bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma lha mo che// rdo rje sems sogs lha yi yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje mtshon
7a3(rnying rgyud): cha dang / rdo rje rol ma dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snying po ma dag rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// e yig thig le yang dag ldan// dbus la tha ma bzung ba dang // yi ge u dang ldan par bya// byung nas de bzhin pazhi
7a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyar nas// sgra yig i dang a bsdu bya'o// shar nas bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le u dang ldan bya ste// nan tan du ni lan gnyis bzla// rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur ba yin//
7a5(rnying rgyud): o yig thig le dang ldan pa// dbu ma las ni dbu ma yang // me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// dbus nas tha ma bzung byas te// sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// shwar las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig e dang sbyar ba'o// shar nas
7a6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa gang yin pa// bla yig A dang sbyong ba'o// bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa// gla yig u dang lhor ba ste// nan tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan// thag le nga ro gnyis pa'o// oM yig
7a7(rnying rgyud): thig le dang ldan pa// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// chog drag dang ni mnyam por ldan// dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas dang // me mtshams 'dam ma can de bzhin// byang nas gsum pa gang yin pa// dbus las debu mar gyur par bya// lho nas dbu ma pa
7b1(rnying rgyud): la yang // ma mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// \u0f88\u0f90 mig i dang ldan stor ba// a yig thig la dang ldan pa// lan gnyis gsum ni brjod byas te// lha mo gsum pa'i kho na'o// sngags 'byung bar ni grags pa yin// o yigazig pa dang ldan par// shar rnas /
7b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa gang yin pa// dz+hachos jig la gtsug gi gal// dbus nas dbum bzhin du// skyo nas dbu ma pa la yang // mam tshams 'dab marnyan skyor dang // dus rnams thams cad sbyar bar bya// dbang ldan la pa bzhin// yig yoni spong ba dru// de nyid
7b3(rnying rgyud): hU~M la bya bzang nas// yig mi dang ldan byas te// mam thams 'dab ma gnas pa me// sbra mas ma rig brtan par bya// d+hA mtshams phyir la ba bzung nas// thig le mA yig sbyor byas te// lan gnyis du ni brjod pa'o// de ni pag gsam shing sogs /
7b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje snying po ma dang / rdo rje sred med kyi bu mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / 'dod pa'i dbang mo rnams shes pa lha mo bzhi yin no// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// yi ge a yis sbyor bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// me mtshams 'dab ma can de
7b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// mig e yis mnyam ldan pa'i// byeng nas dang por 'gyur byas te// dbus las dbum dang zan du// me mtshams 'dab ma can myong ba'i// spyi yi dbum pa pa 'i// yi ge a yis mnyam ldanaH// dbus las dbum ldan 'brur dang // 'a
7b6(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma la gnas pa// sgra yig aM ni sbyor byas te// bden bral gyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te// byang nas tha ma gang yin pa// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po gang yin pa// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// nub nas dang
7b7(rnying rgyud): po gang yin pa// rtag par a med 'gyur bar bya// gdod mtha ma med pa'i mchog/ skye mardo rje pa wang ma'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig yon sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid// skra yig i dang ldan byas te// d+hang
8a1(rnying rgyud): nas su tha staH// nas sum brnags su// na pa dum gnag zu// mamarnams 'dabamang da/ zlab grug ya da te// gang sags ma gang mdag/ rgyus gaman ci rta/
8a2(rnying rgyud): byang nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig min sbyor byas te// ngango sazhi po dang ldan pa// rtag par man gsum brjod bya'o// rlung mtshams kyi rol pa brdung nas// rga/ yag yon sbyor byar bya// mematshams 'dang ma pa la yang // mu mig la ni stong pa da // byang sa
8a3(rnying rgyud): dang po 'gyur bar bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig// sto nas dbu ma 'gyur byas te// drung mtshams kyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig a ni skyong bar bya// de bzhin bden thal gyi rol pa// sra yig ing+ge stong ba'i phyir// rlung
8a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi rol pa nyid ni// lan gnyis ched du brjod par bya// dbus nas dbus bdung nas su// thig le oM yig sbyor dang \u0f7f// mkha' 'gro snum bde mchog la// mchen lha mo grags pa yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sra yi ga i ni myor bar
8a5(rnying rgyud): mematshams 'dang la gnas pa yang // byang nas ring po pa bzung ste// sA ri ga mi ni ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma bzhin du// me mtshams 'dang ma dang rgyar pa'i// lho nas dajam pa dang yang // byer nas mtha' mya te// hrI ma dzamapa 'ang ba maldan
8a6(rnying rgyud): nas// tha mig i ni sbyor bar bya// byung nas dang po bzung byas te// dbang ldan 'dab ma can byor nas// de tshod ni yang brjod de// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang // sgra yig me ni sbyor bar bya// dpyas las dang po de bzhin du// de ni lan gnyis brjod pa
8a7(rnying rgyud): lho nas bzhi pa bzung nas su// nga ra a yig ldan par bya// rdo sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdza rngam zhes grags pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpa'i rnga rje sems dpas gsungs so// gling bu ma dang pe wang kun// rje chen de bzhin rnga rnga kun// rdo rje sangs
8b1(rnying rgyud): dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// g+ha yi lha mos mchod bsgrub pa'o// a yig dang po byas nas su// dbus nas dbu ma pa la yang // me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan par// lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// s+kha yig u ni stor
8b2(rnying rgyud): bar bya// me mtshams kyi la pa bzung nas// dbus las dang po yang yin te// a rig dang ni mnyam po ldan// dbus nas ma tog sa byung // u yi ga dang por byas nas rba// dngus las dbums pa s+t+wa~M// me mtshams 'dang mi dang rngan pang // ston sa da
8b3(rnying rgyud): ma yang yin te// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// spra yig u dang sbyang bar bya// dbus las dang po bzud nas su// rdo rje spos me rnam grags so// a yig dang ngo byas nas su// dbus las dbum pa yang ste// mi mtshams 'dab ma can ldan pa'i// lho las dbu
8b4(rnying rgyud): mar 'gyur bar bya// yi ge a las mnyam ldan te// bden bral 'dab ma gnas pa la// sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya// shar gyi dang po de bzhin du// e yig ldan par gsungs pa'o// a yig dang po byang nas su// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang // me mtshams
8b5(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma dang ldan par// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// shar gyi gsum pa de la yang // thig le dang ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa// yi ge e yig lhan cig 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje me tog ma dang /
8b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bdug spos ma dang / rdo rje mar me ma dang / rdo rje dri chab ma zhes bya ba gyi'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste// me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig/ lho las dbu ma 'gyur ba ste// a yig thig le mnyam
8b7(rnying rgyud): gnon par// rtag par brjod par bya ba ste// shang las dang po bzung nas rtse// wa yig/ uni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan gyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i ni myong bar bya// chog dag mnyam por ldan pa ni// lho las dbu mar 'gyur ba'o//
9a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dngapa la rdo rjes mas dpas gsungasaso// ma yi gcig pa dang ldan par// dbus las dbum 'gyur byas te// mamatshams pa dang mnyam ldan pa'o// nya las bum pa yang bya// dbus pas dang pa brgya dang/
9a2(rnying rgyud): sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig ma ni sbyor bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u lig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal don yod shin tu dga' ba'i sems dpas gsungs na// oM rig
9a3(rnying rgyud): ga le dang ldan par// dbus las dbum 'gyur bar byas// ma mtshams 'dab ma can ldan zhig/ lho las dbum 'gyur ba bya// dbang ldan gyi rol pa bzung nas// thig leng ris brgyan byas te// shar gyi dbang po bzung nas s+ya// sku yig e dang mnyam ldan zhing // na/
9a4(rnying rgyud): bral 'dab mtshan du 'gyur// dpral bar thig las brgyan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// a yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma pa yin to// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig/ lto nas dbum 'byung bar bya// shar
9a5(rnying rgyud): las bzhi pa gung min pa// thig leng dong rnam par btsun// nub las dang po bzung nas sa// sgra min man sbyor bar bya// rlung ma thom sa phyi rol pa brdung nas// chogadrug dang ni mnyam ldan zhing // ma yig lhan cig 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das parang
9a6(rnying rgyud): chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rta mgron 'phang mtho'i lcags kyu ma dang / phag mgo mche zhags ma dang / nyi zla lcags sgrog ma dang / shi ba gso ba'i dril bu ma zhes bya ba sgo srung ma bzhi gsungs pa ste/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la
9a7(rnying rgyud): sngags kyitshogs ma rgyags na// ma ga na / la ban shi dug/ gag na du dum+b+ha/ ma gtas pa can pa 'ang/ na / byug
9b1(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma yang yon te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lha las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// bdan bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// byang nas dang po pa yang ste// dbus nas dbum pa ldan pa// dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas pa// thig
9b2(rnying rgyud): le dang ni ldan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig/ lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma can de
9b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin// byang las dang por 'gyur byas te// byang las tha ma dang ldan pa// mjug tu me mtshams 'dab ma can// zla chos thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig la dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma par 'gyur
9b4(rnying rgyud): te// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig/ lho las dbu ma yang yin te// byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste// me mtshams pa yi mgo gnon bya// dbus las tha ma gang yin pa// zla chos thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas
9b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// shar las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams can gyis gnon pa yi// dbus las dbu ma pa yang 'dod// byang las gnyis pa
9b6(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung ste// thig le ngoraro ldan par bya'o// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung ste// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya//
9b7(rnying rgyud): dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// i yig me mtshams ldan pa ste// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// lho las gnyis pa gang yin pa// thig le e yig sbyor bar bya// dbu las dbu ma de bzhin du// ma mtshams
10a1(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma ldan pa la// mya las dang la gyur byas shing // ma mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// byang las dang po bzhinadu// byang las rnam dang 'gyud pa// skra yig ma dang snang ba'o// gas bcom ldan 'das dpal dan yon shin n+ya dgang /
10a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rdo rjesems dpas gsungs so// thang nas dang tha~M bzung nas su// thig le ma mtshams yang dag ldan// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa dang ldan pa la// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang las dbu ma yang yin te//
10a3(rnying rgyud): dbus las tha ma dang ldan la// yi ge lhan cig 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le nga ro ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// skra yig i ni sngar byas te// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//
10a4(rnying rgyud): dbus las dbu ma pa dang ldan// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang // i yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dang po sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang // de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma// kun tu bzang mo
10a5(rnying rgyud): gsum paste// bzhi pa zad med sngon ma'o// dpa' mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma// sprin chen ma ni bdun pa ste// brkyang pa nam mkha'i lhan ma'o// gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang // sgo srung ma sogs yang bsdus te// me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni/
10a6(rnying rgyud): dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpa la rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag tu shes pa'o// oM yig thig la dang ldan pa// yi gaM aM yis ldan pa yi// rlung
10a7(rnying rgyud): mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang // mi mthams 'dang la gnas pa nyid// sgra yig/ u dang sbyor bar bya// shang lis dang po de bzhin du// dbus las dbum yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbung 'gyur byas te// bdan bral phyi rol pa brdzu nas//
10b1(rnying rgyud): dbus las tham pa yang bzung // dbang ldan 'dab ma gnas panyid// mag a dang mnyamathun pad+ma// rlung mtshams rtsong la gnas pa la// mug dragags namanyam par ldan// don badru bar yongs grags te// bdan rnal phyi la gnas pa la// ma mtshams 'ad ma
10b2(rnying rgyud): can dang ldan// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su// byang las dbu ma de bzhin te// sba yi ge u ni stor bar bya// me mtsham sa gyi rol pa de bzhin// nub las dang po pa dang ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa la yang // dbu ma'i mtha' yang de yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar
10b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa nyid// yi ge u dang mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las tham pa 'gyur nas// ma mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa// byad las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// 'dren pa la yig dang lhan cig/ dbus las dang po bzung nas swa// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya//
10b4(rnying rgyud): dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// lho las dbu ma de bzhin du// shar las dang po pa yang yin// rlung mtshams kyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig ldan par bya// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po a med par// zhes
10b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpa' rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// thig le u yig dang ldan te// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur te// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/
10b6(rnying rgyud): skra yig u dang ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste// dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni// lnga par yongs su grags pa ste// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byung las bzhi pa gang yin pa//
10b7(rnying rgyud): ga mi dang // dbras las dang pa'adrang nas pa// mi mtshams 'dab ma can nga dra// dbus las tham ma te// dang ldan 'das gnas rje// bla min man sbyar ba bya// shang las gsum sa gang yin pa// sgra mig man thor bar gyu/
11a1(rnying rgyud): smra/ / gas/ sman sa du na /
11a2(rnying rgyud): grabs pa'o// rlung ma tshams kyi rol gnas pa la// jig la yig sbyor te// mkhas pas la na gnyis brjod par bya// dngas las dbus ma yang bzung ste// lha las dbum bzhin la// ma mtshams 'dab mtshan dang ldan// rgya las dang po brgyad nas su// thig la dang
11a3(rnying rgyud): mnyam stor ldan// nub nas dbu ma bzung dus su// yi ge me dang mnyam ldan bya// dbang rten gyi rol gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// maM mtshams 'ding mar gnas pa la// swa yig e ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa// du ba las dngapo
11a4(rnying rgyud): brla su/ san sa dang kyildan pa ste/ pa sa yig 'an par bye// bdu gong nga sri zags // shar mi ga ga d-i'i/ men med skor ba bya// dbus pas kyim mgyu / sa kyirol pa la yang // mig me ldan
11a5(rnying rgyud): dbus nas dbum pazung nus su// oM las gsum par 'gyur zlas te// mamatsho pas gdan ni stir byas nas// shar nas dang po bzung nas swa// ya~Mga~M a tshig ldan pa mo// dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te// bden rnal 'ad ba mar gnas pa la// sgra yag e dang sbyor ba yi//
11a6(rnying rgyud): dbus las tha ma yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// pra yig u yis sbyong bar bya// nub kyi dang po bzung nas su// dbyangs yig e dang sbyar bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra
11a7(rnying rgyud): yig u yis brgyan byas te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa ya ba// sgra yig u dang sbyong bar bya// bden bral 'das mang gnas pa la// sgra yig u yis brgyan pa ste// bden bral 'da' mer gnas pa ni// gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan// rlung mtshams phyi rol
11b1(rnying rgyud): smras du la// nga sa na
11b2(rnying rgyud): rnam sa da sa
11b3(rnying rgyud): sa
11b4(rnying rgyud): na nas
11b5(rnying rgyud): gi ga sa na smra s+ho/ da rna/
11b6(rnying rgyud): sa/
12a1(rnying rgyud): dbyas la sa bum dpa tu// bamamams dang napas// sgyob 'gyu ba bya// dang ldan tshum tanas// thal ga sa ba \u0f7f// rju pa la' ba snang gnas paya // ga nan ba ga// da san/
12a2(rnying rgyud): pa gang len pa// e yig ma mtshams pa dparan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le yi yig ldan par bya// byung na sa dbu ma phul nas su// de nas dbus nas thams// nub kyi dang po rtag tu ni// a yig med par brjod par \u0f7f// zhes bcom ldan 'das /
12a3(rnying rgyud): don sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams kyi ma pa bzung nas// thig le u yig stong bar bya// dbus gas bus de bzhin du// ma mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// rgyu las dbum 'gyur bar bya// shar las dang po gang yin pa// dasreg oM yis brtan pa ste//
12a4(rnying rgyud): ldan gyi rol gang yin pa// skra yig oM ni sbyor bar bya// nyo las dang po gang yin pa// gnyis pa ru ni sbyor byas la// thig la i yig ldan par bya// de yang drug par 'gyur ba ste// kyang las dbu ma de bzhin du// dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te// nub las dang
12a5(rnying rgyud): rtag tu ni// a yig med par 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bsrung nas// thig le e yig ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang // me mtshams snyan dang ldan pa ma/
12a6(rnying rgyud): las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// dbus las tha ma bzung nas su// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang // dbyas las dang po bzung nas su// skra yig a ni spong bar bya// dbang ldan gyi rol pa nyid la// skra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha
12a7(rnying rgyud): bzung nas su// rlub las dang pa yang brdur ste// oM log med par byas dran// mkha' 'grom dra grags pa'o// ga rA \u0f7fd+ha mas te// kr-i hU~M nas byib bdi// rdorjen pa 'byong mdag yin// hUMn n+na trA~M// d+ha 3 khAg 'ju 'dra bang hU~M/
12b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rngam pa' 'gramadag yin// rlu ma tshams kyi rol pa bzung nas// yig ma dang ldan par bya// dbus las dbu mang bzhin te// ma mthabs 'dab ma stan ldan par// stolas dbum 'gyur bar bya// ma mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// sgra yog sa dang ldan pa la/ nga /
12b2(rnying rgyud): las dang po 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// thig la yang dag ldan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// thig le nga ro yang dag ldan// dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang // yig a dang ldan pal//
12b3(rnying rgyud): rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur// me mtshams 'od ba mar gnas pa nyid// byung las dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbum pa yang bzung // e yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i// b+h+yonas dbum 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// chag drug oM yig
12b4(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mthoms 'dab ma can ldan pa'o// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur pa'o// oM yig dang ni ldan pa yi// bden dal 'dab
12b5(rnying rgyud): mor gnas de bzhin// lho las dang po de bzhin du// yi ge oM yig ldan pa yi// byang las tha ma yang yin te// dbang ldan 'dab ma gnas pa la// zla dzes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
12b6(rnying rgyud): mematshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// d+ha chos thig la gtsug gi zhal// dbus las tha ma yang de bzhin// skra yig a deng stong pa yi// rlung mtshams kyi ros par 'gyur te// dbang ldan gyi rol gnas nyid la// mA marnams stan dang ldan pa ste// sgra yi ga yo dang stor bar bya//
12b7(rnying rgyud): par yongs su grags pa yin// dbus las dbum pa nyid dang // me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// sgra yig me dang sbyor nas su// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa yang // sgra yig i dang spyo byed ti// tshig drag lhan cig 'dod pa'o// de dag
13a1(rnying rgyud): mad rjon 'dzin ma la sogs pa grwa'i lha mo la so gla bzhi rnams kyil// ma tog ma rogs 'dus pa dang // sgo srung ma sogs 'dus paste// b+hA ba'i dkyil 'kha ba tshul gyis ni// ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med par
13a2(rnying rgyud): shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo rje bems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor la/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma bzung byas te// bden bral phyi rol pa la sogs// dbus las bzhi pa gang
13a3(rnying rgyud): yin pa// sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang // dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// rtseg mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma yang yin te//
13a4(rnying rgyud): dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba// brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin// byang nas tha mar de bzhin du// oM yig me mtshams dang ldan pa// byang nas dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa yang // me mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas su// rlung
13a5(rnying rgyud): mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// me mtshams pa stan ldan byas te// tshig drag i yis sbyor bas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// bden bral gyi rol gnas pa yang // me mtshams pa yi gnon pa yi// dadzul
13a6(rnying rgyud): las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// byang las dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig a dang ldan pa yis// byang nas gnyis pa gang yin pa// shar las gsum pa gang yin dang // byang nas dang po yang yin te// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang nas dbu ma pa la yang // dbus las tha ma dang sbyor
13a7(rnying rgyud): te// yi ge i dang gcig par 'dod// sgo nas dbu ma bzung nas su// chog drag lci ba kho na'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig la u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma pa bzung ba// me mtshams pa ston
13b1(rnying rgyud): ngatanan du ba tu na na rgyu rgyu tu rgyu du rgyu tu
13b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa su
13b3(rnying rgyud): gasgrasu su
13b4(rnying rgyud): ma sa
14a1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yi// sgyu mtshams kyi rol pa 'gyur te// dbus las dbum pa nyid pa// sgra sdig min sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan gyi rol ba la snang // dbus las dbu ma dang wAb+ha// dbus las dang po bzung pa dang // b+hung nas dbum pa la yang // dbus las tha ma dang b+h+ya hA//
14a2(rnying rgyud): kyib babyung // de bzhin dbus las rnam yang// ga spyad spyor ba // mi migs mtshams can ldan pa'aM// b+ha bas dang po gyur bar bya// badzin pal rgya la pa brgya pa// yig mni byu bar b+ha/ b+hung las bani pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'a
14a3(rnying rgyud): can gyi ston// rlung mtshams kyi rol po bzung nas// thig le mag sbyor ba bya// dbu ma'i gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po 'gyur bar bya// de la a yig med ces pa// bdag gis thams rnyed du ni bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
14a4(rnying rgyud): rlung mtshams kyi ri lang bzung nas// me mtshams pa yi spyan dang ldan// tshig drug i yig wAn pa nI// sgras padag gi yi ge ste// dang po par ni yongs su grags// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma yang yin la// dbus las tha ma dang skor te// spyi yig e dang sbyor ba yi// mkhas
14a5(rnying rgyud): pas lan gnyis brjod par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang // thig le u yig gis brgyan te// tha mar yi ge a la yang // thig le dang ni ldan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// chog drug
14a6(rnying rgyud): oM yig sbyong bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang las dbu ma pa la yang // dbus las za ma dang sbyar te// sgra yig a yis brgyan pa bya// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// grwa yig maM dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma nyid la yang // dpung ldan bya
14a7(rnying rgyud): ba bajung sa// dbus las dbu pa dang gyur to// sgra lag oM dang ldan pa ni// rtag par bri bar gyur pa yin// shang las dang pi bzung nas ni// ma mtshams pa yig dan dang ldan// dbus las tha ma bzung nga ba// bla 'igs dang sbyor bar bya// shar las dang po btunas /
14b1(rnying rgyud): mams pa la gang na// dam pas rnam pa dang ma// rdum las byu sa pa gdus/ ga sa sang sakyang ba bya// napa dmung dang zhidang / thegadrag rtsub nan gas pa ldan 'dad dang 'a nga zhangs pa ni'i do
14b2(rnying rgyud): byug dang / bdag mi dpe gyug nga/ gas brgyan pa cig sa kyi ba ni bskyes // 'arigs gas / mtshugs rna da/ / das
14b3(rnying rgyud): da di 'ang ma sa di sa dpa lon pas ga / dpal pa bang nga gyu pa pal rji sa sngags sa / mag gas sa na // me na
14b4(rnying rgyud): phying la pa la yang // rlung pani pa ga ldan pa// dbang na dus man da // da mams pani bgang dpa/ gadrug sum ga byung bar bya// 'ad na gyi las pa canan/ mag+sas bcwan pa te/ byungs pani pa dang
14b5(rnying rgyud): man dang ldan// dang mA lus bzhi pa gang dzi pa// sku rig sang sna ba // da zhin dbus las dbulal/ ga dang nyas pa sa// 'din rnal phyi pa bstanas// skum nga sgyur ba // khye yis dge pa gang yi pa/
14b6(rnying rgyud): patsan dang 'an/ di pa la phyi rol pa bsnunas// chog ga rgyanyam por ldan pa yi// dbus las tham pa dang ldan// de bzhin padan bral gyi ma pa/ mi mau dang sbyor bar bya// byung las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dang mtshan dang ldan// rjes ni
14b7(rnying rgyud): gra drug mgri sa dang ma ma ldang gro/ myo ba myi tu kyis las dbu dri rnam sa pa'i nyan pa skyelas da ma gyu bya/ mtshams 'dapa' dban da / bye papa dang skyeng ba'i ba/ ngas
15a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// dbus pas dbu ma de bzhin du// lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// de bzhin nub kyi dang po yang // lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// me mtshams pa yi spyan ldan pa// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// thig le a yig ldan pa yi// ner chen rdo rje nyi ma yin//
15a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma'i stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar // bden bul gyi rol gnas pa dang / byang las dang po gang yin dang // bus las dbu ma sbyor ba dang // chogadag mnyam por ldan pa/
15a3(rnying rgyud): rna las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzhin du// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lha las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dib ma can de bzhin// bya
15a4(rnying rgyud): las dang po stor ba yi// byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la// thig le u yig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang // me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma
15a5(rnying rgyud): 'brar bar bya// byang las bzhi ba gang yin dang // ma mtshams 'ag tu ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de ba zhin // thig le dang ni mnyam ldanan// zhes ma maldan 'das dpa' rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbyis las dbu med pazhin
15a6(rnying rgyud): me mtshams pa yi gdan sbyor ba'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// shar las dang po bzung ba dang // me mtshams pa yi mgor sbyor ba'o// dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rnyed mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// cho ga drag e yig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
15a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ma dang / mdzod gter ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog ma dang / mchod chen mo zhes bya ba lha mo bzhi gsungs so// e yig thig le dang ldan pa// oM yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan
15b1(rnying rgyud): der// byung bas dang pa rang yid te// dbus las dbu mdo brtan dang // ma yig ma mtshams can ldan pa'i// lto lasang blam 'gyur bar bya// 'a nas tham bzung nas sa// dbus pa dbums pa'i te// min dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las zam bcu nasus// d+han/
15b2(rnying rgyud): kyai dang ba dA badzin te// rtag par mi med 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gisungs so// oM yig dzig le dang ldan po// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// ma ma rnams pa yi sbran sbyin pa'i// ny+tsa las dbum 'gyur bar bya// oM yig se mtshams
15b3(rnying rgyud): pa ldan pa'i// dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yig ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang las dang pa yang yin te// mematshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// rlu mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// chog tA/ yi ge i dani sbyar// do ni 'gyur bar the tshomached// ces bcom ldan 'das
15b4(rnying rgyud): dpe 'a dza sems dpas gsungs su// yi ga zig la dang ldan dang // thig sa e yig ldan pa yi// tshu las dang pa 'gyur bar gyi// mig ya dang sa/ maldan pa'i/ de nas thang ga dang s+ho// dbus las tha ma bzhin du// oM yi gang ngani spyong pa 'i// de kyi
15b5(rnying rgyud): med ltar bar bya// cag drag o yig dang ldan pa'aM/ rmang ma rnams ral par gyur pa // zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs sa// oM yug zag po dang ldan pa// dbus las dbum yang yin te// maM ma rnams pa yi ng+ge pa / ma/
15b6(rnying rgyud): dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus lus tha mde bzhin du// yi ge e dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te// de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang // yi ge a dang mAnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyir la 'gyur bar bya// thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i//
15b7(rnying rgyud): mchims kyi rol par 'gyur ro// nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mnga' gzhu 'dzin ma dang / rngos pa dz+rI ma pa/ dzan+da nyim mi dang / rdo rdzalas// bya za ba mnas bya ba'i rdo nyi pa'i lham pazhi gsungasas// gli ma sogs 'dus pa dang / sbrang mes gas
16a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra// gams gas na // kyi 'a du na sna du da rlom dang sngags sa/ sa/ rnabs 'azung bas bus kyi ba rtags pa//
16a2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa// de bzhin pa na thal phyi la pa// thig la A lag d+ha bar bya// dbus las yizhi pa gang yin dang // yi ge i dang mnyam ldan pa'i// blang gi tha ma 'gyur bar bya// ye ga~M u yig dang ldan pa'i// 'don thal phyi rol pa yin to// nga las bzhi pa
16a3(rnying rgyud): yin deng // thig le A yig dung ldan pa'i// rlung na tshams phyi ral pa 'gyur te// namachog rgya de'i gas gas te// thams cad dus sre ba rna bar gyi// las rnams thams cang 'grub pa ni// 'ang mis pa las bu badzin las dgang // zas bcom ldan pa sri /
16a4(rnying rgyud): ses dpas gsungs sa/ ga rje med de ldan pa// de brji pus las dbus pa// sgra ga yi nga sbyar ra bya// radang ldan rtsor yang bzhin na// dkris las dbul dang ldan pa// dbus pas dbu me parten te// mematshams pa brtan ldan der//
16a5(rnying rgyud): ma yang yin te// bying las bzhi pa gang yin dang // mi mtshams pa yi mnyam gnan pa'o// dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya// g+ha las dbu ma yang yed te// cho ga drag e yig ldan pa ni// tshogs pacwo zhes su grags// zhes bcom ldan 'dis dpang
16a6(rnying rgyud): dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// i yi ga dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma yang yin to// dbang ldan gyi rol pa bslang nas// dbus las dbu mi ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa
16a7(rnying rgyud): las / la bzung ba dang // dbus las dgra mthun pa sa// zing las dang po 'thar dwa // ga rjeg maldan pa'o// rlu ma tshams phyi rol pa yang yin// ta yi rgyal po'i kyil 'khar la// grog grags //
16b1(rnying rgyud): sung du chu // ngangag na ga rdzun da 'a // nga 'a sa 'du dug sa su ma na du/ nga sa / sa nga
16b2(rnying rgyud): sa du smra sa sa sa /
16b3(rnying rgyud): sa nga/ gsang bab maldan 'du// 'du dgas can pa dag bas na das de ra po'i/ grol de bye ga sa da
16b4(rnying rgyud): rdzum myu pa'i nga zhen sa/ sa
16b5(rnying rgyud): sus du / ma pa da na/ sa / na di sa /
16b6(rnying rgyud): pa bas pa/ rnam pa dgas pams / da // nga pa'i byung // dang gas / du ga gas sa/ 'dru ba nga du byag+sa/ sbyin pa /
16b7(rnying rgyud): na ngas 'dzid pa ma pa bzhin/ ting 'a la sags pa nims/ gang gi byed pa 'di // bzlams ni bri mi byed ba ga / 'i 'phru // ma gyis 'i / na pa 'i
16b8(rnying rgyud): yang 'dren pas
17a1(rnying rgyud): b+he// de nyid nyinir grub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i nid zab pa// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'dus kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang sran pa yang // tswi mrar sems can don du 'gyur// dpyi gan tu bzang gro 'i// ci bzhin byang sa
17a2(rnying rgyud): slod rjes 'gro// de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dud dang bdud las rgyal ba yin zhe na/ sems de kho na gdud yin te// sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs// rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni// bdag ni bdud nyid nye bar 'gro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das/ mngon
17a3(rnying rgyud): po byang chub pa dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rig pa ni// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ rang byin brlabs mchog 'grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po mthar byed dang / phyag na rdo rje yin
17a4(rnying rgyud): na// dbyer med so sor rtogs pa ni// sdang ba thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni// byang chub sems bdag brtan pa yin/ brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du// rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gi// phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te// des de bya
17a5(rnying rgyud): ni rdo rje yin// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// phani thabs la mkhas pa ste// 'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni// skye ba dag ni rigs yin no// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/ dngos kyi ba thams cad
17a6(rnying rgyud): chags phyir// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// kun grub zad med bde ba yin// bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do// gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir// mchog na pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po// dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir// dgyes pa dam pa
17a7(rnying rgyud): nyi maste// sbyin pa la sogs mchog smra ba phyir// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir// sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po// ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog
17b1(rnying rgyud): bya// del di ltar brnam ldan 'das rnam pa gsumad pan nen/ 'ad gtan gsum dag mtha' mas par// 'du phyer drid gsum ma thag gsung bdag/ thams cad byung ra da mchog gsum// 'dig tan gsum pa dag khams gas pa yan// da lang skang bcom
17b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das thams rje did len nan/ sems nan pas nams cher 'ad gas pa// mag so rnams cad len pa dag/ sems 'du byed kyi ga ba ste// kun bye rnanas pang khan phyur// mkhara' 'gros dkyus sa gsungs// rngams nga sa ngan pas pa
17b3(rnying rgyud): bzed// rnam par rtag pan la ngan par// badz+ra yimamatshan mang gsungs par// de 'di ltar btsam ldan 'das dang po snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi d+ha / gtan du sring pa yang dag 'grub// dbang phyu chen pa 'grub danA // dpa' ba 'dangs zlab Ta/
17b4(rnying rgyud): brtul pa'i rnyi ba dmaldan gas sa/ dud chags can pa phyir brdzam na// dam pa zang ma na d+ha dag / nga shid kyi na rnying ba dasu ma// mi gdam pa da meng ngo'o// de lta lta pa'i ba tha~Md kyil shes na/ dkyil la bang da dang
17b5(rnying rgyud): dang / da ci gang ga rje spangs pa dang // de nyid gisang ba ma shes na// rdo rjesams dpa' 'grub pa ldan// 'dad pa bcom ldan sems dpa te// de khanan 'did chags yang // rdo phyag na do ni/ du gas de dang m-i 'brel 'gyur// 'i gre 'greng bar rab 'byung /
17b6(rnying rgyud): zugs kyi sa' na nangs/ nga / ga da par nga gyu / da na no// dzu zhi kyi d+ma'i nga nga / ga med 'a thu/
17b7(rnying rgyud): du tu mye sa// na na rnam sa rgya sa
18a1(rnying rgyud): sa// mings na rtson 'arnabs// g-is bdag ston byed// lingaga' mad ba du byung ste// 'dug med du bzhugs nas // bangag zugs kyang du // gad na skye// b+ha gang pa dag 'dug na // dag sapag rnam pa
18a2(rnying rgyud): par snang bad gzugs dag 'ad// sra gnyis lan pa smra ba bya// te gang yi dag bcug nas su// de la hU~M y-ig brnam par \u0f7f// shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pa'i sgo nga // b+he gang long ga brgya gnas su// de la nI ye/ brnam par bya// khrag 'thu nga
18a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs dag ni// sgra gnyis ldan par byar// nya gang li dag bcu gnas su// de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pa spro byad// b+ha gang yang ga bcug nas su// de la traM yig bsgom par bya// nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod/
18a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis ldan pa sgraH'o// b+ha gar ling gA brgyag nas su// de la d+hI yig bsgom par bya// d+hi ma dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni// sgra gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang // snying po yongs su grags pa yin//
18a5(rnying rgyud): sa / na su da sa du du ga sun ngas / // dang dza ra
18a6(rnying rgyud): na/ kun 'grub zang med bde ba ni/ bdang chen po zhes su grag/ de ni rdo rje 'grubab ste// don yang dam tshig 'da' dka' yin// de la ji lta'i bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi do ni yin zhen/ ji ltar gnas su khe 'khor lo// de ltar sde dang 'dra ba bzhid// 'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// de 'dri
18a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi/ dkyil 'khor mdon sum mthang ba las// sod nams brtag pa ci 'jug byas byas pa yang de bzhin no// de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhen/ mkhas pas
18b1(rnying rgyud): u sa rgyan pa ste/ sa sa // /
18b2(rnying rgyud): sa 'a sa
18b3(rnying rgyud): skyes dang sa ga dzum ma paji byar tsamadzad 'ang rgan pa'i ngas thabede se pa myed ni/ de stong babad par dbyo 'dzong // ni sa'i ngami nyi thopa so// rtsub pa dacing ga'ang rtag pa'i
18b4(rnying rgyud): ni ga sa du pas bya/
18b5(rnying rgyud): ma // dus mas pa sa
18b6(rnying rgyud): da ma 'ini sring sa ga su sum bya
18b7(rnying rgyud): ga rjod// mas po nga bye/ sa ma pa sa ba// de 'a ga sa sa nga zi pa ngasu ma da tha ya can// ngongs sad pa da
19a1(rnying rgyud): // khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces// dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin// de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnan pas// g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas
19a2(rnying rgyud): su// de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can// rdo rje snying po gtso bo 'gaci// de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na// dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas// thams cad dbang
19a3(rnying rgyud): phyag che ru 'phags// grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin// de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'bung zhes bya rnams
19a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog/ so sor rtog lnga nyi ma ste/ bya ba la ni rta mchog dang // chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya de bzhin yang /
19a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen// chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis// rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/ 'brog byed ma
19a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzin byed ma// gzung thar mdang tshe sbyin ma// nam ma khar 'gro dang lha mo drag/ mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags// gang gis skra ni bstan gyur na// de la dpral ba bstan par bya// mig la ston pa gang yin pa// de la lte ba bstan par bya// gang gis lte ba bstan pa na// de la mar+tha ni rang
19a7(rnying rgyud): rma bstan// gang gis mamanu rab bstanan// de las ni rab tu bstan// gang gis kye ni baspyan 'gyur na/ de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur// gang gis b+ha ga nga stan gyur na// de la pang ga bstan par bya// gang gis rje bar bstan na ni// de la bar ni bstan par bya// gang gis b.ran
19b1(rnying rgyud): smra// ngal na ma la brtan pa ma// gang gis nang ma'i bstan na sa// da ldam nam na sa// gangags pa tha 'ang bldan pa// deg ldan brdzun pa // gdagras sa sa gas nga na// du na/
19b2(rnying rgyud): ni brnam par bya// gang gis parang bstan na ni// de la zhags pa bstan par bya// gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na// de la mdung thang bstan par za// gang gis seMn mo bstan na ni// de la na ma rab tu bstan// gang gis lnga
19b3(rnying rgyud): tshur bstan na ni// de la mtshams ni bstan par bya// gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na// de la bshang gci bstan par bya// gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na// de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o// gang gis te skad byed gyur na//
19b4(rnying rgyud): smras / su sa / sa / ga sal ma
19b5(rnying rgyud): mig dang khro gnyer can// nu mdag ni mi sdug pa// sA ni rnam par nyams pa dang // gtsug gis bskor ba zhes bya'o// ri ma gsum gyis mongs su bskor// de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni// tri shrI la dz+wa la dang mi long dang // rul
19b6(rnying rgyud): gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang // b+h+rUM gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan// 'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'grum// 'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya// glo blar mi dga' tha ba dang // don med par yang 'jig pa'o// rkang pas ral gri
19b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzib dang // tri shU la dang 'dra ba'i tshul// skad kyang tha rag 'dra ba yi// de ni rtag par gyur pa'o// mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa// dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhesaH// zhes bcom 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsung
20a1(rnying rgyud): sa nasu
20a2(rnying rgyud): sa
20a3(rnying rgyud): yig dzin ma nga ldan pa'i//
20a4(rnying rgyud): sa 'dzin gyur rjes// bzlas pa'i rjem bud la // rtag pa rnams ngas bangs// mchog ga nga 'gab pa'o// de la di ltar rjes m+b+ha phy-i ba deng ldan pa'i badzub pa rnams cad kyi rgyal man//
20a5(rnying rgyud): ga ma dang ldan pang /
20a6(rnying rgyud): nus dang pa yang yi // shar nas dang brdzu nas / nga sa yin ldan / rlung margyams ste ma pa brdza sa/ ma ma ni tur bya // lha las dbum pa
20a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid theg la dang ldan pas/
20a8(rnying rgyud): pa de 'a 'dis/ rjes su byu ba 'an par shA/ nyelas da 'i rjems/ gnyis pa la ni lda / nan tan gyis / sa ma mag ra
20a9(rnying rgyud): su
20b1(rnying rgyud): ba / danasam dgyes na/ phyogs sa dun ga// ngag pa dang ldan par// ga sa g+sa / spyanan / da gyu pa pa hA// ze byas la na/ na da pa
20b2(rnying rgyud): ldan pa// shar gyi dang po ldan par bya// cho ga drag u l-ig ldan pa yaM// dbus kyi tham ldan par bya// thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed de// zhag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bsgru gyu 'grub// de sbyin kyi mo gan
20b3(rnying rgyud): par// ci 'dodu 'dod pa'i d+hi ba yis// klan bzang kun byed de bzhin te// langs pa'am ni 'jug pangam// 'gro ba yis sam 'azeng ba'am// bzhed pa dang ni ska bal// gang dang rje cing bzhin// gang gang dbang po'i la
20b4(rnying rgyud): du// gang gang dede'i rang bzhin du// rang gi mnya ma gzhag med sbyong bas// rang gis rig pa'i lce 'byin no// de nyid spyor ba de pas ni// thams cad yon 'grungab pa'o// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad na// rtag tu ma po sa
20b5(rnying rgyud): klu ba// sangs rgyas thams cadapa nyam gyu bya// mkhas pa ga da pas thog/ de tis pan 'grol te// da thub thams cad da bang drug gyuro// sangs rgyas byams cad dang mas pa da du mkhal po sa
20b6(rnying rgyud): bar mchog las rdzasasu smye pa dang thun pa sgrub pade rtag pa sten shuH gnyis pa'o// / de skang du rdzogs rjems chags pa da bug rdzu rna ma dang rgyas pos// gsal bar rjes skugs dad pa bta par byin pa las/ dpa
20b7(rnying rgyud): da pa sa pas dpe sa nga gas pa rje su bathug// dam dga' ba shin khyor bskal nga mi'i shi bye / la 'i kyi nga bzhi nga rgyas su 'bya ba'i nga dzin na// das dag baman
21a1(rnying rgyud): DU / sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub par// dga' ba rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho nas songs su grub pa bde pa las dam pa'i gsang chen chung rtsi ma phra ma 'ang yongs su rdzogs so//
21a2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi 'di na dang ba'i snying po mchog/ bde ba chen po'i mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po// kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir/ kun mtshogs yi dbang phyug nyid ni sbyin pa'o// mtha' yas thub med thogs pa med pa'i
21a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// rgyal chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi// mkha' dung 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngas grub 'phel bar smin// gdod ma tha ma med pa gang dag gis// rdzogs byed med pa nus pa ma yin no// sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa
21a4(rnying rgyud): dang // ma dad pa dang lkog slab dang mdag pa// rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba yang // de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no// gang gis khyim gzung ba gang gis 'grub pa dang // bdag gis ji ltar ston
21a5(rnying rgyud): bslab par byed pa'am// mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste// dngos grub mchog gis rgyas pa'i las dag me 'grub pa'o// gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang // gzug ma sogs thams cad 'di la ji lta
21a6(rnying rgyud): mas pa bzhin// yig hUM yang ji ltar rab tu 'ded par bris byas ni// des ni rang 'di dngos grub chag bzhin 'thob// sems cad don du las dag byed dang mi yin pas// rdul ba dag gis rnam par dag pa 'di lan// bgags medang bzhin
21a7(rnying rgyud): du ni bdud kyang med pa ste/ rtog pa yis kyang dngam grub 'phel skabs zin gyis rlobs// gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa la// bdud nyid du ni mi 'grom brtan nyid kyang min// brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de//
21b1(rnying rgyud): myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub par bstan par 'gyur byed do// gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni// mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang // chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang smras pa dang // reg
21b2(rnying rgyud): rkyen yang rtag par bdugags thab byod/ denan rje rgya gaskyes tshal bathams nas // 'dzum pa pathams mtha' pa dam pa da// srin deg zungs mi rnam ldan ma chag chen gajugs shegs/ blan /
21b3(rnying rgyud): de pa rgyun la danigs su ga sa yidu sas dus gas rang ma sbyi na
21b4(rnying rgyud): na sa
21b5(rnying rgyud): su /
21b6(rnying rgyud): rgya gar
21b7(rnying rgyud): pAl ni mngon par brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par srung ba'i mkha' 'gro skamapade ba'i mchog ces thab khring rgyad stong pa las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal ba brgyad rgya bdun pa rdzogs so//
21b8(rnying rgyud): kyim nga da kyi stsu/ don di so kyim di ga 'i sa phrang kyi na gtan na mas na namangs ma
22a1(rnying rgyud): rnas ga// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad mchog tu gas sa
22a2(rnying rgyud): chen po 'ad ma tshig sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rdul 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i pha rol tu can
22a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ mtha' med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang thugs rin po
22a4(rnying rgyud): rdorje mchog tu gsang ba zlo gsang thig la chen po'i bud med kyi dkrol na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs sa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings su rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rdal 'byor gyi dbang phrag chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rna
22a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa'i gsang ba chen po'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis kun tu khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
22a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang // me long lta bu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya
22a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang lhag chen po dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
22b1(rnying rgyud): po dang / rlung gi ye ga rje rnas bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag chen po dang / me'i phra shos rdza nas bya ba'i rnal 'byar gyi bang phyag can pa dang / chu'i ye shes do zhes bya ba dul 'byor kyang bangar phyugacon pa dang / sa na du gas bya ba 'dal 'thor ba dang /
22b2(rnying rgyud): rgyag ched pa dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes chen po'i'adzi zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dang sgrag chen po dang / gzugs kyi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam byor byung bang phyag chen po dang / sgra'i dbang po'i ye she rdzogs byu rnal
22b3(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / dri'i dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / ro'i dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / reg gi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'gyor gyi dbang phyug ce/
22b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa nga/
22b5(rnying rgyud): ji zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / ban tub dang po'i ye shes rdo rdo zhes bya ba da la byir gyi dbang ga chen pa dang / gsung ga dbang dang ye shes rang zhes bya ba rnal 'byod kyi dbang phyug che po dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rje sa
22b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byong gyi dbang phyag rkyen pa dang / zhib ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdul 'byung gli dbang phyag chen pa dang / gdul dga' ba'i ye shes rjo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byar gyi dbang phyag chen po dang / tshul bu 'arjed pa'i ye shes don zhes bya ba'i rdul tsu
22b7(rnying rgyud): dbang phyog zed bang / mitog gi mtshan tshwa'i ye she rje rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byung ci de'i phyog can pa dang / rab tu dag ba sa shes dza rje zhes bya ba na la 'byor myi bang phyug can dang / dbang gis shes rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang chug
23a1(rnying rgyud): na sa dang nyima'o khro ba la shes rlong+ge zhes bya ba'i rdul 'byor gyi dbang sgragacan pa dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i shes dkyigs bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang pal can po dang / dung rdza san badrang pa'i do
23a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phug chen po dang / 'pho ba 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang thug chen po dang / gzhon nu'i ye shes sa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dab rdzu gzin pa dang / rje ye shes rjezhes byab
23a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdzaH zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / go cha'o ye shes rdo rjes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dpar phyag man
23a4(rnying rgyud): dang / yang dag par za bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po dang /
23a5(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / pad+ma dmar po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mchod pa'i ye shes
23a6(rnying rgyud): rdorje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa tshad med pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /
23a7(rnying rgyud): rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / gdung bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mtshon mo dang / myos par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mtshan mo dang / gsod
23b1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / rdo rje dbyings phrag ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i
23b2(rnying rgyud): na su
23b3(rnying rgyud): khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / 'dzum par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang / rmongs par byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ces
23b4(rnying rgyud): kyi kyin dum sgyu sa na /
23b5(rnying rgyud): sdigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / tshig byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'jigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang /
23b6(rnying rgyud): khrig la dga' ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / gcod byed ces bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'phyan ma zhes bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang / ngag 'thogs pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / zas su sha rlon pa za bra zhes bya ba
23b7(rnying rgyud): sa sun bu ma ba 'dzi / ni byed po bya sa nga pa ma / na rgyang sa bya 'i du na
24a1(rnying rgyud): pag dang / the dang / byedang/ byel dang / radang / bya shAR+sha// rgyu dang / byano dang / blo mdang/ ma'i gang a da// 'thuthun dang / yo gas dag/ gabadang / bla cad/
24a2(rnying rgyud): da/ sanya dang / bya'aju pa/ theg pa dang / rje 'brug par byed pa ma dag/ dadug la grags pa mthol pa ma mtham mi mnyam pa dang mnyam sa/ chos kyi dmi sa pa la 'gro gyi ma 'ogs g.yeg 'dus byed
24a3(rnying rgyud): sa thobam bya mi ba byas mazin pa thogs rnams kyim ma byed pan tshums so// denas pan pahA rtswa 'dus par bcan pa ca pa dang bdangasems dpa' shis 'as pa gang
24a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i bang ma zhes thab ting ba dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa chags pa'i dul pa chan pas sa rnam par ral bdang / babyin pa'i gar dang / klu nga / sal stan dang / gzug sa dang bla dang drod med pa/ rig pa'i
24a5(rnying rgyud): pab ba khyad par 'phags par thagyur pa dang / rol ba la sogs pa'i dge pa'i dge' bda' gyur pa'i gang ste ra stan cing/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyam chen pas 'phags par gyur pa dang / rnam pa sa tshogs kyisri rin pa dang / rnam pa
24a6(rnying rgyud): byung bdang / rnam pa tshogs kyi thod pa dang / rnam pa mags kyis dang byed pa dang / narapa tu tshogs kyis sa par byung ba dang / rnam pa chags rgyas pan 'jigs par byed 'dang / rna' bre tshogs kyi sa dpa' bar byed pa dang / ru
24b1(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'debs par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs chen po shin tu dge ba'i bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa bde ba'i ros bskal pa brgya stong mang po bye phrag stong tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jug pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho
24b2(rnying rgyud): skyod skye/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi gzigs mi dgongs dgongs pa yang nye bar mi 'jog/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu dga' ba phyin ci log nye bar 'jog par
24b3(rnying rgyud): yang mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma
24b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa sel bar yang me mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa mi 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mkhros pa khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi
24b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po la sogs pa dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen
24b6(rnying rgyud): po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar mi mdzad/ rnam par 'dul bar yang mi mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar
24b7(rnying rgyud): bzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi 'dzum pas gzigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo
25a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dbyangs kyi bskul zhing gsal ba btab pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal khyod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni bde ba grub pa ste// rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya cha sras su bcas pa rnams// yun ring stong pa nyid bsgom pa
25a2(rnying rgyud): nI shin tu gtangs pA la// dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// kye/ 'dod chags doni dri med spyod pa kun tu bzang po spyod pa ste// dag pa rdo rje 'dod par dam tshig mchog ni byed mdzad nas// dka' ba rnam pa drug po stod pa
25a3(rnying rgyud): shin tu gdungs pa yis// rab tu dges dbang 'dod pa med la nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las byung ba yi ye shes chus// rin chen 'bar ba byang chub sems ni rnam byung nas// rgyal ba thams cad kun gyi dbu ni bsgoms pa la// dri ma
25a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas// pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzad mthong bas// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can brlag 'gyur ba// sbyor ba gzhan med ma thogs bshad par gsol/
25a5(rnying rgyud): rje sems khyong dag mchog bde bar byed pa'i mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de// rgyal ba kun gyi gzungs kyi sgra ni rab mthong ba// thams cad bde ba'i bsgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
25a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs des bskul ba zugs su chung nas bzhengs te/ brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzang cing / zhal 'dzum pa 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang /
25a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sa sa su du sa sus su sa
25b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ rlung la kun du khyab nas me'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab par mdzad nas/ chu'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ chu'i khams/
25b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu khyab nas/ sa'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad de/ ri dang sems dang / sna tshogs dang / phra ba dang / sdom pa dang / bud med dang /
25b3(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu dang / rgan po dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung po las gyur pa thams cad/ bcom
25b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar cher gyur nas yang 'dus nas/ phyag gar dang bcas pas
25b5(rnying rgyud): thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gis 'drud pas gsol ba btab pa// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi// zla gsang thig le dgra 'byed pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan phyod
25b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi ma skyes pas// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med nam mkha' dang 'dra
25b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng byas te// nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung // pad+ma dmar po mchog gi mdo// 'dod chags de nyid gsang chen po// thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi mchog/ la dang
26a1(rnying rgyud): sngags sor bzhang /
26a2(rnying rgyud): ar ni yang dag ldan// yang dag mdzes pa'i 'greng ba'i dus// rdzogs ye shAs sna tshig sI// blugs thig la mchog nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun du bzung pas
26a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ngo mtha
26a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la mnapa tu gsol/ a la la ho// sems dpa' bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang ba'i phyir// chags pa med pa'i bde mchog kun tu myong mdzad bzhengs nas mnabs// mchog tu gsang ba'i bde
26a5(rnying rgyud): la rol cing dam bcus 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ ho// sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang nyon mongs sngo skams gzir ba yis// rmongs med bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis
26a6(rnying rgyud): bskul te 'o/ bar mdzod// 'gro kun tshangs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub la mi ston cing // bde mchog bdud kyi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ a la la to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nam mkha'i dbyings thams
26b1(rnying rgyud): da bya bdag ldan sa/ dbatsun gshegs pa thams cad tu blang pa pa zugs ga' bral bar byung bas rgyab ting pa na ldarnams par zugs// rang gagrags pags pa jig 'di las shin du dbyas brtsan pa bang dun dang /
26b2(rnying rgyud): 'od zer gyi tshogs byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po thugs thig le'i dbras su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas te/ skyeng dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang
26b3(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams la gsal bar byas nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde byas mnyes par byas te slar de nyid tu log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde 'u'i bdag po snying po'i gsang ba mchog zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzla
26b4(rnying rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog bye de'i chen por ltung ba'i snying po des bsgral ba na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i
26b5(rnying rgyud): thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu stug por gyur par bslabs te/ rang rang gi sgra bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par gyung ba gyu
26b6(rnying rgyud): to// de nas la la ni spyan pad+ma 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur cing bzlog ste/ smin ris g.yobs/ sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi ze// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing /
26b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yas// bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur// sminam bsgyur cing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin tu gnan pa yis// sor mo tha ma rnams bsgyur bas// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gar mdzad de// rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad
27a1(rnying rgyud): na na su du ma na ma sa na nga // la ya
27a2(rnying rgyud): byed chen po myang bar mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde chen bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa// badz+ra dmar la phye mdzad de// 'dod
27a3(rnying rgyud): chags bral dgyes rnam bsgyur bas// pad+ma drabs gar mdzad cing // pad+ma rnal 'byor ma dkyil gyis// brjid pa'i spun gyis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan pad+ma gnas par gyur// phyag gi rtse mo sor mo'i mtha'// rnam
27a4(rnying rgyud): par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing // phyag slar khong stong pad+ma yis// glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i sprin gyis long long pos// sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas
27a5(rnying rgyud): par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bder chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang bzlagasang thig le chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs
27a6(rnying rgyud): padang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / lus kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyis bzhed pa bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs
27a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le la sdug pa gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba thig le'i dbus su 'di zeng des dgyes pa bskyed cing / drangs bcug bcing sa da'ang nga byas/ nyid kyi phrad
27b1(rnying rgyud): daspyang gas sung byas pacan pa gdanasas bya rnam par tshul ba zhes bya 'i ting pa nas sems par zhugs na/ 'di dag/ shegs pa thams cad kya gtugs pa sngags dgu la sa bya ba'i ngakyil la rgyam pa da shen
27b2(rnying rgyud): 'i 'di ba chen po nyid kyi sgrang nga gsung dang thugs rdo rje ldes phung // dky-iyul bar nyid kyi yul gyis su// tsheg sbyor bas s+ho byas te// thig dang mthun pa kyil 'khor don// sbyor ba'i gur gyis gang bya zhing // de ltar yang dag brtag pa /
27b3(rnying rgyud): skye kyil / gas pa dag 'aM kyi la Sh+T+rin// rdorje sems pa 'dapa 'as snang/ nas g+sa/ kyi lam pa mi shes kyis brtags pa// snying po rgyag sa sngags rigs kyi ra bas
27b4(rnying rgyud): ba tab pa// rdzog shes par bri bar bya// wabazhi 'i la sgo bu zhib// tribebs pa zhi nga yang dag ldan// thig pazhi yod sasna bris pa s+ho// klub bzlad ma chog yu dang gnas// kun tu yongs sum pa ni/ a ba de yi bus bcas pa/
27b5(rnying rgyud): bdun zin pa'i byud ba// gcib dgang bri ba bya// da ni cig drag bcas pa ste// mig bcu gsum ldan pa ste// yi ga mchog tu 'a ba ste// rlung gling dkyi la 'khor yang dag 'byung // shas btsun gyis de'i mdun du// mi byed mi byung
