27b6(rnying rgyud): hrIhU~M// dran por tshig dang 'dzin par bcas// bzhi mug tsug tu byas pa'o// da mi t+ta phyog sa ni// mi smra ba mi yi 'i mchogargya cha ma shes mchag thams cad // rtsub par byed pa'i yig ni// ha dang ldan cha gadzag bcas/
27b7(rnying rgyud): pa mas ni bu byas pa// sdigs kyi gzugs kyisan ni// kyi rgyags suza par bya// thob thog yo gas bya// mig bya rgya na byung ba// brjod dru bcas pa dag pa'i yod// byang gi phyogs su zab bya// sems can tham
28a1(rnying rgyud): mchog dag dang // dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir// nga yis de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can ma
28a2(rnying rgyud): gi rten byed na// de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la gar mdzad cing / rab tu spros pa stan
28a3(rnying rgyud): gdangs nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// spyad cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis// brjid brtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// mdzes pa'i sprin tshug
28a4(rnying rgyud): rnam bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyus btab 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing // shin tu dgyes che'i dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas pa
28a5(rnying rgyud): gyur// shin tu dgyes chen rdo rje'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan gyis bshad do// lon d+ha'u pha'i sbyar a ma hA su hu a ga gu/ a la la ho// mahA su dz+ra pa ya lu ta thA ga tu
28a6(rnying rgyud): das/ rnam pa kun tu skye ba med pa bde bas rol cing chub par mdzad pa yi// bdag cag gzungs kyi dam dang bcas pa rnam dpyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid// bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yang bral te// che ba'i ye shes lhun grub
28a7(rnying rgyud): mchog ldan par spyod ba di la rol par mdzod// mal la ho// 'di ni sru blangs pa yis// shin tu srid las mya ngan 'das// dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dil byin gyis rlobs// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
28b1(rnying rgyud): bdab chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa'i sman ut+pa la kha rtse ba bzhin du sbyin mdang sgra rnam par 'gyur ba klog dang chu rnapas bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas/ ny-id kyi spya nga gsung dang thugs dza dz+wa las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so/
28b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rdo rje yaM shes blags la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid ni// bdug nyid sbyong bas btags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor thub gang 'drag// 'od zer dkar ba'i phreng bas mdzes/
28b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdzes pa'i zla ba kham pa la// mthing ga'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa// me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin// shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog bsgrub pa// rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byung
28b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chu brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor gyis mchog 'gyur byed pa// pad+ma'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra// 'dab ma brgyad pa gyes pa yis// ge sar zebs mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje las kyi
28b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// rab tu 'bar ba'i me dang bcas// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ji lta de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
28b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo ga dag gis ga mdzod nas/ gla dang / sil stan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rArnga dang / du r+ya b+hi dag pa rna ba dang / ba li ka~M dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pA dang / rnam po sna tshogs kun tu brdung ba dang / si la rgyan
28b7(rnying rgyud): pas rnam par rol pas/ lhar dang / ro zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bzung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / ldog pa dang gzhib pa dang 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la
29a1(rnying rgyud): sngags sor bzhag/
29a2(rnying rgyud): bstabs nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i srang ma khang stong du mdzad / g.yon du 'dud pa'i rgyal gyis 'jam pa dang bcas pa'i stan gdangs ta/ yang dakhon nyid sprul bar byed pa'i dbyangs 'das bskul bar mdzadad/ ky-i
29a3(rnying rgyud): ra ta su kha wa/ ha khra prA ka mad tA ya suT kya ma ya/ sa ma ya ta ma ta ma ho// su ra ti saT+Ta kya sa s+ye/ sham tsi ridi trai sug ta shan ta ma ya ma pra d+hi ku ra rba k+Sha.a/ su ra ta ti ba ba/ badz+rad le/ pra bi bi dza ma bidz+ri ma ba/ su ho su kha ra ShA nga lo// mA ban+di rat+ta neraH/ suka
29a4(rnying rgyud): satwa na badz+ra le/ pra bi man+ta ma rti sur ta b+hI sha b+hI sha dza le/ gon hU~M s+thin ta rA ya ma hA su ka te tsa ma ya/ rA ma dA ma ho// su ra tA ka ru su ka barba d+hi ti tse mu thAdza ya te tsat+ta ra/ ha ha ha ho// b.rags su kha ho// dzAM ha hi p+'u ra ta d+ha ra gi smang/ nga ti ti ra ti ti pA rA ma shwA/
29a5(rnying rgyud): d+ha ti ha ho pa ra ma he du/ ma hA su ka ho// su ka ma nu mau dzu na pa ra mo shwa ra ho b+ha ga bAn mA hA su ke hUM ha ho// ba hu bi bi ta bi shra dz+wa la rad ti b+hI/ sha ma ho su ra tA su khaM ga tsi tra pa ra ma/ ma hA su ka ho// su kha mar+tha krin na ho// su ra d+ho ta ta mA pan ti su ka hU~M/ badz+ra la li hU~M ma hI
29a6(rnying rgyud): smaka phrin na no// ho shin tu bde ba'i byams pas kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje'i spyan mnga' ba// byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro ba sgrol bar gyo yid mi mnga' ste// mthun pa'i lam snyen nyon mongs drug las bsgral ba'i phyi// rnam mo/ kha'i gzung
29a7(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin 'drer gshegs kun la stob// e me ho bde ba kun tu rgya yis btab pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing mnabs// sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sgra nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid de bzhin 'de la reg pas su nyid
29a8(rnying rgyud): kun ston te// snying po byang chub bzod phyir 'grol thabs kyi sgo mo bsim gyis mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi steng ngo gsungs su bstan te rigs lnga'i gci rnams mnyis mdzod cing // dgyes pa rjongs la mnabs shing rang tu gyes pas rol ma
29b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i ba ma napas bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin ma lugs kyi 'gag ma bu'i thul dang rnam pa ngan/ zan po'i rgyun dang banas nas bdeb rgyan ma smon pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin// dkris pa mchog gi dang las sprul ba /
29b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa dang // rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod// ha ha ha ho bdi la gnas shing bde ma nobs hU~M// dgyes pa mchog dang ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog de nyid char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol// rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral po'i dbyings
29b3(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po'i tshul bzhin ji ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas ni mnab tu gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin pa de thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la'ang mi brten par// mi rtse mya ngan 'das pa'i
29b4(rnying rgyud): gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan// mtha' dang bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod// ho shin tu dgyes mchog mi chags pa/ 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// yid dang 'ang
29b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gsan nas/ yid chu skyes kyi 'dang
29b6(rnying rgyud): madri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i sbyin gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing / 'dum pa dang bcus pa'i zhal dgyes par gyur nas/ yad tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdu phrin gyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa sbyin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus bu
29b7(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin chen po thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
30a1(rnying rgyud): sngags can pa dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshan dang / dga' ba dang / rgan ma lasags pa rdul 'byung ma'i dbang lhag tan malag man gatshogs cad rje pa 'dun par byung ba dang / 'gugs par byud/
30a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang /
30a3(rnying rgyud): las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas
30a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'dogs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel pa'i phyag gis gang mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg
30a5(rnying rgyud): las 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
30a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las lhung ngo // bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang // de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang // sngags dang phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// de yi dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsgom las 'das// rnyog
30a7(rnying rgyud): dang martog rnam spangs pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'dzin dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnam pyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'drab ma// dkyil 'ja
30b1(rnying rgyud): 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad+ma dmar ba 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pas// gang khams kun
30b2(rnying rgyud): la 'jug 'gyur ba// sems ni chu dang sbrul byed pa// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang /
30b3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa' mchog/ kye ma'o rab dkris
30b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi// dkyil 'khor gsang po nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor tsha ba// rdorje sbyor ba bla na med// 'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur bas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis
30b5(rnying rgyud): gsung // rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba'i gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung // de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+ma'i sor
30b6(rnying rgyud): mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brji dpag tu bcas pas na tha'agrol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bzhad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig
30b7(rnying rgyud): la gcig 'phrul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dbang pal 'degs shing g.yas dang gsan pa'i rnas par 'don pa'i tshul gyis/ oM hU~M sa lal migs pa as trAs \u0f7f/ ag graH/ al la te// ma thAs tha a gsur a mahA rba d+ha dang /
31a1(rnying rgyud): kun tu snang zhing mi chags par// mi chags pa yi bde mchog gis// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyi rnam// stobs shing bde basbyin mdzad pas// al la'o// bsam gyis mi khrab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te//
31a2(rnying rgyud): bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod// chags pas mi gos dngos po yi// bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol// de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyis dbyangs chen po'i bskul bas
31a3(rnying rgyud): thags sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dor sna tshogs shin tu dgyes
31a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par ga tu mdzad/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyi glu len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhan pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
31a5(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ oM ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma phyung ngo // steng du zlag ma ldan pa yi// gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu// mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa// ye
31a6(rnying rgyud): shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor ma'o// A li kA li 'dren bya ba// dbus su ri mo brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu// khro bo gnyis po mchog pas ma bya// 'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o// 'di
31a7(rnying rgyud): ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur// A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri// ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan// de steng bla ga ma thig le dag/ mgo mjug gnyis su gzhan yang tAM// 'di na don dam gsal ba ste// rin chen
31b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byang ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams tho 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams cang dag byar b+he// A la gnyis dang ldan paswA te// chogadug yog gnyis sa bshad// 'di nang ba dag thugan tu chags// tu srin mazhes bstan pa yin
31b2(rnying rgyud): dang po skal pa chen po che// tshig drug po dang bcas pa gzhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi A l-i 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la'am yang na gzhan// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub pa'i dkyil la ci
31b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub byas na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/ yi ge'i phyag rgya mngon granas pa'o// 'dzin pa'i bstod nams ci 'dra ba// bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma 'o ba pa ye shes che/
31b4(rnying rgyud): yi ye shes tsho 'di la// 'dod byed 'de bsnyen byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po yi sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas dkrung
31b5(rnying rgyud): zla gsang thig le'i gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byer ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams
31b6(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas gang dang shin tu dgyes
31b7(rnying rgyud): baben pa'i dro bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu bgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'drub mdzan / bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa den/
32a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dkyus pa chen po bshad pa shod// khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung // khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste// khyod las TIg byed sdug bsngal dang // srid las khams gsang
32a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'byung // khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang // khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang // khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang // khyod las byang chub bla med 'byung // khyod las nam mkha'i rlung dgA dang // khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams/
32a3(rnying rgyud): khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa// khyod las myod dang mi smod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas dpang chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems dpa
32a4(rnying rgyud): chen po dang // ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung // khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las dri med pad+ma dang // khyod las rin chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung // khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams// khyod las reg pa'i snying
32a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma
32a6(rnying rgyud): drang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
32a7(rnying rgyud): mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos nyid kyi snying ga'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i blta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis
32b1(rnying rgyud): myanan te/ nyid kyi thugs pa d+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdorje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung
32b2(rnying rgyud): do// dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te// bde tshen tshul bzhin gzhag byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas// yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po
32b3(rnying rgyud): ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin// ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis// skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po// ston pa rdo rje
32b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs par byed// yi ge'i ye shes grub pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'doms par byed// rdo
32b5(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po rig pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te// rig ma 'bum phrags
32b6(rnying rgyud): brgyas bskor cing // sems dpa' chen po de dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+ma ma nyam sbyor bas// thal mo brkyang ste rol pa yis// tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan// dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa yo ni dgos pa rnams/ myur ba nyid du
32b7(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// 'og dang steng gi nam mkha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub par ni gdon mi za// bde brtson
33a1(rnying rgyud): po'i rnam mdzad pas// gzhom zhing de bzhin byung ba yi// rdo blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam par 'gyur bas rnams cad bskul// bar ba chen pa gtong ba yis// skad cig nyid dgaso bar bya// grub pa'i rdorje 'dzin pa che//
33a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ni 'dod par// rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po// gnod byed stobs kyis mngon par ni// rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral
33a3(rnying rgyud): bar bya// mtshon cha lnga yis rnam gnon pas// gzhan gyi bud med rten par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen pos grol byas te// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdaganyid mchod par bya// de mchog rjes su
33a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar byed// skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed// rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du// sems can skad cig 'di du'o// sangs rgyas thun gyi gnas su 'gyur// sems
33a5(rnying rgyud): can+da rnams dang grags chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang // pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te// de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dgra 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po// yon ta mtshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin//
33a6(rnying rgyud): de nyid dngos po thams cad la// thams cad dus gsum mAHma gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu badre// sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya
33a7(rnying rgyud): ba yig chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che// ye shes shig le ldan pa ste// rdorje yid 'byung lpags pa yi// ha lar btags dbu bskor bya// 'di ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yi// yi
33a8(rnying rgyud): yo yang //
33b1(rnying rgyud): nas su / nas nga na
33b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ na sun sa
33b3(rnying rgyud): mas na 'i su su
33b4(rnying rgyud): sam
33b5(rnying rgyud): dun / / smra / mchogs
33b6(rnying rgyud): sa / da
33b7(rnying rgyud): na
34a1(rnying rgyud): nga dag bsnyen sa/ bdag sbyor bsdu 'grub pa cwam/ gnyis kyang rkyor ba 'di yis ni/ sa ska kun 'gyur // / bdag skyeng nga na la mang 'byu // nga brjod cing mi gam sa tu
34a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i yid dang rjes su mthun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// lha mo rdo rje kI li ni// dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa// bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste// de yis bud med snying ga ru// bdag nyid
34a3(rnying rgyud): kyis ni byin brlabs te// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen po de// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i sman dang rol
34a4(rnying rgyud): cing 'gro// bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la// phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab ste// rdo rje pad+ma phye ba yis// sgrub pa pos ni myur du bsgrub// pad+ma rnam par phye byas te// phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'gro dang 'ong ba
34a5(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te// sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na// de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro// bdag nyid gan rtsal gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya bzhan// nyid kyis byin 'drabs
34a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya la// sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu// dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis bzhugs par// migayeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par bsgom// 'dra yis dngos grub thob 'gyur te// 'di
34a7(rnying rgyud): ngag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig skyer ba yis// nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin 'drabs pas// de ni sangs rgyang
34b1(rnying rgyud): smras/ / sa// sa sbyin ma sa/ na ma na// / dam smra /
34b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dbyings phyug ga 'thob// de dang ldan cig dngos grub 'gro// byeng ngam yang na nam kyad na// rlig ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing // thung bas thos pa'i maphyogs pas// kyang kyi gyid pas brnam paraH// dab ba'i ma gtung ma k+sha
34b3(rnying rgyud): ma mchog ni bzung byas nas// de nas den rdo rje 'grub// zhags dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba de bzhin bzlog pa dang // tshe der bsten pa byas pa las// byang chub sems ni 'gyur mthag// 'phrog pa yi ni dngos sgrub bo// 'di yis rin chen
34b4(rnying rgyud): gtsug nyid du// mig yeng mtshan mo byas gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog byed de// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis thob// 'di yis snying gi bla gsang la// thig le nyid du brtag byas na// de ni dri ma thag tu yang // bla bas
34b5(rnying rgyud): thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur// 'di yis rig pa tsam gyis kyang // dngos grub gang dag 'thob byed de// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po// rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di ni srub pa'i dus su yang // rnam par rtog pa yod mi bya// rtag kA mi rtog
34b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba yis// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la// sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu sbyin// de la bde ba sbyin byas te// mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya
34b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdo dza kI li kI li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o// thog ma mo ste mnga'i chen po// rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel// 'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob// rol pa'i sbyor bas
35a1(rnying rgyud): bud med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya// 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tra// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// padra kha rbe nus pa'i stan// skyugs mkhan de na skad cig 'gyur// gtso ba yi ni
35a2(rnying rgyud): gis// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya// sprod pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus dag tu ni reg pa dang // gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya// bskyod dang mnye ba de bzhin du// mnyam du 'grogs pa'i
35a3(rnying rgyud): bya// bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang // skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya// gang dang kun nas bskor ba dang // 'deb dang de bzhin btung ba dang // the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bslab par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa
35a4(rnying rgyud): mi g.yo tshe 'dir dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos// 'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma zag/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rjer gyur te// lag na pad+ma 'bar khyer bzhin// blo ldan ma g.yeng bskal par
35a5(rnying rgyud): gnas// brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig r+b+ha// bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas// bde ldan gyi mazlog gtso ba yi// pad+ma'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// don bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ltar rtag tu
35a6(rnying rgyud): 'grogs 'gyur ba// dngos grub la shes pade myong 'gyur// yi ge yini phyag tu 'dis// badz+ra las skye ste gzungs bzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na// pad+ma bde ba'i bdagu por 'byer// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid rjes/
35a7(rnying rgyud): phyag tu 'di yos rgyas btab ste// bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur bar gdon mi za// sdug cing ling chos bstan pa yi// ti ma'i 'od zer gsar byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i blta ba pos// pang+ga sems dpa'i cha 'ang
35b1(rnying rgyud): de tsam nam mkhar lta bar ni// dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag po sa tshogs kyi// lha mo yis ni mchong bor byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i/
35b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyi phye ma'i sbyor ba yis// sbrul ni gsod par 'gyur ba bzhin// zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur /
35b3(rnying rgyud): 'di yi mthu yi ngo bo yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo// gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa// 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthu khyen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa tsam gyis de dngos 'grub// shin tu dgyes pa pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i/
35b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ye shes so// // dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyid de// dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmad byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams
35b5(rnying rgyud): gsum 'di ni dngos grub che// dpal gyi bsgyings pa 'grib par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni brgyal byed de// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam myong bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed// bdag gi mthu
35b6(rnying rgyud): yis rnamaN+Dal te// de yis khams gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas patab ste// pad+ma rdo rje rab ldan bya// phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te// bsnyen
35b7(rnying rgyud): myung du dngos grub po// g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bskyong bas// chu byis spyan ni sbyar byas te// phyag rgyas btib skye ro la bus na// bla ma'i dang ma grub 'thob par byed// rdo rnal 'byor nye ba yis// rdo rje'i bdag nyid mthong byed do// de dag ku gyis ba
35b8(rnying rgyud): phreng byed khyed
36a1(rnying rgyud): A// / // sa gas kya ga/ bla r+m+ma sa rnas pa byud// gan ldan/
36a2(rnying rgyud): la byin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan can// de yang de la 'dogs na gnas// nga gi dkyis mchog stobs par byed // bdag nyid chen po de rigs gsum ngo // tshe ba'i ba rdo bzhi dang // rdo rje dzin gtogs 'ad rnams// nga gis
36a3(rnying rgyud): bas pa byed// kau N+DI nu rtul yong / de din rlom du gyu/ sanas padag gi rgyug pa rnams// thog sa kyi pa sgribs bad sa kyi// bami sag tshul gni'i pa
36a4(rnying rgyud): 'angs nas kyang // bdag nyi dngos bung sbyin par byed// hUM tshogs ni rgyal po che// dbang drug dam pa rdzogs byed// de ya ts+tsha sa gtsug pad de// rnal 'byor ni rdzogs ma sbyin byed// gaspyod ni srin po gzugs la sogs//
36a5(rnying rgyud): dgas bu mo rnams// spyod ldan phyag rgya blang byas te// brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dag na y-i// 'di 'is dngos kyu'i myur du 'grub// lha dang kr-i pi bu mo dang // b+he min m+b+ha pi ming la skyes pa// phyag gru 'di las byin ba rnangs
36a6(rnying rgyud): thur pa srung du dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na na yang drung // gang dbud med brdung byas pa// ji ma pa 'di pa tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyar ba brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs kyis rnams cad dang // de bzhin dpang bo kun nyid du//
36a7(rnying rgyud): na ba sa// 'thob par sa chogs pa mang nas rgya rje gsum gyu/ dun pacu da/ dbashin thags /
36b1(rnying rgyud): gnyisar nag/ 'di nasangs rgyam thams cang // bang nan kun ni dga' byad yin// phyag tu'i yig 'diyis ni// mkhas pas nyid kyis brlabs byas na// don mthag tu phyu // thame 'phrul gyi sna 'gyur// stong la shas gnas pa'o// nga
36b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu ba mdzod// srin mnam bsgyur ba pos// lta ba'i phyag rgyas gang byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' rdo rje 'dzi kun dang // pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzungs ma rdzogs rnams dang // rnal brtsor pa
36b3(rnying rgyud): dang mkha' 'gro dang // phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog/ grul bram mi'am pi dwags sam// sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo// 'di ni snying gar bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs
36b4(rnying rgyud): rgyam yang na nyi ma dang // pad+ma ba sna tshogs blo// lca dang lha mon mi dag dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi// gzhan gyis 'phrog par lor mi nus// lha dang lha men gyis mchod cing // dngos grug khams gsu
36b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha man sbyin byed cing // slad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul// sangs kyis rnams kyi zhing kun bya// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya ga dang // de ni chen zhing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs rme
36b6(rnying rgyud): yan lag glen spangs pa// thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen blong bros// dkris pa'i ched mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nangangan m+b+hi 'gyur// rin chen nang na rin rjen 'gyur// bad+ma nang na pad+ma 'gyed/ rdzogs
36b7(rnying rgyud): dang ni du tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ matame dang mi mnyam thos kyi byings// phyag rgya po shes byin brlabs pas// dam pa tshogs ted du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa'ang gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig me pa
37a1(rnying rgyud): yang mug ldan 'gyur// na ngon pa yang smra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rjong 'gyur// da la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// du pha lum la yon tan ni// yon tan
37a2(rnying rgyud): pa mdangs cher 'gyur// ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs// 'phung zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed// de ni yang phug nas 'gro// sa dngas yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs kyi 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni ska cig 'gro bar byed// rdzogs
37a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gying bgar byed pa// bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// mi ga yeng blta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'dogs pa dngan
37a4(rnying rgyud): yis// gang dang rnam par bskor ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bababyed de// de dang sems can thams cad la// lnga ba dang ni sgyu 'brin nga // ci dga' ba ni mngag par byed// gdug pa'i bstabs srog chags rnams// rdeg pa dang ni skyil bar byad/
37a5(rnying rgyud): gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang // khro bo'i lta bas sgrol bar byed// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje lhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag du ye shes kyi mthu chen pa'o// / dang po
37a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku// bde bskyed byed pa shad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis 'dre ni bsgoms ma thag/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur//
37a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying ga ru// bsgoms te gnyis mod sbyor byas ni// sangs rgyas su ni rab tu 'grub// bsrubs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang rkyen byed de// sI li kA li mnyam sbyor bas//
37b1(rnying rgyud): sems pa dngaman pa'ang dngos grub ba// shin d+haskal ldan thams cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thag byud // / skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis// d+hA skyes zhabs la bsnyed par byed// lha dang lta med pa mod de// rig mas gathong na dag byung/
37b2(rnying rgyud): de// phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yi// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas stod byed de// 'jig
37b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing // kun gyis bskyed mchod pa sti stang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i mtha' klas lha rnams dang // hi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa
37b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun du// 'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing lhag byed do// lha
37b5(rnying rgyud): dang lha min phul bum dang // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa badzin// spyi bos bka' ba
37b6(rnying rgyud): gdul dka' rnams// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi// dam pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi// zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam pa
37b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi po thams cad blang // chu skyes dngos grub rtsod zhabs drung // 'tsho ba'i rang du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngang zham ring du// ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas gdab na// spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de// rtag tu sangs rgya
38a1(rnying rgyud): rnams bya mchog/ gan rtsa bar dang mnga' ba myod// rdong shin tu gyes pa'i suman mo bdabar ba med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag d+ha'i ting du 'ad // / dang ba ma byung zag pa ste// gzhan gyis mi byed khron
38a2(rnying rgyud): bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// gsung gi de rje shin tud kyis// bdag sang sangs rgyas rnams da kyi// mchog rtso ngon kyong byed pa// dmachos rnams gang byas pa'i// gsugs la na ba dag 'a bar byed// ma
38a3(rnying rgyud): lcas chen po 'di// byang chub chen por 'grub zed de// yon te yon tan rdzog mdo bya'i// tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag na 'dis btaban// dpal kun bdag po ma thag/ bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin blangs pa// spangs
38a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob// phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan// gyis btab 'dod pa srung byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi// de yis gyur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te// ci ste rmongs
38a5(rnying rgyud): pas 'dang byed na// de yi srog ni zam yin// dI lI bsrung ba rgyas na dpal// tshong nga lang rdzo bring pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gsuMng gas bsan pa bzhin// gdon mi rta ba 'thob par 'gyur// phrag rgya la shes rjes basbas pas// grub pa mi byed cung zud
38a6(rnying rgyud): med// bdag nyid thams cad skyil par// bcig sa shes dngos par gyur// gargya'i gzhes byeng brgyams la// sangs dus byeng na ba'i snogadung // chos dbyings phyi par bzlas pa/ sa thab gang gshegs makyang /
38a7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i sa sa rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po med do// deng ga ti 'dzin ldang ba'itsho// dam chog mchog tu bsrung bya// de spyod rnamam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad spyod de/ la pa 'i nga nga
38b1(rnying rgyud): gsum yang lci 'gro byed// da ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'thob thams cad myong mi 'gyur// rdo rje gsu' de rmad 'byung bas// sang+yas rgyas kun gyis bsngags bya dang // bag chags mtshams spyong rnam grol bas// nam mkha'i rim pas 'a
38b2(rnying rgyud): byed// lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge// gnas rang zas dang btung ba stsogs// nam mkha' las ji skad cig rnyed// bud med rin
38b3(rnying rgyud): chen mthog mkhang las// bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// de phyis khams gsum 'thob par byed// rdul 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di lus
38b4(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs drug pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med de// byed med mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyad pas 'grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po dag dbang 'gyur// gzungs ma kun gyis bde chen
38b5(rnying rgyud): po// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa
38b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o// / oM bcas mi phyed tha mar te// rab tu sems ni bde ste// rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bskyabs pa// 'di
38b7(rnying rgyud): yes byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung // bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin tad
39a1(rnying rgyud): dang / da dpa' ba nyid dru yang / lha mo'i phyag nas byi brlabs pa// sra cig tuni 'thab par 'gyur// skya bo rnams dang gar byung cid// nganA rab byas bdag bldad// bzang dga' ldang rabang kyis ma
39a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+ma sbyong ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bsrung ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson
39a3(rnying rgyud): 'grus che// yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed do// rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskyor// sa gsum
39a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa// res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa// res 'gal bab nas 'byung ba dang // res 'ga' byung chub nges 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' ste dang ris 'ga' 'gro// ris 'ga' byor chen
39a5(rnying rgyud): rol pa dang // ras 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo skong mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mad// des thag 'dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bung modze
39a6(rnying rgyud): padang // res 'ga' lha dang spyi dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' jug/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas
39a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa// ci dgar dngos grab 'dod pa la// bdag gis bar ston par byed// mi myod cog sbyong ba yis// 'dren pa ma kyang na byas te// phan tshun rig pa chen po pas// rdo rkyen gyis de 'bigs/
39b1(rnying rgyud): gzungs mya mang ba chags parnams// ba byed can po gzhan ni zlos// spyong bcas ma thong ba dengs pa// 'bad pa ma grus thub par 'gyur// brdad pas blang chub snang burje// rtag par ni gnas 'gyur// / thAg na 'di yos rnam byung/
39b2(rnying rgyud): pa// sbyor ba rjes snang ldan pas so// thams cad mni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin de// yig 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid las skyes pa dpezod
39b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya thA/ lus thams cad grub par byung ba'o// / dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis po dz+ra rdu'i sgra// dbang gyis rdo rje byin rnabs pa'i// lha mo mang byed dbus su gzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
39b4(rnying rgyud): cang kyi// dab kyis thob pa rmongs thar mi// rdo rje la shes byags gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag tu 'dis// bdag gam gzhan pa rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'dis skyem bcug byas na// de na pa
39b5(rnying rgyud): mu jos grub bo// thams cad lus byed napa la dang ldan// tshe dang lang rdoskal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'di ni dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo me// sangs rgyas kun dang can byen ci /
39b6(rnying rgyud): rnams dang lhornams kyi// 'argyal gyi zung med 'khrug byed // sngo rab tu dgyes bzhin mom byed sde d+ha mye pa ma tog gi rgyal mdzin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba lo gA'i \u0f7fAts+tshat+te/ rlob pa thams cad rnam par sel b+ha las rnams cad byed pa byed kyi
39b7(rnying rgyud): mriza ba'i gzhon gyis mi byed ma'o// // tshangs pa'i gsung gi ngong bcas// tha mang dril bu nga gnyis// dbus su meng gi phreng ba ste// yig 'dzin chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// pad kyi dngos grub tho gyid //
40a1(rnying rgyud): shAH/ 'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams// yi ge skang cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis byas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang gi slob ma 'du drung // de nyid sbyong bas bsnyen d+has na// rdo rje dzin dpal 'ang bang 'gyu
40a2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo'i tshogs dang rje na cir// ro kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'dzu
40a3(rnying rgyud): sogs bdag po che// 'jigs par byed dang du byed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni// brjid la sogs pa'i spyod pas // brjo rje pad+ma chen mol/
40a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun tu brjing ba yis// bde byed chen po slong byed de// rab tu dbyis pas sgeg pa bzhin// rab tu sbrel ldan mgrin 'khyung bas// kaurnal 'byor chen po de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// spyi dod par ni 'dor mdzub/
40a5(rnying rgyud): rgya chu skyes btab byas te// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes// rdo rje shin tu daces pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste thams cad las gyed pa dge ba'o// / dang po nyid du yo bya ste// jig pa'i rgyal pos
40a6(rnying rgyud): nye bar brgyan// chog drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mang gzhag byas te// rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes sdang bar brtsub pa// yi ge pi ni bya
40a7(rnying rgyud): 'dis/ nyid kyi snying gar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang // sbrul dang ma'am ci gnas pa// thams cad pa
40b1(rnying rgyud): phag yog tu 'gyur// 'dun 'od zang rab tu 'bar ba las// sangs rgyas mchog gi zugs ldan dang sa s+ho// sna tshogs rab 'thang dpa la gas yang dag kyag// chos mchog dam babyud pa gtang bye cig// spyod bcas ma spyod 'dig rten snang zad dang/ du/
40b2(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'in pa'i 'od mchog r+b+he// mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas pa dga' bas// A dwe hUM 'i dzi mgyogs/ nga ning mchog rdzas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'a yis sdig pa phyog zu // 'di las byung du dge
40b3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur// 'dis ni bde ba'i ba // 'di yis dngos grub sgrub par 'gyur// smye ba'i sdug bsngal chub phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa zhes zla ba'i rgyag
40b4(rnying rgyud): chen mo ste thams cad mthun pa'i ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// / dang po yo dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo hU~M shin tu dgyes pa che// dbus sugasal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
40b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di phyis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin brlabs pa// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan
40b6(rnying rgyud): ldagung gi// kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde car gyis// rna tshogs chen po'i bskal bar gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyud// denas
40b7(rnying rgyud): pi chos dbyings gnas// dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo// badz+ra'i mdun du thig ma'i gyi// byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yi nang du gzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni// mod la
41a1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// A li kA li rang sbyor bas// bud med rnams dang zin par byed// b+h+yo wang rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna rtogs 'di na
41a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro la gnas// dang po oM ni gnas pa ste// tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdorje shin tu dgyes che 'o// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin// 'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sma
41a3(rnying rgyud): mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtan po yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mar gu zugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa sprad par bya// myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te// bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub// sems can
41a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyis 'dod bskyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ pad+mo'i tshul du sgeg pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas// rdo rje chen po de dngos grub// ci dga' 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i
41a5(rnying rgyud): lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrubs na brtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs
41a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas mchog tu brtag pa yi// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos rnams kun gyi rjes mthun pa'i// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang
41a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par cung zad med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o// // dang po so bcas lha mo yi// tha mar chog drag mi phyed gnyis// de sa
41b1(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi thugs nyid du// ha zhes bya bas rnam bcan te// shin tu dgyes pa dmi // bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yig yani phyag tu 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// phreng ba'i can gyis rnam brgyan par// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'thung /
41b2(rnying rgyud): yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong // chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas dadus pa dgyes 'gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bde ba
41b3(rnying rgyud): che// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang // bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal ba nyid kyis
41b4(rnying rgyud): skyobs byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba chen po mgu bar byed// bde ba'i thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyi sgra bslab par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/
41b5(rnying rgyud): rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// // oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya// ti de skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba/
41b6(rnying rgyud): bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab kyis 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster// sdig pa kun las grol byed cing // bsod nams thams cad nye b.rang gro/
41b7(rnying rgyud): mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ges brgyan te 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rig ma slong gis mngon par mchod byed cing // rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i
42a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis gar ba byed pa'o// 'jug rten dbang ba bde mchog 'brel pa 'thab// po ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du// rdorje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rdul 'gyur ma// yid du 'ong ba'i sman nenyes pa dang //
42a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rten pas rol par byed// pi wang gling bu la mtshan sgra snyan gyis// klu blangs dngos grub tu mo thob par byed// ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i
42a3(rnying rgyud): pa dag// bde ba'i sgra yis bgyid par rnam bskur ba'i// de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed// kha Ta ba gar dza'i dbyangs// g+ha ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang // 'dri yis
42a4(rnying rgyud): b+hi rlabs bde ba'i rnams// sbyor ba 'di yis sbyor ba yis// 'dod byed dathams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po lnga sems dpa' mchog tu dkyis pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// / de bzhin
42a5(rnying rgyud): i ni dang por te// dbus su rked kyis bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed bde ba gnyis// 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor yis ni rgyas btab na// bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro// 'og min gyi ni gnas chen
42a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'grogs// bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen thog/ ji snyid gar gyi gtsug lag las// sbyar bar byed pa bshad pa dang // ji skyed de skyed phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'di
42a7(rnying rgyud): dngas grub// kye me 'od gyes pa pade byed che// kye ma'o bde ba pa chen po// rtse ma 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye mdo sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyin yo byad rnams// brlagasal ba gar gyis ni/
42b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gur byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag gyu de// sna tshogs gar ni ston byeng pas// gyur drugu ni med byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngas grub bo// rdo rje shin byu klas pa chen po ridapal bde ba chen po dag 'byung gang
42b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan drang ba den gsum pa'o// / bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// spyi bor thig le ldan pas te// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// nam mkhar
42b3(rnying rgyud): zla skar 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'i ye shes rma dbyung ba'i// 'di yis thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi// tsha ba'i gser gyis gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shos snying gar bsam par bya// nam mkha'i nyi ma 'bum 'dra bar //
42b4(rnying rgyud): doni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel pa// rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas// 'dod pa'i
42b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi su mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po sten par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o//
42b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'brel ba// tha mar khri bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcad pa yang thos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo po thams cad ni// skra yi thos pa dngos grub
42b7(rnying rgyud): baM// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ster// bud med pad+ma ut+pal dang // ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang chen// rdo rje pad+mar sbyar bas na// dga' byed sbyar du dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems
43a1(rnying rgyud): dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi skud pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis dpal thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// / a ni srigatsug thig ler babs// rab dgyes chen mon rje can// rdo rjerje bder 'brel pa yi// tha mar gnas
43a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab sgyur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad gi// tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro// ma tshogs ched po 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje brgyad pa yi// de ni mtshan ldan tha dang tsam// den sa chom
43a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa des// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas ni// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag kya'o// /
43a4(rnying rgyud): oM mchog gtsug tor rnam byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du// rdo'i ro ni sbyor che ba// tha mar ho hi thig le gnyis// 'di yis rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba
43a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs bdang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob po// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sa
43a6(rnying rgyud): can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lha dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
43a7(rnying rgyud): 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas
43b1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun
43b2(rnying rgyud): du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas kyi
43b3(rnying rgyud): pachen po yi// brjed pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// sprul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtsol mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o spyod
43b4(rnying rgyud): pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o smras pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung // kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don// kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma'o bde ba dag pa che// kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi
43b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma'o sgrub pa rmang 'byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin// kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rig ma'i// kye ma'o sna tshogs dngogos pa che// kye ma'o
43b6(rnying rgyud): dag pa gsum sbyar ba// kye mdo rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma'o pad+ma rnam phye bas// kyi ma'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o// k+She ma'o gar ni dag pa che// kye ma'o bla ra 'a dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par
43b7(rnying rgyud): 'brel// kye mo ba dang mun pa sel// rtse ma 'odag byed me tog phreng // kye ma'o spos ljod dge ba ste// kye ma 'o mar me mun pa sel// kye ma'o dri ni shin tu bsil// bye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor// kye ma'i sgyum nam mkha' 'dra//
44a1(rnying rgyud): bya ma sangs rgyas bye mchog/ rgyas 'dzin chen yang mchog skyed// kye ma 'o sna tshogs padam chog ldan// rtse ma'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// rtse ma 'ong mtshar sangs rgyas dang // se ma'ongo mtshar dpa' bo rnams
44a2(rnying rgyud): kye ma 'ongo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye mang ngo mtshar lha pi rnams// shin tu dkyis tsho rje la// rgya li bkun gyis bskyod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgying ba yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol byin tha
44a3(rnying rgyud): da// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te// sems dpa' rjel phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed// rdza skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa/ yangs pa'i sman gyis gar mdzad te// phye ga dang zhabs ni bstang nga yis//
44a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud// sked pa'i dbyi bas ni rnam par yangs// skams kyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshams kyis gnon// tshe mas kyi phreng
44a5(rnying rgyud): ba kun D+ha// mig drag zlos pa'i dbugs pabyin rnying // rab tu dga' ched gyes pas bstod/ yA la ra man sa// sar+d+ha su rba mdzumad+hA swe An sen no// pa I sa dz+nyA ya pa la ho// sa ra pra ma d+hA su rba/ bud+d+ha na he mu had ha/ na Na ma i khA pa ad+ya ha~M//
44a6(rnying rgyud): thAg b+han ma hA su khedu sh+ya ho// oM badz+ra satwa su ra stAM/ sarba ra sa ra sa gra/ ma hA su ra su khaM bu me/ sid+d+ha nI d+h+yan/ ra ma ra ma/ sarba ra ma saMrba yo gi nIn/ rAg+ni ya ho// b+ha ga wAn ma ka ma b+h+r-i/ a la la ho// d+ha ga wAn ka ma ru ra tas+yAM/ ka ma
44a7(rnying rgyud): haM ma mahA/ khyis pa/ a pa ra mjum/ a la la'o// ba ta t+pa la sha sa ha ra sa ya la hrata/ e d+hiH oM mi/ a mdzu pa thams ras tham/ bai dka la bi don nam lus rba/ mthur rim a ho// ma N+Da mu madz+ra/ bas he Ta pi sad+d+harmA/
44a8(rnying rgyud): palugs kor ga dag/
44b1(rnying rgyud): ra ha sad+d+ha/ ki dza hi pa tsa lu su rA ga mu gadz+ra/ bo d+hi pa ma gsul/ bi ba i adz+dza a la la ho// sa ma a od+ha mu kang+ku/ a la la ho// s+phar a od ta mu sa dz+nyA/ bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan/
44b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing // gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtsen pas dga' bus spyad pa stsol// al
44b3(rnying rgyud): la ho// dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing // 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos de bde gshegs don du mdzad// ngo ma tshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung // bde mdzod pa dide spyod dga' la rol
44b4(rnying rgyud): ba tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad de// byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs//
44b5(rnying rgyud): bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem byargyas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang dang ldan pas kyang ni de la rag lus so// a la la la ho// yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam
44b6(rnying rgyud): dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus/ khyams ma'i gzungs ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu brtson mdzod la// zugs rje chen po rang bzhin dag pa'i chu des bdag cag dbang sbyar cig/ mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob
44b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod byer// ngamatshig chen po gsum po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni// thagasang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu sring pas skyo ba yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin//
45a1(rnying rgyud): blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur// de nas bcos ldan 'das ya dbyangs kyi rtul pa 'das bskad pas shin tu kyis teng bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sesas dmyur bcas pa dang / 'dzi dang rba dang /
45a2(rnying rgyud): dang las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpar bcas/
45a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i rdzogs su bcas pa rnams dang / phyi nang gi rdo rje'i dregs las gyes pa rnams la shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang dbyangs dang / brdung ba dang zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam
45a4(rnying rgyud): par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung bar gyur to// nga nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes
45a5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du// pus mo'i ljang btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'drebs// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol// gang gi sems can bde nyid
45a6(rnying rgyud): gyi// bde bas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzad do// phyag gnyis gang dang bcas
45a7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// sor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom po phan tshun bsnol byas te// shes rab mchod rten du ni
45b1(rnying rgyud): brtag/ rdorje mtshad rten phyir byas te// lhag mdzang bzhin spro bar bya// 'di na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pa ras kyi na ma dag/ gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub byen rlob pa// phyag su 'di yis rlus/
45b2(rnying rgyud): btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'od byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gsar gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal lnga na 'phrul gyi bum
45b3(rnying rgyud): la// 'di yis byin rlabs gar byas te// rdo rje pad+mor gzhug byis nas// sems ni bzhugs pas bsrub byas la// de nas sems de blang byas te// blo ldan de bris btud byas ni// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang
45b4(rnying rgyud): dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi'am// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrul brtag 'thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis// kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus// shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i
45b5(rnying rgyud): shes rab sde pha rol tu phyin ma'o// / thal mod nyid kho skyes pa// sbom po skyil krung gzhag byas te// sna tshogs phreng ba'abar byed pa// rdul 'byor gyi sna ni lhag ma spro// dadi rdo rje rnams cad kyi// shes rab rol nyi ma gas pa
45b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'dri yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings patsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes smra
45b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bsgyur tsam gyis kyang // rdo rje 'dzin rjer nge 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyis mtshan btab pas// sa che na 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs// rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang /
46a1(rnying rgyud): nagadangs med kyil 'alarang du// rngardzas mas nyid 'thab par gyur// de ltar dngas thab 'dug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdorjed pa'ang rnams// drug gasteg gas 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang // sa
46a2(rnying rgyud): btA ba de bzhin rmongs pa dang // gso bar byed dang za ba dang // zan tshun du ni skyed par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bsrung 'ardo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag kyi'o//
46a3(rnying rgyud): la mo de nyid las// khro ma rgya ba ni bskum byas te// snor mo gyig mo snga ma bzhin// b+hag rgyu 'di rnyed bang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dgra lce sogs// dem thag tu 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcing ba com gyis kyang /
46a4(rnying rgyud): kye ni dgyes pa thob// 'di nyid kyi ni dbang skur dang // 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa// 'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis// rab dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub po// mi la 'di yis phyin
46a5(rnying rgyud): te// nyi ma phyed na spyad byas na// 'din de ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'dra bar// zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dbang du byed/
46a6(rnying rgyud): kro la 'dod rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bye ba ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum rung dre ba chen po sob par byed par dam
46a7(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya chen po'o// / pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid// dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te// cho ga dang chog tu rnam bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas rnga ru 'gyur// sangs rgya
46b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam pa de 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// pad+mod mang po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgra ma rnam mngod pas// sna tshogs ldan por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed//
46b2(rnying rgyud): sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nyes spangs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa// bsgrub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par
46b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i myos par byed pa'i dpal pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// // 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas gzhag par byas pa ni// ma
46b4(rnying rgyud): lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/ srub po thams cad
46b5(rnying rgyud): bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin rlabs nas// sngo bsangs mkhur tshos dkar mo dang // de dang lhan cig gar byas pas/
46b6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag/ byin gyis brlab nas dusku gsum du// mtshan gyis mthar ni bsnyen byas nas// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs ngan can dang spri mi dang // gar mkhan
46b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te// bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// /
47a1(rnying rgyud): phyag cang dag pasmyan parnams// ga nam sa rang gaganas// dmachog san gagadum chogags// dngas thubartson par mar 'gyur// tham ma nyid kyar byas te// rdo rje cings pas btsong bzud
47a2(rnying rgyud): drin sa dga' byed dbyung ba byed de// 'da' mi tshul gyis gzung bar // 'di drir ba dkyis gtso bo las// padel byin mtshig sdug pa sbyin// spangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang tshangs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa rnas
47a3(rnying rgyud): gyis kyang // mi shes byed pa 'jigs par byed// las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du// dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis// bede chen rgyal po 'dra bar 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'dod
47a4(rnying rgyud): dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu kyis pa kun tu bzeng mo'i dkyis pa chen mo'i 'di ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba steng ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// / steng gar gzung ba ji myong ba pas// 'di yis
47a5(rnying rgyud): pas kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams thams cad 'phrigs par byed// rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spod pa// bde gshegs srung na 'das kun dang // thams cad 'di yis slong bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du
47a6(rnying rgyud): las la sbyor bar byed// dbang po nyi dbang dbang chen gyi// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mar bcug pa yis// mche bas ma ma chu bzung
47a7(rnying rgyud): byas te// ser mo pan tshun pa sgrol ba yis// dpung ba brgyad skye bar du bya// sna tshogs chen por brgyas pas// bde chen po me bde 'thob bo// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bya// 'dod dang thar pa 'grub byed de// phyag rgya 'di yis
47b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab kyis 'brel pas gar byas shing // nam mkha' gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyis// phan tshun ga r+b+ha pa'i gnan pa phyis// bcings na 'di yis dngas grub bo// de ni de ma
47b2(rnying rgyud): zag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// spyi bo yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid kyis
47b3(rnying rgyud): dpal can stobs pa yis// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing // sangs rgyas dgos par bsgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas
47b4(rnying rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i lus kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang // spyod pas gar gyis byibyas pas so// gzhan dag kyang de dngos grub che// pad+ma'i 'dab
47b5(rnying rgyud): ma rnams phye bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni pad+ma sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal// shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde
47b6(rnying rgyud): bathob par byed pa'o// // thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis// bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya// phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes// rgyal mtshan
47b7(rnying rgyud): ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod bral chags par bsgrub pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yis bdi ldan gyi// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// der phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni skor bar byed//
48a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas phyi rol phyin mas bskyor// sdig spangs rnams ni bkrug nas kyang // spyod pa jug pa'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar bsten par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa la// sangs rgyas 'ad mas
48a2(rnying rgyud): mnyes par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi dam tshig gsungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po sgrib par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad 'grub par
48a3(rnying rgyud): byed/ spor dang ldan pas byin rlabs te// snying gar nye bar bas ma byas na// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang // sil snyan brdung brnam byed dang // pri wang gleng
48a4(rnying rgyud): rdza rnga yi// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// // thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gying zhing bkyer bas gar byas te// bci
48a5(rnying rgyud): ba chen pos bcings byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis pod ku nyid du// g.yon du 'gyed pas brten par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te// 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na//
48a6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byed// 'gying bcom gyi sbyor ba yis// 'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar
48a7(rnying rgyud): byas gnas par 'gyur// kla mo lha dang lha min dang // de bzhin ming ma bdag por 'gyur// nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dge ba bdag gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las
48b1(rnying rgyud): thobyung pa 'dogs de// thams cad la byed par bshad// sangs rgyas pan rdzogs pan// gsang natung bas dngas thub// dpal ston sa pa ba can byams pa dgams pa sa la bar byas pa zhes pa brag sa/
48b2(rnying rgyud): rgyad 'grub pa'o// / phyag kyad nying mnyas bzung ste// lag pa'i 'dab mag dang bcas// snang bar stong dro ngong pa yis// mgyogs su gro ba dngom grub gi// 'di las sangs rgyas thams ched kyi/ byung dam pa mtshang rgya pa/
48b3(rnying rgyud): skyong bab kyis mtshad byas pa// mas ca las cang ma sub ba// nga dag ngas grapa med pa dang // gang dag du pa yi pa rnams// de dag phyag tu 'angs btaban+de// nam pa kha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de mas thams cad la
48b4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// mang byung dem b+ha 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen po de bzhin du / shegs// 'di yis de ni 'grub par byed// gzhan yang myachog tu na tshig/ mnam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun me dam pa de bzhin gshegs
48b5(rnying rgyud): thig d+ha'i sbyor byas dngos grub 'o// dpas bde bachen po rje rab ca gyes pa'i mchog gi pa zhes bya ba'i theg tu ga gangs#nga dung zang bslar bar bya// 'di las sang sa rgyas thams ca //
48b6(rnying rgyud): chog sa gyim byed pa// 'di ni bcid smra pa sa kyi dang // bdudu rnams shin du byed 'gyur// phyag rgyab ngas gas pa pas// zheg dang 'i sring sri par byed// sangs nas dmachog gsus gdas pas
48b7(rnying rgyud): pos mtshad po rgyam por 'gyur// des na mi dris she das/ ma bya gis ma slobs pa byu byung / 'drims 'a bye sa ra/ rgyar dbyas la byung // dag
49a1(rnying rgyud): thams ba nas/ rdzog pa pa sna nga thag da// man na// // r+b+ha gdus su mapa// la nas can la mang bathus pa nga na
49a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// dri ma thams cad sbyong ba dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o// // thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgreng // lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog mtshad
49a3(rnying rgyud): nas pas+ho/ / 'di yis gnyisug 'thog byed de// mnyam par bzhaganas bcings mthagyu/ sang+yas rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rdog// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang // pad+hU ba dkar ba 'o// rtswa rdzogs dru ba dpal chen po// da
49a4(rnying rgyud): byed chen po 'thub par 'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyis gAr bya zheng // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbar te// g.yon
49a5(rnying rgyud): gyi khu tshur spyi bor gzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad srub byed do// thams cad don rnams grub pa dge// bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings patsam gyis byung // mchod pa'i sprin nyid
49a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa che// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub po// phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te// skad cig gcig gis sbyar byas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog dang // 'dri yis thams cad 'dab par
49a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// kun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i phyag
49b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
49b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum
49b3(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas sgrar yung bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de nas de
49b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshor du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs
49b5(rnying rgyud): su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du lha zheng dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'di glu blangs te
49b6(rnying rgyud): dgyes par byed do// a tI nar ta hi su ra/ a ma ha su h+ya bar ta i ni ma hA dzA lAM i/ ku la pa pa tru dza lu b+hi a i/ a ka ma la pI pa si/ a id tsi ho// pha ri yud dz+ha na/ i dze ti ri i ni ma naT lud tha na iN+Da Ta hi NA da hr-i haM/ Nad
49b7(rnying rgyud): drib drag ma me ga ma sanyis/ sanang pa'i / bar rtsom mi nyi kyis rdzi ma mim nim ma nga ba nas pa pas da/ de yang tha lan song 'dis rung masus ngas/ gyi sru ba drir ma ma
49b8(rnying rgyud): ro bcag
50a1(rnying rgyud): radus yo ng+yas sa pa gA d-i ya sa m+b+has d+has na/ rnam mang bar ba'i ral pas bdag nyid mad pa'i smra// sku dang ma thu 'chos nyid lam ldan nad dag dpal bstan pa/ shun tub ba'i dkyil 'khor sa na du
50a2(rnying rgyud): 'dir byung ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i nga bzhin 'jus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing // gsang ba'i thig le
50a3(rnying rgyud): dngas nyid nem mkha' 'dra ba rnam smad de// bde bzhan sum tshogs pa'i longs snang rgya la dbang med de pam+b+ha// byang chub mchog ga lAm 'din na mong sa mtha' dang rnam thul zhi // bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye ni med pa'i sgoso ba rjo rnam
50a4(rnying rgyud): dag pa// nyon mongs mi gos lha mang gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pas chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur// sangs kyi
50a5(rnying rgyud): ra gyi byang ma chag bdud rtsir ma yin// de skar bde mu bzhin dkur tu gnang bar mdzad// sdes bde mchog 'bye bas ral batshul ba na mad// stug bskal 'gro ba'i lus can bde bas chom par mdzod// byams pa sa
50a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje nyims 'gro ba zin la shir mdzadanas// g+hata b+ha ga grib po po'i zur nug zung chub sems kyis gsal bar ston// de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bdi sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mardzog gi sems rjes
50a7(rnying rgyud): mchog cid bang su cig/ dbyangs kyi byeg rgya las ni// skang cig sri cig bskul byas na// rabatu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdung druganas nyi dngos grub sbyin// dra nas bcom ldan 'das shing kyang thas pa byen pa'i
50b1(rnying rgyud): ga pa thar ba nga ba can par rnazugs zug sa can pas/ nanam mkha' la 'grub gas ba spyod pa dang / ga tu bar pa ston pa la 'gyur dang / rnam na rnams na po rnams byam pas nga snar
50b2(rnying rgyud): nga / gas bams cad kyi ba ba man pa shi kyang kyis pa ldang po phreng ba'i du la zhus pa'i byu 'dzin la pa 'di la sgoms par zhugs nas/ shin d+ha gas de rdzun pa gdon mi za pa'i dmachog ces tha nal
50b3(rnying rgyud): ca pa dge dang ga spya kA di'i na / pa la nu ba ste/ sa rnam pa pan pas brgyun/ sa zla ca dang / rlangs rnam pa banan/ nas sa 'dus
50b4(rnying rgyud): bras nas// nga ga lag sbyinams kyis btsun// mA rigs bdags rinam thos pa// sna rdzog+sas nga bags kyis brgyan// srad bre bzhi dang ldan pa ste// kab brgyang mchog/ yang dge gnas// dbus kyi dag 'byed stan la ni/
50b5(rnying rgyud): pa sa sugs pa rnam pa brgyan// tshogs pa d+ma kyil g.yogs// rnams stan de dag sa bya// dbus smad rjenan tu brnam/ drim ni gzhag par bya// ched mang bdud mar 'dra ba'o// sgra tshogs ldan gyis rnam
50b6(rnying rgyud): pa dgrangs// yid bzhin rdor zang ba rgya ni rdug// rlon men gtsug gis rnam par mangs// mad rnyed du ni dbyangs 'ab sa/ dbul rkyen tham mongs par bya// m+b+ha tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs pa shes rab tu
50b7(rnying rgyud): na po chos kyi// ga byung ba tshig pan du 'drud// grangs pa rgyag gis // gareg sa mi gan tus // des sashes pa'i do tan ldan/ ma nyid dudra pa pa gabya/ slob 'am dang/
51a1(rnying rgyud): na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan naH// dbus
