51a2(rnying rgyud): kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab gyes zhes su sba// des ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje bad+ma las byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan//
51a3(rnying rgyud): 'ong bu mo btsal byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag
51a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// mdun du lha mo sto byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pas ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug phon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag/ g.yas su lha
51a5(rnying rgyud): gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing // 'di
51a6(rnying rgyud): ni tshul bzhin gzhug par bya// rgyab tu lha mo tshangs byed ma// pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dgang byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// mardzogs na bza' yang dag gsol/
51a7(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs rkyen gyis rnam par bklubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs gzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa// skye tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/
51b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi pi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad gyos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs// sna tshogs dar gyi na bzla' gsal// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs snga dri ro reg
51b2(rnying rgyud): gi rnams// bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'dod du ldan// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa/
51b3(rnying rgyud): srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yung rnam pasna tshogs rnams// pi ljang gling bu brdab pa dang // rnga rnga rnga chen mu ku dang // mu ra dza dang da rang pa// gar dang dbyangs dang bzhan pa che// rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga'
51b4(rnying rgyud): da dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi me dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dgas rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jig byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan dang
51b5(rnying rgyud): gi bag char lhan// gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par
51b6(rnying rgyud): byed// gsod par byed dang spo bar byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong bu lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas
51b7(rnying rgyud): pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// zags chen mo dang chags bral dang // 'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te// ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang // gnod sbyin ma dang
52a1(rnying rgyud): bdu dag 'phrog/ thags dang rnaganas sbyi nupasaste// 'grus ban tshogs kyang druganag/ shA m-i k+Shan gzhag // b+ha gas dang sa m-ig 'thun// rigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa cag dang /
52a2(rnying rgyud): skar rjes su mthun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog se ma dog 'dzin// lag pa ni dngal bar ga thong thogs// mchog tu ga dang khrag ba'o// na dang rtsol mtshams gzhag pa// bzhad dang drug pa'i
52a3(rnying rgyud): gdong ring ma// khros pa'i lce dang phag gi gdod// gsus po tshwa li lho 'phyangs ma// nubabyung gi ni mtshams dag tu// ri mo thong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang // khrom pa'i rwa dang gyi la'i gdong // rgyu mra'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar
52a4(rnying rgyud): byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas bklubs// lho 'phangs ma la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa lI// ce stang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba
52a5(rnying rgyud): 'byir// rnam par 'gyur bas gzug sa ngon pa'o// oM srung gi ni phyogs kun du// sgo bani rnams su gzhus khyab// byang gi phyogs su 'bod klog ste// bum pa'in ni shar nyi dang // nas rnam par 'jig pa'o// lhar ni gshin ze'i rgyal po
52a6(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ dri dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkha' 'gro bas kun tu 'askor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// ma tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan//
52a7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru sA lnga yis brgyan byas pa'o// bul pa bcu drug gzhig byas te// bcu gnyis brjod dam yang byed// then chung drug cig tsa
52b1(rnying rgyud): yang // rnga ltar rim bzhin gzhag byas te// dbus su bum pa rol mchog/ dmachog chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul la mazangs kyang rung // lcags sams las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // bzung bsnam par
52b2(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las byung ba rnams// shasang gcig gis rab bsres pa// kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/ tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te// bzung ba bzhin du myangs pA yis// rdo rje zla ldan bskal par gnas/
52b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang // tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig sad cig mchod par bya// sngags mthun
52b4(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste// 'thung po rnams la gter sa sbyin// khyu rnams kyi ne thams cad la// he rukA gi phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin pa rlabs te// spyan drang gtsang smra byas pa dbul// gzugs kyi tshogs ni
52b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la// mnyes par byas nas slar gshegs so// rnal 'byor mtshon dkyil 'khor du// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya// mtshungs par spyad pa rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gros kyis yang dag dkris// lag pa g.yon
52b6(rnying rgyud): gyis gzung byas te// rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du// blo ldan dmatshig bsgrag par bya// 'di las mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa med byas tre// 'don
52b7(rnying rgyud): pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan yang dam chog nyams pa dang // phye bo gang dag dmal gnod// brtul zhugs spyod pas de drangs te// khrag chen po ni bdung bar bya// gang dag slong dpon spod bying dang // gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/
53a1(rnying rgyud): rgyun / na na
53a2(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha hAsaH/ / / ba sbyid dag / na
53a3(rnying rgyud): sa /
53a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
53a5(rnying rgyud): ma pa dgas rnam/ rnam
53a6(rnying rgyud): na pa / da sna na sa/ ga sa
53b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pas dbang bskur ba// rdod pa d+hA las drangs // sgom po dang ni dbang gis blang // dzarje dkan dugazhag byas pa// nag pa dge ba bdab sa// thas dzad mnag 'ad brjod rjong// smye u bye nga thang ba na// 'di na gsang panas/
53b2(rnying rgyud): dbang bskyed pa lcithas ma chog go// da slong pon bdag nyid ces/ ga byang ni // sems dpa' chen bdangs byas na// sams kyis byang chubab dpa jog/ 'dini sa so gcugs byaste// dbang bslar
53b3(rnying rgyud): yi badri ba'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad bsgrag miH// rdo rje slob dpon gyis b+ha ba// yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di yis dbang ni bsgyur ma thag/ skyob mtshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas
53b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzungs ma rnams kyis dga' ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyor 'gyur te/ rI dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes
53b5(rnying rgyud): dbyang // slob ma mchog la sbyin par zla// gzungs pa de ni bdag ljid la// bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bslar shin tu sbas pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon
53b6(rnying rgyud): tshul ji bzhin// tho ldan po chom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no// de tshun cad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang chung byung // soga'i tshul gyis smras pa rnas sa// gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya// nas de nyid langs rgyas
53b7(rnying rgyud): to// slob dpon nang par gzugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug pade dam pa// thams cad min ni dpral bar bya// gzungs ma dag ni thams cad la// ci dga' bar ni yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la
54a1(rnying rgyud): bsams pa man ya dug// dmacig bas gas pasas// da smra pas nga la dus// mdun can tu chug/ dbus byud pang gra na// sa ga ga sha ma/
54a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas byen ni yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser dag dang // skyer mo tha mA'i yon mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs minan// yon de mchog giyon yin no// rin chen pa d+ma'i chung mdang // shing rtan ni shin tu brgyar// sna tshogs
54a3(rnying rgyud): da dag pa// hU~M ga phreng bas shin tu mdzes// yon can du mas// bshAn sa sa / pa da ga // chung ban med rjel bar // 'al kyi 'od pa rnas gsan shin
54a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi // nan tan b+h+ra ma dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon bye rtseg na 'di// rdo b+h+yo ldan slob ma yis// tsi ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dgang dang mos pa'i sems kyis bu// de la sogs pa'i stor ba yis// rab kyis
54a5(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun
54a6(rnying rgyud): tu// pad+ma'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun+da dang // rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gyur// nyid dang skyob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje
54a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi
54b1(rnying rgyud): smras pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas btab dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya//
54b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yis// myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis// rang rig khyad par shes byas te// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil
54b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs// bde byed chen po'i dkyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// lha rnams
54b4(rnying rgyud): kyang ni ro re yang // sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas// rmAng+ge p+ta hi na hu ma ha su hu ad dzu dz+wa la ba b+ha'i so ka khu ma hA su hu ka dzu sa sa ra yi ka ma lu ba ra na ma dzu ba se hi gu li sa ba tu dzu dzes ni hi badz+nyA/ 'das pa'i dus ni ma byung ba// mtha'
54b5(rnying rgyud): yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' yas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod// kun tu chags par mi 'gyur
54b6(rnying rgyud): zhing // bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po// rab tu bzhad cing spyan zung
54b7(rnying rgyud): gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin du dgyes pa/ kun tu langs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rje
55a1(rnying rgyud): je las thung // / g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te// bdag nyid brlan mi snang bzhin// rtsa ba'i sbrul ma ba cing brnyan// sbyong ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni// gar gyis
55a2(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gang na gyi bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis kyang spos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du 'thob// mi phyed pa ni
55a3(rnying rgyud): thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bstod cing bzlas// byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// padz+ra mi byed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa'i sgor ba bya// mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas pa
55a4(rnying rgyud): bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yis rtsen par byas pa na// nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' chel slong mdzad de// gzungs
55a5(rnying rgyud): kyi pad+mo las byung ba// bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro// dri nas rab dga' bde thob pa// sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan// gdon dang
55a6(rnying rgyud): drug dang tsha ba'i nad// mkha' 'gros nye bar gtses pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid nyi ma shar dnga'adra// sna tshogs dru ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs thams cad snang byed rdzing // de yis
55a7(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bstan par bya// rtsa ba'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// // bdag gi rkang pa dbus su
55b1(rnying rgyud): bsdu// de yis rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa chem gyis kyang // khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas// bsgoms/
55b2(rnying rgyud): sam yang na ba spyod kyang rung // sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag bdun bsgom pa bsgom byas pa// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// sbyor ba shin tu bsten
55b3(rnying rgyud): byas na// gdon mi zla bar rgyal po 'thob// yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung ngo // gzungs ma bzung ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar slar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung // 'di
55b4(rnying rgyud): ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i drug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad
55b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs ma// me g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru// mchog tu rmang byung bsgrub 'dod na// rin chen
55b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rin chen mtshan// gsung ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi skyil mo'o// de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pad+ma 'dra ba sbyar byas te// bdag
55b7(rnying rgyud): gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad+ma bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas rnam dag dang // rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yi// bde byed 'di
56a1(rnying rgyud): du / sa sunasu sgyu // smra / stsa// // /
56a2(rnying rgyud): 'aM// thugs sa nam ga s+ho// sa byed mas pas pa ga sab da/ gA'i don kyi so/ slo ma ma jug da/ sa kyi du sa
56a3(rnying rgyud): rji da dang ma thanga' thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni skyil ma'o// de nas mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po rgyas// thams cad khrag te 'brog byas te// gzungs ma yin nang pa gnyis// nyid kyis gtu' bar gang ba bteg/ rdo rjeg pa 'gro sbyor ba ma/
56a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin pas thag rnams 'thag par byung // mnyam bIr bzhag nas gzungs pa laM// gang pagacig ni mabrapa nyid du// spyong dang ldan pas btag zus // sa rnams rnams cad 'jog cung // bzung ba bza' bababa' ba dang // gis rgyad
56a5(rnying rgyud): kyis bskabs pa las// de bzhin nag bdun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byed gdon miH// tshangs pa togs 'dod dadeng dri ma// dpal ched du chog zhi 'phrog par byed // phyag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// khams gas pa
56a6(rnying rgyud): d+ya rgyal bar byed/ gan rnams pa rnyed 'ang+ka thA// 'byung gas pa rnam par 'jig/ rnas pa bzhid dumanyam shi ga/ mig me skad cig pacing rgya// gdug pa'i srab sngags rnams nga // dab nga
56a7(rnying rgyud): nga / la baba'i gag ste/ dbubra rgyas su du / mas rnas su gyu khams gsumams ca la gyu/ gas 'du sa gnasun// gas
56b1(rnying rgyud): ga ba bya// gang dbang gis ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gas ma rnams ni gang byed gzhug/ dril bu yis ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde rgyun 'thob par byed//
56b2(rnying rgyud): skyil mo phyed ni mnyam gzhag nas// gnyis pa yIs ni mnan byas na// / khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam bzhag pa ste// kyil mo rab tu dga'
56b3(rnying rgyud): thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams gsum thams cad dngos grub bo// rig 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig gnan par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi// mdor bsdus gzungs
56b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten gsum na rnam rgyal te// skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par pha tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te// thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis// mchi ba sbom po
56b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon pa'i brkyang bskum sbyar ba yis// myur du gnon pas
56b6(rnying rgyud): bteg bya zhing // mthe'u chung bde ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la rege byas te// sa bon tsheg drag hri ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya// lce yi thog mar spro byas te// 'dren pa'i
56b7(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste// kha yi phyogs su mche ba yi// sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te// khros pas mche ba'i sbyor ba yis// sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni 'thung bar bya// yi ge dang
57a1(rnying rgyud): po yo dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags// u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni khro bo'i snying po skye// mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun/
57a2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang gi lus ni bskum byas te// bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba las// dgra rnams thams
57a3(rnying rgyud): cad gsad par bya// nga do dang po yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo pe thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po bsgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer smin phung sgo// de yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// tsha ba gdon dang dug la
57a4(rnying rgyud): sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i gtso ba dang // 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog par byed//
57a5(rnying rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams// snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// myang du rdordo slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gras la zhes rab rgyas pa
57a6(rnying rgyud): s+ya// shin tu lhag par phyogs par bya// rnams rje slob dpan // mas ni krug par min+tan+te// hU~M s+t+waM nas rab 'tshal bas byed// m+b+hi dran dag gang bar bgyur// nad dang bad+ma ga dag da // gdon dang tsha badrug nyid kyis// chos
57a7(rnying rgyud): dpon zhabs la spod byed pa// gti mug chen por de 'gro'o// tha ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla mas mtho ngas blams bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las 'dang maH// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs
57b1(rnying rgyud): dang / thugs nana'i bdag po kun na pa rang po min po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen pa'i ba bu seMnang rdo rje sems dpa shin tu dgus pargyan pa'i bad ba gdon mo za ba 'do rgyad mchog dab bskur ba rdzam shes kyi dkyil 'khor can pa de bzhin gshegs pa
57b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi ska nga gsung dang / phyugs rdo rje mtshog gsang bzlas pa chedan pa zags thig le rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dkris pa chen pa'i rlon rdul 'byor mchen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa la// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbadzin/
57b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa 'bar dang bcas pa'i 'khror lo'i tshogs dang / don rnal 'byor ba dang / rdul 'byod ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pa'i tshegas+yA d+hAng / rdo du na ma mkha' la 'gru ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma tshogs kyi galas rnams mcho
57b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin sa/ sa sa sas lags na/
57b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes bde ba che// gang bad g+hi ni rig ma yi// badz+ra lus ni gnas pa mdzad// rtse ma'o dag bzhin tu nag// shes rab pa ram sbyin pa 'di// sems can kun la shes rab ces// sun pa thibs po sel bar mdzad// k+She ma'o bams
57b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud ngo mtshar mye// mkha' 'gro'i rlabs gar mdzad cing // snom par mdzad dang myang ba dang // mni padang ni phrog pa'i mchog/ oM ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang // sna tshogs skal ba pade byed che// sna tshogs
57b7(rnying rgyud): rje shin tu mngos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu mangs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa 'de ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byar ma thams cad dang / mchog gi pha rol gyi nam la sogs pa
58a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rlung gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa bad+mo ba chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag bsnu tAM/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs
58a2(rnying rgyud): phyag sa chen po dis mnyes par mdzad de// hU~M btu maH sarba n+ta ma~M ka~M a pra N-i ba~M sa mra rathAka dza ma An d+h+r-i ga tA wa ru mu ka ti bi sa the brgya ma dzad pa ma ni khris d+hanAr+b+ha d+ha sa~M A Sh+TAn/ sgyu ma'i bdebs nam mkha' kun gyi gang ba/
58a3(rnying rgyud): sa so 61
58a4(rnying rgyud): sa pa sbyin skye ba ga nga rnaMs smra skyes pa ba drug sa 'di bang gdu bya ma sa me / ma 'di sa khrings ma 'di tshig dbul dang na lda sa//
58a5(rnying rgyud): me phyogs su mi ga ting ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/ 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag/ drug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtsher phyogs dang mthal byang chub snying por bgro // nga nas bcom ldan
58a6(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i stan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
58a7(rnying rgyud): cang mI gsang bar mnyam par bzhugs te/ dbugs su rngub dbugs mi 'byin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshes
58a8(rnying rgyud): par mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par yang mi mdzad bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/
58b1(rnying rgyud): der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdungs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to// du nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dra ba mdzad nas/ yang nas
58b2(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsgral nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byang chub
58b3(rnying rgyud): kyi sems chen po la yang thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug par byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la 'jug par byed pa yang
58b4(rnying rgyud): med/ khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrugs chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog phrog pa dang /
58b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi sems phrog pa dang / bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / rdzun dang phra ma dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig gri sha gcig gis za ba dang / thabs med pa'i
58b6(rnying rgyud): lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyibs
58b7(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'jug pa'i yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba la yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems
59a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' ba sa som pa 'das na/ sgyus nas gaju/ // sas/ na su la// nam du
59a2(rnying rgyud): ba pi sangs sra ba bu hi/ sa ra kan d+ha b+ha dra/ a sa ma ga mra d+hi b+ha ba nu pa du A la la ha~M// tha~Mr a tI b+hi mun+ta tsa sa mun tsam ho// dzA ya twA nA ri ba zhin// rko dang bzhin dag pa dag pa badz+ra bde ba'i mjug mnga' bri// thugs kyi yod bzhin don tshun
59a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad do// bskal ba'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjod pa dang // byang chub snying po'i swA des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus// A la la la ho// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bder gshegs kun
59a4(rnying rgyud): skal ba mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal nad kun sel ba'i zugs rje ji 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// sa la la ho// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsngags pa yi gsang ba
59a5(rnying rgyud): oM// 'grong srin gyi ying dang thang ba gsang chen 'di phyung ste// name dag spyod bral gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs nam mkha la// dngos me ma sna'i gzhan las 'phags pa bzhi su gang mdzad du gsol// a lu lAhU~M// sad cig ma maspyod yul
59a6(rnying rgyud): 'dis// mun pa thams cang sel ba'i phyir// gzhan 'i thugs rjes dgongs nas sra// lha rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa'i skul byas na// parjo ba rdo rje dang // bde bar sbyor bar bzhes
59a7(rnying rgyud): sra gsol// bde ba chen po bde gnas pa// gtsal 'di yis bskyal ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan/
59b1(rnying rgyud): bya bad pa chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bzhangs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byam mtha' klas pa'i 'dag rten gyi khams can gzigs nas ro mdzar du gyur te/ skye ma'o khams gsun 'di stong sa
59b2(rnying rgyud): so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gcos/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa
59b3(rnying rgyud): dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtod pa'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
59b4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+ma las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar byas te/ nyid kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje yas 'di ltung ngo // / zlog mar oM ni thig lang bar
59b5(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste// 'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// phreng nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spobs sdang bar byas te/ A
59b6(rnying rgyud): yang 'dras nas rdo rje lta bur gnas mo// yang tho ba dang bsgrub byas nas slar 'dres pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa'i lta bur gyur nas sha kyi dkyil 'khor dbus smra bzugs par gyur pa na/
59b7(rnying rgyud): hUM zhes pazhed pa zin par bzhang cing ma zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du med tsa mo'i myong bas 'jud pa/ g.yas kyi rdorje gsor zhing 'drem pa dang bcas shing spyan byas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lngapa/ ga
60a1(rnying rgyud): drug rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs spyan mchog 'dzin pa// dpa' ba thams cad+ma las tho pa// / bdag rnam lnga gzi brjod do// mamanan rnam pasna phyogs 'angan// rdo sgyum rab tu gnas// mkhas pa gangs
60a2(rnying rgyud): snying gnyid// mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+ma bad+mo chen yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
60a3(rnying rgyud): sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung
60a4(rnying rgyud): ngo// // oM yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas// mthar ni dral te cho ga dag bcas// 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad rung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha'
60a5(rnying rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dag/ 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te// slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang // brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bsrung nas// sems dpa
60a6(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i spyan// chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyo gleng gang rin chen 'dzin//
60a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnyis phyag gi ngo bo yis// dri sa gsum spang brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rigs pa'i// nad kyis grongs pa 'jig par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
60b1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gdon chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang // nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du// nyid kyi snying gar 'dre byas te// nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na// zhag
60b2(rnying rgyud): bdun gyis ni nges par yang // dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod
60b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang bzla gsang thig le las 'di phyung
60b4(rnying rgyud): dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi phyed ra btags 'dren par bcus// cho ga drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor// sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste// snying gar 'di ni sbyar byas nas// bdag ni
60b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhen sems shing // pad+ma sbyar bas bsgom par bya// mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob// pad+ma che las byung nas kyang // thams cad du
60b6(rnying rgyud): ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+mar tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun tu sdang bas khyab byas na// sems dpa'i tshul gyis skul ba ni// de nas 'dod zags phebs nas kyang // pad+ma'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur// dkyi
60b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du ni gang la yis// thab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing // 'dzam bcas pad+ma phye ba yis// bregs kyi dbus su yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtams// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin//
61a1(rnying rgyud): sna gas na sa skabs pa myos// nas la// stod pa gang nam myong byuzhugs// 'damos pa ma ga sa du/ ny-id la thob par 'gyur// dngal ldan ga gang thong 'a
61a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis// gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par
61a3(rnying rgyud): 'thar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zlagasang thig le chen po las 'di phyung ngo // / sna tshogs chen po mo chen po// snying du rje ga ler yang dag spyan//
61a4(rnying rgyud): dbus te lte 'og khro// sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun gnang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas// de nyid spang 'khor rab zhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs
61a5(rnying rgyud): mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpang su gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhed pas brgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong // phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// kha 'byed sna tshokra
61a6(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha gtong // zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas/
61a7(rnying rgyud): sngags mkhan zhag bdun du ni bsgom byas na// sna tshogs 'gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen po len cing
61b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'bar che po dbyas sa ldan 'das la ma sa par ma da// las na gyis 'arlab par gyur// mags pa yang bdang/ ma rgyad sa bshad pa byung // sang+yas rgyas sbrul bsod phyug 'jal// sngags rig phyag rgya du sa/
61b2(rnying rgyud): bcas// sa yi de nyid pha rol sbyin// bdag gi ni nyid sna chog saH// d+ha tshogs ye shes pa stod byug 'tshal// gzungs kyi brda yang po ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// she sa rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// tIr bI
61b3(rnying rgyud): shes bstod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me khor ye shes yang dag 'byung // bya ba nan tan sems can don// rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// /
61b4(rnying rgyud): nyid rig pa'i sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang dur 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal snyan tu bzang po gnyis su sbed pa'i mnyam d+ha nyid kyirdo rje ye shes
61b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i yig 'bru di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM tAM/ stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsad+ha trA~M/ oM
61b6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra rA ka AH/ oM badz+ra a d+hi Shid+ya trA~M/ oM brnaMs la ya b+h+yoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tra mtha/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phrag bris te 'di skad ces gsol to// des
61b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyang ring rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bral lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu pazang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rig ro rnaMs bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu slo bar mdzud// dran na dga'i rgyal ba
62a1(rnying rgyud): kun// dgra' dgra' rgyal ba mchog/ dga' druga'o lags pa'i las// dag 'daga' sngon 'grob// dga' dge'o sna tshogs rgya// da hUM snying gar drangs byas te// rang ga gsung ba bshad par mdzod// gang gis
62a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje chen po// de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying pa nyid kyi sri dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lang byung ngo // oM sarba tan+ta ga ta mA hA
62a3(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA nA badz+ra swab+hA rba At+ma \u0f85te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mo long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung da du thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tam hA ts+tsha brjes dz+nyAn tra/ de nas ba ga shugs
62a4(rnying rgyud): bas sor kun tu gzigs pas ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi slad du gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra d+ha bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa dz+nyA wa A / dranas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
62a5(rnying rgyud): rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma hA dz+nyA ni badz+ra swad+ha wa A t+ma ko&ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba ni na tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs paste rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang
62a6(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta kr-i t+ya a nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&taM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de// oM dga'i dge'o stong pa che// oM dge'o dge ro thugs chen
62a7(rnying rgyud): oM dge 'od ge'o sgra chen po// oM dge'o dge 'o gsung chen po// oM dgi 'o dge 'arin po che'o// oM dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das pa
62b1(rnying rgyud): ge dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje ye// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shong// gang gis sems can pa de nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes
62b2(rnying rgyud): bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor sbyar bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bad+mag
62b3(rnying rgyud): nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bsgrib// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso ba chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye she sa ni/
62b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'i// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
62b5(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsang dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gzugs dang lang chos brgyan pa yi// b+h+ra ma mig yangs ga zung bya ste// shes rab can
62b6(rnying rgyud): gyis byin rlabs 'grus// mnyam par bzhag ste byin brlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gnag/ gnyis pa mdun du gzhag byas pa// brtson 'grus pa rol byin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems
62b7(rnying rgyud): dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid
63a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas ngan yang dag gnas// rdo rje chos sde btsun ma ste// de sbyin dga' byud ma yin na// bzod pa chen ma byang du ste// gas pa' bdag nyid zad bsten// btsun mardo rje gdan meza// dam chog gnas na stong byengad ma'i// gla
63a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag ni thams cad du// snga ma bzhin du mdzod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo spyang rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod byas te// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// b+ha gArgyas lag pa brtan byas te// 'dzum dang
63a3(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par bklubs// slob che bas gar bya zhing // lha mo 'gying ba'i 'dud pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag pas bzung
63a4(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // sgro yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni sgra ru gzhug/ rdo rje chen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rab dgyes gnas las byung ba yi// bde byed chen mos mnyes par bgyi// de lta bzhin du mnyam
63a5(rnying rgyud): nyid 'thob// me tog phreng ba dod byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhengs su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la ltung ba yi// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod
63a6(rnying rgyud): par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi ra ba dgyes smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaT// mtha' ni hoHzhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo
63a7(rnying rgyud): rje phyung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas te// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang // ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la gdugs byas te// bla ma la ni dbang blang bya// shin tu
63b1(rnying rgyud): sbas pa 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la skal bar mdzad// de nas sbyar bzin pa pa// snyoms par zhugs ta da'i 'dab// slob dpan rdo byung byas te// b+ha ba dab tu gzhag par bya// lag pa yis na ma reg par// 'al rab tu byin dang /
63b2(rnying rgyud): bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bdi bar ni btung bar bya// gzungs me de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dbul bya// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // zung ma dang ni rang gi bu/
63b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang // de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang // glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// g+h+ri yi sbas pa gsang ba dang // de ba
63b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bslab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor
63b5(rnying rgyud): kyi ste rmongs pas sgra byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myung du zla phyed tshun chad du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te// phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams
63b6(rnying rgyud): dmyal bar bskal par grangs med sbyin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrag mi b+ha// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// da ma tshig bsung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don
63b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ lha rnams kyang ni dmachog gi// gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'dir sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten po rol dmyal ba rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob pa//
64a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ yang du bzhan du// zhan sdug bsngal 'thob sar te// das ni sngags kyi don pa smin// rnams kyin mchag tu bang// dam chag med par slob ma la// nams kyang sbyin par mo 'gyur ro// dbus ngas/
64a2(rnying rgyud): tshi ga gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang // de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams// dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang ba snang ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song zlog
64a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med pa 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad na bcu drug lon// dam
64a4(rnying rgyud): tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang // rdo rje las byang chub sgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag
64a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig yi ge gzhag pa yis// myur du dam tshig bsgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos gru ba ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur// mdongs sangs rgyas chen po dang //
64a6(rnying rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' bdag po che// blo ldan dbang bsgyur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te// dbang basbyar ba yi yid du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen
64a7(rnying rgyud): pa zhes zab mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug pa
64b1(rnying rgyud): thams cang rnab 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'ang // rngo rje khro bo chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad sbyar// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul bya// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad bya// thab dam chog dang dpon gyis// gsang
64b2(rnying rgyud): ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes
64b3(rnying rgyud): las 'di ltung nga// e badz+ra ba d+hA tsa NA sar+b+ba d+yak+Sha ta ka ha na nga ha pa tsa sr-i baH/ 'di spang sa zag sa song gsu makyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ong thams cad la bo chen po'i mthas rnam pajug tu g.yos/ kun tug yos/ lha dang / kla dang / dro ba dang /
64b4(rnying rgyud): ma yin dang / nam mkhang stong dang / mau'amaH dang / lto 'bruchen po dang / garjod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrag pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thung du lhags nas bcwa byin bdag nyid kyang thabs med
64b5(rnying rgyud): par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad ba rtsin/ tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du zen/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phrag chen po'i thang du rtser te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid tsa mahA 'angags byed chen po'i gzugs sa byas te/ 'jig rten gyi 'arje/
64b6(rnying rgyud): 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phral gyi mthas kun tu sdang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/
64b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi zhus sam/ khyed rnams ci dga' spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin
65a1(rnying rgyud): na/ sgrub bams kyad cig nga pal klas kya da dzin pa rnams par 'gas / dban ga shegs pa rnams cad mdza jug 'a pa des nang / ba bul du chub snga dgas dgan
65a2(rnying rgyud): pa shes las byung ngo // oM badz+ra r+tha\u0f89\u0fa4 TaM/ mthu kro d+ha han han/ prah+Na kr-it+ta/ mAr mAr/ !\u0f7f\u0f7f\u0f7f/ da d+he daH/ baH// d+h+wed+d+haHthApa/ hrI kr-inas r+b+ba mA d+ha na sa du ma rnamarba/ oMHmoT/ \u0f7f/ \u0f7f/
65a3(rnying rgyud): dzaM hU~M tra~M traT/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du sgra ga nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags sa// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyed krung mthu chen po'i skya chen po ste gajug pa thams
65a4(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'digs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag
65a5(rnying rgyud): po chen po'i bgad pa'i gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs
65a6(rnying rgyud): ma thag tu pad+ma'i rnga ba 'chang ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
65a7(rnying rgyud): oM pad+ma ma thA dz+wa la ma hA rbo d+ha bdab krug sa pa/ sar+b+ba sh+mi/ khA e+e ShA hUM/ sar+b+ba rba Sh+Ta/ prad nI nAM/ dam dam/ brjod hU~M ja maH maH/ s+pho& d+d+hoH/ badz+ra lar/ tsa ba ladra ga dag/ ngas nas/ mabyung rdzab rab pra Sha/ bra ma tra pra mthA
65b1(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ hI haH hA hA/ tsarba grub/ be sha pANA sha na/ hrI naHd+hUta/ de nas 'dag sangs mthag tu tshangs ngas can pa 'drar yang yang zhing khas thub tu 'gyul te/ brdab 'chos so// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po pa
65b2(rnying rgyud): dris pa/ lhang dI nI shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskal ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/ lha'i tsho gas thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen
65b3(rnying rgyud): po dang ldan pa de'i phyir khyod kyis gadrug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang / tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig
65b4(rnying rgyud): byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me lce stong gi gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang lha
65b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i tid+ya nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po'i 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM
65b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ saM b+hak+Sha ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyad rnam par bshig ste/ raM rab kyi rtse mo yang ches 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas
65b7(rnying rgyud): gnas par 'gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa yang khaMs bu ba tsam du 'gyel te brtsal bar gyur to// de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/
66a1(rnying rgyud): mthu che ba yin la sum na rtsa gsum gyi lha gadrug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na da ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthun bar ston rgyag/ de nas lhar rgyal po rgan po brgya D+yan nga rang nyid kyi mthag cad sbran
66a2(rnying rgyud): dang / srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ ra'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan
66a3(rnying rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad
66a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mtsho ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu ma bzad par byed pa'i me rlung
66a5(rnying rgyud): gis bdus pa'i mdog sngon po'i sde/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang / tshi l-i rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pas lAm logs rgyab la g.yogs te bsdams pa/
66a6(rnying rgyud): me'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / ce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / d+yaM la dang / gzig dang / stag
66a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa khro ba bya la sang gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ba nas phyung na/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dral ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i sman dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po ga
66b1(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'dzags par byed pa'i thu ba chen po brgya snang gu g.yog dang bcas te/ shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rnga khro gnyar car khrob brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang bcas pas 'khyil bar bu d+ya ta
66b2(rnying rgyud): gnas so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad+ma chen po rta gdeng khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil par gyur te gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil
66b3(rnying rgyud): par gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po yang khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos
66b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul than dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'brumra thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas
66b5(rnying rgyud): so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs dang ngas skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste/ rje gcig rje gcig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po
66b6(rnying rgyud): de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin+da tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma
66b7(rnying rgyud): ma hA yak+Sha sen ba ta ye/ taHTA/ oM bo d+ha boH/ ma hA d+hi rabad ra ba pany+dza ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na grad+d+ha/ mA ra mA ra/ b+had+d+he b+hAdz+dza/ shrI g+h+ra~M ma hA badz+ra/ tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM/ ta ka ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ ma rba ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs
67a1(rnying rgyud): ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sman ma mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bster ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang po la
67a2(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po gan ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra ar+thar+tha
67a3(rnying rgyud): satwa sad ha ha ha ha hU~M ha i ti/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas slar yang bslang ste 'jig rten gsum po yongs su bskor du bcug nas 'jigs byed gdug pa de
67a4(rnying rgyud): la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas raM rab tsam gyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing / bgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par
67a5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// oM ma hA b+he ra ba be rl-i ShI/ TaTar+tha ta T+Ta ta/ ha ha i ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i rtse mo cung zad tsam yang ma 'gul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga do 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te he ru kas bdag/
67a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ngo 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem che ma mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' dga' yang rnam par bcom mo// ma mo'i
67a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te dam 'phab nas/ kho bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du yang bcug/ dam chog la yang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so// de nas bcom
67b1(rnying rgyud): prar+tha 'das rdo shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag bong bzhad pa bzhad cing rdo rjeng khro ga nyer khro bo chen pos mgo la zhabs kyis bstan te gtong bar mdzad do// oM bar+d+ha t+ta sarba/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na kr-iH dz+dza/ mata ma ta na~M N+DirA yA sau/ snga r+thas
67b2(rnying rgyud): tas+t+waM/ re ke ba su rA dza la la rtsi pradz+wa le ta/ ma hA b+hA rti A ka b+hu A kaD+D+h+ya a bya wa ma bya wa ma/ kr-i NaNA ba tsakra b+hai ra ba hr-i da ya~M hU~M b+h+rUM/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhud pas bzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon
67b3(rnying rgyud): par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyan te/ khas bub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje gcig bdag cag la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nang
67b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo // de nas baMSh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so// kA ye kA ya gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'jungs kyi bar du de
67b5(rnying rgyud): snying rang gi gnas su song shig/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po de rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do//
67b6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ba sAr+ya d+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha ha ra pa ta ra pa/ s+ya su d+ha/ ra mAM sa me da mad+de na/ oM b+ha b+hA b+h+r-i b+h+rUM thA/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brtag par gyur te gnas so// de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang / ma hA shr-I dang / la taM yang g.yog dang
67b7(rnying rgyud): bcas par dam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par bdul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po rnga bo chen pong rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzadang // oM badz+ra ba Dab mr-i kha kha kha Sha D+ga khA he/ tsa tra dz+raH/
68a1(rnying rgyud): bag/ masbya rnye pa/ An// blud po d+han/ nga ste/ ba sgrub ma na da na dz+nyAn+ta/ das nan dang rtson du su can po mdzad cing ngas pa 'i mdun duganas par tha /
68a2(rnying rgyud): de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor khas bu ba tu 'gyel nas/ rje gcig spobs shig/ rje gcig skyobs shig ces smras so// de nas tshangs pa de tshangs pa'i phrin
68a3(rnying rgyud): pode bdag nyid kyi nam mkha' bkang nas rgyal bar byed de/ kra ye kA ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song skyong / khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma btul re zhes smras so// de nas rdo rjen gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen ba de'i
68a4(rnying rgyud): mgor brdzus te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la glags te/ sha dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / nus pa rnams blangs nas phyogs bcu gtong to// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra sA s+thi dang ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i
68a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas pur byas te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i bsgrubs gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do// oM s+phu lu gu lu badz+ram
68a6(rnying rgyud): ka bo d+ha/ A kar+Na yA/ A kaR+Sha ya sha ga hr-i da ya~M/ mahA badz+ra da wA ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya d+hak+Sha ya trUM/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas brgya byin 'atsor bachen
68a7(rnying rgyud): pas 'gyings te/ yi bzad par khros pas gnod sbyin chen po khyod sro'i bran yin zhes de la skyes so// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu gyur spring yang dral te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang /
68b1(rnying rgyud): tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so// de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing dngangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabs su nye bar gyur to// de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nus de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas
68b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu yongs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham
68b3(rnying rgyud): cad yang 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bsgral bar mdzad do// oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha saM ha ro ba saM ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha/ ud+d+hi ma kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/ swa pa ya
68b4(rnying rgyud): swA pa ya/ sarba kro d+ha ma duSh+pa pra duSh+Ta bi ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya shakra brAh+ma biSh+Ta ra ma he shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga wAn/ swa ra Ta/ sau khya kro d+ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta sat+yA nA sa ma yu&he/ swa ra ta sa mu ya i hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po
68b5(rnying rgyud): khro ba chen pos khro bo thams cadade 'dren bu dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ Ta k+ki dz+haiM dzAH/ Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH/ hUM Tak+ki b+h+rUM dz+dzaH/ hUM Ta wi trAM dz+dzadzaH/ A
68b6(rnying rgyud): ya/ A kAR+Sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ ba sha~M kur+tha/ sarba kro d+ha/ sa ma la~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ prak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ hU~M bak+ki b+h+rU~M/ de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'byor lo 'brel bar gyur te/ gyi bcom
68b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes lnga zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi ka'i 'khor lo chen po
69a1(rnying rgyud): dang // As smranas sa tug hU~M nga/ de nas dedag pa khyod kyis dbyung thug chen pa stsags pa gdug pa sa nas can ched po rnams gsum shAg rgyas bkang stsal // / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
69a2(rnying rgyud): kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsang bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bo'i rtseg bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo //
69a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra a mr-i ta/ ma hA kro d+he shwa ri/ uta shrI dzaH/ utA shrI dzaH/ badz+ra a mr-i ti hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan+d+ha 'ang snya ma bdud rtsi chen mo de dag kun tu khras te spen ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ dra wa ru su/ zhes pa'i sgra 'byin
69a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcu gi nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig pa 'di phyeng ngo // oM a mr-i ta san+d+hi pa ni ma hA mr-i te mu She/ pra be sha ya prA be shwa ya/ sarbAn badz+ra pad+ma sad+mo ge// ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta bi Sha bi Tha/ mAr+No A/
69a5(rnying rgyud): nas dbang phyug chen mo la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo/
69a6(rnying rgyud): rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs sra song nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun
69a7(rnying rgyud): kyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams// 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste// je bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po che// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong // ches
69b1(rnying rgyud): khyod skye ba skur// thob ma med khyo nga ro thigs// nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med// gcu bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgyes pang byang gtung ba yi// 'gro ba kun la phan bya phyir// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes 'gro
69b2(rnying rgyud): la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhe mdzad pa// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba na gong grol
69b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyis mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam pas zhir gyur pa// rdul dang bral bas 'dzums pa spangs// nam mkha' bsgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam
69b4(rnying rgyud): rtog dri mas ma gos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi//
69b5(rnying rgyud): ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde
69b6(rnying rgyud): ba chen pos stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi gsol ba'i cho ga nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis
69b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba dang yod bde ba grub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi pra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gyur ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'tshul chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bsgyur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag pade ba chen po
70a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshe 'phrul gyis dbang bsrung bas yod bde bar gyur te/ bcos ldan 'das kyizhabs la yang dang yang drug tug sanas paskor badras// ngo/ kha baban ban/ sangs sa bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan
70a2(rnying rgyud): 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ched po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs la shin tu dgyes pa bde bachen po nyid mchog dang myor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsang bar bzhugs nas/ de ma zhag tu de bzhin gshes
70a3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khro mo dbyung mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang blugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta la hA badz+ra Tad+hI shwa ri sarba draSh+TA ni mu d+hA Ne ma he pra la yA nu ya sh+ma shun b+hI Sha Ne/ 'adz+ram hA bo d+ha da~MSh+Tha kaR+Sha lo pra ta ba ta dwe/ sar+b+ba shutrUM/ pra
70a4(rnying rgyud): la ni/ hU~M dz+nyA ma hA kro d+hi shwa ra~M hU~M phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung paM badz+re rjeg la phyag na mi na sna tshogs bsdams pa/ zhal gsum pa mdog in+da nI la'i 'od 'bar ba
70a5(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa'i 'khor ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sU re dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / mu srar dang / 'khor lo dang/ ka ni ma dang / to ma la dang / gzhu dang / mudang dang / shag
70a6(rnying rgyud): te dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'bring chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rlig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o// oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra
70a7(rnying rgyud): khro d+he ba rim hA A thAn T+Te/ Sha ni nI la dz+wa las tas pra dzA kita s+sa t+l-i r-i ka tI la \u0f89\u0fa4k+Shab+hU/ She ma rba n+te/ nang dI ra rangaH/ pa ri pra ri ta kA tI la/ ya ng+ge dz+haiM// badz+ra dz+ra shU la thAng+yas rbAkr-i d+hen/ hU~M hU~M hUM trA b+h+rUM/ ha~M na~M rud+ha lAn+d+ha pra la hUM phaT/ de nas
70b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tud dgyes pa khro ba chen po'i gzi brjong chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi mkho mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung bya// oM hri hU~M sa dz+ra An+da ba
70b2(rnying rgyud): krortI shwa ri bid ma/ mtha ma tha/ g+ha sa kAs/ sarba duSh+TaM/ pra duSh+Ti/ hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M tra~M waM/ rbadza tra// khro mo chen mo 'dis sgo phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste// gzi brjid chen por rab gtong zhing // shin
70b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzegs pa me ba khyen 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rnob ste// dpung rgyan thong bas brtseg par bya// spyan ni ba mar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon tshwa'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing // yi dwags
70b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i drab khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang
70b5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hiH badz+ra po dri mu hA ban+d+ha mA le// ga bak+Sha k+ki Sh+T+r-i ni/ ma hA ma ho// d+hu ra bi kaM krodz+haiM he hU~M hU~M ha ha/ hUM hU~M hrIH/ hi sha nyi sha// mA hA badz+ra bA ba mu la muM ho N+yai \u0f7f/ hUM hU~M/ hi he hU~M hrIHtrAM/ dkyil 'khor
70b6(rnying rgyud): nang gi dbus te dang // 'di dri rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rnob chen pa zhal gsum pa// rta gdong sbyin du ston pa ste// gyo mo chen mo dpung ba tu // rnam par bskur ba'i mi sreg gdong // mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon// khrug med po la 'thung byed pa//
70b7(rnying rgyud): metshan tshad tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa 'ang bu rgyan mod pas brtsegs// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor ba rgyan teganas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes kyi khro mo gnyis su med par
71a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gabus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'don la snyams par zhugs te/ gdon ma za bar drug po dang ldan ma rkyen s+ho zhes bya ba'i zhes pa'i dbang ma rkyen ma 'di nyid kyi sdang dag sang dang thags darje las kyang dang // yonam
71a2(rnying rgyud): yo g+ha ma hA bi shwe shwa ri hU~M hU~M k+ShaM/ ha~M haM haM/ ma hA kro d+he gra mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe bad ra Ni/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT// 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs
71a3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// bsgyur ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong // rab tu drag la ro myong zhing // gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas// dpur pa bcu drug gis
71a4(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gding gsum pa// za byed mi bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// dang dab bcud dang ldan pa
71a5(rnying rgyud): yi// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yin la 'byor mtshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su basbyor// gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung // de ni de lta'i stan la
71a6(rnying rgyud): gnas// bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro bo nam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/
71a7(rnying rgyud): yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gar byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs// de nas
71b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba de ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang sras pa dang / de khon nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sbrang du gsung dang brags rdorna las
71b2(rnying rgyud): nga/ smra sa na
71b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+hA rA ma hA te dza a b+hi She kr-i d+h+r-i taM hU~M/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma~M hA sUrmA nA~M ku Te ka ro ke tra ta Ta tu hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA ke t+ye kr-id+d+hi shwa re/ ma hA badz+ri yod+d+ha ye hU~M hU~M hU~M tra~M phaT phaT/ oM sarba badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra krod+ha Anu A sa~M hU~M hU~M tra~M tra~M tro Ta ya tro Ta ya hU~M da ya hU~M phaT/ oM
71b4(rnying rgyud): sbyis pabadz+rad+ha ra mi kro d+hIn ts+tshats+tsha hU~Mg+h+ra/ hr-I tsA ba cwa m+b+hi kyi rjod la hU~M rna ma tha maT/ oMs badz+ran tsashA d+ha TIm gdu ni hU~M hU~M btal bat+ta lta/ mthapa / nga d+mo hU~M / rba brji ma hA shweg pra thA na hU~M hU~M ma ta ma ta phaT/
71b5(rnying rgyud): klod+hamA h+lA badzAd+hA sh+tsa b+hA be shar+d+hir+thab+h+yAM/ bita ya bi tA ya phAT/ aus pa ban d+hi ga lang ni saHkro d+b+ha shwA ra d+hA d+b+h+yAM/ is na b+hAr+d+hata raM paM hA gro nas ldan tr-Is+yAMstAM/ sarba badz+nyAn ra sa t+pa lo d+hi gad+hA ba hI d+b+hag gri/ oM sarba badz+ra ni d+him d+h+r-ikr-id+hI shA ra ma hA kid+hA rIH/
71b6(rnying rgyud): dri ba'i dri 'aM/ mas tha badran ma thathon par ma hU~M/ sa ba gli / mos pa sbyi sbyin ni/ oMs bdun sa mad hU~MhU~M/ yis nabadu d+ha ma sa
72a1(rnying rgyud): oMs r+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ram d+ha oMHb+h+yarmAr+m+mA d+hA \u0f7f/ oM sa rba bad+yA d+hA ra mahA krod+d+ha satwA badz+ra ba shin N+DihU~M/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha da ma \u0f7fwad+ha ts+tsha TA d+hI hoH/ oM d+hIdz+dzab+h+yaHAH/ de nas rnal 'byor yang drug mgu rangs dga' ba gyur te/ 5
72a2(rnying rgyud): dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab pa de mchog dbyings dang ldan// me g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// gzungs la rol pa'i bde ba bzhes sa gsal/
72a3(rnying rgyud): mtshur chen po cho 'phral snang mdzad cing // snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang pa'ang mi rten par// bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// ra yu ma hA sudz+ha dzo hi ni dz+wA la su hU~M pUma?/ ma hA mra
72a4(rnying rgyud): i ni/ dz+wAdz+wa la su hU pa k+Sha~M ma hA su hA/ i ni dz+wa la su hA u dza/ u ma hA sa hA dza~M/ dza i ni dz+wa su hUM a la la la ho/ ma hA su hU ra ma ra ma ma hA su hU/ a lA la la ho/ ma hA su dre Na/ de nas bcoM ma lhan 'das rdo rje nam ma khi Sh+Ta la 'gro me chen mo dam tshig
72a5(rnying rgyud): ces bya baSh+Ti ting nge 'dzin li skems par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi steng po 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+hA rad+d+hi phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi gi ts+tsha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+raDA ki d+hI ma hA he ma pa ti
72a6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM bAdz+nyA na ki hrI T+Ta m+bAr pri ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra n+ta kin+dod+b+ha sh+ye mA rA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+radza ki tI mahA badz+ra mAts+tshi tA da/ b+hI d+he g+hA b+hI ta ya/ sam+b+ha ni sam+b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Na ki nI mA hA ba kr-i hU~M ya d+ha ra la li d+ha phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hi k+sha lo d+ha ts+tshats+tsha ne/
72a7(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ d+hIm sa mr-id pa rta ga ba/ mi gnas naso gro hU~M hU~M / oM ba rnaM la hU~M hU~M Ta/ oM badz+ra na ga mA dus / oM dzi rje rnaMm rdzas rba ta~Mg pA la tra sa rnaMs / oM badza gi seM /
72b1(rnying rgyud): ma ston nga/ na tu na na su
72b2(rnying rgyud): ga tsun ma ma sa/ nam rnaM / wAn sa ga bya/
72b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
72b4(rnying rgyud): ngas / na sa/
72b5(rnying rgyud): mi ts+tsha sa/ gang 'i badzin hU~MhU~M b+h+ya / sa / pa b+hAm m+b+ha/ spyan / li hU~M bahU~M phaT/ den sa rten mupa ma dul ma 'dzir bye ba sgyug mau dag thams pa da
72b6(rnying rgyud): yi dga'ab bya / tshan mo da byed par shA pa'o'o// ba ba bskye pasar ba 'bang sangs ni mi pa// 'de bapa'i sla par byung// sa patso'i sten tu smra par du
72b7(rnying rgyud): ma nas da sa sa kyi sa sa salu su smra
73a1(rnying rgyud): na // / sa // du
73a2(rnying rgyud): khrob gas ky-itshig 'di sla rjen la byor pa da/ ma thing yang gro pa dang / nam mtha' pa 'i md-i/ rdo 'jog par byed ma dug la sogs pa dug dgag padang / gzig pa / dbang thub la sogs pa sa sa/
73a3(rnying rgyud): gad+ha mas mtshud pa la sogs pa'i das chob tu r+saka phyag tu dang / na 'byor rdzog dang / d+has smin g+sa gAH m+b+hi te/ las rnams ca la hU~M // denga'i bal po'i sgri ba bzhin bcingasakhro bra gnyis sngags nas da/ sdom pa gnyis phan
73a4(rnying rgyud): na b+har zhing / zhib gnyis kyang rab tu brjing / glag ma gnyis pa rti ste 'od zer lta gtang ba 'din phyag tu'i cig yin no// b+hag rgya 'di ni gzi badzid // g+ha dang lha m-in rgyag byas pa// sangs pas rdon 'dzin la logs// bsngags gang mchod pargyas
73a5(rnying rgyud): pa yis// bcings pa rnyid 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'dzad par byed// gajug pa thams cad gsod byed pa// phrin ma thams cad zabar byed// na la 'byor da ma la gnas pa yis// 'di las las rnams thams cad rjer// las
73a6(rnying rgyud): nams thams cad sgrub pa pa// ldan dngos thab mi 'gyu te// 'dod tshigs zhe sang gagi sun mas// bzhin pa sa ng+yas thab tu du rbab// rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/ srung gnyis rgyab rgya // phen rgya gnyis brgyang ste/ phan tshun
73a7(rnying rgyud): badz+ral khrus pa gnyis kya drung steng gar bstan nas/ brkyang badrub kyi tshul rjeg das pa 'dims thams da byu 'o// da pos thams dmas kyi rnams// de ces par 'ang byed par phur/ rgya'adu sngag sa gang sa // 'ad gis pa
73b1(rnying rgyud): cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub yid bzhin rin ldan no// ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phung bar byed// reg 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang // cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong // thags
73b2(rnying rgyud): mnyam par sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus sbyar/ lhag ma 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no// sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rtagadong gi'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos phub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma jug
73b3(rnying rgyud): 'phraphur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa 'og dngos grub 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge// nga ni bstan te rgyal ba rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis drang ba
73b4(rnying rgyud): bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas nam ma/ khadu la 'gro ma chen ma de dag sogs 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing // dur
73b5(rnying rgyud): khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu ba chen pos brtags par byed// phyag na thod pa gri dag dang // rdo rje khaT+wA~M rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbu sdug rnam par bstar ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyar ba yis// bde ba
73b6(rnying rgyud): dam pa longs spyod myong // rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs// d+ha mA ra ma ho na ta na ba ra a ma hA su hu badz+ri i ni// ka ma la su hu a la la ho/ sr-i ra o ta mu hU~M a hu si da dza'u wa ra dze i naM dza la ma ho a yi ha ar
73b7(rnying rgyud): ho/ a ru ho b+hi su b+ha d+ha an ha a su ra a su hu de ni ba ra Ta i ni dza la su hu sis/ sa sa nad ra ba nad tA nra nad ti da/ a ma re hi ma hA su hu mad dzu mug khu/ sa la ga khang hU~M kung du sa dun i su ny+ra tsang dziT/ lug khu sra hra/ na be dug/ be la ba b+ha 'i mu ga khu su hra/
74a1(rnying rgyud): sas // sang / tham dang sa/ nab la ba shA dza/ nangs rgya mas pa bang ba stsangs dbar pa sa skyes sa ltung bdags pa'i sa// dgas rjes ma stong du bdag cag bsung
74a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshabs gdungs pa yi// byang chub des ni kun tu tshem par mdzod// Al la la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgro 'byed cing // byang chub mchog lam snying po nyid 'di ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde pas zil gnan te/
74a3(rnying rgyud): rmongs shing bying pa'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol// A la la la ho// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gis gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// kyang na 'da' ba'ang longs spyod
74a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyar// rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong // kye ma'o ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba// bsam gyis mi khya ba nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde
74a5(rnying rgyud): mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rten chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon med rol lo 'di la rol mdzad cing // rdus khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// 'dul ba'i dbang gi grub pa'i cha lugs mi zad ma// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gros gzi
