74a6(rnying rgyud): brjid 'bar ba 'dris// sdug bsngal gsum pos 'joms shing rmongs pa la// bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas spyod mdzad de// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod// a la la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa'i
74a7(rnying rgyud): bcings pas ma zin nam grol te// rol pas chub pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa// 'jog rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba'i rnams// mnyes mdzod shin tu dad pa bzhengs su gsol/
74b1(rnying rgyud): 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' de bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin ma nabs shing rnam khro yang // byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzod// e mdo 'de bas bde sprin phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i/
74b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba dngos grub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzod// thugs rjegs la ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// chu dang rkyen lam
74b3(rnying rgyud): brten rang bzhin du ba// la chags dri med yongs gsal zla ba bzhin// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas rten// 'di yis gcol bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub po//
74b4(rnying rgyud): yid gdung mnyen pa'i nga ro yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po gru blangs te// mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba'i// dngos grub thams cad skur bar bya// bad byed chen po 'di yis ni// bsrel bas
74b5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro la thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
74b6(rnying rgyud): de dag thams cad larjes su mgri bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te// gsang skyes pa d+ma bye ba las// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// brtag na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te// mkha' nga 'tho badra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'di nas dngos
74b7(rnying rgyud): grub 'thob// mi dang mi dang mi byed rdo rje bde// mtha' rtsa laT gyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bdab mkha' 'gro ba rtse// rab dkyis dbang ma bar byed pa skabs mdzod// rnal 'phror mthogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis rtsen pa rnam byas na
75a1(rnying rgyud): bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi// rab gyes dngas grub 'grub par 'gyur// rnam 'gyod ma'i rje ba'i che brjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya la shes sa// / mgo lathal mo phyed sbyin te// rma byas lan
75a2(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje bcing ba yang dag ldan/ pad+ma'i skyi la mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis rten par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen pos gar byed cing // rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud dang smod
75a3(rnying rgyud): byed dang // sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos 'grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te// sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// gsum gyis
75a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams su rab bya zhing // mkhur chos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du gzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye// g.ya 'byed pad+ma rnam bzhi bya// padz+ra phyi phyir rab sa nye zhing // ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbar// sen mos mtshan khrang sam
75a5(rnying rgyud): mdo dang // rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// dal bus rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyod par bya// g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis rjen pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo
75a6(rnying rgyud): mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod de// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yung dang yang du 'dzin pa ni// blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i sgo ba'i ye shes so// de dag thams cad mgu
75a7(rnying rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye pa'i yo byang rnams// bdeb bsgrubs pas sgrib pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// bsgrub pa thams cad srung byed pas// gdon min dka'
75b1(rnying rgyud): rtag bgyid pas// gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bskur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byAd phyi yi thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan la sogs
75b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag bsgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus pa'i sha las rab bsgrub
75b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// 'o ma dam pas zod bdag nga// mkha' 'gro ma kun dbu la byas na// dkyil 'khor 'di rini dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs
75b4(rnying rgyud): te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda rnams dran gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
75b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi bana'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// ka ni 'dod pa
75b6(rnying rgyud): byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te// gti mug ldongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis// rang gi nu ma rab
75b7(rnying rgyud): bsdamu s+sa nAs// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa dkar brten na// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo ru gzhag pa yi// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag len no// g.yon gyi sprin ma
75b8(rnying rgyud): bstan yang
76a1(rnying rgyud): bstod pa yis/ myur dgrag ni byas par 'gyur/ sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// garas kyi sbyin mas phyag partsug/ pas kyi lag pas m+b+hing gAs// rA dang ldan pas ma tebs na// 'don namam pang banamachod
76a2(rnying rgyud): de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bsgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yi// lag pa snying gar btung ba ste// dbang mo rkyen
76a3(rnying rgyud): du rnam bstan na// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje pad+ma rtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang
76a4(rnying rgyud): tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bsten na// de che nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar lhung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngogs mkhan
76a5(rnying rgyud): gyis ni mu bsten na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskal na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya'i
76a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i yI ge kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu chog drag rnam bral ba// 'dren tshul rnapa 'byor ma yi'o// oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor bsngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs
76a7(rnying rgyud): pa mtha' yas mchog/ sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun
76b1(rnying rgyud): chu bzang po chen po yang kun tams 'debs pa'i ye shes rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thags te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor mchen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ngas
76b2(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // rdo rje thul mo mnyam gzhag ste// sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste// lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang bar bya// snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas// thams cad las ni rab sbyar te// sna tshogs mkha'u 'gro'i dkyil
76b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed// thal mo de gnyis mAnya mu sbyar te// mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du spyod// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong spang // snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar// 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jigs byed
76b4(rnying rgyud): rab mdzad cing // sems can thams cad phran mdzad ma// de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las ni rdo rje dang // mchog nyid bsgreng ba'i tshul zhus te// rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yeng de nas
76b5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub bo// gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu mo dag/ lha min la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam
76b6(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas/ mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam pakug byas te// lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des ni myos byed thob pa yin// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bskur
76b7(rnying rgyud): ni// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te// yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med// spyi
77a1(rnying rgyud): gang 'di nyid kyis byas te// mgu ba'i spong ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur// mchog gi bcing ba 'di kun dang // 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang // yid la bsam pa byed pa 'thob/
77a2(rnying rgyud): phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing // mgu bas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar// lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtang // dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub
77a3(rnying rgyud): 'thob// rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub// de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir// gnas ltar rab tu
77a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bsgyur byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang // de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du ni dbang bslar bas// khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi
77a5(rnying rgyud): g.yeng 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te// snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas// 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub// de nyid g.yon par dab sbyar te// rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun
77a6(rnying rgyud): du ni mnyam gzhag pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyid kha nas bgad pararu sbyar// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid
77a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam bzhag ste// rtse mo kha phyed rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po che bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde byed
77b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dgra tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis zla ba gcig byas na/
77b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjed// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mig yong sems kyis de 'gyur ro// sbom po lce yi tshul
77b3(rnying rgyud): bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang // dbyig dang gseng dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btang ba mchog gi rnams// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de//
77b4(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying gar rab tu gzhug/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang
77b5(rnying rgyud): srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal sred mthu chen thob par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar to// rang gi ma mchung dbus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag
77b6(rnying rgyud): spo// zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste// sha zas bza' ba las kun byed// thal mo nyid ni bcings byas nas// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor sbyor// sbom po'i zud ni spel nas kyang // chung ngu gnyis kyang de
77b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang // thams cad las ni skyer byas te// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyang bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po
78a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ khra mo gnyis kyang bsum par bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig tu ni gnon byed de// de bzhin bgrus dang btsir bar 'gyur// phyag rgya
78a2(rnying rgyud): 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po'i bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis// las
78a3(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad grub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshad du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // hi hi zhes pas glu ru len/
78a4(rnying rgyud): ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas 'bod par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas gang bar byed// hwA hwA zhes pas skrod par byed// paT+Ta phaT zhes pas gsod par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dA dz+ha sa
78a5(rnying rgyud): bas 'dzin par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed// dge ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog/ hU~Mn+tu zhes pas gya spyod par byed// d+h+r-i trA~Mts+tshiN+Te/ tra~M hU~M b+h+rU~Ms pas 'ber bar byed// hU~M dr-i zhes pas gzi rjing byed// tra~M tri zhes byas 'dren par byed//
78a6(rnying rgyud): zhes pas mchod byar byed// dngos grub thams ca de 'bras bu smin// dz+r-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed/ d+hI d+h+r-i zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hr-i hri zhes pas 'dren par byed// hri hUM zhes pas 'byin par byed// hr-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed//
78a7(rnying rgyud): hra hra zhes pas gnon par byed// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// hi hi zhes pas srung bar byed// b+h+r-i hU~M zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// tr-i traM zhes pas bdug par byed// g+h+r-i b+h+r-i zhes pas phreng bar byed// ga~M ga~M zhes
78b1(rnying rgyud): pas dri du byed// re ro zhes pas brgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyipa ga / rang drang po sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
78b2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsopa ga 'debs so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid
78b3(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang klu dang bzhed pa che// sgeg mo rgol ba bde ma mchog/ sil snyan bring bu rnal sna tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyung
78b4(rnying rgyud): dris pa rnams// da'aphrul // dang thab pas ma da kyi ma / rgyad kyis phyin dadu seM dru tha sa ba na pa mtshon// theg sa 'a nas spyod ma dazug
78b5(rnying rgyud): mas su / du du// gas na nga ma sag tu 'di / sa sa pa
78b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa khyab pa che// 'phyod pa sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams se la bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed // sa dang bar snang de bzhin pade// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la smin// tshangs
78b7(rnying rgyud): dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// bla gsang thig pe pas byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdoH// bde ba/
79a1(rnying rgyud): su nga da// san du// rnas sa ba da bya/
79a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'dra// 'od zer gzi brjid 'bang ba can// rang las mye bur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni// waM byas myur du dong bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drangs pas// chog drag des ni lcags su byas// lha dang lha min mchog
79a3(rnying rgyud): gi bdag/ khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yis// phan tshun du ni bslabs byas nas// rmad byed rnam pa lnga tshogs kyi// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya// sgor ldan
79a4(rnying rgyud): rmya ba'i gzugs nyid du// de gengs bon gzhag par bya// de nyid dri nyid thabs kyis gnas// phyogs kyi spang bar nga myor bas// de nas pa/ sa maben dang 'thub bo// de nyid rdzogs dang snying po dang // sngags dgra dang mi ldan pas//
79a5(rnying rgyud): tha
79a6(rnying rgyud): skyer dadangs thub // mardzogs pa nges b.rab tu 'dug/ sa mdzes pa // 'ang nga thung bas 'gyur bte/ pa byor 'gyur dun pa sa dpa' ba da pa byed// de nasang bzhin gshegs
79a7(rnying rgyud): du/ sa / / bang gas rgya// dang ra /
79b1(rnying rgyud): nyidang // bdag bri de nyi nga bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog shes gsungs// dkyil 'khor dang ni mchog dang / gsang bzlas par tudang// 'dub dadapas sa sreng 'dud par dan// dag mthun papa btu sags/ rlo /
79b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas// rig ma dang ni lhan cig rtsen// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon snod la bskal ba dang // gzungs ma'i bdag por bsgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed bya dang // rab kyi
79b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad byung ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod byang nga// bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun tug khrag byungang // padz+ra'i gnas ni dag byu dang // bsgrub da nye bar bslab pa dang // shin tu
79b4(rnying rgyud): sbyor dang sbyor che ba// sbyong bar basbyor sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// bskyab pa yi ni sbyor che ba// spror drang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor// de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' rje// phan par dgongs pa
79b5(rnying rgyud): nyon gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa'i mdo rjes su dris pa/ rang gizugs la bzhag ste/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las srung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu stong
79b6(rnying rgyud): pra lanyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'bor phrag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bslabs// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de// rtse ma'o ba ba rnam par 'gyur// skyeng bro
79b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis bsgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs// bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid
80a1(rnying rgyud): de dag de nyid ci bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags// dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba
80a2(rnying rgyud): de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang ba rab tu bsgrub// rdo rje pad+ma rnam mdzad pas// rol pa phyin pa sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyur ba dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung // rdo rje brlan pa
80a3(rnying rgyud): gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// nu ma mtshan khung mkhrur tshos gnyis// 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgya ba// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// ma
80a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po de 'grub po// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang // dmal zhe sdang bza' ba dang // zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang //
80a5(rnying rgyud): maspyod rnams bskal bar bya// sha dang khrag dang klad pa rnams// drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya// 'di ni gsang pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon sdod pa dang // bla ma sdod byed brtsod pa la// dram tshig phyir ni bslab par bya// gti
80a6(rnying rgyud): de ni 'gu ba mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar 'tsho ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing // 'o dod 'bod par sprul gyi ba dang //
80a7(rnying rgyud): bstir mod chen po brlag par 'gro// lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa// rig ma kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di sbas te// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu/
80b1(rnying rgyud): giganas nas gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug Na dang yang dag ldan// nA bla gas bar thig la lu// matag dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phral ba bskyod par bya// ngani bskyed pasu 'grubyu ste// de bdes yang bsgrub par bya//
80b2(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gus la bzhin// blo sbyin rtag tu bsgrub par bya// bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni// lha lo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang // de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// bslab pa lnga po sbyor ba ste/
80b3(rnying rgyud): suM sgrub pa lha mo'i don// sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rtsa// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so yi rtse mo sa ma chu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsnam par bya// stong bar bsgyur skal
80b4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i// rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsrub bya ste// bdag ni sems dpa'o zhes bsams na// 'di ni gnyis med
80b5(rnying rgyud): myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sgor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag
80b6(rnying rgyud): rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// myong ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe da di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/
80b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor bskur ba yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang // rdo rje brtan pos bsgral byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa
81a1(rnying rgyud): sapa dus rnams babs pa byas nan// mangs ga / ngas/ du nas// na pa / dbus par dag nga dang // rdu tha na
81a2(rnying rgyud): 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chum pade che dang // byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'phyob// gsang ba chen po rang babyung ba// de dag de ny-ing klas pa che// sangs rgyab rnams kyi 'dris pa'i nA// dpes yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang
81a3(rnying rgyud): drag ldan mthang dang // bdag po chen po mchod byed na// nga yis ston pa kun mdzod te// rgyal ba chog pa mdzod par 'gyur// srid pa gcod pa po dang gyur te// 'ge ba'i ston pa ma chog tu 'gyur// de la sgra ban mchod byed cing // 8
81a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ sa sa/
81a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i sgor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po de ste 'thob po// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan btab la// cung zad mi 'grub yong meng de// phyag rgya phun gyi badra ba che// bdag nyid mo sor rjes su 'grub// rabang dgyes mtshan dang mngar
81a6(rnying rgyud): chen mo// ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i tshe// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpud mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mthu 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzing ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par
81a7(rnying rgyud): mdzang // ra ma rams matom hA san// rib dgyes gdon mo thal bzhugs// sangs rgyas kung dang mna' sbyor ba// thugs jig par yang dang ldan// bdag cig run kyang ma Sh+T+rI// skal rdzun dri med rang sa kyi// rnal byor ma b+hi

82a4(rnying rgyud): sa rkyo 'dang / sa mang ba sa parnaMs// sa ma so/ lab dzi ba // dri shi bde ba'i ga sa nga ga pas mas pa ra/
82a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhang po che// skra ga mchog tu ldan pa dang // bATe' da ba ba g-i seM ni dang // si las na rnyed par chen do // grong bad+ha mangs rdo rje dang // bzang pa la sdigatal le// skrag dang dpa' phang rdzogs pa dang // de dang med 'byung dgas zeng /

82a7(rnying rgyud): grizungs sa mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldang 'das sun bu zang po chen po btung mos pa ba ba'in ngos// rnam mapa' dang rim ma kha'i skabs thams ca la gnas pa sangs rgyas thams ca dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal
82b1(rnying rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang bzhid skyes 'gag pa dang / 'gro nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shing tu dgyes pa mar po'i bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bras bu sagra byed par bskur nas/ shin tu rjes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting /
82b2(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin pa yang dag par 'jog pa dang / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rdul po rjes su spong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma ldas pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam/
82b3(rnying rgyud): su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang / lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can dang rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod byar bcas pa dang / 'byung
82b4(rnying rgyud): dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes b+ha dang / bdag dang / bdag gI pa dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin
82b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon du dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kye
82b6(rnying rgyud): dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thobs dang / khyab pa dang / khyab byed dang / zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang /
82b7(rnying rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pa dang /
83a1(rnying rgyud): dang / ral khri dang / tho dang / ngasdin pa dang / rjegasam pa dang / 'khor la dang / sbyi pa dang / rab tu spong ba dang / stong pa dang / na dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang /
83a2(rnying rgyud): pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang / ma med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / po chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang /
83a3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la hUM cig tu stug por gyur te/ rnam par gyi nas mi snang ba'i tshul du
83a4(rnying rgyud): gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu rkyen ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
83a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ su ra tA s+t+waM ma si ho// gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che/
83a6(rnying rgyud): gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mar 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i ba drag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon ye
83a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bsnyen pa yis ni
83b1(rnying rgyud): du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba mnyam stor ba // rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar dring byung chub dang // khrag dang phyung mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid rung
83b2(rnying rgyud): ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos/ rdorje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo ng+ge dang / thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mAn+tas
83b3(rnying rgyud): padang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu smras pa/ mchog tu gsang ba'i rjes lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thug padro ji lces byung ngo // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sung byas pas// de ci
83b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdo tshe// zhe srang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan pong 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'did gti mug ste// rtag pa grub pa chog min no// drabus dang shes dang tshul nyid kyis// thob tham
83b5(rnying rgyud): de rdzags zhi cam/ 'de rje rten hU~M// sa pa pa sa nga brjod// dmas rnam pa di/ bu 'dul bya/
83b6(rnying rgyud): sogs pas mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon miza// sna tshogs pad+ma rab 'jug phyir// de yi lcir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab gyes sbas pa che// 'dod pa ma gtogs bde byed med// bde
83b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te// sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad

84b1(rnying rgyud): b+hA ba la ni yang gsol pa// rigs de rnam pang du bstan// ji ltar sras pa gsu ma zhes bgyi// tshogs chen po de dag spyan// 'brel/ gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'a de ba ga shegs pa thams cad rtsa gnyis su
84b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu byung ngo // nga nyid stong pa
84b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/ 'jig dbang gdon mi za 'grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa bskyod bstan
84b4(rnying rgyud): te// mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// / khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'// bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog
84b5(rnying rgyud): ma du bya/ gsum pagasal 'drebus pa/ pa sa ba ban gyu pa// 'dul thug par/ / na bsung ba rnams// bcom yang gi sa nga nyid kyis gsungs//
84b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pas mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pa
84b7(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // su dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos su' shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyis kha dog dbyibs chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs
85a1(rnying rgyud): pas btab// sbas pa'i sgra nI rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bar// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par bsgom/
85a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu bsgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yini// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du bsgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sras gsum la sogs
85a3(rnying rgyud): ga yIs// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas gsum rnam par smra bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po drang // gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gu gis 'da' byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang
85a4(rnying rgyud): skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur nas// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba// shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam pa'i phyag
85a5(rnying rgyud): gis gar mdzad cing // g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa// kar dbang rnam gnon gnon par gar mdzad cing // mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bAde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de/
85a6(rnying rgyud): sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam sad par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyar min yang dag sbyor // zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu de//
85a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa snga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis// sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/
85b1(rnying rgyud): gang ldan pa kAdi bying bsgyur// badre bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di na de la bstan// 'di la khyus me nyes pa med// da// 'brung med dka' ba 'ang rnyed// sang s+yanas thams cad mnyam myor ba// datha~Md sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur
85b2(rnying rgyud): lus deng dag sems rdo rje l-i// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pab skyes byung nAM/ ji tsAm 'dod pa nam mkhar 'gyur// snying gar drim tha gyur brjings// bro slebs rnam bA las te// dgyes pa 'i stsol gyis bskyon byas na//
85b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dbyar skad cig 'gyur// rnam zhig kres pa'i rnam gnon pas// rabang rjes sa ni 'gro byed de// sangs rgyas bde bzhin po dang // grub bya yis snang mtsho chud cing // rdo rje sams dpa'i rgyu myi mchod/ 'gyid pa'i langs pas gar byed pas
85b4(rnying rgyud): bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // las kyi byed par las sogs gnon// sras pa'i gar gyis gang byas pas// sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub// sna tshogs dkyi yang khor kar byed cing / la pa mang po rnam bsrung dang // phyir brkyang dbyibs su ldan pa dang /
85b5(rnying rgyud): khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro ba mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don bsgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam N+Dal 'gyur// lce mo ba'i
85b6(rnying rgyud): dang mAnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta s+t+rai zhes smra zhing // ha ra big le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur// rab dkyis mchog tu brtag pa yis// sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// sems can rnams kyi don kun byed// de napa
85b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'de ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa/ thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phrag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod bshod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang // ro dang reg
86a1(rnying rgyud): pami 'ong ba// thugs chen pos bsgrubs pa yis// dpa' ba chen nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan pade byed de// dngas sus dpa' bdag ston// phyag rgya bcings pa 'ad ba re// de nyid mchog ni ba 'angang nga// dang
86a2(rnying rgyud): phrag rmA ste// gnyis pad ma tshig phyag rgya min// gsum pa phyag chu rkyen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas srugasung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar dbyibs bzhin bsgom za ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes spang ga/ rdzogs che 'chang
86a3(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i sra nis po rtse// mi bskyod dode'i dkar po myed// nas ma pa stong po 'i gling ga tse// dpag myed pa brjod pa // sde tshugs 'dog rgya // ng+ga pa zhing brgyad byung ba'i// gdon mi 'dzirjen// don rgyu byed pangang bya/
86a4(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi gnas nyid rje// myur du nam mkha' 'gro byed cing // rigs lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol bdud ni ma myod par 'di// sna tshigs sbyor ba bde che ba'i// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje lhor bdag brdo le byas na/ sems ra
86a5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rjes stsogs gdon zhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo la tog gis baN+Di rA// rabyig rgya gra char gnas pa bsam// pad+ma'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni// brje dang ldan
86a6(rnying rgyud): snying po sbas don gar byas pas// smras pa che la 'di khyed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye bar// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad
86a7(rnying rgyud): bde bzhes bya ba phyag sa rab tu rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya cing bshad de// rtag sa sogs pa 'di khon// grong gis byung chubacings pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub ba zer ran// thabs nag ra kya gas / dang dzin sa
86b1(rnying rgyud): te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad par bar du// mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje 'i ni thal mo 'dis// sang+yas rgyas thams cad nyid du bsgrub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // nam mkha'i
86b2(rnying rgyud): snying po'i gnas su 'gro// 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yis// gsum du sbyor bas mchod par bya// de nyid las ni sor mo kun// kun du bskams te bcing bar bya// rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pas+tha ni// bcing bar ldan par rnam bsgyur te/ de nyid sbom
86b3(rnying rgyud): po rab bcug nas// khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing // rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'asgrub byed// de bzhin bcings pa rnam bzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che// nam mkhar 'gro ba nye bar
86b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub// de nyid bcing ba bgyid byas te// khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo sbed de dgug bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis+t+waM brla ba skrab// becing bde nyid rab tu sdom// phre bar brgyag nas bsdam byas te// las kyi bcing bskor ba yis// don
86b5(rnying rgyud): yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro// bcing bde nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbus su bcug bye ba// de 'dri bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa// glang gis bstings pa tsam
86b6(rnying rgyud): gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid thob po// dngos grub thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tshe 'thob gyur te// phyag tu bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs kyis byam cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis
86b7(rnying rgyud): e/ ngag gi zho rags sbyang byas na// de ma 'ig tu rab dgyes 'gyur// btsong pa swa yi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon gyi snying gar bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzu
87a1(rnying rgyud): bar bya// phyag na 'dini byang chub pade// sangs nus thams cang ga gra ngan sru// gdon mi zabar tse 'di la// rtag pa 'dra ba thog par byed// yon pa de nyid spying kar gzhag/ g.yas pa ma la reg byas pas// sa la bde ba rol pa yis// 'di pas mi rbad dro par 'gyur//
87a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin snying gar g.yon gzhag/ lag pa g.yas par basbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen sbrul ldan sogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying drar gzhag/ g.yas kyang gzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas// 'di yis tsher bag med pa nyid// cho
87a3(rnying rgyud): la'athob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying gar smar// lag pa galus pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rabaskol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che// 'di yim thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi zla ba'i dris pa yi// den chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de da
87a4(rnying rgyud): bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas ni sgying gar gzung byas te// brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// rdo 'di nyid la the tshom med
87a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas brtan par bya// sbom po 'i rtse mo pad+ma'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis// brgyag nas bde spong bya zhing // skad cig skar ci/ sdam par bya//
87a6(rnying rgyud): 'di sangs rgyas thams cad skye// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob// ba dgyes bde mchog long stod kyi// btsun mo dngos gru ba nyid du 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas badra byas te// kyang tshul du gu 'dra bang bya// rdo rje 'dod ma ldan/
87a7(rnying rgyud): d+ha ste// ji 'dod byed btsun mo yi// deng por 'dren pade nyid bzhig// tham dar thig ler bya// rdo dgyes pa bde 'jod byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying gar byas pa'is// de ba ni dge sla pa po mchog 'gro// bya Na bani dang 'phrogs pa ris// lus 'drin tshe 'di 'bru par 'gyur// rab
87b1(rnying rgyud): dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'phrogs shing // rdo rje 'agling la sogs spyod pas// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab skyes la sogs ma lus pa// ba bye la dbyings pa yis// kyi bying du rten par gyur// de bzhin com po'i rtse mor sbyad// snying rje chen po de dag
87b2(rnying rgyud): skal ba chen po rdo rje spen// de nyid don kun ston byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcing pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i sman du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam sngangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i thal mo brtan bya ste// khro mo rtse mo blag po yi// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje brtan pa che// de
87b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+ma'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag// spro ba che bas gang mdzad cing // rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yi ge thob dang / nas nas// de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/
87b4(rnying rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrim+ba na// gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyis sgoche ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo thams cad kyis gsol
87b5(rnying rgyud): ba btab pa mkhyen nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig le ltar ni yang dag ldan// tha ma ra ha ra thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes// snying gar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dag 'phyed lhan cig rtsen byed cing // skyed dang mi spyod
87b6(rnying rgyud): grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog/ ha re thig le yang dag ldan// tshe gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa// 'di ni snying gar bzhag byas na// bde bar nam mkha' 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub po// 'dre na pa de nyid thog mar na
87b7(rnying rgyud): ltos ltos zhes pa dang ldan// skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// dbus su bskal bas 'grub parang gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag// tha mad ha thig ler bya// rdo me kyis pa
88a1(rnying rgyud): da/ ma bar bya// 'dims snying gang bya dusas// nga bzhin gshegs pa pa da // kyag tu ni nga 'thogs pas// sa di 'byu ba nang/ nga byor ba gu// ga dang phyogs
88a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gying la sogs spong pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phrag rgya'o// // de nas bcom ldan blong nga che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdugs thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// mtha bar de 'gyur ro// byang na thog sa
88a3(rnying rgyud): rdorje hU~M mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzu brjing rje// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// ya ron che 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan tegadug pa'i tshigs rnams la// de ni yang drag rol pa mdzad// blo tsho na mchog 'dul byas bya 'di// A gla ni rang gi snying gar bsgom// rdzo
88a4(rnying rgyud): bu mo'i mdun bskor// dro mi chen mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hrI sa rdzu du brlab par 'gyur// de dag gdag pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'azhugs te rab tu 'jig / skyobs shig stobs shing ces sgra zhing // rdo rje gco ladun par byed// phyag tu 'din pa nyi la ga dag/ 'gros rnams cad dang
88a5(rnying rgyud): bya ste// las mchog thams cad grub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// spyor dang ldan pas 'bay-i/ klas te// lus rnams thams cad byed pa na// glodon mi zab dpa na 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang ba sgrub par nas// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo sems dpas su 'o// blo bo phyag d+ha'i legs so sa
88a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas ni ni dag/ sangs chus nyid kyis rjes pa mchog/ gzungs ma rdal 'gror ma thams cad// shing khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// pham tshan pa de ba ldan pa yi// dag 'bras 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te/ rang ga bde byed zhes par 'bel// skal ba chen mi ldan par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
88a7(rnying rgyud): gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang yang du ga zings te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badz+ra ma~M ku sha du du du dra/ e h+ye tita n+ta bi kar+m+ma/ sarbA ne ma dz+ra ta tsags cu ya/ badz+ra a~M ku na du lapra 'di pas rgyas kyi rje mi paci gnyis da te/
88b1(rnying rgyud): dgrol bar bya// rdo rje khro bo rab rgyar pa// rdo rje kyo bzhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams// phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas bgying pa'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcing pa mnya ma gzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin zhag/ dbus su sbom mo gzhag pa bya// rdo rje 'dren pag/ zi 'jid che// rdo rje bci
88b2(rnying rgyud): pabasdam byas te// rdordorje sbom mo rtse mo smad// bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya/ de nyid bcing padam byas te// dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom po nus byas te// ra'ad kyis bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya/ gzhag par nyid 'dren pa'i
88b3(rnying rgyud): mchog// 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcug nas bcid byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' bar bskyed nas// rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos rang gi tshul srid rjes su myong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal
88b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' bed zlagasad thig le yi// rab gyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zung // de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te// la mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas/ chos kyi ngo bong chog smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs// rab de yongs spyo ga dbus te/
88b5(rnying rgyud): tshe yis 'di ska/ sgras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// dbad kyis longs spyod gar byed cing // bde byed chen pos bdag nyid rjes// leg so zhes pa sbyin byed de// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes me// legs mo leg+sa so sna tshogs che/
88b6(rnying rgyud): legs so legs sod gyes pa che/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i zug kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// // gsung rab don rtog thom dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te
88b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems bde thob par sgo na/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam+b+ha l+la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba brje dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// phyis kho che'i paN+Di ta te dzad pa'i zhal snga nas dang / lo zla ba 'phags pa zhes rang kyi skad gsar bcad kyis kyang gtan pa phab pa'o//
89a1(rnying rgyud): cha gar skad du/ sarba tuthA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta ra ha s+yo gu h+Na sa mdzan ma ma ny+dzu ka lpa d+ha dza/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po/ da
89a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi
89a3(rnying rgyud): lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' se
89a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
89a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha
89a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sa'i sa dpa bas dpa' chen pa gzug 'dzi da da / zing chubasams dpa' 'dupa de 'dzi kyi rje rdo rje de/ mengs dpa' mas dpa chen dadzodzo dang/ byeng bye ba slab pa dpe sem dpa' chen po dang /
89a7(rnying rgyud): pa bsas dpa' chan pa ga kyang dang / byang chub sem ma dge'isasas dpang thar pa kyis byid bya sa myong ba zhi / dedag la sa gas par byang chub sa sa pa' sems pa'i rtsed pa so kyis ba lang po'i mang brdu pas ma lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
89b1(rnying rgyud): phrar rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
89b2(rnying rgyud): 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa dang de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
89b3(rnying rgyud): kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad shin tu yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par sna mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
89b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa de dag nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung lcags kyi bdag po yongs sgra mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku
89b5(rnying rgyud): bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnam par ro// la la ni mA ma kI'i rnam par po// la la ni gos dkar lo'i rnam par ro// la la ni dam
89b6(rnying rgyud): tshig sgrol ma'i rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to// lA la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni dri'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni ro'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni reg bya'i ngo bo'i rnam pa tsha yang dag par gnas par gyur to//
89b7(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang b+hag kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag pa dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun pu rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin ni kun
90a1(rnying rgyud): sa// / sa la bags na/ da/ da du ga pa napa
90a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyad mchog chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhi gshegs pa'i 'gyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa du chen tog dang / de bzhin gu sha rjes pache dpag med dang / de bzhin pa
90a3(rnying rgyud): dan yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la gzugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de badzin ga shegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
90a4(rnying rgyud): gnon pa de rje zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu/ de nas nam ma pa'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so ga
90a5(rnying rgyud): da sa dag 'i sa skye sa kyi pa mi 'i mi
90a6(rnying rgyud): dbyang chub kyi'i mas rjed pazhin gshegs pa thams ba kyi srung nga gsung dung thegs do 'das ches 'byung ba'i sa b+ha ba'i d+hi de du la sbyis pa pa theg sangs/ rin pa gi 'i ses dzi po di'i gas pa
90a7(rnying rgyud): kyang du so// nga bas 'asas pa ru'as tshu bamams ngas bya kyi 'drongag sa lags so dres pa da rdzog pa sngo phyo gcigs pa bya// dri slong
90b1(rnying rgyud): ba mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs ka nas mngon par byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di med du brjod do// e mA ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni ra'abyung ba// de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyi gsung// ras mi tog gnas
90b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sbyin
90b3(rnying rgyud): gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
90b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom
90b5(rnying rgyud): skye bar byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de mtshar bu gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa
90b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can la yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
90b7(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde/
91a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / yid bde ba spong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ rnga nas bcom ldan 'das dang
91a2(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes ston ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mtsho
91a3(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di nyid kyi sgragasang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 'adz+ra hU~M// de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ brtsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stug sung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes dri de nyid mi parjod pa'i phyag rgya mi por snang ba'i rangs kyis dgapa
91a4(rnying rgyud): dkar po dmar po'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags thugs rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdzo zhes tha 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
91a5(rnying rgyud): teg ti mug gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyis gsungardo rje las phyung ngo // dzi na~M dzi ka/ de nas 'di phyung mu thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsus thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes su de nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi
91a6(rnying rgyud): chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dkar po/ nag po dmar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes
91a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las srung ngo // rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
91b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rin chen tog gi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sar po/ nag po/ dkar ba'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sgra gsung thugs rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
91b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sngags/ mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyur ro// A ro l-i ka/ de nas 'di phyung
91b3(rnying rgyud): ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dmar po/ nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa
91b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yad mchog gi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par grags nas dmachog dgug pa'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi skyi
91b5(rnying rgyud): po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi lha gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor pa'i thabs kyis ljang du/
91b6(rnying rgyud): drag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i byung phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtog pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang thar par ba bslab pa'o//
91b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su mnyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dwe Sha ra ti/
92a1(rnying rgyud): nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kI gzugs 'don par gyur te/ shAr phyogs kyi blar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
92a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
92a3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i lces bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/ rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
92a4(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo // rA ga ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i
92a5(rnying rgyud): skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs slab rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab
92a6(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba rjes su btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gsang pa 'dzin par gyur te/ zung gi grwar
92a7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya
92b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i khro chen po 'di nyid kyi spagasang thags rnan las srung ngo // yanan kr-ita/ de nas 'di byung sa thag su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams rgyud kyi lug sung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyungs par byed pa'i rnamabyas na
92b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/
92b3(rnying rgyud): kyi grwa gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ba na kr-ita/ de nas 'di srung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje dam chog bskyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sbyor bzhugs so// de nas
92b4(rnying rgyud): bcos ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'phang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi lha ga
92b5(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pade d+han+ta kr-ita/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sra gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung bsgrunas par byed pa'i rnam pas nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhug sam
92b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
92b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // big+h+nAn kr-i ta/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i gyis bud de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so//
93a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyas par byed pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs
93a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal
93a3(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
93a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed
93a5(rnying rgyud): kyis sems lus kyi rnam pa dang / lus sems kyi rnam pa dang / sems tshig tu brjod pa'i rnam pa skyed cig pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni nam mkha' lta
93a6(rnying rgyud): bur yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho kun du bzang po yi// rdo rje'i spu dang gsung dang thugs// skye ba med pa tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
93a7(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med par bsgom pa'i dngos// bsgom pa
93b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa ma yin nyid// de ltar dngos po dngos med do// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisgra gsung thugs rdo rje bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par da
93b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang phyi mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin
93b3(rnying rgyud): pA rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas la skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
93b4(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par// byang
93b5(rnying rgyud): chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bstod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
93b6(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par sbyangs// chos bdag med las kun tu byung // byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
93b7(rnying rgyud): pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas 'od zer 'bar ba sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/
94a1(rnying rgyud): dzab 'a ma pa'ang ga// rnamamapa'i tshul du spor ba yis// 'di ltar dngos par ba tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das/ da gan gshegs pa rjo ma dpag tu sa pas gsungs sa// denam bcom ldan 'das dbasnyen gshegs
94a2(rnying rgyud): badz+radz+ra dan yod thabya pas de bzhin gshegs pa banas rba kyil gyis gnon pa rjegs bye ting nga 'don pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa/ rjes rnams dang bzhin 'od gsas pa// gdod nas dag pa nimama'a'ang
94a3(rnying rgyud): kyi ma rtogs mang/ byang brdzu 'de tsun pa'o// na gagags pa dzi thu dus gi / pa migs pa'i byung chubs des dpangs pa dzin panas ni nasun nags pa rgyam pad kyi
94a4(rnying rgyud): ga / ga ngan /
94a5(rnying rgyud): sems myod mga'atshal ba// bdag med pa mams / ga rjo / mapa mi dog phyogs sa med// byang chub sangs khyong phyag 'tshal la// banan pazang bathams cad nan// byang chub sems rab zlar ba
94a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub spyod pa na// byang chub sams khyod pag ma'o// dgu pa gag 'i sbyin so// su de gsung bag slong / sa d+ha sa byung chubar bstan pa// byung chub sa thug 'jal ma/ dang sprin gzhugs pa thams
94a7(rnying rgyud): sla ngag slong dang migs kyigs chen gsang pa 'dus pa las thang chub kyis sa kyimadug gnyis pa// de rnas pa cim ldan 'das dpa de gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdu gsung thugs rdorje bzhin gshegs pa na gzhags pa thams da /
94b1(rnying rgyud): 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs sa// oM sh+tsa n+yatA d+hA n+ya badz+ra swA b+hA sA t+ma ka&ha~M// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ba sgon bya D+ha/
94b2(rnying rgyud): 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer lnga ni kun du khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgom nas su//
94b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// su gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya// bsdus pa gnyis med sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog rab dang //
94b4(rnying rgyud): rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // don grub phyag rgya chen po rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/
94b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung // shel dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra// zor phyogs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas
94b6(rnying rgyud): sprin ni kun du 'khrigs// rtse mo dgu pa'i rdo rje che// de yi phyag tu rnam par bsgom// ma ra ka t+ya'i 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// kun du 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin+da chen bsdams par bsgom// pad ma rA ga'i mdog
94b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'od 'bar 'chang // rab 'bar phyag na pad ma bsnams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga yi 'od 'drab// sna tshogs don yod rdo rje can// zhib phyag ni ral gri bsnams// sangs kyis dkyil 'am
95a1(rnying rgyud): du ni bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis rdzob pa'i sngags
95a2(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM d+ha rArma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas sgo// brtan par ma gyur yang mi
95a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor la rdo rje rin chen dang // pad ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spo ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyibs kyi dbus gnas
95a4(rnying rgyud): par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// pad+ma ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni/
95a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar dri bar bya// sangs rgyas rang mchog 'di rnams nyid// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul
95a6(rnying rgyud): thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/
95a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab do// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhig// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'a
95b1(rnying rgyud): dmapa bshad du gsal// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spangs// kun du bzang po sgra yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba// ye shes spyod pa rnam stong mdzad/
95b2(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen pa// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dag ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//
95b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso// 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul// dkyil 'khor/
95b4(rnying rgyud): nyams dga' rab tu bshad// de nas de phyir thugs dkyil 'khor// mchog thugs rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab bshad bya// lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig
95b5(rnying rgyud): gdab pa// thig srad sar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma bzang po mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dram pa ni// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhi dang // sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab
95b6(rnying rgyud): tu zlum pa phra bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// shar du 'khor lo chen po ni// rdo rje 'ab ba
95b7(rnying rgyud): ma ser brgyan// lho ru rin chen chen po ni// 'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs// nub tu pad+ma chen po ni// pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// byang ngu ral ze chen po ni// 'od zer 'bar ba rab 'khrigs bri// dbus su sprin dang 'dra ba'i dzod// spyan ni shar gyi sa/
96a1(rnying rgyud): rba bi// mA ma kI li rigs 'byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho ngo // pad+ma ma kha kye sdong bur bcas// nub tu kun du theb bya// bung du ut+pal mdzes pa ni// mthing ka sprin dang 'dra ba zi// thob kun nas 'ong mdzes 'bar// shar gyi sgor ni thib
96a2(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo rje babar sogs 'od bzung ba// dbyug pa skyo ru kun du bri// pad ma 'bar ba 'od byed pa// nub tu kun du bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang du rdo rje bri bar bya// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas/
96a3(rnying rgyud): las dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lo rnyed nas// dri dang me tog phreng brgyan te// de dbus su ni 'dod pa bya// yon tan ske rags mA ma kI// shes rab can gyi
96a4(rnying rgyud): de lji na brlabs/ sangs rgyas zhi ba tshul spros pas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// bshang gci khya ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin
96a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u skye bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo
96a6(rnying rgyud): rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka 'a stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las byung // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg po'i mchog ni bla na med//
96a7(rnying rgyud): rab mchog dngos grub sgrub par byed// gdol pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// thig mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //
96b1(rnying rgyud): de rnams kun kyang zag pa che// mchog gi sgrub pa 'dir 'grub 'gyur// steng nas slob dpon smod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yod mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can gang // brtan du sgral dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang //
96b2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu 'dod pa spyod dga' gang // bshang gci zas su za ba ste// de rnams sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo pa// sgrub po gang gis 'dod byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos sra ni// dngos grub rgya chen des 'thob po// sangs rgyas ga
96b3(rnying rgyud): bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// mnyes par byas kyang mi gas te// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/
96b4(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams
96b5(rnying rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gisan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma skra cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// chos nyid
96b6(rnying rgyud): dag 'di sangs rgyas ni// snying po'i chos kyi don byung ba// 'di dag byang chub spyod pa'i gnas// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing
96b7(rnying rgyud): skrag la brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol
97a1(rnying rgyud): te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thags rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su
97a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sgra gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas
97a3(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur// dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas chos kyi dbyangs 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med
97a4(rnying rgyud): pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// skra dang gsung thug sa rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i sbrul phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kA tso// rgyas gsum dag gi lam
97a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // nam mkha' chen po'i dbyings gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'drad// nam mkha'i sgra las yang dag byung // nim mkha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam mkha'i rdzogs te chos sde mchog/ smod pa'i gnas khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de
97a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las kun du spyod pa'i sna chog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsang thugs kyi gsang
97a7(rnying rgyud): brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te grags byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra sa thA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad byas tshul dang bral ba'i
97b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa 'dun sa sgoms pa rdzags na gas 'a gsungasmras// oMs thAg tu kAs 'anas thA / nganas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pan cad pag tumad pas mnyam pa byud ma gnyis da rdo rje
97b2(rnying rgyud): sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs tu gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sats+tsha twa thAg tu wA ki badz+ra s+ye b+hA ba~M AhrI/ rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa gas // gnas dang gnas ni rnam par bsgom bya ste// dag
97b3(rnying rgyud): nyid mchog rab kyi sngags kyi ni// mtshan nyid mtshan ma bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po rdo rje rin chen tog gis ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta
