97b4(rnying rgyud): b+hag ta An+yA drAgA Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas rdo rje don yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga tA pA dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// rtag
97b5(rnying rgyud): tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// myur ce sang+yas rgyas d+d+hi thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdage pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos
97b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang chen 'di gsungs so// sngags dmigs pa yi lus kyis ni// ngag dang yid la
97b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrul byas pas// bsgrub bya rab mchog dngos thab dang // yid ni yang dag dga' mdzes pa// sems kyi dmigs pa bdag med pa// dag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom// nam gsus sbyor ba nam mkha' ding // mnyam nyid gnas ni grub par bya// lus dang /
98a1(rnying rgyud): ngag dang sems dmigs na// dzan nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi sgra mi sbyor ba yis// byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med// sku gsung byugs kyi mtshon nyid 'di// rnam par dpyad nas bsdu bgyis// byang chub sbyor bting nge 'dzim
98a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi brtags pa bsgom par bya// de nas dpal lhan rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil
98a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs kyus gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// yungs kar rgyu dang mi rgyab// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes brtags pa bsgom// nam mkha'
98a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas dgod do// sgronam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil la bar bsgom par bya// sman gyi tshul gyi
98a5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad ma rnam par bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'a
98a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba sgo// 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro// ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tshad nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsan ka yi 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad pa
98a7(rnying rgyud): gsar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di shis te// bsgom pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya
98b1(rnying rgyud): rgyab gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor ni sgo bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma me// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // de nyid don kun ston pa pos// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to//
98b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom// gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen ni// legs mchod nas kyang bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su bshad gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang
98b3(rnying rgyud): dag bla med 'grub par 'gyur// sha yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir// sha chen po ni rab tu brtag/ gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// de bzhin dam pa khyi yi shwa// zas kyi phyir ni
98b4(rnying rgyud): bza' bar bya// zas gzhan bza' bar ma byas na// byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten du// go 'phang
98b5(rnying rgyud): las ni byed par 'gyur// stobs ldan gtso bo gzi brjid can// myadangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste/
98b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag sngags kyi gsung ba 'di// lus dag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gaskyang dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sru dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas
98b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs kyi bdag pos dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngag kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rje lnga pa byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cada'o// de ltar 'dod pa bstan par de//
99a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus tha spyod ba dang // nges pa sa sa nas spang rnab 'ad/ 'ang rnams cad nga tu nga du du gan na dun nam rag// bdag dang gtun ma dang ga/ da/
99a2(rnying rgyud): ba// bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te// slong la dga' bar yang mi bya// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams
99a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// bder gnas thob na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par bsreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas// chos mchog
99a4(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur mchog brjes rnams// 'dod pa thams cad bsten byas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// 'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu brten// byang chub sems dbang mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas
99a5(rnying rgyud): nas// mchod pa'i bdag nyid can mchod bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'gyur
99a6(rnying rgyud): gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dpral bar bya// de nyid bcom ldani sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas snga
99a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa// sangs rgyas don yod rdo rje 'dzin// reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dpral bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la// rtag tu sa mas ni sbyar bar bya//
99b1(rnying rgyud): de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha rnams nyid du rtag tu bsgom// yang na de la rigs kyi ni// dbye ba rnam par byasgoms pas bsgos// sangs rgyas rjes pa ngan par spyod/ chos
99b2(rnying rgyud): ni rjes sra dran sgom pa// lus dang ngag dang sems ni bsgom// rdo rje nas su dran sgom pa// rigs ni rjes rban sbyor ba las// khro bo rjes su drani sgom pa// dam tshig rjes dran sbyor ba las// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud ma
99b3(rnying rgyud): bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug yon rnyed nas// byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gsheg pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spar bas// ya gi rgyas
99b4(rnying rgyud): dngos gru ba thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang aM dag dang // AHdang phaT kyang rab bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi// rdo rje pad mo bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/
99b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// bskya rnams kyi brag nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sbyin rnams so// de la chos rjes su
99b6(rnying rgyud): dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar li ga rab bzhag nas// rdo rje chos ni rab bsgom bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu gA nas// mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ d+ha ga ra 'i gi rab bzhag nas// rdo rje sems
99b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnam par bsgom// baspu rnams kyi rtse mo nas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas
100a1(rnying rgyud): // pas rigs kyi sbyin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhan/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhug nas// khro ba'i dbang po rab tu bsgom// bsgra rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas za ba'i sprin rnams sde// da la dam chagardzas
100a2(rnying rgyud): pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis na mnyam sa
100a3(rnying rgyud): ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya// de la grwa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra gang zhig// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sra ma
100a4(rnying rgyud): bdug kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa dri ltar bsgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang zhig/ nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar
100a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom zhe na/ kun du bzang po'i thugs gang zhig/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung
100a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/ de la sngags kyi gzugs dang sgra dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin// gsung gi sbyin rnam
100a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sku// rtag tu sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu chu cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad no// dngos
100b1(rnying rgyud): rgyad myo pa can pa dasang slang / sa/ mas dang pan nga gas 'du// klu pa bang dag nga da du smra // 'du nga byung brgyad
100b2(rnying rgyud): desum skyes pa rjes bdun pa ltar bsgos zhe na/ rang bzhin 'dags pa nam ni// nam mtha'amatshun mang sde bgyur des// gnyis ma ga nyis su maud cin// rkyen tu'i med nam mthor bzhin/ de'i zhesung ga rigs kyi mchod brjes su da
100b3(rnying rgyud): bAzhom na/ bud myed sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcug nyis yon rnyed nas// rigs kyi ster ba'i dbang byebs// rang gi grubs mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra// ngo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag dang // chos 'di
100b4(rnying rgyud): gi gsung dag ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// skra dang gasrung thugs yang dag sgrub// gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rngom phyed gsum bsgoms pas// bzlas pas de ni 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srang
100b5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi bsung chenagasang ba 'dus pa las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog kyi ste bdun pa'o// / rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa na rten tog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamus cad kyi bdag po dam pa'i
100b6(rnying rgyud): shAchang rgyan po la bstod pa'i rnam po 'dis gsol ba ba tub s+ho// ngang rgyal thog byam// rnam ma su'i myong bas nam byung // sun du bsring zu myong ba mjug/ rgyal ma chug mdzad pa bshang drun pa// 'ad drugs 'i spyod
100b7(rnying rgyud): ngi theg par bston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar po'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam 'jug mdzad// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog brtsor
101a1(rnying rgyud): // pa bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams
101a2(rnying rgyud): cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed gnas// sgra dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung yangs pa'i mig can
101a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan rnyed nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzung // byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am// rgyal ba nyid skyes zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas// bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa yang // rgyal
101a4(rnying rgyud): ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya// nu mra'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba ro smad gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lha rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
101a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying gar bsgom par bya// gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// ye shes
101a6(rnying rgyud): tsho dus gsum gyi// gnas su gyur par rnam par bsam// rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ut+pa la dag dang // pad ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul
101a7(rnying rgyud): bar bya// me tog kar ni ka ra dang // mal+li kA dang yA thika/ me tog kar bAr yang // bsams nas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam dra// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya zhing // rnam par mkhas pas brtag par ni// rigs rnams
101b1(rnying rgyud): rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad ma rdo rje dang // ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod
101b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// /
101b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs la sogs brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos grub 'dod pa sbyin pa'i
101b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// rig pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil
101b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// rang lus de bzhin gshegs dang bzhin// bshad pa gci bas bla ma mchod// bzhin bzang yid du 'ong ba yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag/
101b6(rnying rgyud): mig yangs khu ba blangs nas ni// brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pas bza'// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
101b7(rnying rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshang gci'i da mchog gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ sran dan dbang
102a1(rnying rgyud): phrag dam pa yis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod ba// rdo mi byed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas legs can gyi gsang // nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas kya /
102a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rab bsgoms nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ sgra gsung
102a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyir brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing du ni//
102a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho nar shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// mi shes thar par bsgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston
102a5(rnying rgyud): pas// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa yi// yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpyas gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom// rin
102a6(rnying rgyud): chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su// rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par bsgom// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yis// nor gyi rgya mtshos rab gang 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub
102a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las gti mug gi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig tu shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa// gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor
102b1(rnying rgyud): rab tu bka' sam te// rnam ma pa rjo dbyung sa dbus gnas byad// pa ma dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bya// 'od dpag me na rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams drung na// thang dadu gzar sbyong ban// thams du
102b2(rnying rgyud): ma / slong ba zhesadon rje'i rgyam martog ga/ da ba rnam pa yid da gyun// rdza bams cad / nga chugasas tha /
102b3(rnying rgyud): ya dag pa'i sa ga ste/ thugs pas pa mi zla // de nas rnaMm badzang 'dis// da thugs sa den ga/ gsu las byung ba sa ma pas// gsu na ma bka' \u0f7f/ rnamamakha
102b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgos par bya// rdo don yod dab ba sgoms te// sangs pas thams cad bsgrim par bya// badzin gyi dag ni rje'i gnas// thams cad ga zugs spya nas bsgom gyi// rgyal ba'i gnas ni thams cad dang // sprul ba
102b5(rnying rgyud): swA \u0f7f// 'didus su sa / ma 'du / sa sa gas /
102b6(rnying rgyud): 'i / de sa// na 'brang / bzhin / 'a / sa gnas sa kyu sa /
102b7(rnying rgyud): to// de gas sa ba bye sa di bye brag chu kyi ga sa gi kyi du gyu ba ga nga na
103a1(rnying rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngamatshar zhing rmad du byung bar gyur nas rdo rje'i cho ga 'di smras sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams da
103a2(rnying rgyud): bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las 'das pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu rmad du byung ba'i tshig gi la mardo rje'i tshig 'di ci
103a3(rnying rgyud): slad du gsung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad
103a4(rnying rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang / spang ba'i 'du shes 'di lta bu ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni mchog gi spyod pa'o// gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spong ba'o// rigs
103a5(rnying rgyud): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/
103a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so// rigs kyi bre chos thams cad ni de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di lta bu'i don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chang par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu da
103a7(rnying rgyud): nga nyid kyi nam mkha'i cho ganges par brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmachog de dag rjes su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsung shing dang / gtsub stan dang mi'i leg pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis dra ba rab tu 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod
103b1(rnying rgyud): me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gzub stan la yang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dmatshig 'gro ba dang ngang ba la sogs pas rjes su rag par
103b2(rnying rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur pas dam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa pas// kun rdzob du yang
103b3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dmachog gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa thams
103b4(rnying rgyud): cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sgra dang gsung thugs
103b5(rnying rgyud): gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal ba rdun 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi ma mchog tso// 'bar ba gtum pa spyan yangs pas// gsung de 'di skang bkang te/
103b6(rnying rgyud): dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rnam par mirtag mi dmigs pa// menyam nyi ga yang mi gnas pa// phrag sa thug sa kyi rje bam// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo
103b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nyams par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'i stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyed pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig pa
104a1(rnying rgyud): stong du ma dang thabs cig tu sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i gar gyi rol ba ston par mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lha rnams kyis rol cing dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang de dag sngags yod
104a2(rnying rgyud): pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de chu gang gi phyir zhe na/ kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos thos pas so// de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa chen po de rnams kyi spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir de bzhin
104a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun du sbal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad
104a4(rnying rgyud): kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dmachog la dmigs pa/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las tshig gi las nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// oM hUM AHswA hA/ de nas 'di ni
104a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas// rab tu 'drar zhing brgal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
104a6(rnying rgyud): gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hU~M// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'tho ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// drangs pad+ma de yis rnam
104a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom na// de mthag nyid dar 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes// skyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po
104b1(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'o// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshal// zhal gsum rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu bsgom/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'dod do mchog
104b2(rnying rgyud): gi gsang ba'o// snying ga'i dbus sA phra mo yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya// de yi dbus su chud par ni// yi ge mchog gi tshig bsam mo// sbyor ba rdo rje chen po ni// rtse mo lha pa rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje lcags kya sbyor ba yis//
104b3(rnying rgyud): kAkram rnams bsgom par bya// de yis thugs ni gzar bya ste// lha yang rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di de rdon thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje ljags kyu rnam bsgom pa// rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs// thugs na bsgral ba rab bshad pa/
104b4(rnying rgyud): 'di rol mo 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yini tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par byas na ni// gsang chen sgra dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rdo rje can grub 'gyur// 'jigs shing yid ni sreg gyur byas// mchog stsol ni rnam par gzigs// yang ni mgrabs dpa'
104b5(rnying rgyud): ye// dngos sgrub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyong pa'i mchog 'dzin rnams// gal te mongs bdag nyid 'ang snyan// de yi srog ni dir zad 'gyur// de nas rgyalnga bong rje 'dzin// rdo rje gas ma mchog ldan pa po// 'jig
104b6(rnying rgyud): rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal te// sngags kyi sdes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum kyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos pa thams cad brtag par bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dmachog smar
104b7(rnying rgyud): ba'o// rig ma'i dbang bye gzhugs pa la// rdo'i sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing // chags la chags pas balci bar bya// 'di ni mchog dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid skyes// thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas
105a1(rnying rgyud): gcas// gsung ni 'di skad bkang sprul to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud mda'i skad yod pa kun// phyag r+b+ha tshe sogs myur ba yis// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// the bzangs med rdo rnga can// sangs rgyas gnas d+hi da dz+dza/
105a2(rnying rgyud): bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' tshe nges 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi sgra da
105a3(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das su gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngu rdorje skyes bu mchog sa
105a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i ting du 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u 'ding gsungs so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa// byang chub thams cad 'thob kyi gyi// ye shes rdo rje dag gis
105a5(rnying rgyud): bya// oM yig ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje sku ni 'thob byed pa'o// AHyig byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o// hU~M yig sku gsung thugs yin te// rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed 'thob// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgru ba sung zhugs
105a6(rnying rgyud): gyi lcags ci gyes byas de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes// rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyed pa'o// dwe ru yi ge b+h+rUM bas ma ste// re la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o// hrI/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnyis par//
105a7(rnying rgyud): gi hU~M ni rab tu bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khar dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHna rab tu bsgom// yi ge b+h+rU~M kyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung ba sgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das
105b1(rnying rgyud): mchog gsum thags pas dang/ rdzas pa/ sal// / snang ba gsums sa sa// sngag sung thugs nam sa byed ga// ma mags macas mAm mam// oM migs sa babyung po sa// A sas sul na tud
105b2(rnying rgyud): ni byang chung rdul mchog yin// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rang sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas phyis rba nyid// sngags dang rig pa zhes bsgrugs pa// rdo rje gas ma ma
105b3(rnying rgyud): brnams pas// dam tshig dag gis rdzog par gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyai zla gsung thugs dmachog de lan ta yaM shes du byin gyis rdib pa rgya zhes zla ba'i ting nge 'din ta// rnam par da ngan zhing nyams dga' bar// sbyor 'a'adi ni zla rnams na/
105b4(rnying rgyud): rdo'i sgra dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba byed kyis nges par 'grub// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig brgyad/ yi ge oM ni thugs kAr dgod// 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen //
105b5(rnying rgyud): bar snang mdzad mchog sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas kyi ni sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje gsum gyi ka lA ni// zla phyed kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das su rde na
105b6(rnying rgyud): gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas pa'i// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed// AHyig dag gI la
105b7(rnying rgyud): la dkod// kha dog lnga pa dzum// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas// dam cig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi dmatshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni/
106a1(rnying rgyud): rnga bskal pa gsum duganas// bcom ldan 'das rjo gsung gsang sa da sa pa// / de 'din gagags pa thams ca daphyogs pa chog byung ba na tu ldan// / nams rje dbus gnas dang // dan kyil pa
106a2(rnying rgyud): bsam// rang sngags skyes nu bskyed nas ni// thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M// dmatshig chen po de nyid ni// kha dog lnga pa rnas brkos bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// skyon pa rjo thugs las byung // ye shes yon tan ma mcho byabyur /
106a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan bstan ni ni// rdo rdo bskal phra gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugs gsang bas de nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi snga gsung thugs dmachog rdo nas bya ba'i ting nge hA// yo shrIs dkyil 'khor dbus sun//
106a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin nga nas/ darjel gas sa mye sa th+ya rna su sa na na // sa nas rnaMm gang gags mi ra
106a5(rnying rgyud): la 'jodzi'i dam rnyog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil lakhyor dbus las ni// ra glegs rnaMs bur ba 'doms la// rting gar rdon tu zhes pa// bzhan tu 'ang
106a6(rnying rgyud): par bsgom// ha~M/ 'dus dpal mtsho g+sa rdzogs yongs spyod// skye bsrung thugs rdo dz+nyA d+han// sa brgyad dan la gnas pa y-i// byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de mchog rna ba das bya ba'i ting na te/ rnamam pa'i dbyangs
106a7(rnying rgyud): sa 'o// 'a ba dang ba sa na du / ma par 'byung / byin ga ni sa byas 'a na nas na nga ma pa
106b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'di dus bung thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas mngon shas mchog sgrub pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rjesems dpa' rab bsgoms la// ya nas yo lag bsgom par bya// / dzang dang
106b2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang // gsung dang thugs mchog rtag tu 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod do rjes mchod par 'gyur/
106b3(rnying rgyud): 'das mi bskyod pa'i dran rtsig mngon par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs kyis dkyil 'khor 'od bzung bsam// nam mnga'ardo rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM yig bsgom par bya// yo/ rdo dam tshig gsum 'do
106b4(rnying rgyud): pas// rdo rje gsum gyi tog 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis// rin chen tog gi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdug med byang chub dang // ye shes gsang bu mnyam gnas 'gyur// rin
106b5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM yig bsgom par bya// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum
106b6(rnying rgyud): dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen la ma ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bco mu ldan 'das rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag tu med pa'i
106b7(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje lut+pal rab bsgoms nas// dam tshig oM yig rab tu bsgom// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje don yod gsum
107a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas du gas sus du so// da na ma 'dra ba'i da// na pa ldan pa shas saH// mas cad pa dang byung bar 'gyur// maldan ldan pa ltan dudang ma / darang rdzun da
107a2(rnying rgyud): zer ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzing+ka ti/ rnam ma pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// rdo rje sdang mdzad rab bsgoms la// sku gsum oM yig rab tu bsgom// oM// rdo rje mchog gsum 'asgoms pas/
107a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa smra
107a4(rnying rgyud): pa mngon par byung rngub pa'i ngo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// ri ngo rnam par dbenu pa dang // chu byang 'bab pa rnams dang ni// dur khrod la sogs rnams su yang // bsam gtan bzlas pa 'di dag bya// mi bgyid ye shes rdo rje sogs// rdo rje nam ma pa'i dkyil gnas bsam/ mngon
107a5(rnying rgyud): shes lnga po'i stong ba yis// sangs nas mchog rnams gnas su bsgom// bcom ldan 'das drirje chen po mchog rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo chen po rtsa lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga rab tu sbyor ba yis// rdon mngon
107a6(rnying rgyud): shes 'dra bar 'gyur// mertag mang po khrag pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par gyi// rdo rje rjeni myur ba yis// ji seM na shes 'dre ba du byer// nam mapa 'jorje'i dkyil gnas par// 'khor la sangs rgyas ra 'od 'dra// brnams nas sangs rgyas 'jug pa las//
107a7(rnying rgyud): sas rgyas gnas pa 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil la khor dbus gnas pa'i// rangag kyis la snying mang da ba zhag/ myi gang yig oM bas ma la// sngags pa rnan par shes pa bsgom// de'i sems 'gog pa'i rdongo tshad// ga tso zlabar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
107b1(rnying rgyud): ngan co chog grub pa// yang bganonor bung pa la ldanang gyur/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor byas gnas pa'i// rdon mi babyod dub tu rlom gar yog bgams nas// sems ni rig par gyur bar bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor byas panas pa'o// ma pa gamadang
107b2(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge matra sams te// rdo TIg ler gtogs pa bzhad// 'di da nga mtshig mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje gsum nim byeng bsgom// 'gag pa'i dmatshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas das grub 'job 'byung bar// nam mkha rjeng brengs gnas // gsam
107b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgos par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni bskal par gan// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge hA// bsams na de ni bathal par gnas// nam mkha' do dbyangs gnas par/
107b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ga trA~M// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dmatshig gis degad ces bka' gyur to// srung dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rdul 'byor 'di gang nas bzung ste// klog gam yang na sems bya
107b5(rnying rgyud): rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin mtshungs 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stag kyi mchog de kho na nyid rdzo rig par skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas byon pa rje
107b6(rnying rgyud): rje 'dzin// bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pas// dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkhu' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa// rnam par ma rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom// dpon pa chen po'i btsogs
107b7(rnying rgyud): me // me tig 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan// des sbyangs dbe pa // dngos gru 'thams cad pa smras pa bsgrub// mo/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// 'jam pa'i rab tu bsgom// lus dang ngag sems la slob// 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dra ba 'byung // dpab rtsod parje 'di bya ba//
108a1(rnying rgyud): darda'ab ba 'a ngas na// blan rnams kun gyis brgya pa 'o// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa dag pa la sags smras// nam yang mthong bar mnusas// dam pa'adrang sa ga ga na chog ma snang bar byung ba nas bya ba'i ting nga 'dzinan// dag
108a2(rnying rgyud): las byung // bshang gcing mtshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas nas// khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de ru rab bsgom na// de ni de mthag nyid du// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'od 'drar 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis 'khor
108a3(rnying rgyud): lo ni// 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul ldan ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'di
108a4(rnying rgyud): ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par/ bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi// phrang ba rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i// de snyed rtse ni bud med
108a5(rnying rgyud): rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phrug byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin pa//
108a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi// phrar rabardul rnams ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'don to// ye shes lnga ldan rab bstan na// bskal pa gsum gyi yul du
108a7(rnying rgyud): gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kye// gsang ba rnam gsum bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'da'i 'od// rang gi sngags la ral gri bsgom// mig yangs lag na thogs nas ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum chen pos mchod bya dag/
108b1(rnying rgyud): tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sems kyis gang zhig 'dod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung // de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// ral ga thams cad dam bzhe bya ba dpa
108b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin to// oM yig ril bu tsan ka'o// 'bru tshad du ni bsams nas ni// dbus bu rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar brlab rnam pasgom na// de ni de ma thag nyid du// byang chubasems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu chu gsu gyin // #
108b3(rnying rgyud): yig ril bu tsan ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug bsgom na ni// de ni de mthag nyid du// byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ hU~M yig ril bu
108b4(rnying rgyud): ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug bsgom na ni// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rdo rje'i thung nga 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser spyod 'dra// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i// rdzam
108b5(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// sangs rgyas m+b+ha ni rab byor 'asam// lce shes mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//
108b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i skur ni rab sbyor bas// rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par// na
108b7(rnying rgyud): che rdo rje rab tu bsgom// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin chen chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor bas// rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas
109a1(rnying rgyud): bas/ ngags sa// ga sus gasmran// rang mis pa // bcwa pa gsu / sun/ na nga du/ ma gagan sa/ rkyen gan // man
109a2(rnying rgyud): dpung gnas par// don mong yi sa rabatu bsgom// lag tu 'gre ba ba sgoms na// ra' gro'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ngamachog chen pa rigs bsgoms te// phyogs med dmachog rab sbyor bas// demachog mchog gi zlab pa 'di// pi shes rdo rnga dag gis bya// ce gsu
109a3(rnying rgyud): be shes lpags su sogs/ ro rje'i khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku ga sung sngags kyi sgrub pa yis// bsan gtan des na 'thub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dmachog chen po'i dngos su rdo rjes de gang ces bka' bral to// lam gyi bani po ma shing gcigadung // ma
109a4(rnying rgyud): mgacig dang naganas sa// rdo re dgrag pa'i byad par gyis// slob pa pos rnga dag tu bsgrub// sbyor gsumardo rjecan rnams kyi// sgor gsam sngags kyi skyes thabs ma// sangs m+b+has+yA pe shes go ldan gyis// sbyang nga gsung thugs phyag/ kru btang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchag gnas pa/
109a5(rnying rgyud): sang sa rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// demajog las byung phyogs brlab// rdorjes bcwa rnas nye bar spyod// rnam ma pa'i byings kyi mchog rdo rje thug pa'o// rnam par snang ma nga 'khor lo che// rngon patra la sogs pas// rgyal gnas rdzogs drab sems nas ni// dmachog dang
109a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog ni bya// khams gsum gyi dematshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas bu ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu hUM dang gsung blugs ni// kyob la sogs rab tu bsgom// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ de ni gnapa leng byed par 'gyur// rnam pa
109a7(rnying rgyud): mchog lda dpa'i// ngo slong rjes doms shing// rdo rje'i spong bas bre bsgom na// rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur // rnam pa ku kyi mchog ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas sgur ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu 'azla 'byabasams can// ngong de 'i du'o 'gyur// 'a
109b1(rnying rgyud): gsum dmatshig mdzod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab bsrub 'di// de rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sha chen dmachog mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog
109b2(rnying rgyud): bgrub par bya// bshang gcing ma tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi shwa dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub
109b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ra glang sha yid mi tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad marnyed na// thams cad bsams pa'i rnam par btag/ rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di byas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa
109b4(rnying rgyud): ye// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// skyeng gar ye shes dam tshig dang // rab ca na rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur la// 'di ni dmachog tshul gyi mchog/ dngos grub thams cad 'grul pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad
109b5(rnying rgyud): kyi ye shes de rdo 'gyur ba zhes zla pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// k+She yi mdzeg rdo rje mchog/ rdo dan gis hU~M bsgobs te// bad rtsi lnga mi sbyor ba yis// thos nardo rje gsum tho 'gyur// 'din rdo rje'i tshul mdzog ste// yang dang mi byed mtshig kyang // 'di ltang gi stong ba ying // dor
109b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dmatshig bdud rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// dza
109b7(rnying rgyud): rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam chog grub pa mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam par 'gyur// ga d+hA'i bye snyed thams cad du// kun nas grub pa rnam par spyod// thams cad dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje ru ni rab
110a1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas// thams cad dam tshig mchog tu 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong gsum gcig pus snang byed pas// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog lnga spyod// gad+hA'i bye steng sangasazlas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyigs
110a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa// rang lag skyu ru rab zhag bzhin// rdo nge'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/ mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni// rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// ga ng+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi// sems can kun gyi
110a3(rnying rgyud): sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can// rol mo ltar byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gad+hA'i bye snyed du// 'khor bar gnas par 'byung ba yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du ngan// ga d+hA'i bye ma snyed kyi chu/
110a4(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis sprin la sogs brgyan pas// brtul pa ga d+ha'i sde skyed du// rdzu 'phrul mchog gi rdo rjes 'gengs// bcom ldan 'das dam chog mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa ldan rdo rje'i stan dang / rdo rje'i stan dang dza'i rdzags dang
110a5(rnying rgyud): gnas dang rdo rje rdzu 'phral lo// sangs rgyas mnon shes don grub cing // sangs rgyas sgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ga d+hA'i bye sted grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'irje skra dang ga slang dang thugs// 'jig te me khams kun rnam pa 'thor// brten pa'i nga
110a6(rnying rgyud): rdzog sbyor ba dang / te ba grub pa 'byung ba dang // blang ba'i don du tshig dang // thub brtson pa dag dang ni// rdo rje'i bye drug shes byas la// de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// bai sbyin pa teng 'dzin dang myor ba// byang chub na bathos par bya// nye ba sung
110a7(rnying rgyud): mchog la// rdo mo'i skyemached rnam byung ba// thugs dang bdag po bsgom pa yis// sgrib pa'i tshon stsal bar gsungs// sgrib pa rtsed po byeng pa'i bya// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dab tsun lani bdag po'i sa ma// ye shes dang grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i yen/
110b1(rnying rgyud): sa ces// sa ca na btag pa \u0f7f/ dag gsarnam sathams cas// thags dang sha nga rtsub pang// dgan pa ca pa sardzogs dadu/ ngas rgyu ba ba pa dang // ba bus 'dab cagasas// ga dang 'thong ba nga//
110b2(rnying rgyud): deni sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen par bya// skug sum mnyam pa nyid gyur pas// bsgoms na dngos gru ba rdzob par 'gyur// thun bzhi rnams dang rab byor bas/ gnas lngar blo dang ldan pa yis//
110b3(rnying rgyud): grozas nas ni// ye shes rdo rjes sdom pa bstan// zhag bdu dang ni na phyed dang // zla gcig zab phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje mchog bsgrubs na ni/ dngos gru ba cur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab dbyebs// nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan// gas pa mchog
110b4(rnying rgyud): las byung rnams kyis// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sgra 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas der// sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcang
110b5(rnying rgyud): zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gdas deng// sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// chos nyid gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje gsume dang mo phyed dngos// bdag la rkyed kyis brlab
110b6(rnying rgyud): gnas der// gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng // gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i la lo// rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal
110b7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// rdo rje gsumada' mi byed dngos// bdag la byin gyis brla gnas deng // thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos// bdag po byin gyis brlab gnas dang // thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du
111a1(rnying rgyud): gsol// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung // grul te rmongs bdag nyid 'da' na// tshal par 'gas 'dir gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gas ba 'dus
111a2(rnying rgyud): pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sbyor ba'i dmatshig sgrub pa mchog nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan pa dag shegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'don dang // sems can kun don yang dag 'byung // byang chu
111a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston po che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang // e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog/ e ma'o chos kyi tshul le na//
111a4(rnying rgyud): e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag la// ye shes 'byung bar rab tu gsungs// yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum mi phyed dkyil
111a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ni// sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// bzlas pa rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis rlob// rig dang sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs mtshan nyid// sngags kyi bzlas pa de dang gsungs// ye
111a6(rnying rgyud): shes rgya mtshogasan pa dang // skya gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum byung ba rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa yang du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye
111a7(rnying rgyud): shes byung // byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtses// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro ba rnam pa
111b1(rnying rgyud): na sa mas sa / ga / na/ na/ na
111b2(rnying rgyud): gas // / di pa // zlas// gas sa
111b3(rnying rgyud): lu na/ / sa na sa// sa
111b4(rnying rgyud): na
111b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa
111b6(rnying rgyud): dus nga sa/ ngasu du ma/ sa
112a1(rnying rgyud): sang gnas la bzhag// don na kyang bzlas par bshad// dmachog byung don gsum/ dbum das jigadon nan// danyid mthog rtag// myaning bzlas pa zhes bshad do// 'dod chags 'i don sgom pa/ rje bdag po thams cang de// ba
112a2(rnying rgyud): can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad// rig pa chen mo'i spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub// gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po
112a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje can// ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// rtag tu gsod la brtson pa rnams// sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam
112a4(rnying rgyud): tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can gyis ni// snying ga'i dbus su 'khor lo bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// dbus su 'khor lo'i don bsgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can gyis ni// snying ga'i dbus su rdo rje bsgom// rnga
112a5(rnying rgyud): rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can gyis ni// snying ga'i dbus su rin chen bsgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad ye shes can gyis ni// snying ga'i
112a6(rnying rgyud): dbus su pad+ma bsgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// pad+ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can gyis ni// snying ga'i dbus su ral gri bsgom// dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor
112a7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ngos rnams su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// spros na byang chub thob pa du'agyur// sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya//
112b1(rnying rgyud): lu ni sra mi do'i nyid// sems ni thugs kyi bo nyid// ngag ni gsung gi rang bzhin gyis// mchod na mchod pa'i gan rdob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo sril// rdo rje ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rang gi dag po'i sa
112b2(rnying rgyud): nas// rang gi sngags kyi rdo rje'i gzugs// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag ni// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags pa// snying gar sngags kyi don bsgom pa// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las// bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams
112b3(rnying rgyud): rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la na spyan gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad+mo rdo rje chen// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di de rdo rje thams cad kyi// gsang bsku gsum las byung bas// sprul pa sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bya ba
112b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ma dad ska ba'i sems can dang // slob dpon rdo rje can smod pa// gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang // rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems
112b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas srung ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bo bsad par bsams nas su// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// rdo rje rtse lnga zhal bzhi pa// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom// dus gsul ngam
112b6(rnying rgyud): chog las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lug pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi kye brag gis// bkrus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// de dag rang gi lus
112b7(rnying rgyud): labazug/ sangs rgyas pa zhes 'khor po chen// slar yang slo bar rab tubya// khros pas 'khrugs pa'i khro bongs ma// mi sdug ba gsal 'jigs su rung // mtshan chas tshogs mchog dzin pa// gsod pa'i don bye mchog sems pa// rdo rje sems dpa'
113a1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang // gdug pa can po gsod par byung // sangs rgyas sgra gsum mchog stsal bas// de gsum gyid la 'khor gnas// 'don nyim bdun byas na// sangs rgyas dngas phub byer bar gyur/ mongs pas thub pa la ltar na// 'chabar 'ad na gdan
113a2(rnying rgyud): mi za// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ting 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// dus gsum dam tshig las
113a3(rnying rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can// de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgom// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje'i su yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzung // rdo rje
113a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad spro ba ni// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis // sgra gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad nga dang la gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas// bral te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje kun nas
113a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar gzugs kyis// sku gsum las byung 'gas par babya// zhig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi 'tshal// 'khor lo'i dmatshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam// gshin rje gshes
113a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor po che// rang gi rdo rje rab tu brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams// sgra gsum dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa// slar yang sangs rgyas gshin na gshed// rnam pa 'dra bar skyo bar bya// sems can dus gsum la bzhugs pa// gdugs mas
113a7(rnying rgyud): can dang ba ngo rnams// ngos pas thams cad gsod par bsgom// 'di rdo rje bkang dkyil 'khor// dam tshig thams pad las nyung bag ninang gshed kyi drugasum gyi yi shes rdo rdzigs bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rngang sa// dang rdzogs don gyi don tan nam /
113b1(rnying rgyud): yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// sngags kun bsud phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsung ba'i don zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsa
113b2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las// byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbug gnas par// bsams nas gang na de rab tu brtag/ mkha' dbying sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bas rnam par bsgom// rang sngagra yi ge gnas
113b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// slar yang sangs rgyas sems tsam du// bsgoms pa rnams ni rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas nas su// sku gsum la ni de dag gzung // bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i
113b4(rnying rgyud): sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu / sgom// sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcag par bya// rkang pa mnyam bzhag sgor de yis// sI dro'i steng du nang pa
113b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chu gter rkang pas gnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la// las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis// de yi si por gnan par
113b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// mu stegs thams cad dang // phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// khro bo'i gzug/ gsum rdo rje mchog/ gesar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar// spyi bor bsams nas rab tu bsgom// sangs
113b7(rnying rgyud): sadapar yang gnon bye na// mi dbang la 'dir rje tshom med// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spu/ sung thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dgra bo skrag pa'i dmachog
114a1(rnying rgyud): lA// bsam gtan 'di ni rab tub ga/ sangs cas dag gis 'das na 'ad// 'gas par 'gyur bar gdonam na// shAcom ldan 'das du rgyagasas rgya byagags 'ad skad nas gsus te// ya ga d+hA las pur bu y-i// mngan ma lda /
114a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje phur bur byas bsgom la// snying gar de yis 'dri rab bsgom// sangs rgyas dpung ni khros pa yang // 'jig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// dag rmongs pa gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong khyer ram ni yang na grong // ljongs su
114a3(rnying rgyud): nire bsgyur bya// nad kun slod pa'i zhi ba yang // 'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// bar snang la gnas don nI// rtse mo lnga la rnam par bsgom// bskal pa srog pa ltar bsams la// slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// slob dag kyang sgrar bya'o// rin chen yid bzhin nor
114a4(rnying rgyud): bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang // dbang bsrung ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje 'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje ba snang byed// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// der ni sangs rgyas chos chen dang /
114a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i sprin suH// bskal pa gangs meng gsum yang gnas// sangs rgyas pan kris byin gyis rlob// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ skyod med stsa legs pa 'o/ nang thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung bzhis phra ba'i ting nge 'dzin tu// bas ma gta
114a6(rnying rgyud): pas byung ngam bcas pa// gnas gang du ni brtsam par bya// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bung rab bsgoms la// me stag 'ber ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
114a7(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// zhes kyang gsungs so// 'gro ba 'dul bzhi pa rdo rje zhes byi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas// rang gzugs kar don gnyer/
114b1(rnying rgyud): banag/ ma bang dpyongs sun gyim chog rnams byas// yongs su gang ba rnam par brnam// bslus nas dzad kyi gang bu las// nad pa la ni phab nas su// bsgyu'i bu gnas sangs kyis// smin rnams bdul zhugs can gyis smra// sangs rgyas smin na pa
114b2(rnying rgyud): de la dbang bskur rab tu stsol// nad pad ma tshig rdo rje yis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// chos 'ang
114b3(rnying rgyud): pra ye gzugs pas mam// thugs kar don ga ti shi nag par \u0f7f// mapa dbye pa gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar ma zhes byas rab tung dgang // yid bzhin no dag na chen rjod// 'od kyi gang ba brtsub dbya// 'di dag dang pa'i sras dang nga
114b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi gnas la bab par bya// baspu'i du gnas rin cher// sprin rnams brtul khrugs can gyis s+ho// chos kyi sprin ni bsgom bya zhing // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis nAM/ ngagang dka' ba yang rab tu dgangs
114b5(rnying rgyud): yi pa'i no dpal ldan// sbyin pa'i dzi bsnang ba // rlos kyi sprin gyi mamog pasrid pa kres bya ba'i ting 'do to// rjes ma 'i brings sti dbus gnas pa'i// rdo na rnag ma 'i lta 'khor bas s+ho/ rdo nam mkha' chas mngan gzugs/ thabs ka
114b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang // 'od zer lha yi sbyor ba yis// gzi brjid dri la dbab par bya// de ni dem zag nyid du// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon// 'jam pa/
114b7(rnying rgyud): bi ni mdog dang 'dra// gnas las byed par der 'gyur ro// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can dbang bsgyur// dga' ston chen po stsol bar mdzad// mthong ba nyid kyis byung ba yi// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod
115a1(rnying rgyud): pa nyes byaba'i shing badzin to// rnam mkha' datha sbyin don// drag zing khrol rab gtam dang // wa dang sa tshogs bya rog da// bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom// ma yi kyil 'khor la gnas pa // dab por mas ni rtag par bsgom
115a2(rnying rgyud): sangs nas kun la gnod byeng pa// bas mas nas rnal 'byor snar byang bya// mtshan cha tshags thogs pas mnan// nu ma dus brgyang khrag la sogs// kun d+hi sa drangs par rnam bsgos ste// bsgoms na dang rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te 'di ltad ba
115a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom na// sangs rgyas don 'dzid pa yang // byed na dardzogs pa la// 'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mam/ rdo rje smin dmachog bkod pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mang ngazha la gsum pa// ston ka'i sprin kyi mdog dadra bas maM/
115a4(rnying rgyud): dkar po nag po rab tu dmyur// thor tshugasang ba rgyan dag gis btsun// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan nAn// 'jig rten pa mas rnams lnga khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni nyal gsum bsam/
115a5(rnying rgyud): dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal// thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs stod can// bsgoms na ngas par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdorje pad+mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon na ni// bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par bsgom// @
115a6(rnying rgyud): can kun la phan bzhed ma// sbyin ma zhal glas ma dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po dmar po che// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// dri ma med cing zhal gsum pa// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i tshal// rdzadam pa'i
115a7(rnying rgyud): gtubasas rgyag tu ma// rgyo skyes spyan ni rgyal mtsho// zhaphags ma du rnam par thosgos// dmar gnag dgang po'i rnam pa yi// kha ga mangs par rab tu bsgon// rig mdzes sudral ba sdams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal bar ma // ba ga /
115b1(rnying rgyud): dkar ba'i rnam pa ni// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu bsgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra
115b2(rnying rgyud): 'byin pa// zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro bar rnam par bsam// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bacha
115b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/ drag po rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che// zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab tu bsgom// stobs
115b4(rnying rgyud): da ga mad sa pag// bdag pathams pa dang yos par byud// des gsum pa ga tu rnam/ ban po cing// sa gsu di gas par byed// lags pa rdzol pa dru /
115b5(rnying rgyud): du bsgom// rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che// rdo rje las byung zur gyis blta// zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsgom// gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu phro// zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'khor lo
115b6(rnying rgyud): can// bsam gtan dkyil khor bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i rgyamatsho yang dag byed// gal gsum 'bar ba'i 'od 'adz+ra lnga// bsam gtan k+Shi l+ya 'khor ba sgom par bya// gzi brji phung po gtsug tor rgyal//
115b7(rnying rgyud): gshazhan sngags kyi 'khor pa can// dam thag phongs spyod 'di rnams kyis// ma mo sa sor bsgom par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams byin bshad pa yin// khro bo dag ni rer yang // nam mkha'i steng du shin tu phags// nar+tha/
116a1(rnying rgyud): // mkha' dbyangs kyi dbus gnas par// gsab pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam/ gsal zhing zla ba bzhin zhab// 'od zer sna tsho ga mtshungs pa'i 'ong // me lo
116a2(rnying rgyud): bur yang dag byung // khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du/ rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan bdag/ bsams na byang chub de yis mthong / bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgom pa// de yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid
116a3(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad da mchog 'byung ba mdzes pa'i do zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs kyis gzugs ni rab bsgoms so// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bsam/
116a4(rnying rgyud): khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra// 'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang lhun// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje nyid ni myur du 'thob// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskal ba// 'dis ni
116a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag nyid che/ sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dmachog thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// chos bye dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas
116a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rgyan kyi sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzi zhi pa ni// chud rnams ldan gyis rnam par brdzun// 'od byer smin 'khor lo che// rnam par 'jo ba rab kyang chom// 'dri yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// snga gas ma
116a7(rnying rgyud): da par byung ba// ye shes rgyam myos rnam brgyan pas/ tshe 'di nyid 'thob par 'gyud rgyas kyi sems dpa 'byung ba'i mchog 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' dorje dbus gan pa/ rnga 'a'i rtseb lab dam par ma/ sangs rgyas
116b1(rnying rgyud): d+hags sgoms la// snyu su rnam par ga// zhal dang spya rgyasas// rlogs pa rgyun// ma nams thams pa gas// du sgyum mchog nanapa// khams ga yang thos zud pa// nan
116b2(rnying rgyud): dngos srab thams cad byed// 'khor lo'i yid bzhin nor bu ster// b+ha gca' khor lo shom par bya// sprin gyi ma tho / cig gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rdorje 'dibyas gnas par// rdo rje skyil 'khor 'o mdzag bsam// sa
116b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas gzugs ni rab pa rnams nas// nam mkha' rdon mchog rab bsgom// zhal bzang san ni rab tu yangs/ ung+ga la mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// nam lala'ang mchog mchog rab bsgom// byas rba u d+hag sro mar
116b4(rnying rgyud): bsnams// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // nam mkha' yum rin po che'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/
116b5(rnying rgyud): rjes kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje chos ma rab tu bsgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin stug pa// mtshan
116b6(rnying rgyud): nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyan rnams can gyis brgyan pa ste// phyag na ut+pal dmar mdzes bsdams// sangs rgyas thams cad rab poskams pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsung // chos kyi dam chog de khon nyid
116b7(rnying rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mekha'ajo rje'i dbus gnas par// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ngas ma// sangs rgyas gzugs rje rab bsgoms la// sgrol ma mchog ning sgom par bya// zhal ba
117a1(rnying rgyud): sa smra sa na/ na sa na tun nag
117a2(rnying rgyud): nga/ / // na pas
117a3(rnying rgyud): gas / nam pa dag / sa pa / rnas rnags/
117a4(rnying rgyud): nga ba ni / na sa /
117a5(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa
117a6(rnying rgyud): ma ga // rdzun 'a
117a7(rnying rgyud): pa med/ thangs 'dund pangam mo// gag thams pa kyis mdang / 'dog dmi sas par ba // rdzogs sa ngag ma // sa mo da ga ces
117b1(rnying rgyud): yin/ ta ma grin byed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ngas pa byas ma// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rabyung sgoms pa// rdo rje bdud cung ba sgom pa// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'gro/
117b2(rnying rgyud): smin ni kun tu 'khrug/ zas shing jo bcas gnag pa dang // mje ba rnon po rab tu bsgos// mi bskyod dmachog dbu rgyan la/ bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di na thams cad khro bo yi// 'dab bar dka' ba'i dmachog go// bdud rtsi'i du mtshig 'byung ngo zhes
117b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ nam mkha' jo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// dkri'i rgyal po rab bsgom bya// / khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed//
117b4(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dga' ba'i dam tshig go// bsam gtan rdo rdo rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba
117b5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'dzor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobyas po che ni rab tu bsgom// 'brang ba'i 'od byerd mang po gro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// 'o ning phrag po
117b6(rnying rgyud): zhags pa 'dzin/ rdo rje stobs can bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dmatshig dgu can la// bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i
117b7(rnying rgyud): dbus gnas par// nyis 'dakyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par bsgom/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs bdag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab cag nag la'o//
118a1(rnying rgyud): ngas du bla dasas chung tu sa ma pa/ gru pa ma //
118a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam ma pa'ardo rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsapa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi ga yo mchog ni rnam par bsgom// 'bros shing 'jig pa'i phung
118a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrug par la gri zhags pa bsdams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po dgro// mig yo rdo rje can bsgom bya// mi bskyod dmatshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam cho sa yin/
118a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'od rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor long rab tu som// mtshan rnams thams cad
118a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// 'khor ba 'bar bas yongs su brjor// gardzog tor 'khor long mchog ni// rnam par 'gro ba rab tu bsgom// mi bskyod dmachog dang rgyan la/ bsgoms nas nyes pa rabatu 'phepa// 'di thams cad thob pa// 'da' ba dka' ba'i nga ba/
118a6(rnying rgyud): bya/ pa / / sman kya pa rnags smra/ ma /
118a7(rnying rgyud): thag ba'abar nga// mas na ngos su thang par 'jud// mi babyed pa rgyag brgyar pa// bangs na byis par btu 'phel// 'a bams cad la 'o// 'ab dag sa
118b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting 'don to// 'ag ba'i 'kho ban// sangs rgyas 'khor po brtson pa gos// ting la gas rnams// dkyil la bar grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung nga gsung dang thugs sa gsang chan gas ma
118b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dram tshig bskyod pa de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i lhab skye bcu gsum pa'o// / de nasu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen bas na pa'i dam jug ga mchog ces /
118b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ti dzin pa snyoms pa btsugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo 'di nyid kyi sngags thugs rdo las byung ngo // ru u dz+wal tId+ha se d+d+ha lo tsa nis rbA rbAmA d+ha swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 'byo ba kun la dgyes pa rnams/
118b4(rnying rgyud): mnyes shing rab tu dkyis gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdo rdo rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni byed ma// las rnams thams cad rabasgrub cing // rdo rje 'dam che gargyal mdzad ma// shing sos par byed par gsungs// rdo rje 'chang chen pos de sa skyes gsungs
118b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das sngags sa kyi mchog / khro bo rdo rjes dngos po dang dngos po med du'ang ma rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdong 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mjog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung // oM shrI kAr shA
118b6(rnying rgyud): da bAn b+haT+Ta k+Sha nI di/ g+hA ta yA g+hA ta lA trA T+Ti ni wAd+ha/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// de'i gsu nI mi byed pa// rdo rje can mnyes spyan gdungs nas// rdo rje thugs ni rjes su na/ gsung ba chu sbyor ba la// ga tu lAs d+hi ba bislab pa/ chen po
118b7(rnying rgyud): rna mo// rtag so byed par bshad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dam tshig gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// chos kyi dmachog gi su'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sngagasung dathugs ro rje las phyung ngo //
119a1(rnying rgyud): oM ka Ta gtsun ga ka Ta ka To swAhA// nga nas 'di na gsungs tsam smras// dza sa mchog 'dzin pa rnams/ dzod ces rjes sa d+han// mnyes nas bsam gtan tha bskur bas// nag tu rgyas rgyas stobs dang ldan// rdus tu mdzad pa ma na/
119a2(rnying rgyud): pa// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam chog sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las
119a3(rnying rgyud): lhung ngo // oM d+ha ra tut+tA tu re t+na hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag cher skyes mnyes// rdo rje'i spu ni rjes su dran// bsam gtan ye shes thob gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni kun nas su/
119a4(rnying rgyud): spyad cig gis ni dran bzhin du// thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
119a5(rnying rgyud): rnying nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nA maHsa man+ta kA ya byA shrit+ta A hU~M/ oM ga ba khA k+keSh+Tha tI/ sarbada?d+has twa da ma ka/ a sems la ba ra pA sha ha s+t+wa~M/ tsatu rmA la/ tsa
119a6(rnying rgyud): dza/ tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta pra d+ha a ba hA ri Ne/ ma hA biSh+Ta p+ta ta ka/ bi kr-i tA nana?/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha pa~M ka ra/ an+tar+tha ha sa nA di ne/ g+ha g+ha tsa ma ni bas na/ kri ru ku ru/ sarba ka mA ni/ tshidz+ha tsad+d+ha sirba ban d+ha na/ bir+N+Na bit+ta pa ra mu dA na/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/
119a7(rnying rgyud): sarba bA tAn/ mtham \u0f7f/ ni mtha na mtha/ sarba dr-idz+nyAn/ pra be sha ya pre ba sha ya/ maN+Dal ma bye be ba s+khata/ dzI ba tA N+Da kar/ su ru su ru pa mas na k+Sha re/ nga sha ta/ \u0f7f/ ma bi sam+ba/ saM bi la mr-i/ sa ma yas n+ye s+yAdab+hUs+t+wa~M/ phaT phaT/ ba Ta ma ba s+pho Ta la/ sar+b+barba
119b1(rnying rgyud): sha ya ka kar/ bas+t+ra d+hAs na thA bar pU rA ka/ hi ha b+hag bAn/ kaun+Da d+ha las/ ma ma sarba ar+thA sA d+hA ya swA hA// de nas 'di na gsungs tsamags// sangs rgyas can gags rlo // gas shing ba khrag zung nas// rnardzamams sadran/
119b2(rnying rgyud): mchang mags pa// gzugs mdzes yid 'od rnyed pa la// rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mA ma kI'am spyan yang rung // rdo rje chen po rigs mthon po// lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag pa dzes par 'phags
119b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dam tshig 'od zer 'thug po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje tho ba 'ang nyid kyis gang
119b4(rnying rgyud): thAgs na rna las phying ngo // namaHsa mA nA k+Sha la bA g+he/ badz+rAH/ nA ma badz+ra krod+b+ha ya/ ma rnon rje b+hi thA la/ a si/ mras la/ baR+sha pA sha ta stA ya/ oM s+'u mr-i ta ba t+ta si// ga ga Na wa h+na/ ti/ N+DiH/ ban+d+habad+ha/ han tan/ da had ta/ gardza gaH/ li Ta zla ya sdom la/ sarba
119b5(rnying rgyud): bad+hUpa n+b+ha sa/ mthug Nab te/ dz+ra d+hag ts+tshas+t+wa~M/ de nas de na ga sus // spangs nas pa da thugs / ba jigs sa/ sa ngas su na/ rnams pa gyi slong da/ rdorje u shA las maman/
119b6(rnying rgyud): gsasangs rgyas dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas na sring par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa den rkyen togasangs rgyas kyo 'od ze do na zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la skams par zhugs nas/ ngo rdokho po chen po gzhan gyis mi thab pa 'di tha~Md kyi sa gsung thugs
119b7(rnying rgyud): las byung ngo // namaHsa man+ta kA ya bA s+ye ta badz+ra d+ha/ oM d+hI na ts+tshi hU~M Ta phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid rje byis kun// 'jigs shing kun du smrig gyung bas// byang chub sems ni rdzas su dran// srin pa ma rungs gsum pa dang /
120a1(rnying rgyud): 'dugs rdzu du lags pang / sa ra babyung // la sa ga / de na 'a btsun pa gags byu ba sa pag da nga
120a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
120a3(rnying rgyud): seM t+pal hU~M smras sa spyo t+yAr / sa/ bar medapal ba rnams/ ga tu ni lcags// ha li kwi ba// 'a khyad/ par bdun b+h+ya/ ba'i sa slong / u la/ sa
120a4(rnying rgyud): heShAp+na te he to b+ha bi/ badz+rI n+ti kauts+tshi rA ya saM/ oM da duthAgra ta na/ draSh+pa sarbaM bA/ dzA nad+ha na/ ma the ma tha/ mdza medza/ prA Ta yaM/ pA Ta ya/ ma Ta maT/ b+h+yar+yA b+han+ta/ br-it+tad+har+tha sad+d+ha ar+tha dzA ti karma su shIs+t+r-i hAM yaM gI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra yaM phaT/ badz+ra gad+d+ha ya dzaH/ badz+ra ni d+h+yA ya phaT/
