120a5(rnying rgyud): badz+re Sh+Ta ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra ni d+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ru mahA pinA sha d+ha ya phaT/ sarba trai lo kye b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba kar+b+he b+he pra trA~M ha~M tA ya~M phaT/ badz+ra trai la swan+ni sa d+hA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// d+his kyi rdo rje
120a6(rnying rgyud): mchog kyis rnams// 'jigs shing rab tu bsngal bar 'gyur// ye shes sbal po rjes su dran// mkha' dbyingasu drug gis yongs gang po// rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od// khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis// drug rnams thams cad med par byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
120a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas gdon me za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa ma d+h+ya ShA ya pA b+hi d+d+ha badz+rA hU~M/ oM
120b1(rnying rgyud): !/ b+hag b+hAH/ dz+ha la brgya k+Sha/ tsa sarbaH/ trasa? rbas/ d+hAH/ gas pa/ sa? ba pa/ galpA la/ gam gA ma/ b+habrU bran sa sra bag na/ b+hU r+tha Sh+TaH/ da Sh+Ta t+ta/ da dang / bA ha bta/ paH baH/ ma thA/ pUtwA ya/ b+hAta pa/ mnaman/ mad+ha pa/
120b2(rnying rgyud): mapa/ nga bas/ da myed/ b+ha / thams / b+h+yas tsun/ sa d+d+haH/ Sh+ka/ / sang brdzun/ da shAn/
120b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ ga / gas/ / sa na ra nga// sa pa can
120b4(rnying rgyud): ni ba~MH/ na han+tu/ d+ha ti te/ btsapaH/ gAr+pa krAm+b+ha/ tsa ts+tshan+ta/ sa rba/ phaT hUM baM ta / dab khaM d+hU ba kA paM/ han tan/ brjod rten mAn+ta/ de nas 'di na ga sungs tsam gyis// gtan pa'i tshog las kyang bcung// yid ni 'dags dang
120b5(rnying rgyud): nas// sems dpa' rdo rje rjes su dran// grags chen mI buM'i rgyal po 'di// brtsaH brgyang du ba zlas rje rnaMchoga'i tshul bzhin ba skul ba sa/ gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bstod pas kun nas sprin gyi dab
120b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po rje dI hrI kyi thas sung thugs drod las srung ngo // rnamaHsa man kA ya bA br-it+ta bar+d+ha d+h+waM/ dz+yod+hi d+hI Ta phaT baT/ Ag+sa thu b+hA hrItrA~M Tu Ta gra ngan la zang na/ sA mad+ha ba sa ya~M swAd+ha/ de nas 'a
120b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs tsas gis// stobs pa che ye kya rnams kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rang spag nas// sngags mardo rdo rjes su dran// bzlas pa tsa mad skyong po pos// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// than po byung ba'i dus su yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bengs par byed/
121a1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gan du 'joms pa rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tiki'i rgyal po chen po khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA t+yat+ta badz+rA NA/
121a2(rnying rgyud): hUMH/ de nas 'ad ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che skyes rnams// 'jigs shing rdo rje sku gsum ni// rjes rngan dmachog ldan gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' myong ba yis// rkang pa g.yas pas pi d+ha mnan// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags bzlas
121a3(rnying rgyud): pas// sngags rnams thams cad 'grags par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba rdo rje gsum po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sra gsung brags rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa maN+Da kA ya
121a4(rnying rgyud): ma tshal k+Sha/ k+Sha/ rmAnaH/ man+t+ramaH/ oM maH/ san saH/ tar+hat+kak+Sha/ hanA tan/ de nyi / ma ha ta/ ts+tsha t+sa k+Sha/ bAnas/ bdags pad+ha/ hes d+has/ bar+d+ha ma \u0f7f/ gtag // d+had+ha/ ta/
121a5(rnying rgyud): ma hA man+d+ra pA la ka/ d+hu na d+ha na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khAd/ big+h+nAn/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dr-idz+nyA naM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+ShA/ sarbA na ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki re/ ma hA bi Sha ma badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya spr-i Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M tri ba le ta rat+na na ta ka/ AM AM I/ hAM hAM hAM/ oM tsa laM tsaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hU~M
121a6(rnying rgyud): a sa mat+te ka tAT/ ma hA ba la shA ta ya/ sa ma ya ni/ g+ha ti ya/ pa ra sa ma ya man+ta na/ AM sAM/ hAM hAM/ mAM shwad d+haM tra lo ka/ tuSh+mAt+ta badz+rI/ na maHm+bu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+ho/ dz+wa la ya/ trAT a sa ha na na ma A hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lga kun 'khor da
121a7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa rnams// brgyal zheng yad ni rabaskrag nas// rdo rje'i pra ni rjes su dran// khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis// lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang sdig gyur nas// kha sbyar lus kyis 'grags par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam
121b1(rnying rgyud): tshig rnam par 'phrul pa'ardo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par grags nas/ rdo na 'dzin thams cad kyang ma tshig khro ba chen po gnod mdzes 'di nyid kyi sgragasung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oMsa? m+ba ne su b+h+yAM/ gr-ih+Nab+dad+hatAM/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoHthag bAn/ du
121b2(rnying rgyud): rAdza hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// sgrub shig gos dang bral gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni// rdo rje ljags kyu zhags pa yas/
121b3(rnying rgyud): bcings na bu mo dgug pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
121b4(rnying rgyud): las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa// zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas sgra gsung sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo chen po sbyor ba las// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po// rtag
121b5(rnying rgyud): tu nges par 'phags par 'gyur// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje ches// rdo rje kyo ba'i dbye ba yis// sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog/ rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhib// mi yi bu mo
121b6(rnying rgyud): mchog rnams kyi// snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyar// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya// shA tsi der ni gnas par bsam// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba
121b7(rnying rgyud): yis// lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu gzugs po che// 'bar ba rnon po 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms na// nam mkha'i pad+mo dgug pa'i mchog/ khro ba rdo rje'i dam tshig rang //
122a1(rnying rgyud): 'i gaganas palta// smramadu du ba gnas// thal na pa sgo gags pa'is sog/ bcagag bdo nas dag zung du/ pa myong ba yis// nabag 'thas du bya// panas das babar ga/ ca papa da da
122a2(rnying rgyud): yin
122a3(rnying rgyud): bzag pa'i gamar na // banabs nim gad sbyi maud kyang/ na se mas rgya'i kyang par dang // sngags kyi mang pa thas da du// de gyu ba ga // na byas na ga pa pa zhi/ rdongasams dpa' can//
122a4(rnying rgyud): du sa par bya/ da ga byas papas // rnam po jog tu ga pa'i// de nas pacos ldan 'das rnam pa ban pa pa yul ba'i seM shes zhes bya / 'dzin 'i rnams par grags nas/ 'dzo la pa bcigs ma pa
122a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa ga smrahA / padu
122a6(rnying rgyud): thathas cad 'grags par 'gyur// grwa le the mo mag pazangs dag/ bcag nas zhi par spyad pa \u0f7f// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam mas sa cig 'byung bar rnaMgs byaba'i rkang 'dzin la stobs par grags nas/ sa chen po ma g+sa zher ba /
122a7(rnying rgyud): thugs las byung ngo // sa rgya pa/ hA gan/ shA ni t+tes/ hA sa la dz+nyAb ya/ bai 'ji / 'i ta thAH/ ni AhA/ dran pa 'di gsu sa gyis// rig 'dzin bdun nyid kyis mthan// 'ad she 'jigs par byam na/
122b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rjes rngan// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ gser kyi rnacha g.yo ba rnams// sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni// dmachog mchog gis dgrag par bya// 'gog pa rdo rje rgyal po ni// yongs su rdzogs pas mangs mchog gis// ye shes rdo rje gsum las byung //
122b2(rnying rgyud): kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs// yang na khro ba thams cad ni// dben pa'i gnas dang chen po ru// sngags pas 'bum du bzlas pa yis// las rnams thams cad byed par bshad// rdo rje slob dpon spong ba dang // theg pa chen po spod pa dag/ rab tu 'bad pas
122b3(rnying rgyud): gsad par bya// yang na gnas nas spro bar bya// 'di yis byang chub mchog gi ni// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems
122b4(rnying rgyud): gsod pa ni// cho ga bzhin du bsgom byas pa// gdug sems can gyi dgra rnams ni// khrag dang chu yis gsher ba'am// bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// bgos nas ling+ga rkang pas mnan// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// brgya rtsa bkyad ni yongs bzlas
122b5(rnying rgyud): na// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ yang gsungs pa/ chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas// khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis// ling+ga rkang pas mnanan ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ bshad gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// ngan pa rdul
122b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dri ma nam pa// bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na// skad cig gis skams 'chi bar 'gyur// thal ba'i sgo mas gsher ba'i gos// bgos nas thobs 'khrugs bzhin du// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur// yang gsungs
122b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ gcer bur phud de kra bshig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul can gtsigs shing bsgyur// ling+ga rkang pas mnanan no// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khar stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mtshan ma gcig dang shing gcig
123a1(rnying rgyud): sasu nus// nga su na// sgyud / rdzu sa/ sa tu spya// da / na
123a2(rnying rgyud): /
123a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa / sang na nan
123a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang ga nga hU~M sa na mas pa sa/ 'a ga shA nga bye ma pa nga gang bye sa kyi bapa 'du bye / sa gtu ma@
123a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma//
123a6(rnying rgyud): ma / sa
123a7(rnying rgyud): brgya sa // sa su
123b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas bdag nyid chen po'i yang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin// snying gnas ni rkang pa'i bar// rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom// de nyid gong drung ma tshig pa// phur bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di // bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kyis kyang nges par 'dabs//
123b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal poH// phur bus btab na myur dra ste// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen po m+b+ha rnam par 'phrul ba'i dong zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs nas/ sku'i dramachog tsam dam so rdo rje phrar bu'i sngags 'di nyad babrug tu thugs
123b3(rnying rgyud): lab srung // au s+yai ts+tshad+ha/ hAn han/ da ha daha/ dIn badz+ras thA thAM phAT/ phan tshun dbri ba'i dril dang na// mtha thong bzhini rab tu bsdam// rnam par snang mdzad tshal gnas te// rdo rje skar thu nges par ga ba// btab ma thag tu sems dpa' tshe// dod sub
123b4(rnying rgyud): las byung ba// dam gri mtshig gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung gi dmachog tsam dam
123b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi thug srang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM m+b+hi b+hU b+hubaH/ ye shes slo byeb// rdo rje song monges par bzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje phung bla nges par gdab// btab mA thag tu rje// phyu gsum 'i byed las byung ga//
123b6(rnying rgyud): dram chog mchog gis ltung bar 'gyur// yung na 'tsho pA'i gnas sa 'gyu // de nas bcom ldad 'das rdo rje chang chen pos thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsha mu dam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'a
123b7(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa gas rdo rjelas tha'o// ma brje du/ khyim grob thongs namin// 'di yi'i po 'jigs par bye // ma 'i rgyal gnas te// gyung byung sa bar gdag// ba'abakyim kyi ba / gyi bdag
124a1(rnying rgyud): byung // dam tshog ma tshogags byung 'gyur// yang na 'tha' gnas smra 'thar// srag nga bsas// rtag pang dag nas sa na// mdu batha gas par// phung bas 'dabs 'ad gu na med//
124a2(rnying rgyud): 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sgra gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan mdzod pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma tshogasang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ a ma ting dri
124a3(rnying rgyud): kun bzlas pa/ e ma chos kyi gnas zhib// e ma'od ni rnam par 'joms// phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen pa// srug sung thugs sa don rnams// phrar bus gdabs yang dag bshad// 'di na sngags
124a4(rnying rgyud): rnams thams kyad kyi// phrar ga pa de nyi las byung ba// skragasung thags la sum zlog glen pa// sngags kyi rgyud basbyin ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa rgyad kyi grwa dang gsung dang thugs kyigs chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sru dang gzung dang thugs che /
124a5(rnying rgyud): byung bsngags kyis 'gugs pa rnam par sbal pa'i tshul po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bslar kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa// hUM
124a6(rnying rgyud): sha can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lhag par byas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa
124a7(rnying rgyud): yog// 'arkye thams kyid mangs su dag/ bzhin pa sangs la tu brjong // chen rna mi thams pa sa rdzogs pa// bang par bgaganas rnam par brnam// dkyil ba ma ci mthas/ sa sa ma ga gas rnarnam par /
124b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// rnam par snang mdzad sgra chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// dzarje sems dpa' rtsor ba yis/
124b2(rnying rgyud): zag mkhan ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsrub// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// byas nas las ni brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de ni de ma thag
124b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// chos rnams kun 'dzin rgyal po mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar mkhan bu mo rab mdos shing // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub // den
124b4(rnying rgyud): chos bdag nyid// sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bslab par bya// gsang bathob par byed
124b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni// bsgom pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms
124b6(rnying rgyud): na// grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par
124b7(rnying rgyud): bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dmachog shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gal te rdo rje can grub 'dod// bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kye// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang gci'i dmachog la sogs
125a1(rnying rgyud): pas// dbang pa gnas kyi myong ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhib// de nyid tha na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'o dmachog rdo rjes da skad ces bka' bral to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam chog chen por ma
125a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun du blag par byed pa'i khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM d+hI Sh+T+r-i mai kr-it+tan nasarba sha d+h+r-i nA ga ya/ stamA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ drug ni khrag dang ban
125a3(rnying rgyud): lanam mablangs mar te/ tshor ma'i selas khros pas bsreg/ bu ma'i bdag tshig dang bcas/ nyi ma grang ma nam byed na// 'ad ni rnam pa byed du shes// serab can gyis bu ga mdu/ stong phrag brgyad ni tshul bzhin 'drug/ zongs
125a4(rnying rgyud): da na byed// 'don nyi mags ma ngabya// bskal pa gas ma dadu grang ba myed do// des ni rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang chos 'dzin no// rdorje sems dpa' gzhan yang dang // gal te rmongs pas 'das da // ram tshan deng bang nga
125a5(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyang la// dur khrod so la ma blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar
125a6(rnying rgyud): 'brar 'dir gdon min// thob bsam gtan myong ba yis// phan na nges par ltung bar l+r-ing // hriM lag ra btu'abar dang bcas// rdo rje 'ab ba rab tu gnom// rgyag rdorje'i rigs drad+ha te// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ rdom sol ba la migs pas/
125a7(rnying rgyud): sa pa' brang ma dgathag 'thos pa// 'gabar ras / na su byengs pa sus sa rgyam sa su du / dbang 'dra ba pa gra// de'ang kyang cha sa
125b1(rnying rgyud): si rdo rje rab 'bar che// mi stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje rnam bsgoms na// chu rnams gnon pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'drab na// rlung la sogs pa byung nani// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// gdug pa'i dag ni rjes tha
125b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang // mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag gang // sngags 'dis skrag par
125b3(rnying rgyud): byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi rtsa// btsun mo rtag tu gzhag par/
125b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad padus su rdzogs// san rnams pa sa kyad kyis btsun pa// d+hA ba rgyas byas smras// sngags 'dis ba thos pa sh+na/ zer DI ba byur ba/ bas+ho// / rang sas ngag sas /
125b5(rnying rgyud): chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med
125b6(rnying rgyud): rnyed na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag nyid du// 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur// bshad pa'am
125b7(rnying rgyud): yang na bza' ba'am// sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du sngags pas na// zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bshang bachog bzhin blangs nas// kham thor sbyar mar dgag
126a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// brgyartsa brgyang du bskyal na ne// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // dz+haiM yig dang / shadang // sha chen dgang chog bzlan// ngas nas bsgyur spong pa yis// thos na da yas mam nga // bshashud dang lhan cig ldan pa yas// de la tha spanas/
126a2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyor ba yi// ril
126a3(rnying rgyud): bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // baglang sha dang sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // bshang ba
126a4(rnying rgyud): las byung srog chags las// brtul grags can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // ga pur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun
126a5(rnying rgyud): gyis mi mthong ngo // gi wang a ga rba sbyar ba'i// dril bu ljags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// ga pur grang gum sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor
126a6(rnying rgyud): ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje can rnams gang yang rung // phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs na// de 'drar 'gyur te dpral dang ldan// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje
126a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa dpal dang ldan// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa
126b1(rnying rgyud): da// bcom ldan 'das dam chag mi snang ba 'dro chen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// dra nas sangs byas rabar byes padud// sa'as latham yangs dbang bdag/ ngam tshar byung bang sun gdangs nas// gsung na 'ang skad bka ba //
126b2(rnying rgyud): e ma 'ogasang gnas mi 'gyur ba// e ma'ongo bo nyid kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed par byed pa mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje 'asnor ba yis/
126b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'don rnams mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje spyan dang gzugs sogs kyis// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang la da mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o// rig
126b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i thal po chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par bsgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems
126b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnam par bsgom// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya// thams cad sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la// spyi bo ru ni bsgral pa shis// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal te// bsam gtan
126b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'di yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub po rnams la phan par gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/ skra dang gsung thugs yang dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal te// ri rtse nyams
126b7(rnying rgyud): ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par yang // bsam gtan rdo rje dang bya ba// sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags dang bsam gtan gyis bskal bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//
127a1(rnying rgyud): ngang rgyag sa // thug na dang// na smras nga gag/ mas // rtsabadagadan min bar 'thag// bkra' ngas pa sachon pa// 'baba' ba na
127a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rdorje grub pa dag pas bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'thab// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'im// khyengs grangs bcu gnyis pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bzung nas dbab bang rab tu brtag/ chog thams cad byas nas ni// lal rnams rab tu
127a3(rnying rgyud): dU \u0f7f// rnam pa gzhan du rgya zhi na// khams gsus skyebs dpyas par 'gyur// de la byeng ba'i thugs kyil '-i'i tshib ni 'di rnams s+ho// d+hI d+ha lag/ rnas ma la'i kham sa ni sems med cing // rtog pa thams cad rnam spang sa dang // thams pa #
127a4(rnying rgyud): cho ga yis ni 'bab par 'gyur// hU~M si gardo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ shA.Ak+Sha yig sku yi rdo rje can// AH yig chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni sngags tshig bstan pa'o// yi ge d+hiHlis bskul bar bshad// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni 'phrul ba thams cad
127a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad// khru gang tsam mam zla do'am// ji srid khu ba rgyad lnga tsam du/ rdo rje rgyal por ba bskul na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'phang bar 'gyur// phra ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang bzong byeng ba'o// de na sa rgyal po rje na
127a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ srag sum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gdu 'i 'di na nga dka' sam to// rtse gtsigs gad pa yis kyang // 'artus zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya// spyo ba gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad tham gzhig pa 'o// dur thong
127a7(rnying rgyud): bu bsogs las// dag mi gzugs brtan byas nas ni// sla ba shig gcang du byung ba yis// khams gsum ngag kyang 'jig par byed// du de 'a 'bregs thal ba mas// dgra sa gzugs parten byos nas ni// snang brgya rtsa ba kyang ba smras pas kyang // 'tshob
127b1(rnying rgyud): zhugs la/ pa' na sa// sa // sa sa// /
127b2(rnying rgyud): rlud// rnas N+Dig pan kyi bgrad gakyims// dgras gzugs pa cwa ga n-i// dang ma na 'ja nas pazlags// ng+yas kyas dag sang ngas pa ga// ces gsus so// dri 'ing tha gnyisas yis cig// de ni'i gzugs nga byas dang ni// ngag las bral
127b3(rnying rgyud): na// ting 'jams kyi na la // dgang da gad bas// sangs kyab dag byangs par 'ag/ ces babyas so// ma phra ba dang // shA dag ni// sa mnyas thas padugs dpa'// dag
127b4(rnying rgyud): bstsu // stsog su gzhan pa'i gos dag ni/ kyi sem kyi khros nas hA// nang pas 'an mnan nas ni// srin pos khyer bar gdon sa rba// dza.a kha ga d+hAn nams kyis// gtsug na ba na/ ngas dpa 'jug pa yang/ zla 'dis
127b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa mes
127b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ / ba pa sa/ ga yangan bsam btand// mas /
127b7(rnying rgyud): na gi ma tshig ma// rjem sa dpa' thob // rnam par bsrid pa 'jigs 'gas / thub bya pa ni dri byang thoms gtanar gyu / des 'du ga gaspyi macanas//
128a1(rnying rgyud): dbyi gsangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sangs su gang ba rang noms la// gdun pa mos pab ba s+ho// bsams nas ma thag tu'// sangs thas byang chub sems dpa' yos// yos sug bya gas nas na// gazla pa sams dngas dang /
128a2(rnying rgyud): na ne// do rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra po rnams// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni// sngags ma khan gyis ni mdun pas nus na// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi ba// srin go / khro ba sna tshogs pa// gtus zhing wa pa ma bzang pas// d+hagang
128a3(rnying rgyud): gyur par bsams des ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod dang // mchu rings pa dang wa rnams te// de yis zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sbrul nag rab tu khros pa ni/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa// dug gi
128a4(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dam tshig ni// dpral bar bsams na 'di khyad 'phags// sbrul des zos par bsam pas ni// bsgrub bya dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// yams samanye bar 'tshe ba rnams// 'jigs pa nges par dbab pa'i mchog/ 'di ni
128a5(rnying rgyud): bskul ba'i mchog yin no// thob rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dgra yi sgrog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje lta re la sogs pas// gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin
128a6(rnying rgyud): pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi// bsrung ba la sogs sngagA rnams dang // lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod byed mchog gi mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje phung pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// gsang bdag
128a7(rnying rgyud): nyid gtogs bsams na ni// 'di ltas mnyes 'gyur gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo rje thugs kyi bka 'ji bzhin// bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje rlabos de skad ces bka'
128b1(rnying rgyud): rnal ba nga 'an// rnams cad rnams na no// / rnams ca nga gsasas rgya// 'du rnas pa/ stsal ba// mam smra da/ // sa // rgyal 'danas kya rgya
128b2(rnying rgyud): glan// dal 'a mas gas kya rdzogs pa'o// 'dimi rdzug ri byed pa// dag pa'abyung ba 'tha cig/ sbyin ya / gnas pa sa pa snyom / 'i ba na sa
128b3(rnying rgyud): zhig// dug ni nying nya la 'dra/ sreg pa me yi kha dog dang // bsgoms na 'grel bar gdon ming// de la 'di ni dug thams cad dgug pa'i snang ba'o// hrIH/ rnam pa sna tshogs las byung drug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yis khyer par bsgoms nas ni// dab
128b4(rnying rgyud): skye pa dam par bas na// sa dang// ngas kun wad// byang ma/ 'jig pa 'di she sa/ ga sarnas pa nga sa / shA
128b5(rnying rgyud): ga ba ba/ de'i 'a dag 'anas cad 'a 'bru nga di das pasanan/ ga nas smra dang pa mi skye/ rnams pa drungad sa pa shes rje su 'dred/ mas ldan ngas dun pa
128b6(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni dag gso pa'i dmatshig rdo rje'i snying ba'o// hU~M/ snying po 'dzin che// khadog dkar bar rnam par bsgom// da gi sngon gyi 'bar ba// rnaba'i 'od nang bzhin bapel// danas bzhi ga kyi sbyong ba yis/
128b7(rnying rgyud): des zag tu sdud pas ldang // len gnyis lan gsum ba ba skams nas// sprugs pa dag tu rnam pasams na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang // skadacig gis ni drug med byed// sa skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// de la 'dzin nyi la jug thams ca/
129a1(rnying rgyud): drang nga'i sbyong ba'o// AH/ 'bras dang po la mig 'bum bu dang // gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// rnga bo can bzhin dri med pa// de yi dbus na
129a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer lnga ni rab rdzogs pa'o// sdung pa na ni dam tshig gnag/ bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dra// bsam gtan gnas 'di gsang ba ste// gsang chen ye shes dri ma med// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi gong tshig rnams
129a3(rnying rgyud): so// dzi na dzig/ A ro le ka/ badz+ra rje ka/ nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thob par 'gyur// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dam tshig lde'u'i rnam pa 'am// yang na khyir ni byung ba'ang rung // rang gi lus ngag sems
129a4(rnying rgyud): nas las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // rdo rje'i go 'phar gnas bsgom la// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams// des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa'
129a5(rnying rgyud): grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rang lus dag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nang las thang bar bsgom par bya//
129a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan rnams// de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las skos su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad 'azlas sbyor ba yis
129a7(rnying rgyud): ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur// yang na rang gi sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nang rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'dab dka' ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po// 'dod bzor ba rdo rje ches/
129b1(rnying rgyud): gsung na 'dag bka' phral na// zas rnams kyi la ma thun// ngab t+yad byas masmras ga // rang bzhin dag pa'i'adi rjid la// 'khrul ba'i da rdu btugasungs// bsam gtan bathas pa 'don brtson par// thub pa pas ni rtagatu nga // sangs rgyas byu
129b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong // de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// srur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong //
129b3(rnying rgyud): sems can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par de yis mthong // rang gzugs ye shes che 'od mnyam// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong // rdo rje sems dpang gzugs
129b4(rnying rgyud): chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa che// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba// rmi la me 'di 'dra mthong 'gyur bar// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster// rgyan rnams
129b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// des ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang // chos
129b6(rnying rgyud): mdzod yid du 'ong bsgol// chos kyi 'khor lor bsgyur pa'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyad// sangs
129b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byed par nges mthong ngo // zhes kyang gsungs so//
130a1(rnying rgyud): rje las phyung snga chags pang // rmi lam bra ma med mthong das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// byas pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol ba khyi yi sgor la sogs// gal te rje zlos mthung na// b+ho ldan no rje sems dpa' la// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub du/
130a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de la 'don mal ma rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snyir po'o// rang gi sems ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab gnas pa// nam mkha' rdo rje'i sems gnas 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
130a3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshesas pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig 'gas/ ra bo nyid med tshas rnams la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/
130a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// e ma'o ngo mtshar yang dag byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das
130a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
130a6(rnying rgyud): cad rmyi lam dang / rmi lam las byung bar rjes su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang nam mkha' ni ba rtag tu med pa/ bltar med pa thogs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
130a7(rnying rgyud): cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad dang rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems
130b1(rnying rgyud): ngabatud // lung ga dang sems bams gang ldan pa dang / nam mkha' khams dag gtas su mang cing gnyisas byung ma dang// bam ldan 'dus bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'atu // dpar nasems can thams ca narnams 'a bya pa bya da
130b2(rnying rgyud): mkhwa'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na yang gnas pa me yin te/ chas gang / khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o// gar la bye ba med pa de ni chos gang gis kyang btag
130b3(rnying rgyud): par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad ra pa nyid med pa'o// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba gyur
130b4(rnying rgyud): pA rdo rje'i gnas kyi rnam pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so// chos gang yang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas
130b5(rnying rgyud): yin no// kyi bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyel ma ni bdag gi sa khams gsum du mi lam spyi ga nas mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems sa// ma yang bdag bris rmi la ma mthong bar dbya'i snyam du mi sems te// khams gsum gyi zla' darnams kyi rje la mi
130b6(rnying rgyud): d+he/ las dang 'dra ba rje lum las rgyu 'gro/ de bzhin du bcom ldan das pazhin gshegs pa thams cad phyags bcu'i 'jig tan ste/ khanas rnams cad nasangs rgyas dang byung chung sums dang 'di ltang bzhugs pa rnams dang / sems pan sbed de rung bya rje
130b7(rnying rgyud): dri 'am la bdag med pa'i gnas du kyis su rig pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yid bzhin gyi na bu rin po chen rin po che thams cad kyi gca pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po'i thams cad kyi gtso ma yin
131a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang gsol ba btab pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam nyid kyis 'byor par byed de/ ngan pa che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la ma
131a2(rnying rgyud): gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab
131a3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/
131a4(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
131a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub kun nas btus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la
131a6(rnying rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub ni sngags thams cad kyi sku gsung zhugs lnga mi gnas
131a7(rnying rgyud): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la ni gnas so// lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na
131b1(rnying rgyud): so gnas/ gzugs kya sa rnam gnas/ gzungs sdud pa'i thams nam gnas/ mam ni sa la ma gnas/ sa kyang sams panaganas/ ngag nasams la gnas/ sems kyang ga 'a gnasas// da 'gyur nan/ dmam dang
131b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/
131b3(rnying rgyud): 'chang gis bka'aphrul pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag rengs mas la gnas sa// radu ga sus dang rig dang sams las thung // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang laldanas/ bka'ajal ba rji mkha' lda
131b4(rnying rgyud): so// gsol pa nam mkha' gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi
131b5(rnying rgyud): 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
131b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas btsam ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi snga gsung thugs rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skrag suMng sa da da mchog gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegasu pa rnams rtsed kyi rdo ra
131b7(rnying rgyud): mtsho dpa' 'god pas mchod pa byas na// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs papa rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ba gi 'das tshig gi rgyal ba'i bkod pa zhes byang chu 'dzin la rnams pa bajugs nas/ rdong du'i dkyil 'khor 'das
132a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad nyid pa khrug su thugs dan sa // danas su yo la 'khon mchog/ thugs kyi krol 'bar nga ba 'brag/ dkyil la ba rnams nas na su mcha/ logs par rab tu bshad par bya// ba na du// /
132a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje'i cho gas bri bar bya// sngags rnams kyi ni gsang ba mchog/ phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas//
132a3(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang hrI// sgra dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ ga rnams kun du dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgom pa'i// mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnam
132a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sku yi rdo rje can// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig go// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom
132a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi
132a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gdab bo// nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas//
132a7(rnying rgyud): rje'i gsung gi yon tan bskyed// rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos// rig pa'i dbang po dbab par bya// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// kun du zlum po bri bar bya// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga brtson pas bri bar bya// tshe dpag mod kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su
132b1(rnying rgyud): dgang par bya// rdo rje'i gnas ni nyams dga' nyid// de dgra thams cad yongs su dgod// yangs su gsal bar chog yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsung ba'i mchod ngapa b+ha// de ltas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// bshang gas bu ba 'od
132b2(rnying rgyud): gis// mchid na dngos gru thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' bka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdorje'i dkyi la 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas
132b3(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi bkod pa rdo rje zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje 'di namachog gang yin pa'i// gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas
132b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang grags rdo rnga'i gnas shes pa'i gas de rkyen ba tu gsang pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyug na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor rnams cud 'khor la 'byung ba/
132b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'idadi nyid kyi lcags dathugs rdo rje las byung ngo // de la 'di rdo rje'i dkyil lakhur gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gi yi ge'i gnas rnams te/ oM hrIH hU~M/ rdo rje'i jig
132b6(rnying rgyud): rig das pa dang // tshan ci rnams kyang nga kyi dag/ sngags kyi sems pas maHste// b+has na byang chub byed par dka'// de bas ma tshig rdul shes pas// sngags kyi spyan mas bcug nas su// b+hi nugs pa rdabs pa'i gnas bsgom su la// yul 'khar rnams rnarnam par
132b7(rnying rgyud): btak+ta/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzang dang // spyan ma yang ni gzhug par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong // rdo rje'i sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal ba che// rang gi tshesems dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// ma
133a1(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i gsang ban// rdornasams dpa rgya dzim// mAm kA yang dbab par bya// 'dod pags rnams tham cang // mag yang byung gsang rtsonano// deltar byas pas sbyang du dang // med la dbang ba rnams byan
133a2(rnying rgyud): dgyes par blar pa rnams// gsung bdag gi mchog kyang rnaMm// 'di nang byang gas pas// rtags thub pa yis rnyed de// dadags pa rmang byung \u0f7f// zhi ba'i rnas pa las sa sa rnas// sa cad 'grag nas mdzad par bya/
133a3(rnying rgyud): gsung dag she/ gas du smra bslang pa/ kyi/ 'a da/ sa bas pa nyid payang // rlung byung tshan pa phyir mang dun// bshang gag
133a4(rnying rgyud): 'gram ga// sems las byung ba'i na du// ba dag gis kyigs rnams can// mas pa nga byung ba ngan sashAd mchags na min ta// sangs rgyas byung chu rdzogs byed pan// jig gdapa pa la chog 'di// nga shing gang rtsa stong pan
133a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang ma nga rab bsgoms nas// rje sems dpa' ba brnaMpa// yang dngo bdu cing grags/ 'i ma tha~Md// sangs rgyas sbyin gyis ngas pa na // las kyi 'a pa rnam par bya// sangs rgyas rtsal chen pa mdzan/
133a6(rnying rgyud): da la ga/ 'di ni sang sa rgyas rnams cang // gas ba cad tu gakya gzhes/ rkyen gyi ga sung rnam par bya// 'dini 'dus zas rnam sa // sa ma n-i// ga rnamam thams
133a7(rnying rgyud): ga la nga gros pa bya// mgag sgrag sung rdzogs bcwa/ gangasas su pa rgya pa sa stegasuzus rdzun/ ma byed gsus ni skyes sa sri chud pa/ tshigs kyi mang
133b1(rnying rgyud): bum pa rnams dgod pa// sngags rgyud bdag pos shes byas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun 'bras 'dod pa yi// sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs// bsreg rdzas
133b2(rnying rgyud): dag ni dngul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyong bas// bcwa rtsa brgyad ni sbyin sreg tu/
133b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dmachog shin tu 'ad 'a dka' ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// slob mardo rje gsum las byung // k+Sha lig lus dang ngag semasu la// bsgoms nas rdo rje 'dzin par byed// rtsal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dgas chen/
133b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku gsung thugs kyi mchog tu// byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu stsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por ga/ drug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go// AHb+hi b+hI ra hU~M/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi snying po'i sngags kyi rtsal
133b5(rnying rgyud): po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang chen no// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis// sil snyan dri yi smin tshogs bsgom// 'di skad kyang gsungs so/
133b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gru gsum sngags kyis ni// yungs kar brtul zhugs can gyis brdeg/ de la de yi tshe na ni// rang nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas bsgom// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar
133b7(rnying rgyud): mdzes pas bsgom par bya// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad pasas// rtag tu slob ma blo brtan pa// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje chen// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bsgyur ba thams cad kyigasang chen te// slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i chog tu/
134a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ / ma pas sa pa// rdzu sus // su su mas gyu ba na// pa sa du da /
134a2(rnying rgyud): mas sargyas pa// rjod 'ang byung bral ba bsgrin// bdag kyang bcwa skal pa'i phyir// rnam mapa'i rje dang bdag rgyu// deca la ba bam+WA // rab dag sems kyi d+hIn pang bya// rgya mig myong bsan// gang bdag pa gdag
134a3(rnying rgyud): ma na mnan ya na // kyisags sa / gags ga / gas /

134a5(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi sbyin pa rgya// drug sa kyi rdul po'i 'ad de// gsang ni sbyin pa brtsam pa bya// klu 'am yang na bsha pa rdzu// myongan ba sag sanas tshig pa'ipa nib gdugaH// / rnam pa

134b1(rnying rgyud): ma na sa ga kyi ga pa sa nan pas nas da/ sa hA// ngas mas dpa bab // mthan can pa ba pa dang // sangs cas nam byung byung // byu bas
134b2(rnying rgyud): stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / rdorje 'thugs pa mdzag dag ni// rdorje sku yi bka' ji bzhin// cil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'brug// ba shring gcingad nga ni sha chen rnams// tshe ni mnyam par byas nas s+ya// kham phor sbyang mar bzhag nas ni// sangs rgyas kun rje
134b3(rnying rgyud): cig 'dzi// 'di da kyis kying gsus pa// de la 'di na gang thams cad kyi rnam/ thug pa ra bcu rdza ba pa'i dam chog gi mchog go// smig 'bri ba rjong bdang ba// rnam ma par rje'i rgyas pa rnas pasam// sa sa r+b+bas kun gyis rnams
134b4(rnying rgyud): ga nga rnam pa sa// de'i drugasang drug pa ci gnas// de sngags ni pa ba pa // dal 'di skyed d+ha gsung dang blag+sa kyi kla rdo rje'i byin gyis rlob pa'i gnasas// hU~M/ phyagano rjegadags rten // gnas
134b5(rnying rgyud): gan kyis gzugs kyi rne ga/ rkyen sa sags pa'i gnas gnag // de la 'din gsang ba'i gnas // kyil khor dgras gnas pade// mi bstod pa ni ba ba te/ dpag med pa'i 'tsha lol// dzam
134b6(rnying rgyud): di she// rnamasacad dzin ga patha ni/ na po b+h+ring blos bskul bar bya// sbyi rnams ca ni po phru 'o// ma du na pa 'ong ste/ thugs gyu rdzogs sa ga rnam pa kyis/ 'di cig bsgralan// sa sa kyi
134b7(rnying rgyud): kyang gi ma// mas dga' ba de'i dang dang // rjemi rnam pa snga tshogs su// myid na rdzogs mas// nges pangasangs rgyas nyid rdzob tshur// de rab sum thun drug sa// rdul lan skye ma ma mo// 'am
135a1(rnying rgyud): dang da ngas surgya rgyudags nas surgyas thams chu sa// sbyangs na na du 'thob gyun// tha ma thos na a 'thung da // su ma rnam sa yang ba ra 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das chad/
135a2(rnying rgyud): bshad ma chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal te// de la 'don mngag gzug pa thams cad kyugasang brdo rjegs chen no// rdo rje sems dpa' yo shes che// de bzhin gsung ga rdo rje 'dzid// rdo bla yi dgad pa rjes// maungag gzug pa rnams rtag tu phrul
135a3(rnying rgyud): dal 'din legs 'khang la gas kyi mag gi gnas rngam pa pa te/ dmachag skal ba dang / dmajug gto da/ dam dzag dod pa dang / sa ga thong ba'o// ca dag parda/ rnams rnams sa ma sa nga
135a4(rnying rgyud): 'i tshul gyis dzin// zang zung gzugs can byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sangs nas thams cad kyi zla gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos degad ces dka'aphrul to// sangs rgyas rdo rjesems dpa'ang rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// mcho
135a5(rnying rgyud): de na pakyi/ sa po stsal na/ ba bri de mo// dmapa' 'dod du rum gnas pas// madre bya'i ngos myong bam mi na du/ dang snang chu ba shes pas// ngabargya
135a6(rnying rgyud): rtsal bar bsgos pas// skyes pa'i po dgrags ci kyis/ bsrum btud dade'i bad du// gas ba'i skal ba dag gi / parnams dran pa 'i nga bya rnam gsung

135b3(rnying rgyud): 'das yid bzhin gyi nor zas de skad ces bka' bral te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje gsung las phyung ngo // hrI/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangasargya

135b5(rnying rgyud): rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting dzin to// dngos bcom ldan 'dad rdo rje'i dbyung kun nas nges par bsreg pa darje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas chen po rdo rnam pa'i chog 'dinyid kyi dru gsung thugs du las byung // da pa 'a sa nyid dri'i skye
135b6(rnying rgyud): ngaM/ nyi pa'i kyil 'khod dam pa bsam// cho ga dag gis sa sa rgyun smin// do dag snam mjug zlas sa chen ni// sras dang dag dang sems la dpa'// skul byed rdo rje ma pasgom ma// thun rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mong rab ta ga ma/

138a3(rnying rgyud): kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje su la rab tu gnas// sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te// mchog tu rtag pa'i dam tshig go// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nyan thos kyi bslab
138a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje lus phyung ngo // dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam// byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig de ni rmad byung che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
138a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gti mug lam gyis las gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
138a6(rnying rgyud): pos drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khams gsum par ni gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las drung kun// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag rnga rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
138a7(rnying rgyud): pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi mu gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can skyes pa'i snyed pa// su gsum dbyer med la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang // bsam gtan rdo rjes gsar par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
138b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pasadung gsum gyur mchog ga rdo byed kyi/ sku gsung thugs rdorje las byung // sgra jo mangs par 'gyur/ gagang gdod dbangar byug na// sngags kyartul brjon 'angan// tang khya ba 'drab rngu 'dul du// denas rgyan 'dra na
138b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas gnod sbyin pa thams cad kya dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo ro// sha dang khrag ni zab dang // rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod// dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya/
138b3(rnying rgyud): gan rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos klu'i dbang po'i rgyal mo thams cad kyi dmatshig 'di nyid kyi skug sung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma cano// de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad// ram chog 'di rnams kyis bsgrub bya// gzhan du
138b4(rnying rgyud): nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khro zhing nga rgyal khur gyis non// spos dang me tog spyod la dgyes// de mchog rdo rjes 'og
138b5(rnying rgyud): gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed de// de nas gyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // thod dus bdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag gis rab tu dga' bar nyakrung // 'thung po bran gyi dam
138b6(rnying rgyud): tshig 'di// dgra byed rdo rje don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gyung ngo // bshang ba gtse ba khrag bza' zhing // chang la sogs pa rtag tu btud//
138b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor bas// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsang bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas// dam tshig ma lus myad par bya// khams gsum pa thams cad gyi rdo rje'i dmatshig
139a1(rnying rgyud): // gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rdo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig rdo nyid kyi sdug sung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje yang dag 'byung
139a2(rnying rgyud): bya// sems can khams ni rnam kun du// rtag tu sangs rgyas su byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ngag gi dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngag gi las lam ma lus par// khams
139a3(rnying rgyud): gsum dri med dkyil 'khor du// tshig gi dngos byab yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'di'i dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sems rnam par dag pa'i ram tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo //
139a4(rnying rgyud): yid spyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// brtan pa rdo rje'i blo yis bsgom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
139a5(rnying rgyud): bdag pos sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal tan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// phyag 'tshal na ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo de bzhin gshegs
139a6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dmachog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bisam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas//
139a7(rnying rgyud): sa pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag rdo rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags rdo thams cad kyi sdom pa nyid kyi thug sung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can lams rnams bsdus nas ni// bsam gtan ngongs bsku bar bya// rdo rje gsum
139b1(rnying rgyud): gyis phyag 'tshal mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje 'byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bsnyen pa dang / bsgrub pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang srub pa chen po'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje bshang gcis nam mkha'i
139b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje thams cad mi snang ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
139b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi po ni gang zhig mchog/ rdo rje mo ni nyin de spyad// slar yang rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ rdo rje rdzogs byed dam tshig go// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gyur ro//
139b4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// dbu sbyin gyi ni bsam gtan bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dmachog kun// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags nga chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid
139b5(rnying rgyud): kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // kha zas la ni sku'i rdo rje// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mdo 'don cho ga'i bya ba'o// rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
139b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cing mi gsung byar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phreng ba dang mnyam pa'i byang
139b7(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
140a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' la mang gyi dpel 'khor byed kyang migs par brnyags pa dus/ ngas sus bya sa ga gags pa sa rgya rgyas sa par dadag pa sa / thang ban gshegs pacwa /
140a2(rnying rgyud): da kyi b+hag zung thugs kyi bdag po 'di ma dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje dbo migs su med pa'i phyi ge'i tshig la gang bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas kyang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// rigs kyi bye ba'i gshegs pa thams pa rje la/
140a3(rnying rgyud): di ste du mas par gyur te/ shA mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gaspyang dang rtags cang sa khyod ti byed// dpal pa lkog tus byung // log par bzung ba med pa yin/ de nas byang ma dpal la sogs pa rgyang chu sems dpa' sems dba' byung po dmas kyis pa'i
140a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'dri ska pes gsol to// bcoMm lda na 'dus de bzhi ga shegs pa thams cad gsung rje tshig lo log pa dran 'byung bas mi brtag tu gsopa// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dgyes kyi pa nyid stong pa
140a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa dang byin pa ning bzhi ga shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa 'di yin no// de ci'i spyang du zhe na/ tshangs pa la migs pa'i byang chu chen pa sems dpa' badzin par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rlob pa rna mchos thams cad kyim khye po ba ma shes pas 'di d+has
140a6(rnying rgyud): du yongs su rtog par byed do/ rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'di ba'i nA gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi ring khon ting mngon par mamakhyen das gsang ba'i yi ge 'chang dang snyam pa yang mArnaMs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa rnams cad bye byung /
140a7(rnying rgyud): chub bsas dpang didag pa da sa pang dul s+ho/ gas ca pamams dpa' che dngas nga/ ba gshegs pa thams par phya gdung gas mig sa pa lagadang bad kyis par drug sa thungs pa kyang byu thogs pa// dkyi
140b1(rnying rgyud): phyi zhe na/ ngo ba tad med pa/ mi 'gyur ba las byung ba/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so// rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji skyed yod par dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje // /
140b2(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ yod ye sems can 'di dag ni sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid nye bar bzung nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da /
140b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang bzhin dge cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje yang dag byung // d+h+rU byas bya yang ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'a
140b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub gang nas yang dag par 'byung / gang du gnas gang du med par
140b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud la rdo rje rab tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
140b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag kyang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thams cad gang na gnas/ ye shes rdo/
140b7(rnying rgyud): rje'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos gru ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
141a1(rnying rgyud): 'das rnamam kha' gang nA gnas// phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ gangan pang ma yin no// nga nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshung du byung / rlung dbyung bar gyur nas dbyangs 'ang dag brjod do// e
141a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje e rdo rje// e ma'o rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru sku ni rnam sgom pa// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum mchog dbang /
141a3(rnying rgyud): phyug gis// dngos grub dag ni thams cad kyi// rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa gsungs// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par d+ha// sku pi rdo rje rab bsgoms nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom/
141a4(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum sku gsum yang dag byung // rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnam par bsgom pa
141a5(rnying rgyud): ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi gyur// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che// mnyes par byed pa rnam par bsam// rdo rjes gsum gyis mtshan pa// klu mchog des ni mnyes par
141a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gang zhig la la 'di sgom pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni 'od chen po// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nag na rdo rje de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi bri ga pos sku gsung
141a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phur ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thab// de nas phyag 'ardo rjed bzhin gshegs pa
141b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos yang sgrub po thams cad snga lus dang ngag dang sems byegs chen b+h+ri kyi stug snang drugs ngorje las phyung ngo // gal tu byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags rnams btu dam chog 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyang mi'anga'o// de nas/
141b2(rnying rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshi ga nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bshang ga ni khu ba khrag rnams ni// smad pa nyid du yong mi bya// tshe ga bzhin du rtag tu bzang // gsang ba'i rdo rje gsum gyur yin/
141b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phung ngo // khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin du phur// gsung gi rdo
141b4(rnying rgyud): spyad do// de nas par phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdug pos thugs kyi rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi skye gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo skya gsum pa gnas pa'i// dmachog ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dmachog gis// mgu bya gas
141b5(rnying rgyud): da/ bcom thang 'das rje rje gsum gyi mchog chen po de da cis b+haka byos to// de nas pang theg rjo pazhi gshegs pa papas cad kyibang ga sa dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad migs ba'i kyi skyeg gapas rdzolas gyur// nang
141b6(rnying rgyud): po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched rnams nyid ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khams gsum bsregs pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi su gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung
141b7(rnying rgyud): sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// chu'i khams mA pany+dzi zhes bya// dkar deng sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dem tshig ni// de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang rgyu/
142a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms
142a2(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
142a3(rnying rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang chen gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
142a4(rnying rgyud): cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nyid du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di ni gnyis su med cing
142a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu ji snyed mdor bsdus te bstan pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams bzhugs pa dang 'tsho ba dang skyong ba de rnams thams cad kyang dus gsum du byon nas/ rdo rje slob dpon de la
142a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnams kyis/ yang dag par mchod nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di skad du yang 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa
142a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi ma'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcun/ ji snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi ru rang gsung
142b1(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji rnyed pa rabs cang / slob dpon gyi baspu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so// dza ci'i snying zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa brgyad du
142b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su gyur pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa da
142b3(rnying rgyud): mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa na zhugs nas/ byang /
142b4(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes yang dag par byung ba de rnams kyang byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon
142b5(rnying rgyud): la mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// ji ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po phyin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub
142b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal
142b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ sdugasupa gsang pa'i sku gsung rngubs rdo rje slob dpon kyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnabs kyis gsol pa/ sa dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ de bde na gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal ba/
143a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu sa
143a2(rnying rgyud): nga sa sa
143a3(rnying rgyud): nga sa sa 'ag spyod de na sa'adi gas
143a4(rnying rgyud): sa / sdug du / sa
143a5(rnying rgyud): na sa na ma pa su
143b1(rnying rgyud): hrI// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam// sgra dang gsung thugs gsum sting ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drug po me sdug kun du thos// ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag sanapa na rngo ga yas/ phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom// snga pa
143b2(rnying rgyud): gzer bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos slang yang rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bza' ba 'am brdung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang za ba// bshang gci shi ya sbyong ba
143b3(rnying rgyud): yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su btag/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skye dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nyer spyod lnga yi mchod mchog
143b4(rnying rgyud): gis// mchod pas de dag mchod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba nyed gyi
143b5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dbang po gnyis kyi skyer ba yis// rang gi khu ba sogs bzung bas// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod bya// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs/
143b6(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad kyi sku ga sung thugs kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sdug sung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sems can lams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig dzin pa mi rnams la// dam tshig gsum kya rdo rjes spyod// sdom pa 'di ni rmang byung che// de nas phyag na rdo rje pazhin
144a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa 'asgom par nyid kyi sdug sung thugs du rdulas phyung // sras da nga nga ga sems pangs spyong rdzogs// gsang bugs ma gnas kyi skyes// bzang po bdag gis bskyab par byed// minan ma
144a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag rdo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mtho gang tsam gyis dpags par ni// mgo bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// oM yi
144a3(rnying rgyud): dbus skya gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par// 'gyur bar 'dir ni the tsho ma med// de bas yang phyag no rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
144a4(rnying rgyud): bdag pos sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdzod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs byam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje mchog gsus phyag me bya// de na
144a5(rnying rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos drug zums cad ngasel ba gnon pa 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM/ 'od zer dkar 'bar phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag/ 'od kyi ser po 'jig
144a6(rnying rgyud): pa yis// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis// sa bon 'di ni gsang gsum byung // de nas sngar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa nyid

145a1(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bkang stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang rjod kyis mi rung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du /
145a2(rnying rgyud): rab dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar se mad dbang 'das nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de du ci'i phyir zhen ba

145b4(rnying rgyud): bdag pa bsgrub tu gsol// man pos gal te de ring bdag ni gsan par mchis brjed na// sems can yab chen mnyes mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shugs kyi btsun mo mA ma kIs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
145b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po rdorje 'chang chen po la rdo rje 'dod pa dgung ba mchod pa'i mchog gi mi ga cho ga 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor po sems can mang por phan// sangs rgyas rnams don byang chub mchog don phan ba rjes ster pa// mgon pos gal te de dang /
145b6(rnying rgyud): bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// chags pas 'dod chagasung ma tshig bdag pa dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas 'jig rten dpung phyug gi brtson mo skra gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin po zhugs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje zung chen po la 'dod btu bar
145b7(rnying rgyud): thongs myod pa dmachog gis pang dag par btong pa/ spyod na nga gdung te rgyapa pan jing thugs bcib// 'jig rten dag ni gos pa'i don mngod pa pa rtag tu rtson/ mnan pogal te ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzheng na// rang ngas 'byong ba bang mya
146a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pa dgyes par mad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skrag sang thugs dam cha ga nga' brtan ma bcom ldan sa bzhin gshags pa thams cad sa bdag brda na chad can po la bad pa dang bang bdab dbyu bang das bad du/ khyod na da
146a2(rnying rgyud): pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs brtse ba// mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag da
146a3(rnying rgyud): rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag pa dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings
146a4(rnying rgyud): 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum yang dag par 'byung ba de rnams rdo rje dpal
146a5(rnying rgyud): gyis yang dag par rig pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to// de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun nas bzang po/ kun du bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi na
146a6(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad pa 'di skad ces bkanga' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong

146b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa mdzang lagasas// dam bcom ldan 'dam dang rten gshegs pa thams cad du bzhinag gagasu pa thams cad bya brta ma \u0f7f gu pas mngan bar byung das bcom ldan 'das ngazhin ga gsus na mnad pa das bsags pa// grang na nga 'a ga

146b3(rnying rgyud): ma pa 'das pa'in gshegs pa thams cang spyad ma gsungs shig/ dang rgya ba dam/ rgyam thams ca nana'am yang tu 'das sa dang 'drang ba pa'i byor gdamang phung bam pan/ mang ba'i rna pam / 'du shes kyi spang ba ma yin/ kyi mang pom pa/
146b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i blang thom pan/ khams pa phyin mdzang sa med/ de bzhi nadung dang chags ma 'i na sdang ma pa ni gti mugs yin/ chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang mayinan// dengs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to// danas bcom ldan
146b5(rnying rgyud): khe me pazhin ga shegs pa rnams cad kyi bdag po phyog nang rdzas nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sams dpang rnams pa bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad dung bzhing gshegs pa thams cang gi lha gsung thug don pasang ba
146b6(rnying rgyud): gas / thugasu badra brnas pa'i na sems dpa' rnams pa chos kyirnams yang dang sgri pa yang ba gyur // dus ldan rdzong bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi ra sa bya da pas/ dbus kyi byed bye
146b7(rnying rgyud): gshenas pathams cad byeng mchog ga nga tu 'dadra shig da pa'in gagasas pa thangs ca kyi kyi thams rgyang kyangangazug ngas bya bcu / rkyong chungs su bangasasas ba sa spyo dun myo nisas bu'i
147a1(rnying rgyud): cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas
147a2(rnying rgyud): shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar
