156b7(rnying rgyud): so/ rgyang phyi ma 'di na gar gyi mkharan po sangs byas gsang ba dang 'brog ming pral rgya yo shas kyis bskur ba'o// slar yang cag dkyi mkhar po Ats+tsha r+ya grad d+ha kar wam+ba dang / klu chen gyi lo dz+ha ba dag spang nan chen bzang pos bsgyur cing nga cos te gtan la phang pa/ slar yang slob/
157a1(rnying rgyud): dpon ye shes zhabs kyis 'grel pa dang bi brda phyi 'gyur bcas gsum la gtugs nas zhu dag bgyis pa yin kyang phyi 'gyur la 'gyur mi bde ba dang / don go dka' ba dang / tshig smyos pa sogs don ltar ma bskur ba yang mang pon ches shing 'brel ba dang nga
157a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis lnga 'gur khon dang khyed snga tsam me 'dug pa yid ches pa'i gnas so// // rdza gang skad du/ shrI ba ra mA dwe n+ya ma ma hA yA na ka wa rA dzA/ bod skad d+ha/ dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i tog pa'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa largya
157a3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig dang / mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che thams cad kyi cod
157a4(rnying rgyud): pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi
157a5(rnying rgyud): ba mdzad de/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa/ dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin
157a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing / bsngags pa/ bstod pa/ nor bu chen po dang / rin po ches sbas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ dar the ba dan dang / me tog gzang ba dang / rnga ma dang / rnga ba dang / drang phreng ba dang / zla bzang gis brtsod pa rnams
157a7(rnying rgyud): kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byad kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la'an rdo rje dang / byang chub
157b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
157b2(rnying rgyud): bo 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bgyid ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po nam mkha'i mchod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
157b3(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang zabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ rngog mar nga
157b4(rnying rgyud): ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge / don bzang / tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dzes pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag
157b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas
157b6(rnying rgyud): deni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na~M/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gajug pa'i 'azing ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas dor/ 'ang
157b7(rnying rgyud): lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas den/ 'di lta ste/ byang chung sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/
158a1(rnying rgyud): 'di dad+ha/ thang chub sems dpa' gnas sa// dgang ba rnam par drug par gnas dang / 'ad tun/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas sa// rbad pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas dam
158a2(rnying rgyud): 'das te/ byang chub sems pa'i gnas so// brtsams pa ma par dag pa gang sma na/ 'a ts+tsha n+te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// can rnam par dag par gnas dan/
158a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// yid chom par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
158a4(rnying rgyud): sras bdab ma par dag par gnas da/ 'di lta lta/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dge pa gnas den/ 'di sa na byang zab sems dpa'i gnas sa// marnam par dag pa'i gnas don/
158a5(rnying rgyud): byang thabs sa pa dbang gnams/ rnam pa dag pa dag bcwag nas da / nA/ hA btus pas pa sa rnam par dag pa dag ma nga// byang chub sams dpa'i gnams
158a6(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad zhing bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas zhes rab kyi pha rol tu rkyen 'ayongs su dag pa'o// badz+ra hU~M/ lag na rdo rjes la las chos thams/
158a7(rnying rgyud): ngadro nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas brdung du/ shes ran kyi bar la brtson pa'i grol 'ad bar ci gtam depa'i dbang gra ba ting pa'abar du shes phyi'i sgribab thams ca rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i slob pa dang / chos kyi slong
158b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / lab kyi srab pa ca mo bsags sapa na tan dumal thu pa sgoms pa nas rnams nub pang zlab nga du dang / ldog pa pa sus chub dudrug bas pa dadab tsa mang ma can pa dad pa nan/
158b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin thog pa dang / mata bye pa dang / tshul bzhin med pa byed pa dam da nyid la chos thams cad kyi la nyam pa byed rdorje tid da 'dzin thob pas/ chos thabs tshod la dang ga tu blang nga/ chos rnams dang la dga'
158b3(rnying rgyud): dang / mthab dang / mchog dga' brtsod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu gragis de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dzi parjid 'thob par gyur // den
158b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das las na rdo dzo pazhin gshegs pa thams can gyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdorje byings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog/ khams shesum po mtha' dag ni 'jig rten gsum pa ma lus
158b5(rnying rgyud): pa las rnam par thal te/ sems can gyi khams pa lub shing sa pa med pa/ 'dul bar byud pa/ don thams cad 'thub ba/ lagang+gA ji shu'abs thams nga / de bcog chen pa pra/ rdo rdzogs bas
158b6(rnying rgyud): byabyams gastsoganas par/ pa dang gyi rgyal basbyin pa tshul gyi ma da sto / bzhin bcang nga ga du babab bzhin da bcings/ byas 'don rab sa dang dran 'a ga ba da par bral gyis 'du /
158b7(rnying rgyud): da ngakya 'babya nga thor tho nyid kyibyang nga spang // denas 'a gsung ba tsas gyis dpanan gshegs pa bas byang badzin pa dang mabras brte gyi 'ams thams pa dpa'aphas gsas
159a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad nas rjes su mnyes pa brtan pos mnyes par byas te bkug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chan par bcug ste/ dam tshig gas bcangs nas dbang du byas/
159a2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
159a3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba/ dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi rkyen gyis
159a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// de nyid dang po dam tshig che// rdo rje byin brlabs zhes bya'o// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi
159a5(rnying rgyud): dang // khams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba// te babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khregs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor lo nA ga rnams dang // sgo khyad kyi ni mtshams rnams sra// zla babyed la rab gnas
159a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes// rtse mo lnga tshogs pa dan ni// dril ze mchog btags rlung gis bstod// me tog rgyun 'byung mo long sbas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor za ba \u0f7f// de yi nang dra 'khor pon// dkyil 'khor bcang
159a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa sa// ma thig gas theg btab le// rdo rje 'khar ma zhes kyar bzhid// da yi dbus pa ci dgas par// sangs rgyab ni gzhag tu ste// 'dzum bcas thapa mdog can pa// rdo rje ba sems pa 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo grang sogs kyis
159b1(rnying rgyud): shing // rnatshogs 'barab dakhregs pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par na// lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o// rang gi snying po kun bzlas te// de tso kyil 'khor brtag par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// stong po nyid kyis
159b2(rnying rgyud): yang dag dgod// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus// gzhag gam yang na 'ang bya// tshogs rnams kun du ston pa'o// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can// rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar bcon/
159b3(rnying rgyud): dmar skya dag ni nges par dgod// sangs rgyas kyin g.yas logs su// rdo rje kI laM kI la ni// yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa// rdo rje'i gzugs can nyi ma'i 'od// rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni// chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs// rdo rgya'i mdog can ci rigs par/
159b4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// g.yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni// bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa// bco ma'i gser dang 'dra bar dgod// sangs rgyas kyo na mtshams rnams su// me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing // thal mo spyi bor legs
159b5(rnying rgyud): 'jog pa'i// mchod pa chen po gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// lha mo'i tshogs rnams dgod par bya// sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du// gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brkyang ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri
159b6(rnying rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor// gyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams sa// 'dod pa'i dbang phrag bri b+ha ste// mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// 'dod pa'i tshangs bzhi byed mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'jug pa la
159b7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i cogabyas pa 'byung ste/ de la dang po nyid du kyi med bshad pa'i cho ga 'di sathugs pa'i grobang pon na/ rdo rje mamatho slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam chog thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams cad dag pa dang / las thams cad smra
160a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mchod pa thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
160a2(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas 'thud par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad kyi las la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / byin gyis brlab
160a3(rnying rgyud): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ma bslabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// mdor de smras na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
160a4(rnying rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcings la dbang du byas te/ rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug cing bsrubs na grub par
160a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te snying po lan cig brjod nas dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag byas nas gos dmar po con la/ me tog gi ther
160a6(rnying rgyud): pa thogs te gdong dris byugs pa dang rdo rje thal mos rdo rje gar byed cing bskor pas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas kyang yang rnam par sgeg pa dang skor bas gdud cing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas
160a7(rnying rgyud): bltas te de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid la dgyes pas mthong ba sgrol bar 'gyur zhing sprin ma bskyod la sgra thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro// 'od zer gyi rang
160b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi zhal lam/ sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba rtsol ba 'am dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'job
160b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang / maM sod par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rlab par mdzad do// de/
160b3(rnying rgyud): nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur zhing / dpang po'i rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying po bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas/ rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub
160b4(rnying rgyud): mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bsrung ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// de nas
160b5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshogs bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba bsgrub pa lan cig bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya
160b6(rnying rgyud): bcings la 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang / bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste shes nas phyag rgya
160b7(rnying rgyud): chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nis de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob ma la cho ga chas pa 'di bzhin du byas te/
161a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig lams pa de rnams la yang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub
161a2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ci ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang / ro bcud dang gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la ci
161a3(rnying rgyud): lhur shes pa'i gar dang glu dang dgod pa dang bu dang bu ma dang mdza' ba shes dang nye du dang gnyan mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o// de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam
161a4(rnying rgyud): gu 'di dang / 'dod ba'i byasas pa yongs su rdzabyas par byeng pa'i dzirje snang pas de na chos kyi mam pa da kyi phyag rgya margyas bta pa'i nA 'i phyi nga// dkyil 'khor can pa'o// de nas tshig byung ste/ zla ba tanas parnams nas byag rdo rje spyan sngar rang gyi dgi nga
161a5(rnying rgyud): de'i phyag rgya bcings la ci ltar skyo bar mgyur bar dang po byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje'i chogagis brjod cing ci srid zla ba gcig gi b.rang srid du bzlas brdad byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyurar// de nas brtsams te phyag na rdo rje'i bka tso sa ba bzhin du dngas grub
161a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris 'dri ba'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod na/ dang por rdo rje bre ba'i phyag rgyas bris la de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang po brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ci lta ba bzhin
161a7(rnying rgyud): bri zhing / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba tas brtsams te phrag rgya chen po bcis la/ de bzhid du sngon du bstan pa'i tshul ltang bzlas nas zla ba nya'i mtshan mtheg zug tu ci lta ba bzhin du bya bar ma gyur pas phyag rgyam bkrom
161b1(rnying rgyud): par bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'dum zheng zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba sgrol cing / sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan
161b2(rnying rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad bri bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin du bslabs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub
161b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas par bris la/ de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo
161b4(rnying rgyud): gcig pu bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs
161b5(rnying rgyud): pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'obyed pas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so// rdo rje thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba lani
161b6(rnying rgyud): rang gi snying po bzlas pas so// lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so// bdag bsrung ba la ni yungs kar la lan cig bzlas pas so// gzhan bsrung ba la ni rdo rjes bskor bas so// thams cad bslang ba la/
161b7(rnying rgyud): ni yid kyis lan cig go// mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khar thams cad bcing ba la ni blta ba'am yungs kar la sogs pas saM// sems can thams cad rings par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba rAr+the/
162a1(rnying rgyud): rnga ba dmas// gsu pa nathams dngas par thab pa ni ga brgyams nas bzlas pas// rnams kyadags la spyo rnarnal sa/ sa nams nas nga mal ma ldan sa //
162a2(rnying rgyud): cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad zab la ni ljang cing myur bar zlos pas so// sems can thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag ces so// nar thams cad dgug pa la na gser gyis bzlas pas so// nor
162a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad 'bigs pa dang rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mnga'i phyag rgyas so// thams
162a4(rnying rgyud): cad chags par bya ba la na phyogs thams cad sde de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya bra la ni snying brtan por nges par 'chir bas so// ma rungs pa rab tu bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas sa// rgyan thams cad zag pa la ni 'bar bar
162a5(rnying rgyud): bltabs dbrog pas so// thams cad yid tshim pa la no khA tshwar b+h+ri gar bzhag pas so// sran pa blang pa zla ba la ni rdo rje khwa shar du b.lus te bskor bsas// lus bdabar byab la ni rang gi mtshar gyi bkris pas so// gzugs thams cad snang bur bya ba la na rdo rdzag tu
162a6(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas sa// sku thams cad thas par thab la ni rdo rje pa bang gis s+ho// dz+riM thim pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sgra'i dbugs byin pa'i glo yis so// zas dang rlo ma thams cad dang brgyad thams cad thab la ni rdo rjes par bya'o// dbab pa thams cad la na mnyam pa' bral sa
162a7(rnying rgyud): dang se gol dang glu'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas pas so// thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas pas so// thams cad sgrar gzhug pa lan rdo rje margya yis so// thams cad dbas nas lan
162b1(rnying rgyud): skyon pa lan rdo rje 'bebs pas so// gdon thams cad las thar bar thab la ni rdo rje lha gu'i phyag rgyas so// gdan thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni tshogs kyi bdag pa rab tu dgu' ba'i khro bas bzlas pas so// rims thams cad 'din du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i
162b2(rnying rgyud): rims kyi gdon gyis so// rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i ltabs bsal bas so// dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug gi phyag rgyas so// dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chen pos sa// dug thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsis phyag rgyas so//
162b3(rnying rgyud): bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdan thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so// mkha' 'gro ma
162b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so// ma ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa dang / gsang ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phaT gyis/
162b5(rnying rgyud): so// ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug mar bya ba li ni ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bkras brjod 'bum bya'o// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i he ha zhes bya ba'i gang chungs kyis so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhon pa la ni rdo rje la yongs
162b6(rnying rgyud): sru bzlas la 'phang ngo // 'thab pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud sa bya'o// thams cad dgrol ba la ni yi ge mA yis so// ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed
162b7(rnying rgyud): kyis so// lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so// me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyis so// chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so// nam mkha' las zas dang skom dang gos dang rgyan thams cad la sogs pa ma bya
163a1(rnying rgyud): mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod 'brum byar// nam mkha' las sangs rgyas kyi sbrul sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nam mkhar / zhing bzlas pas so// nam mkha' las yi ges 'du
163a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba'i bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bri sa la bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so// pra si na thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra sen thams cad dbab pas so// de
163a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// rna bas thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// snas mnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so// lces dang nyid sla ba la ni kye la bzlas pas so// lus kyis
163a4(rnying rgyud): reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so// yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so// rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi skub skabs pas so// sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgo'i chun po la 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad
163a5(rnying rgyud): g.yog par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad la lan ljon par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzang kyi rdo rjes so// rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so// cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la rdo rje dang nge 'dzims phyag rgyas so// rang gi
163a6(rnying rgyud): lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgya ba'i dngos pa thams cad bstan po la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phral rnam par 'phrul pas so// lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje skor bas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni kwa'i
163a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// gnod sbyin thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje'i bka' ba sgobs so// 'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// ser ba thams cad bzlog pa yin rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgyas so// blos
163b1(rnying rgyud): 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyur can gyi phyag rgyas so// chur dbab pa la ni kwa'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i byin byug bya'o// sbyin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sprin bshig par ni
163b2(rnying rgyud): n+da rnam ma pa'i spyan kyis so// ma med pa'i thugs sa shin tu bsgril ba'i chu tshigs rtag tu byung ba la 'i sri byeg nas sa// gter thams cid shes par bya ba lan snang ba thug par byu // gter thams kyang bad pa la rje 'dzi byas so// gter rnam
163b3(rnying rgyud): la ni rdo rje nor gyis so// rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub sa
163b4(rnying rgyud): la ni byung ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// dam tshig thams cad bskyab pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag nas so// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i lcags kyi'i phyag rgyas so// ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag
163b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bsgrub pa la ni dro rig pa 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// rdo rje thams cad bsgrub pa lan rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog go gyig rgyas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdzosas// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub pa la na/
163b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rtsag chen pos// sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes d+hab rgyas so// drang po chen po rdo rje na yod pa'i dmachog thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'is mchog chen po khon nyid do rje zhes bya brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs sa// rdorje snyams dpa'i/
163b7(rnying rgyud): ga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdeng mdzod kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisazhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ rdo rje sra pa nyid kyi phyir rdorje
164a1(rnying rgyud): mnyam 'i nyid mngangon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na byang chub rten par// don gcig nga sa myor do kyi banyam patang mngan par rdzogs par nga rgyab pa thang brjen pa/ nga pa nyid rnam par dag pa nyid pa chos kyi mnyas pa nyid mngan par rdzogs pa
164a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub pa ni byang chub chen pa'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la chos mngon par bslab pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang klas pa dang /
164a3(rnying rgyud): sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher
164a4(rnying rgyud): ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ aH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad brda
164a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang / sems dpa' cher po brgyad kyi'i dkyil 'kho nga phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang zhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdang de bzhin gshegs pa
164a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'don la snyems par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dong zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khar chen po
164a7(rnying rgyud): tshul du phye'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su thag gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs pad+ma rab tu gnas pa de'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o//
164b1(rnying rgyud): de'i phyogs thams cad dus la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad gzhag gam bri bar bya'o// de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// phyi'i dkyil
164b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' brgyang ci lta ba bzhin bzhag nas/ bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su dgod par bya zhing / byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams te ne'u gsangs dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang /
164b3(rnying rgyud): drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang gser dang rin po che dang / gos la sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'i snang dang / 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra gzugs dgod do// de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
164b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang / mi song
164b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhugs// zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o// sems can kun la
164b6(rnying rgyud): phan phyir dang / bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis// ci bde bar na thams cad kyis// zhes bya'o// de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ci lta bas skal ba ci lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ra// de nas
164b7(rnying rgyud): slob pa ni/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dzum pa dang bcas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o// gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ba'o// de nas de bzhin du sems
165a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' sa ga bsgrub pa dang / dang thabs mas pa dag / gnan pang sas sa ma rnan sa pa pa tsag panas// don na gags sa pa na sa pazhis ca pa na
165a2(rnying rgyud): na sa ma paseM na 'i
165a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ 'di skaste/ de bzhin gzugs pa thams ca dmachod pa ladi/ ci snyed pa'i ba na gshegs pa'i ba ba thams cad bral bas so// sangs na sa nga cing chub sems dpa' thams cangs rjong pa nA/ bang gaphral bams
165a4(rnying rgyud): ga gsus pa 'du ga gas pa nas sa la/ da

165a7(rnying rgyud): bams cad bye pa byi pa ngas gra 'phrul ba rdzogasas da gaganas pa ga gas mangs thams dul 'a ba shegs pashi nga sa rnams byam pa
165b1(rnying rgyud): par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab pa 'di gsungs sa// 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa
165b2(rnying rgyud): med pa nyid kyis ches thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smos pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang le la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang klog pa ngas
165b3(rnying rgyud): des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan sang du skye bar mi 'gyur te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i ngan
165b4(rnying rgyud): cher ston cing / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing sprin ma bteg ste 'bar bar blta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i tshul du gnas pas gnas
165b5(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hU~M/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lgang bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal bar
165b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad la/ bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul ta/ bslang nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs gnyis su phab nas mnan par mdzad do// de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams
165b7(rnying rgyud): cad du sgra chen po bsgrags te/ kye rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su slob par mdzod cig/ bdag cag rnams ma gzir cig/ 'dir khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// dam tshig dang bka' bsgo ba yang bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la btags nas
166a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'a'ang yang rnam par bshig ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang dmachog sa dngul zhing rnam par bshegs pa dang / gdan thams cad kyang bzlag cang // nang thams cad dang rims dang gnod pa dang dug dang dran 'gra rnams dral zhing rnam par bshags papa blon
166a2(rnying rgyud): po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa chen pas 'jigs par byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skabs su ma dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad nas/ de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas/ rdo rje byin chen gyis dbang /
166a3(rnying rgyud): bskrad nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang rjes su stsal nas/ sems can ma lus po'i'adon du phyi'i'o rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu bzhag go// de nas dron khro ba'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog
166a4(rnying rgyud): dang mtshon cha rnam pa snga tshogs bsdams pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ tshams kyis smos gnon pa smin ma mi bzad cing khrog nyer bsgrer ba// spyan dang dbu skra dang a ga tsem 'bar bzhil 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang lpags kyi dang zhags pa dang mchod ma
166a5(rnying rgyud): mda' drang dbyig pa ri la gri dang 'adz+ra ga dang bri ring dang tu gre phyag na bstims pa/ zlab cher ba d+ha mdzang las byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rje'i dang po'i dpal 'bur gyi tshul gyis bzhugs sa// lha la sogs pa de rnams ca dang ga dam par bas byen kyis par
166a6(rnying rgyud): phyi'i dkyil 'khar du bzhag go// gdan la sags pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi gyi rim na gnams// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thug/ rje chen po 'thabs kyi zla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs par zhugs nas// khams gsu la
166a7(rnying rgyud): ngag las rnam par thal ba 'byed kyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor byen pa 'dig sung // dadres pa dag pa shang bya'o// nganga'i dbyel la bar ngam broste// sems gsu nam par rtsela'am bya// 'dral bamed pa 'du babyed pa// de yang ba da po
166b1(rnying rgyud): yis// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo na// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su khro ba che// phyag na rdo rje gzhag par// sangs rgyas phrang la sogs pas sbas// ut+pal sngon por mdog 'dra ba// zhal na cung zad ma
166b2(rnying rgyud): ba gtsigs// khro bcas bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba// g.yon brkyang ba yis legs bzhugs pa// rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsdus pas so// g.yon gyi zhabs kyis legs gnon pa// de yi bya ba dbang phyug che// g.yas ni dka' thub thog ma yi// nu ma'i steng du rang tu 'jog
166b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyis// khro bo kun du gzhag par bya// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'odang ldan pa'i// 'khor lo de yang mkhas pa yis// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bre// phyi yid kyil 'khor gnas rnams
166b4(rnying rgyud): su// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams su// khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi po ni// gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // 'khor lo de bzhin rtse gsum bsgreng // sgo rnams kun du bri bar bya// phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi// sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang // par na
166b5(rnying rgyud): sngon po dril btags shing // rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// de nas 'dir 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i rigs kyi slob dpon du
166b6(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas brtsams te sdig pa la sogs pa rnam par grol zhing / mi sod pa dang mi tshugs pa dang mu stegs thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dod// zhus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma de bzhin du
166b7(rnying rgyud): bcug pa bring po byin te dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnon po ce bzhi pa 'bar babyin pa rdo rje ming gi dbang bslar bas dbang bsgyur nas rdo rje'i btang zhugs sbyin par byi ste/ 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje ste// ma rungs thams cad 'dral du
167a1(rnying rgyud): la// khyod kyis pa ni nagatu nga // de nas de bzhi du byung bar bya'o// rdo rje'i til 'arjod do// dngas rgyab pa la naras bcom lda 'angs za ba dbang phyug nasal/ rarje'i dkyil 'du rdzogs thang mal su pa 'ar babs
167a2(rnying rgyud): cang bya'o// phyogs thams cad du na lha la songs pa dang ma mon ma pa bar byaste/ dr-i nas brngub pa ma po la yang de bzhin te/ de bzhin dri dngos thab mchog rnams me ni ngas la bcom ldan 'angs kyi lta ba bzhin du bya nas/ de'i mdun dul ba par tis kyis kyag
167a3(rnying rgyud): brjings te bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// de nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang / de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dgrag pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
167a4(rnying rgyud): bcing ba dang / dgrol ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / lpags par bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid med par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gsang pa dang / gso bar bya ba la sogs pa yang yan cig
167a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad gsang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo mthur byed kyis so// thams cad rgyas gang ba pa la ni bo'i lta ba'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas gzhig par bya'o// thams cad nges par gnod pa la na rdo rje dang khros pas
167a6(rnying rgyud): gas der brdeg par bya'o// nang thams cad dbug bral ni rdo rje phra mo 'bregs byed kyis so// thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis 'byung bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad tshar gcad pa la ni khros pas rdo rje 'asho bar bya'o// gsung gzhod pa dgos pa la mi
167a7(rnying rgyud): sa pas lhags phyi'i byin sreg gis so// bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gis sngon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gnod sbyin thams cad baspang ba la ni ha he zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so// klu thams cad gdon pa na rdo rjes la brdebs zhing 'azlas pas so// lha thams car lung ba
167b1(rnying rgyud): bya ba la ni lha mo rdo rje ltung byed kyis so// lha'i bdag po thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / bsnun pa dang / gsod pa dang / gdul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so// rnam thos smras rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rdum thos sras mdzan
167b2(rnying rgyud): nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog par bya ba la ni rdo rje skyes bus so// 'dong pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so// khyab 'dun
167b3(rnying rgyud): gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so// dbang phyug chen po gdul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje tri shUl dral bas so// ma mo thams cad gsang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang dam tshig dang chos dang gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam
167b4(rnying rgyud): par gtor zhing rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so// ri dang shing dang khyim dang gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer dang mchod rten dang lha'i khang pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med dang glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa la
167b5(rnying rgyud): ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas mig la reg pas so// ltung ba thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo bslang bas so// thams cad spro ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so// thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang dbrog pas so// 'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje
167b6(rnying rgyud): po'i ltabs so// dpyang thams cad gsang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang gnon pa dang rmongs par bya ba dang long bar bya ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang gseng pa la ni rdo rje khro bo ma rungs pa'i srin mos so// rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po
167b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsang ba la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gis sbyin sreg byas pas so// lha thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab pas so// lha'i bdag po thams cad bsreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brtan gyi lam shing gis
168a1(rnying rgyud): !// radug zug sa gyun smras lanas cang par byab pa sa thosas dog zug sa sa// khams gsum thams cad gsad pa la da 'dags pa'i byuganasas// 'jig na gsum po mas cang sa rnam pa rgyal ba la de /
168a2(rnying rgyud): rten gdus las rnam pang rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdernga thobos so// khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / dbang du rgya ba dang / nges par btsun pa la ni sems dpa slo ba'i byag rgyas so// bsas gabus po thams cad rjes su chags dang bya
168a3(rnying rgyud): buM dang theg pa dang ga zhus padang brjing ba dang rgyus sna pa pa dang dbang du byub dang banon par byu dang bsgrub pa la ni bde chen po dzi na 'dima'i gags khro bas sa// bde ba chen po rdo don med pa'i dmachog gi rtog pa'i rgyal po che po las bzlas gsum rngam par rgyal
168a4(rnying rgyud): rje ma gces zla ba tig pa'i rgyal po chen gyi phyogs // 'jig rten gam rgyas rtog pa'o// / na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa do ba nyid dag pa tsho shi thub ngas yang ches thams ca kyi gam pa nyid spyarangs gzigs pabartag gi sashed kyi
168a5(rnying rgyud): skyeg kyi sa bya ba shes ra kyi sa khyen po tshul 'dregasangs te/ 'dod chags bams pa nam byar dag pazhi kyis gang jig rten men mas rnam par dag par g+sa // rjem mas cad rnam pa dag panyid kyis kyi ga rte rje rdzog pa rnam sa
168a6(rnying rgyud): ma par dag pa du 'jig ldan khan mas rnyi pa pa dag par shes pa thas sa pa dgapas ga rji N+DI na pa myi tsu pa da do// nga'i sa
168a7(rnying rgyud): nyi pa nga rtsor pa dang theg pa dang ba pa nga tsag sa dang tharnams kyi dang 'dug kyang brig thapas rgyags kyishes pa rnam pa ji marnams pa 'i byeb mangs pasas kyis des pa ba 'o// byeng du ba me po pang dag pa rdzogs pa cang dror rtsi bang dang
168b1(rnying rgyud): gas par 'cha na par yang 'byung // de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phug don gyi gnas 'di nying yang tha mar mun cing bzhir rab tu 'jam sul te/ byad+hA'i 'a ba ma kha 'byed bas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mi sa
168b2(rnying rgyud): gas pa la blta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi par bad+ma gzugs tshogs shes bya ba'i snying po 'di ga sbyangs po// hrI/ de ni 'di gsungs gcom gyis pa rkyen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa la so gus pa'i gzugs parnyan thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang 'a
168b3(rnying rgyud): bdus pan nu pa'i gzugs pa rangs par byung das bcoM Sh+Tha dang me smad ngas gags dbang thug gi rim pa dang po'i du la 'khong sa drug dru bkrugs par lda // / de rnas pa / sa 'das sru ngas gA'i gas dbang phyug ces thams pa laga'adas pa'i sems ca nga
168b4(rnying rgyud): ma
168b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor brgyang pa'i tshul du thig palas thag btab pa la tshe dadapar pos pad+ma 'dabu rtswa brgyad pa zla bar bye'o// deny-i dbus su bcwo ma ldan 'das dgod par byung // de'i mdun rgya com ldan 'das pad+ma chen po rgyags pa skyem dag dbyur po 'i gzugs 'a
168b6(rnying rgyud): chen po dang mdu' dang gra bas sbyin pa/ gangs su bcom ldan dngas pade cher po'i gtum po'i dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dod dbye gzhag par bya'o// rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'don du sgra ma ga nag po gzhag par bya // bam
168b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma chen po'i mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzi rab sde mdog dkar po gzhag par bya'o// g.yas kyi mtshams su pad+mo chen pos 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams gnyis par bad+ma chen po rgyamatsho mu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//
169a1(rnying rgyud): par padra chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o// bzhi par pad+ma chen po drung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams pra shrI d+d+hi grI d+d+hi lha mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshun ma
169a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste 'di lta ste bud med kyi gzugs dang sbrul gyi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / pad+ma'i gzugs zhes bya'o// de
169a3(rnying rgyud): nas gos dkar po bgos te gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la/ pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas pa bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste gang du babs pa de ngos bsgrub par bya'o// de nas pad+ma blangs la pad+ma'i ming gis dbang bsgyur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad
169a4(rnying rgyud): ces brjod par bya zhing / pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta bar bya ste/ ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos te// 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni// blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang //
169a5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pan las rnam grol nus// gyur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang lhag nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so//
169a6(rnying rgyud): nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang bkra shis shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes
169a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// thams cad gsang ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro
169b1(rnying rgyud): po phyag nas pa// byams ca rmongs par byab la ni d+hAn+dan po lagagis sa// don mongs pa thams da u pa dag par bya ba lani pa rnyan na po rnam pa gshegs pa'i da 'don gyi gnas so// sarnams dug nga bab langs pa da
169b2(rnying rgyud): blang bcas pas banas brjod 'bras byes nas mthar mtshan mo thog phrag bzlas padzang byu// rnathams cad bab pa yi ni b+ha bris nas de'i sted 'du bzlas brjod 'tham bya'o// thams pang snang bar bya ba sa ni mun par ma cher po'i 'o sa so// rlung thams dang pas
169b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gzug pa dang / bcing ba dang bang du bya ba la ni/ ngad chen po rlung gi mchog gis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje na yod pa'i dmatshig gi rtag pa'i chal po chen po las/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dma'i ga ces tha pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po che
169b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kham sa gsam bams cad kyi dbang pos yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bsgyur ba las byung ba/ ye shes kyi snying po zhes thub shes rab kyi rol
169b5(rnying rgyud): turkyen pa tshul 'ang ba da da / dbang bsgyur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsus thams cad kyi tshul sridang thob par 'gyur ro// nod sbyin pa ni ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni rjes thams ca kyi matag ba tu thob par 'gyu ro// gad ring snying /
169b6(rnying rgyud): seMs pa ga dang / mas dI ba ba sanang rdzob pa gyur ro// de ras byang chub se ma snad pa'i sem snang ba chen po nyim ma la'i steng po bzhin tu dzus pa dang badz+ras te/ rang gi mag la rdo rje rin po zes dbang bskang ba'i phreng ba 'dzing zhing den yod pa 'di ga
169b7(rnying rgyud): dpa'i byung ba ma sa bye pa mag pa man byes nga po 'di // / de das 'jigasus pa kyis pa ma ldan 'das kyi na tho mas tham ya bang rdzur ba la sebs pa gyi dang gte mas byung / ri mtha pa nga
170a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa sun / sa smra smra lanas sa sa rgyu
170a2(rnying rgyud): ma cang byo 'ardzogs par byud pa/ pa'i ma du chog sa zlab pa 'thob sa sa/ khyi dkyil la ba'i da 'i kyil pa pa ngamagan pa ba ci lang na pa
170a3(rnying rgyud): lam/ rin pa ci'i lcagasas bangs du bsong pa na pa ca'i ba dang kyigad/ metog gi rdong ba dang ba na dang gdugs dang rnal ba gyi bang mangs pa'i spyo// de da sasu skye skyeng sa sa pa ngas pa bang 'di ba'i bya ba da
170a4(rnying rgyud): pAr mdzad cing zhal rnam par bzhad pa margad sa mdog can gzhug par bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ba'i rin po tshonas thab rdo rje rin po che cing pani 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yas du rin po chem dz+dza
170a5(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa dbyig gi gtir 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// rgyab tu chos chen po'i rin po rje'i glegs pa ma 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du rin po rgya chen por skyong bzlas dang snyom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mams rnams su 'tshong shing lha mo rnams rin po rgya/
170a6(rnying rgyud): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rnga dang srog shing rnams 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol gyi mtshabs su bum pa gang ba rnams so// sgo rnams su ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol du ni gdug sa dang dz+wa la patshar dring ba den dang tu rnam
170a7(rnying rgyud): gyis kun du khyab par byo'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rje chen gyi phyag rngu 'dzin pas zhugs nas/ de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grib pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bsrung bang phreng bar sa te/ ranang
170b1(rnying rgyud): blangs nas rarnas tshor mang gi dbang bsgyur bas dbang bsgyur la sbyin pa thams cad phul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'i rdzo gams pa yang de bzhin no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos sgrub rnams cad de ba'in no// de nas ma
170b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs par yang dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bsgyur ba'i phreng bas so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pA la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas pas so// chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pan/
170b3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la bsta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// zas dang skom thams ma la sogs pa dang / ro thams cad thob par bya ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlas brjod stong byas pas so// shin tu mthon po thob par bya
170b4(rnying rgyud): bal ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'brum bu'o// rnam par rgyal ba rkyen po skyob pA la nI/ rim na rgyal mtshar mchog gis so// grags pa dang ldan pa chen po dang / ming thob par bye ba lA ni byin rdo zhing kha thams cad du bzlas nas pazlas brjod pa // bdag pa
170b5(rnying rgyud): chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i dam tshigs ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// rin po rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'o//
170b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
170b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ngo ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par/
171a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kya rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sams thams cad du/
171a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub dpa pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang lung dpog pa dang sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang shes pa thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad
171a3(rnying rgyud): dang lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag
171a4(rnying rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/ bzhi ni rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// aH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can
171a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyas rgyas gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis kyang sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya
171a6(rnying rgyud): chen po la sogs pa phyag na thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' phyung nas kyang // dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phrag ma'i tha tshogs
171a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas dris la/ nang du rdo rje'i thog gis 'khor lo bri'o// de bzhin du de'i dbus dkyil 'khor btu
171b1(rnying rgyud): par theg btab la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdorje khu char phyag gnyis dam chog gi phyag rgya bcangs pa/ zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje'i sku mchag ces bya ba rdo rje bsgoms par 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya brdang
171b2(rnying rgyud): lce'i mchog 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du rdo rdordo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gnyis pa la no nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gsum pi la ni chos kyi khu tshur
171b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan ying 'dzin par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas dam chog gi phyag rgya yongs su bzud la rang nyid zhugs ma
171b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don yod pas thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thams cad kyi mo shes kyi dbang phyug tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur ba myung bar mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
171b5(rnying rgyud): der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa bcom ldan 'das las bslab par bya zhing / rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sgra gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan lta bur sbyor ba yis// phrag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags// da
171b6(rnying rgyud): tshig dngos zab ban stong ban// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no// phyag d+ha thams cad med kyil 'dzang ngo // sgrub pa dang dngos sur rnams kya zhen no// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams cad de bzhin no// phyag tu thams cad bci nga bslab pa la ni d+ha
171b7(rnying rgyud): rje ba thur gyis so// phyag rtsi thams ci de bsgrub pa la nirdo rdo rje chen po'i bu rgyar gyis so// dam tshig thams cad bsgrib par ni rje 'dod pa'i khu chung gyis so// sems can thams cad rjem su chags par bya ba lan rdo chags pa chen po lab cur skyes so// thams
172a1(rnying rgyud): dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gcing ba la rdo rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bsdam par bya ba la ni rdo rje lugu myung gyi kha tshur gyis so// thams cad lpags par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhwa la zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so//
172a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa lA na rdo rje nges par bcer ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dral ba
172a3(rnying rgyud): la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad sgrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje badz+ra ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs
172a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i khu tshur gyis so// gzhan gyi dbyung thams cad lkugs pa dang 'phye bor bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po 'phye bo'i khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje mkha' gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi rdo rje'u
172a5(rnying rgyud): tshud gyis so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyang dbye ba la ni hU~M mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer byA ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khru tshur gyis so//
172a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rnam par gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa dang rnam par gzhom pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// chu'i nang du gnas shing chags pa la ni rdo rje rnon po'i khu tshur
172a7(rnying rgyud): gyis so// gzugs mang por smon pa la na rdo rje sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje khu rgyar gyis so// mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi sdung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam mkha' khu tshur gyis so// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub
172b1(rnying rgyud): la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la nI rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad ma khyen pa grub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khA bur gyis so// nor
172b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so// las thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin phying khu tshur gyis so//
172b3(rnying rgyud): rang nyid 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i mchog gi khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lha byur gyis so// bde bachen/
172b4(rnying rgyud): du don meng pa das rtog gi rtog pa'i rgyal po rten thoms/ b+hag rgya thams cad kyis gror myi kyi grobs bya ba teg pa'i rgyal po chen po rtogs so// gnur gyi rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldang 'das chos rnams cad smos pa med pa ba zhi gsegs pas nga
172b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad sdod pa med pa'o//
172b6(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing / shes
172b7(rnying rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs so// a/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par mdzad nas/ dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon dur srung pa chos thams cad
173a1(rnying rgyud): nyid med byas smras pa med pa'i ral gyi zhes byab tang du bdon la sgoms par thugasanas pa'o sa d+hAr lag paskor bags byung ra sa ba 'dagasungags/ tI dkyil 'khor cig pa'i na du gabar po zas pa/ as sogs pa'i mtha
173a2(rnying rgyud): phreng bgo mas bzhin gyibar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshal gyis thig pa pas/ de'i lte bal bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon du gzhan dung na lugs pang shing 'dzus pa dang bcas panam mkha'i mdog can phyag bzhi da nga ngal yis de banan gas
173a3(rnying rgyud): pathams cad la 'debs pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra rnams gzhag par bya'o// gyi mtshams rnams stegs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par byo'o// rdo rnams su ni mtshan ma bcu bzhag
173a4(rnying rgyud): par byar/ 'dis par pa byed byu ba dang shegs pa rnams so// sa nga shegs papa ci thab rji pa dod rgyun ces brna go// dengs pa sa de shing gis nga ba sa bang bathung nga ma
173a5(rnying rgyud): shad pa )/ ral gi 'don teg zungs// shes babral 'ad / zhing 'i mangs rgya ba zhes/ sbyin gyi ma bcan pa shA // bems sbyin ma gyi brgya 'i ra// 'das pamang
173a6(rnying rgyud): par myi / bsod na kyis ga pang po ba par 'gyur// rmob ma rnams lapang de na// gas y-in la rol tu phyin pa maus rdzogs pa sa ga ma gas byung byin med pa yang dag byang rdzogs pa'i byang chu tu man pa rdzogs pa
173a7(rnying rgyud): su tshul bya // ngangs tshun so// rgyas da dubyas su chu sa byung kyi sa mdzu 'i shes pa slo kyi da 'i phying du //
173b1(rnying rgyud): nam ca ma dang bral ba'i rkang nga 'dzin pa sgoms pas so// ston pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas s+ho// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsul ba chos kyi ye shes thong pa ldani shes rab kyi 'arol du mun pa bsgoms pa pas// por blangs
173b2(rnying rgyud): gcod pal na chos bsgoms pas so// yI gre thams cad kyi ngas pa'i tshig gi ye shes la na spros pa med pa'i ye shes pasgoms pas so// gnas thams cad du yi gres chos kyi bru ba mthong ba la ni ma la sogs pa'i yi ge ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas so// da ba'i dag
173b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi byang chubathob pa la ni rje'i ral gri'i gag rgyas so// 'ad ba chen po rnga dran mod pa'i dam tshig ga rtog pa'i rgyas po chen po las/ 'khor mo chen po ltar yi ge btor pa'i dam chog rjes zab rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs sa// sa dpa' ji pa/
173b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dang du 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor po chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdorje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma
173b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad
173b6(rnying rgyud): mAsham panyid la 'dug pa rje 'kho po thams cad la byujug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed mthug tu mas kyi 'bor la bskor bachos nyid padon 'di ma cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'jam nas rdo ci'i 'khor lo la thab da da
173b7(rnying rgyud): pa'ad ma tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// dz+haiM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po car khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor
174a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ci lha ba bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdorje khro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rngu zhes bya ba ting
174a2(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo
174a3(rnying rgyud): bskor ba gzhug par bya'o// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dkyil 'khong dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i rigs mi dkyil 'khor ba'i tha bar bya'o// blo rnams su mdzan ma bzhi gzhag
174a4(rnying rgyud): par bya ste 'di lta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang rdo rje khro bo'i sgra dang spyanA ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgra dang nam mra kha'i snying po'i sgra rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro//
174a5(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya zhing / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i thig btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug par bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa yang de bzhin no// ma bslabs par
174a6(rnying rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los te/ rang gi khar bcug la gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so// de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag
174a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// de bzhin du mchog gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dmatshig chen po'i 'khong pos so// las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdorje thams cad kyi 'khor los so// de bzhin du rjes su chags par bye ba dang dbang du bye ba dang don thob pa dang byas gdab pa dang gcad pa dang /
174b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa dang mchod pa dang gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya g.yon na 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so// bde ba chen po rdo don yod pa'i dmitshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi tshe'i dam tshig
174b2(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa snod kyi mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces byab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bcang /
174b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyisams byed pa ni bzhin gshegs pa pams cad ma mchod pa'i rdzag cas du // sems ni mi mam thams cad yongs sa grub ba nyid ni dpa'i nagashegs pa thabs cad la mchod pa'i cho gargyas pa/ ngas tsho ma mongs pa dang 'i
174b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'dir 'jug pa dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang rjod pa dang ston pa dang mnyan pa dang sems pa dang sgom pa dang mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
174b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dmachog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM/ de nas 'di gsungs bcom gyis nam mkha' tha
174b6(rnying rgyud): cad las mchod du thams cad gi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus par spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam maka mdzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma mkhar mdzod bachod
174b7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad mchog rgyas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes byab shing nge 'dzin ma mas par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i mchong ba'i mchog don yong ba'angam chog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ci lte ba dbazhan du dang du rin tshe ka bar brgyad
175a1(rnying rgyud): dbus sa bcom ldan 'das mtshon chasna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal 'dzum pa sgra dang yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhug par bya'o// de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o// 'ja/
175a2(rnying rgyud): ga cag na dang de rkyen pang byeg pa pa sa bu chus su dpa bcu parjing rgya gyi sa 'dzin nga byang thang bdang blags pangasas na pa dang nings byed du bang ci la la ba rje ba rkyod pams dang sam sungan pasas nga
175a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis ci lta ba bzhin du gzhag go// phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang gser dang mu tig dang rin po che ste mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo
175a4(rnying rgyud): rje thams cad kyis mchod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste lus kyi las thams cad dang phyag bya ba dang ngag dang yid dang sems kyis chos kyi dbyings
175a5(rnying rgyud): su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya zhing rdo rje dang phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o// slob ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas srub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bslabs par yang byung
175a6(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas so// ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dab par bsgoms pas so// dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so// phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni snga tshogs rdo rje thams cad kyis so// skor
175a7(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i lung bstan pas so// dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so// mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so// gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so// me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas
175b1(rnying rgyud): pa // bde bachen pa rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa/ da mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen pa rdzogs so// nam mkhri'i mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de gdun gzugs
175b2(rnying rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang / ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid do// sems
175b3(rnying rgyud): can thams cad dul ba nyid pas khro bo dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro bo chos nyid do// sems tan thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir de na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ji byang chub ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
175b4(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi stongs thams cad rab tu 'joms pas don nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// ha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul
175b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste/ dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad kyis 'dul 'khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gdug pa
175b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang rim nyid du ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir lhan/ tshon sna lngas
175b7(rnying rgyud): ni rnam par ze// ka ba brgyad ni mdun gnas par// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// da yi dbus su ci rigs par// rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste// rdo rje mcheg gtsigs pa dang // dbar ba'i phreng ba 'khregs pa'i 'od// 'jigs byed/ pa dog tsA ba dang // han no/
176a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bzhad gsul ba'i zhal// na yi kun du gnod sbyin ni// shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par bya// de nyid dang po la sogs mchog/ phyag no rdo ni sogs mtshan 'chang // hrI yi dkyil lakhor mtshams rnams su// maH ba'i phrag sgri bar b+ha// rga
176a2(rnying rgyud): gnas ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya// de nas 'jug pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs na gadrug pa thams cad 'dul nas shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs
176a3(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje mche ba blangs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid la bstan no// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum
176a4(rnying rgyud): por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// de nas mchod la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig brjod la slar dbyung bar bya'o// de bzhin du phyug rgya
176a5(rnying rgyud): bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos gru ba kyang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ni lta ba bzhin no// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag
176a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// sems can thams cad gdul ba la ni khro bas ha ha zhes dgod cing 'dul bas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang sngam spyad gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dbang bsgyur ba thams cad dbrog pa la ni khams rnams
176a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// thams cad rgyas gdab la ni rdorje bu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs brtan byas nas gtub pas so// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo bgrang nas 'jug par bya'o// mchod pa
176b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad rnam par gzhag pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi skabs blta bar bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje dmachog ces b+ha bu'i rtog pa'i rgya ra
176b2(rnying rgyud): po rdzogs so// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces byab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'dre bshad do// rjes thams cad mnyam
176b3(rnying rgyud): pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rlig par bya'o//
176b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor phrin gyis rlob pa zhes zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'i smras la/
176b5(rnying rgyud): de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis laM nges par btad/
176b6(rnying rgyud): de/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sro sor gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig thams cad kyi
176b7(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su
177a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'tshar can pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o// thams ca ga dkyil 'kho brdzu pa'i klu rjing/ sem sa pa 'ardzun po gzhag par bya'o// kyil ladzu na n+ya jugs / rnags pa thun pa ba rdzu/
177a2(rnying rgyud): rnams su ni rigs bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o// de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
177a3(rnying rgyud): po las/ bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// rigs bsdus pa'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes
177a4(rnying rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams
177a5(rnying rgyud): cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no// ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni lus kyi snying po can no// de nas kyi rol sde rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis caco'i swa phyung nas/ chos nyid
177a6(rnying rgyud): kyi don mu cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// tI/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ kun nas zlum po thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi pa/ mtshams rnams su mdud rtsi gsum pa grib bya
177a7(rnying rgyud): de'idabus su dbang phyag chen po thobar bya'o// de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad pa pabar bya ste/ 'dis skyenag pa rtson pa dang / dga' byed dpang phyug da / dril chen de/ gar gyi nga phyug rnams ni phyogs rnams su'o// mtshams rnams su pa babang po dang / tu
177b1(rnying rgyud): bya du b+hag dang / lhag d+hA gdung/ bkang pa'i gyun// gag kyis rnams su/ ma gas sa gnas btsu// stonanusas ma gyug pa nga shAg dang / mga'i nga byag dang / dang /
177b2(rnying rgyud): chen po// tshu rol du ni b+h+ring ba rnams dang / phyig rnams kyi ts+tsham// de nam yon pa ga gtsang mas sas pa zlas shi go ga sa gos te/ ma thegatus kyim na tshigags par byo // thags sa kyi byed gras pa rna
177b3(rnying rgyud): slob sa de bsnyen du thug pa lag par rmeg ce gsus pa byin nas chos ba tud par bya'o// sems can canas kun bye nga // bgan pams cad sung gyi dang // 'dod kun bdag pa da stir// drag pa'i las la gnas par ces// nas ga ma
177b4(rnying rgyud): te gtor ma smin par bya'o// de nas brtsams te 'jigs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang // yid bde ba thams cad rjes su myong nas/ drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po zhi ba'i mdung zung gi
177b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dang po mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang gsad pa dang bslab pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// d+ho/ de nas 'di dkyil 'khor
177b6(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ bur bzhi pa byung gi sgo can gyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la/ dbus spya nag po chen po gar byed bzhin pa gzhug par bya'o// de'i sngogs dang mtshams sum mo brgyad thipar bya ste/ 'di lta ste drag mo dang / rmongs pa yod / khyab 'dug mo dang // zhon
