177b7(rnying rgyud): nu mo dang / nag mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / sha za mo dang srin mo'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma baji kwi bar bya ste/ zhib mo dang / bai ruN+Da dang / gtum mo dang / 'jigs byed ma rnams so// de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung
178a1(rnying rgyud): rta gsum pa dang / phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bud yod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang / 'khod ga gil dang / mam pa dang / ba ga// srang rnams kyin thod pa dang / nus pa'i sa brgya dadang gagod dang b+h+yom na// danam phyag tu
178a2(rnying rgyud): dpon chos spyod pa gtsang ba gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ thams cad za ba 'am thams cad spyad pa la yang smad pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas blo chen po zas par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon ma gtogs
178a3(rnying rgyud): pa gzhan thams cad ci gar 'ongs bzhugs par 'gyur zhing thob par 'gyur te/ gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so// de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab la/ nag po chen po'i phyug rgyas bcug ste/ rna bar ngam chog rten ngo d+ho zhes bu ba drang
178a4(rnying rgyud): sbyang ngo // de nas smug nas me togardo // de nas gang du lgang ba de lhag pa'i lhar pa grub par bya'o// gal te lhung bar ma gyur na yang dor du gzhug go// de nas ni 'jigs par byed nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa po la la dkyi
178a5(rnying rgyud): khor bldan par bya'o// bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mdzad nas snying po dang dngang rigs tshun ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas mya mog bstan par bya ste/ sems can thams cad rgyas btab cing // dam chog ldang rnams bza' bar bya// sngags rnams bas par mi bya ste/
178a6(rnying rgyud): tshig rnal blod grub skye pa'o// drag po 'damachog mdung rtse dang // ma no rnams kyi byas 'debs pas// gal te 'das na khyod kyi snyi / rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de nas parnams te gang gachen po zab ni dang bye ma thogs par rnal 'brid 'grub par 'bye sa/
178a7(rnying rgyud): gang za bar mi 'gyur ba de'i dngos grub mad do// gal te dam tshig las 'das par ma sbyar na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya yi shas bslab par byaste/ phyag rgya'i gar dang mchod pa byas nas gtor mthen zhing / bdang ba dang btung dang
178b1(rnying rgyud): mgasugs rnam pa gyus nas mye dbyu ra bya// ngasasra sa du mye nga gdusan pa ga // das so byed pa lamags pa sa gas sa ma pas phyag / mngon gcig kyang gas
178b2(rnying rgyud): 'dibral lo// / de nas 'dini dkyil 'khong ba shad par byaste/ thar bani ba dang go ba snying // kyai yid kyi 'khor thib bya// de yin da dkyil 'khor ni// gang+gA mi stobs can grib tu// de'i dbus sa ma zer// mchogasasas drug na gnag
178b3(rnying rgyud): rjid da myam khyod dang // de bzhi spyon napas pa // 'thab par 'a rjes byaba'o// goms yang bags pa dang // de bzhin thod pa ma tshan ma 'dzin// lha mo rigs dang zang pa 'chang // drang ba dag dmang khro ba dang / bang ga 'thil 'dug pa
178b4(rnying rgyud): b+ha dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o// dngos phrab kun ster dag pa ste// gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs// sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du// tshogs la sogs pa legs par bzhag/ grub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang // gtum dang khro mchog gsong
178b5(rnying rgyud): phyi rol ba dan rtse mo la// dril bu phreng bcas thams cadang // bum pa grang bya ro mdzug panas// 'byung po ma mas pa two ma bcas// grwanams sgra men pad// rol mo rdung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas// ga tu kun gyis 'jug pa
178b6(rnying rgyud): lpags nas sgrub la dad pa yis// yang nas yang du 'dudu bya zhing // me tog can gyis 'azod pa yis// bzla ba dang de nyid dag kyang brjod// 'jig rten gsum po sring gsum mchog/ dran song gsum mchod gsus rnam gsum// legs lnganams pas ba sa
178b7(rnying rgyud): dal bub kun la rtag tu'o// de nas snying po lan cig brjod cing phyag tubams cad ci g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo sngags kya byas la dgragang/ bya'o// denas drim bu dang bcas pa'i phreng ba rnams gso'o// thams cadapa' nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dam chag 'dre
179a1(rnying rgyud): bar pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o// bzhi par pad+ma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su shrI h+Na gI d+hi lha mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma
179a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste 'di lta ste bud med kyi gzugs dang sbrul gyi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / pad+ma'i gzugs zhes bya'o// de
179a3(rnying rgyud): nas gos dkar po bgos te gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la/ pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas pa bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste gang du babs pa de nges bsgrub par bya'o// de nas pad+ma blangs la pad+ma'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad
179a4(rnying rgyud): ces brjod par bya zhing / pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta bar bya ste/ ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos te// 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni// blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang //
179a5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so// de
179a6(rnying rgyud): nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang bkra shis shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes
179a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// thams cad gsang ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro
179b1(rnying rgyud): po 'phyag nas so// thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po phag gis so// nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par zla ba la ni pang+gA chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyag rgyas so// sa rnams cad kyi bdug po nyid du bya ba la ris la skyis po
179b2(rnying rgyud): krung bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog zug bzlas brjod bya'o// nuthams cad dbab pa la ni b+ha bris nas de'i steng du 'dug ste bzlus brjod 'brum bya'o// thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma cher po'i 'od kyi // rlung thams cang dbya
179b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba la ni/ pad+ma chen po rlung gi mchog gis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig shes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po che mo
179b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kham sa gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bsgyur ba las byung ba/ ye shes kyi snying po zhes thub shes rab kyi pha rol
179b5(rnying rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul 'di ba da de/ dbang bsgyur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi tshul sring thob par 'gyur ro// nod sbyin pa nI ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni thos thams cad kyi mnyam ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang cing lding ba
179b6(rnying rgyud): sa dang ga dang / sems kyi dI bathams na thub par bgyur ro// da rungs byang chub sem sna pa' sems ba chen po nyim ma pa'i snying po bzhin pa tu 'dzus pa dang bcas te/ rang gi nagol rdo rje rin po za / dbang bsku pa'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di shang
179b7(rnying rgyud): te/ dbang bskur ba rnams cad kyi dam tshig rinapa che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di slab sa// tAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam thos bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po tshad las thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang
180a1(rnying rgyud): dzadu 'dzin pan ces// 'bras pa yod pa 'dul pa'i mchog/ dam di byed kyis bzlas// do m+b+hal pon dud// gang dmas 'di dag 'don pan// bdu la sogs pa thams dbyas// dadag ma song bsngags
180a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs kyis kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thog sa 'thob par 'gyur// de// dge spangs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pal// kun mchog sangs rgyas
180a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bskyod// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po AHd+ya shrang drA kar ba rma dang / zhu
180a4(rnying rgyud): gyi lo dz+ha ba dge sbyong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// #rgya ga r+b+ba/ du/ shrI par ma bya ma dz+ra ga tanam// bong na nga / dpal mchog dang po ma
180a5(rnying rgyud): ldog pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos kyid brngas pa/ chos thams cad smos pa med pas/ yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod bya'i dam
180a6(rnying rgyud): tshig ces bya ba/ rdorje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dbul mchog dang po thog ma dang tham dang bus rjed pa'i dam 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen pa'i dngos bung dam parjo bu men po'i dngos padang sa dang ra'o//
180a7(rnying rgyud): grub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bad ba chen po'i dngos grub pa pani de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cing grub chen po'i dngos bu'angs par 'gyung // dri bzhid gshegs pa thams cad kyi bying chub kyi gro'i ngos bu sa pa gyur drangs thams dang tu mas
180b1(rnying rgyud): byed pa dngos grub ngas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos smrab ma pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dpung byug chen po'i dngas grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems da pa' rnams pa 'ams gsam par
180b2(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su spyod par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor bu la yang ma chags shing / brtson 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
180b3(rnying rgyud): rnams ljongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub ngam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ kyi srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'o s+ho// de srid mtshungs med sems na don/
180b4(rnying rgyud): mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnas su bslabs pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten
180b5(rnying rgyud): sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba spring du bdag nyid 'dul// tsaM star pa d+ma ba mang bya// 'dam gyis nyes pas myo gos pa// de bzhin gnas kyi nyis pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags che po ma par dag/ 'dri ba chen po nor ce pa// sa
180b6(rnying rgyud): gisus dbang byung thobabasan// sem sa can don rnam sa rtog par byed// gling la la ni gnang bar 'angs das dpa' martog dang po shes rab gyu pa ro tu byen pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos ma ma grangs 'di rten me zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang ma lce yis bdeng dang /
180b7(rnying rgyud): yang bde ba thams cad kyi tho ba par 'gyur ro// ba ba ched brjo don mod pa'i nga chog gi spos thub kyi mchog cung tsho 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams kya dbye gas pa mchog kya 'bru rtse/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pa thams cad dam/ dri bzhin gshegs par/
181a1(rnying rgyud): 'dra ro// bad ga chen po dngadun yod pa das rgyag dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin ga shegs pa ba mas kyi bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'i shes da kya pa rol tu mun par martags so// / de nas som ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
181a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dang sa grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyal po ldan po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i chog rgyag ces brtam pa'i sri gsung thugs thams cad
181a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig chen po thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas/ chos nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las kyi
181a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' can de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ zla ba phyed pa du ma la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba/ gser gyi dril bu btags pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye
181a5(rnying rgyud): bar mdzes par byas pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang me long dang mu tig gi phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes shing brgyan pa// sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang gar dang khA yi saM rab tu brgyan pa dang / brjod
181a6(rnying rgyud): bsasad par byed pa/ bde ba chen po rdo rje sems pa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchog sems dpa' thams cu dang / dang
181a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba thams cad dang / thams cad ma byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mchog tu gyur ba/ khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ thams cad dbang du byed pa do/ sbyin pa po 'dod pa thams cad pa/ rgya che ba'i dngos pa kyinachog thams cad brtag pa'i de bzhin gsheg/
181b1(rnying rgyud): lagaso byug bab/ srid stongad par ba gnas sa// depyod byams pan don mchogs dang // semam can 'ams sa d+ha sa dang / rgyal gas sud pa 'dod pa gyung// byed pa ldan nams pa su myod// 'ang ba
181b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsungs pa'i// rjes su gnang ba bdag la stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas tshasarnams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid la lhag par dgongs nas gdul tha mas cadu la tha tha chen po'i rdzogs rdo rje zhes byaba'i ngo sngon
181b3(rnying rgyud): par zhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gri bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad yongs / sbyang ba dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang dngos grub thams cad phran sa ma tshogs pa dang / ye shes dang las dang mchog gi dngos su
181b4(rnying rgyud): rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du ngag zhi du gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang rdo rje 'chad chen po thob pa/ mchog gi dngos grub sto don pade bached po'i jorje/ po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lus snang ba nyid de bzhin ga shegs pa thams sa dkyi na 'i phre ba'i thod par pos dab
181b5(rnying rgyud): bsrung ngas dbyung bsrung ba yad ro// de dus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus ga gas pa med pa'i bdu brjen pa mchog gi dngangos tha pa sogs pa dngas klub thags pa thob par byab phyir/ sems dpa'i phyir stob ba pa te/ l+r-i dang bapra / g.yo pa
181b6(rnying rgyud): 'angs pa'i rnam mdza na mi gams pa rdzogs byes nga gzugs ka nga pa'i mchog sa spyong la ba bemin par jugs kyi rnamams dkyi myu byud kyi sring gsung dang sa sums byung // sa pa rna /
181b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtsa khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rnams srung yang byang chub chen/ mngon par rdzogs nas de rnams kyis bzhad pa chen po mngon par mdzad do// 'jig rten po khams thams cad g.yos pa dang 'akris bas ma
182a1(rnying rgyud): dag par 'gyur ro// khams gsum rgyas par spros pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur to// gang+gA gas sems can thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa
182a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa las mngon par byung ba/ rdo rje chen po phyag r+b+he zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/ par zhugs te/ bad ba chen po rdo rje'i dmatshig ces bya ba rnam par gnon par mdzad nas/ de'i sgra thams cad las dngos grub thams cad dang / bde ba dang yid
182a3(rnying rgyud): bde ba steng brtag tu rjes su 'brel ba can lhan cig tu stong ba/ bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dmachog gi sems dpar rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du blang ste/ mdun rdo rjegasang ba yid las byung ba/ g.yas sto rdo rje ki li ka li/ rgyab tu 'dod pa'i rdo rje/ g.yon rdo rdo rje bsgyings pa'o//
182a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams rnams su mthod pa'i lha mo rnams so// phyi rol gyi kha khyer mtshams su lha'i bu mo rnams so// sgo srung ba rnams na rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// phyi rol du rdo rje sgo srung gi rdzogs dang / pho ha dang ben rnams so//
182a5(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol pa btab ste/
182a6(rnying rgyud): sems can kurnal ba de don du// rgyal ba chen po 'byung ba ste// chags bra pA de rnams chags ldan yang // rang gi btsun mo 'ang gsol mdzad pas// de'i phyir bdag gis khyod la gsol// bde bachen po rdo che// gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dngos grub ste// 'dul ba mchog
182a7(rnying rgyud): ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos bu 'dul ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzang nas/ rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i dmatshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'kho chen po 'jigasu
182b1(rnying rgyud): da sa// du na nan su dus sa// na smra /
182b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub par bya// gas shing lags par bsgril ba dang // mdang bu dag med pa yi// thig su dngasar pos nig patu nas// tshon gyi phyems ze bya// byung bzhi par byon pa// ni byini mngos pa dang // dab+h+ya sa po
182b3(rnying rgyud): mas rgyangs// dkyil latu kyi mapa menas sa dang/ ma sa/ byed byub/ la mi// dza du ci gdu/ byung gis myo pa la ba snog// 'ang sa rdzogs dus pa ma/ rab ba tigazung /
182b4(rnying rgyud): de yin du 'khor lo na// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dug// rdo rdo theg gis yongs bskyod ba'i/ rdojo 'khor man / du dag bri// ded bumachog bzhin du no// rdorje sems dpa' dgod par bya// blugs sam yang na byas pa'am// brlangs pa'i ma yang na bris pa yi// ba
182b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang sa zla ba 'ad// 'byung ba'i 'od bang dbang bas rtsug// sangs rgyas byeng bas rnam par myongs// la yang dag phyugs// mas dbang skyil mo krung gis bsgrugs// rdo bsgoms pa 'dzin pa 'jog/ sam sa stonas brjo sa//
182b6(rnying rgyud): par dgod par bya// de yi logs rna thams ca dang // sems dpa' ben pa rnams driste// yon nam yang dngul non gyis// garims ji bzhin brib bya/ mdudu na na ma / ngasang po ni// rdorje sarjon rgyal btsun pa// g.yas sa ga pa shi // mig sa po
182b7(rnying rgyud): gang pa gyis sa shes 'o// u kyi rgyas zhing myi kyi ga tshig ga rte babye sa pa dzin pa migs nga sa ga nga pa'i ma bya bgrangs bu ma drag sung
183a1(rnying rgyud): sbrul ga/ sngags gags du/ snru bas mas / sgyu pa bya// s+yA das / rna nal/ sa sa/ brnal kA ma
183a2(rnying rgyud): sgrar badz+ra bad+ha hU~M/ hU~M trathA badz+re N-iSh+T+r-i/ rdo rjeban no// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams byin/ hU~M mad+hA ra badz+re hUM/ hU~M badz+ra me b+hob+h+rU~M/ trA~M shA ra da 'a dz+ri hUM/ hr-i dz+r-i shi shi raH/ de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyin/ hUM 'adz+ra lA s+yai/ ma hA ba ra badz+reH/ oM badz+raM Sh+T+r-iH/ oM badz+ranaH/ de nas
183a3(rnying rgyud): sgo srung rnams kyi ni/ dzeHdz+ra a~M ku shi pra ti ha ra/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ga na/ pi badz+ra s+phon du ta/ ho badz+ra g+ha ts+tshed/ de ltar lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du// bud med grags pa de nyid dgod// bkod na de dag rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje 'angs
183a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun mchog bri byas nas// bum pa gang ba ci snyed dang // me tog la sogs kun gyis mchod// dril bu btags pa'i bden rnams// mtshams rnams su ni gzhag par bya// lcug ma dang bcas bum pa rnams// sgo yi phyi rol dag tu gzhag/ rdo rje dang bcas bzhi dang
183a5(rnying rgyud): bcas// lhag mo yongs su bzlas nas ni// dri chus gang ba'i bum pa ste// phyag na rdo rje'i mdun gzhag bya// de la 'di ltar bde ba chen po'i dmatshig gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sa ma ya/ adz+dza She kang \u0f7f hU~M ba~M hoH/ lan ti shu rtsa gcig
183a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas so// chu 'di gtor ba 'am/ 'jungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'byung ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas rang gi dmachog rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs bu bsrub par bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod nas/ dgug pa dang ni gzhu
183a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // bcings nas skad cig dbang du 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste// de bzhin g.yas mdzu ba lpags gyur bya// dgrag pa 'di ni lan cig gis// 'grub ster rab cu gzhug par bya// oM ma hA lu la ba dz+ra satwa/ a a d+hi shI g+h+ra ma N+Da lu la badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma la ma n+ta sI
183b1(rnying rgyud): prab+hA ta sa ma ya swA rbad ya mu to Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ sra bo dz+ya ma b+ha ba/ a nur k+to mab+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bAn an te na da na sad d+hA ta me man+ta pa da dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas rtag tu bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor du na rang nya dbyon// dgug cing bcuganas brtan pa dang // rang
183b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhing 'grub pa yin// rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul du ma rnams mthong ba 'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis na thod par 'gyur ro// de nas dang nyid rdo rje 'dzin/ kun gyi slob dpon ni phyag rgya thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ las thams cad nus pa
183b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yis rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ci snyed pa'i dris blugs shing bsgom pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i me tog gi phreng bas lus shin tu brgyan pa/ gos dmar po gnyis bgos pa/ rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la
183b4(rnying rgyud): bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o// bstod pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa glu yis bya'o// 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni// kun 'dus bdag la bde ba stsol mdzod cig/ rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag ston mdzod// bdag
183b5(rnying rgyud): dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud// de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgongs su gsol bar bya ste/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kun tu bzang po khyod yin te// rdo rje bsnyems bdag khyab bdag yin// sems kyi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin//
183b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dam tshig dngos grub can// rdo rje sems bdag de'i grub mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis// rdo rje slob dpon byin brlab 'gyur/ de sngar ma byung ba'i so sor rang rig pa'i bde ba gnyis ka la skye bar 'gyur ro// phra mo dbab par yang
183b7(rnying rgyud): gal bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te sems dpa
184a1(rnying rgyud): chen po rnams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis kyang ngal dngos grub thams saca stsol bar mdzad// phyag tu thams cad kyang bdag rang nyid kyis bcang san las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam thag rnams cang
184a2(rnying rgyud): kyang 'di la bstan par 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dod pa'i las rnams kyang byed pa yin no// bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad nyams su myong zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang mi sod pas lo gcig 'das nas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no// de
184a3(rnying rgyud): nas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin no// rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid snga ma bzhin du lus la brgyan nas/ rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug ste de bzhin du de kho na nyid chen po bsgral pas yang dag par bskal la dgug par bya'o// 'di
184a4(rnying rgyud): skad ces brjod do// srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir// sngar gyi srid pa la khyod dga'// 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che// 'gro ba kun la'ang 'grub par gyis// de nas mchod pa byas la rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dmatshig gi phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa gzhag pa bya
184a5(rnying rgyud): smai/ bcug nas na par 'di gad kyis brjod par bya'o// chags bral 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni// chags bla nyid kyis 'dral bar 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bad bache// rdo sems dpa' sbas pa min// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// sdug bsngal gtan ni dang gzhin med/
184a6(rnying rgyud): dgas sems can chags bral le// slar yang yid ni mi byed cig/ de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dus 'dor du gzhug go// oM ma hA su pa badz+ra satwa pra ti gr-ita sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas gang du babs pa de ni de'i lha yin no// de nas de/ nyi chen po sor par bya// ga
184a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i lha'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ de'i mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su byin te deng rigs kyi ming gi dbang bskung la snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta go/ ting rjedangs mu le d+ha /
184b1(rnying rgyud): gr-id+ha sid+d+hi bidz+ri te a mo g+ha sid+hi/ de nas phyag rgya tshangs pa bslab par bya'o// de nas ni 'dod pa'i mthod pa byas shing byed du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang btung bas skyong ma rnams tshim par byas la phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i lan dang gar dang dgod pa berd du bcug cing dang /
184b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis kyang bya'o// de nas thams cad bskrad nas 'di skad brjod par bya'o// thog mthang chu ba'i 'gro ba 'di// dga' ba mchog la ngag lus te// sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur// slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol// de nas snyim pa'i me togangong nas dgrang
184b3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor yang rang nyid kyis phyogs la rdul tshon de dag gis ril bu byas la bzhag na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de yang bcug na cho 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad dgongs pa yin no// de nyid kyis
184b4(rnying rgyud): dbang bsrung na yang dkyil 'khor du dbang bsgyung ba thob pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gal te spu bri ba'i ri mo mkhan ma rnyed na rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gal te de yang mi shes na phyag mtshan gzhag par bya'o/
184b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod pa thogs pa med pa myung du 'grub pa'i cho ga tu che ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang /
184b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' grub pa ni// rtag par myur du bshad par bya// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// de srid sems can gdon par bya// mya ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrib// de nyid kyis ni dam tshig rnams// ci srid sring pa la gnas pa/
184b7(rnying rgyud): srid sems can don nyid byed// thams cad dag pa'i mchog na// ci ltar sems can kun gyi don// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa// de ltar byin sogs pha rol phyin// byang chub spyod pa mchog gis min// de bzhin gshegs ni gdul min la// sem
185a1(rnying rgyud): can rnams sadon yang dag/ 'don ngas grub pa zlasmra// / rgyas na thams cad med// dusan pa d+hapa 'di ba shang rdzag// ng+yas grub shi rtag pa san// gangags srid pa / dang // gan d+ha rtag pa' dngas grang ga/
185a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs kyang // dam tshig rnam par sbyangs pa'am// bsod nams med kyang thams cad du// srid pa 'di la myung du 'brug// gal te dngos thubasgrang 'dod de// rtag tu yul dang ldan byung ni// gsung ba'i mthong pas mthod na // pa 'ang
185a3(rnying rgyud): ga rgyas 'grub par 'byud// drug san la logs snyan pa'i grwa// rtags pas 'dod par // bzlas pa 'dod rnas / rje ses dpa' bsgrub pa rgya// mas 'dzud pa'i ba pa jug mkha ladz+ra/
185a4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug grub// rga sha med cing gtso bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas la// rang gzhan kun gyis bsnyen bkung zhing // rdo rje 'chang chen dang mtshungs shing // don mong kun mchog spyod pa yin// bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la
185a5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i dngos smrab thams cad rab tu ster ba// rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' yin na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadakyi mchog gi dngos grub mngon par 'dod ni des bcom ldan 'das dedabazhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
185a6(rnying rgyud): khu rgyur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o// bzhad pa dang bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khwa cung yongs su 'dzin pas rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas par
185a7(rnying rgyud): bya'o// 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gnom pas bcom par bya'o// de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dam byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gal te
185b1(rnying rgyud): rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na/ des lugs ma'am/ 'dus byas pa'am/ brdungs pa'am/ ras res la sogs par legs par bris pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ci ltar thob pa ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bslab pa bshad
185b2(rnying rgyud): zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po 'grub po// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba gcig 'das nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o// gal te rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bskyang na nga
185b3(rnying rgyud): lho'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes bsgoms la bsgrub par bya'o// de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o// yang dang yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya'o// ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid rlab phyed/
185b4(rnying rgyud): 'das nas thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te/ phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o// ci srid bdag 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug dang / khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i
185b5(rnying rgyud): bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol bar mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// ma bsgrubs pa'i
185b6(rnying rgyud): snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang bu'i mdzod smras so// phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba
185b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phreng bas so// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gas pab mi bskyod pas so// tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud kyis so// gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gas ba'i gzugs can gyis so// gaN+DI
186a1(rnying rgyud): brjid dang na chod shin tu bzang po rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis len gyis so// stobs dang mdog 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yis so// dbang bskung ba thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba 'tshod pan can gyis so//
186a2(rnying rgyud): nor thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbyig gis so// rgyal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so// sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so// thams cad dbab pa dang g.yo bar bya ba dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum
186a3(rnying rgyud): bden pa nyid du sgrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so// pra sen thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so// gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gdon las thar pas so// gdug pa thams cad gzhig par
186a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i bgis 'joms pas 'o// rjerang cung nges par dru la jigs ba'i ngas pasas// rnam cadag nyid leg par byab lan rdordzogs pa gyis so// rnams ca byas pa pa lani de badzin par rdzogs parji mtshig sem pa 'thoms so//
186a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mthar byed kyis so// thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang bas so// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bcings pas so// thams cad thar par bya
186a6(rnying rgyud): nga la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mis so// phra men ma thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang pa chen po he d+yA ka'i rdo rjes so// ma mo'i gdon thams cad las thar bar brub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drug mos so// phra men ma sems cad kyis bya
186a7(rnying rgyud): btab pa la thar bar bya ba dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar 'jug pa dang / shi ba gsob la ni dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje dbang bskur bas so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so// rims thams cad rab tu zhib la
186b1(rnying rgyud): na rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so// dug thams cad gzhig pa dang bza' ba dang 'bab pa dang 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// drug thams cad dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad bdud cing bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dug mad pas so// ga
186b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad du byad dang ro langs dang byur dang gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi nus pa gzhag pa la rdo rdo rje gas pa'i sbyin sreg gis so// rtsod pa thams cad dang 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so// yams dang 'tshe ba thams cad dang rdzogs
186b3(rnying rgyud): dang rmi lam ngan pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhabs so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang mongs par bya ba dang lpags par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang gsad pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gshed byed kyis so// 'thab mo nyams
186b4(rnying rgyud): cad las rgyal ba thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyan gyis so// gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje legs byas so// bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs sbyor gyis po// dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje
186b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so// bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so// sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so// char dbab pa yi ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sdigs mdzub kyis so// thog dbab pa dang / glog dang / rlung
186b6(rnying rgyud): char zhi bar bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin srung gis so// sprin dang mun pa dang // brag na zhi bar bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i spyan gyis so// klu thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni gsang ba thams cadakyi
186b7(rnying rgyud): nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bas so// klu thams cad 'byin pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'don pas so// sa ma lus pa g.yo zhing 'grel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so// chu med pa mu'i phung po char cher
187a1(rnying rgyud): bsil zhing dri ma med par bskyed pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// mud pa N+DI ma'i snang ba chen po bskyed pa la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyasas// rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba lan rdo rje drung thams cad kyis so// nam mkha' la gzugs thams cad
187a2(rnying rgyud): kun du ston pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pas so// nam mkha' las dngos po thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsing ba'i 'byung bas so// nam mkha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun du bstan par bya ba la na rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so// nam mkha' la de bzhin
187a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas so// nam mkhar shing thams cad la lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i/
187a4(rnying rgyud): dus kyi phyag rgyas so// sa'i cha thams cad la 'bru'i cha thams cad smin par 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gshol gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad las lha'i kha zas dang // btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gnas sar pa dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'byung ba dang / skyes pa dang bung
187a5(rnying rgyud): med dang / bran pho dang / bran mo thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bsod nams kyi chu yis so// g.yul du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi bstan cing g.yul 'gyed pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sdom pas so// sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni/ rdo rje bde
187a6(rnying rgyud): mchog gis so// bde mchog gi bya ba thams cad pa ni rdo rje sa ma'i bya bas so// rmad du 'byung ba dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rmad du 'byung ba'i thu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas so// lan thams cad gdab par bya ba la ni rdo rje linu bstan pas so// me rengs par bya ba
187a7(rnying rgyud): la ni rdo rje shin tu grang bas so// chu dbab par bya ba la ni rdo rje zla ba'i chu shel gyis so// dgon pa dang / grong dang / nags dang / chu bo dang / rdzing bu dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zas dang skom dang / gtsug lag yang bsrung ba li ni rdo rje grub pas so// chu'i steng du bzhag pa
187b1(rnying rgyud): dang / bdag nyid gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyu phyag rgyas so// lha la sogs pa thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' bsgobs so// sems can thams cad dang
187b2(rnying rgyud): du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang gis so// mi grub thams cad lba ba dang dbab pa dang / bden par spyad gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgyas so// gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dgod par bya ba dang / gar byed
187b3(rnying rgyud): du gzhug pa dang / kun du rol par bya ba dang / bsgo ba thams cad byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang / las thams cad byed du gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig bsgrubs pas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i
187b4(rnying rgyud): du bye // ra ga pa sa// rnams dun pa sbyin sa'o// sa rnams pas/ mang dpa rdzu la
187b5(rnying rgyud): ngag gis so// gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam mthong bas so// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sreg blugs kyis so// rmi lam bzang ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje rje lam grab pas so// nad dang
187b6(rnying rgyud): gnod pa thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje sman gyis so// rims nad thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bcud len gyis so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje dUr bas so// dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral bas so// rna thams
187b7(rnying rgyud): dpesab pa la ni rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so// gsung thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rang gi lces 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos po thams cad bden par ston pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i ljags kyi mchog gis so// thugs thams cad bsrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams
188a1(rnying rgyud): cad bskyed pas mo// mo thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgyas thams cad bcing ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen pos so// thams
188a2(rnying rgyud): cad dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// las thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas so// dngos grub thams cad la na rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po grub pas so// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la ni rdo/ ltung ba las gdon pa'i phyag
188a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad kyi mchod pa bya ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gar gyis so// rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub
188a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen pos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba mchog gi bde ba chen pos so// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas
188a5(rnying rgyud): so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po lus rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcos ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa gsang ba'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad
188a6(rnying rgyud): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab po// bde ba chen por rabakrub dang /
188a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags chen po rnam ngag phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa mthar yas nyid// dam pa'i rigs ni bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngam tshig bde ba chen po mi byed pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bcom
188b1(rnying rgyud): rgan dang kyi chu dang / dang thugs de thams cad la ban ba jugs nas byam su kyi / mnyam par smras nas bdab chen pa canan gnas 'de gsungs sa// oMH/ de nas 'di gsangs pa ma rjes// rnam padrug tu g.yos gyur te// sangs rgyas nas dang
188b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa bad+ma// sman nus 'das shing bstan par 'gyur// dkyi 'khod rten pa'i N+Di ba gas// rnams cad klub gyir gnanas pa jigs// bzhed pa chen po'i tha par bris// cheng byung chen po rab tu bzhudang // de nis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa darje ma
188b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' de bzhin du rjel snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen po'i da mjig rdo rje gsung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs sa// 'di ltar mon gyis bris nas ni// rgal pa g.yo dra ba skems 'dzin pa// dam chog mchog gi mchog bkod nas// sa ma ya
188b4(rnying rgyud): skye zhes parjod // de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas// rdo rje ma tshon che la sogs gzung // byang chub sems dpa' sems dang rtse// ma tog ma sags snyi bral ster// de la 'dag pa la sogs pa'i tshig byis pa'i khyad par dri 'i yin / de bzhin gshegs
188b5(rnying rgyud): baM thams cad la phyag bya ba'i phyag tu dang rdo rje'i klu bangs 'jug par bya'o// de rje sems dpa' bsdus pa las// rdo rje rin chen than med// dza dzaM chos ri kla grangs pas// lasan byed par 'gyur// de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
188b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi gzungs bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyis dgug par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ma d+ha s+ya le sarba d+har thab ma ta ya/ sarba tathA ga tA dz+nyA na mr-i man+ta pA dai dzaHdz+r-IM ba~M hoH/ de nas de bzhin gsheg thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa yang dag par byon par babyung
188b7(rnying rgyud): ro/ yid pa de ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo // tshe 'phrul ngam dag thong bayi do// de sa chog rgyas pa dang / bslab pa dang / srid kyipa'i dong pa'i ngas bu'i thams cad du/ doni yod pa dang / thogs pa meng par sbyor rungs pa grub pa yin nong ba /
189a1(rnying rgyud): de nas sa bsgrubs par lan cig baHsa pas las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad bsrung ba lan dwo dzA badz+hag tu byas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la n+ya rdorje mdod sbas so// chos nyid thams cad thob pa lan na ljongs tad kyim /
189a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bos so// byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgyas so// bdud thams cad ga/ zhom pa la ni bdud
189a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'joms par byed pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
189a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po'i thabs bde ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
189a5(rnying rgyud): thugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba rtsen par bkru ba dang // chags pa chen po na ma dag phyir// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// rang rigs sul mdzod rdong 'dzin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
189a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkab rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs te/ hU~M ra b+ha dz+wa la mA lA pra la ya a g+ni pra ti pa ta te ngo ma hA su ra ta badz+ra kro d+ha dzaHhU~M ba~M to phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag rnga
189a7(rnying rgyud): rdo'i rdo rje las kun nas 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i snying po can smin ma 'gyur zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa/ slar ser zhing spyan 'bar ba/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas ma mchu'i spos rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba dang rdo rje dang gzhu la sogs pa
189b1(rnying rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kha mas gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad nas rdo rje dmachog chen po'i byin gyis brlabs so// dkyil 'khor chen po zag padab bya/
189b2(rnying rgyud): la dang po khros pa bzhag/ su ra tod b+ha ba dz+haiM zhes zlos// ut+pal sngon po'i 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal// khro dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje skyil mo gung gis bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar
189b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// thams cad du ni khro bo bri// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen pos dang por slob dpon gyis 'dug par bya ste/ slob ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// slob dpon zhugs nas khros pas lcags kyu de nyid kyis
189b4(rnying rgyud): dgug par bya'o// hU~M su ra ta badz+ra kro d+ha a ya te/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dza/ sarba badz+ra ku la ne tra pra we shwa ya hU~M/ sarba mu drA ga Na ban d+ha ya paM/ sarba ma yA ma bi shwa ku ru ho/ sarba karma ni tra satwa ya a/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas
189b5(rnying rgyud): pa byon zhing grub pa yin no// slob dpon dang slob ma rnams la dgyes pa dang / khro bo 'babs pa'i mtshan ma yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na/ de grub pa dang / dngos grub dang / cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin du'o// gal te
189b6(rnying rgyud): ma grub na lan cig bkra'o// khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so// sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dug pa la ni rdo rje khro ba'i gsang bas so// 'jig rten gsum po las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum
189b7(rnying rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang // gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang // gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgril ba dang / gsang
190a1(rnying rgyud): par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdos thobs so// thams cad srung par bya ba da mangs bams// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa khrobs so// thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gang rnangs kyis so// las thams
190a2(rnying rgyud): dgod pa pa ni bde ba chen po de rdo da ma tshig gi khro bos so// bde ba ched po rdo rje'i gsang ba las rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kya na ya
190a3(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa btab po// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam
190a4(rnying rgyud): dag byer// pad+ma rigs chen dag pa ni// mchog rjem khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad la gzigs pa rdo rje 'is bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzade nas bde 'chen po rdo rje gsang pa' badra gas bya ba sngags
190a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// oM hrI ba~M ho/ 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas pad+ma'i mdog gi mdangs can/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu pad+ma'i mdangs la sogs pa yongs su 'don pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i rtsa
190a6(rnying rgyud): brda dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang pa dang / pad+ma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas rdo rje skyil lo/
190a7(rnying rgyud): krung gis bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri// de nas rdo rje badras zhugs la mdzupa mo'i lcags gyog nyis
190b1(rnying rgyud): kyis dgug par byang// oM bra~M noH/ ahrIHma tha su la ba rtsam lo ke shA rA ya me// A A ta pra bre shaN+Di d+hi thab/ si rnam ma su dru de ma taH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sman ras gzigs dbang byug d+ha tum tshag thams cad stsol bar shA //
190b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs kyang lan cig bzlas pa las thams cad byed do// slob pa thams cad snang ba la ni pad+ma chen pos so// thams cad bsrung ba la ni pad+ma'i gtsug
190b3(rnying rgyud): tor gyis so// thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni pad+ma la stobs so// thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni pad+ma kha 'byed pas so// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i 'dod chags kyis so// skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po dpa
190b4(rnying rgyud): phyag gis so// rmi lam brtag pa la ni pad+ma chen po dmar pos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa med pas so// bde ba chen po pad+ma gsang ba las bde ba chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi cho ga ches pa'o// // de nas de
190b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btang ngo // bde
190b6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni// mgrin 'byor phyir ni skyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par
190b7(rnying rgyud): gdon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// oM l-i tid+ha b+ha trUT te trAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po cha rab tu phyung nas phyag g.yon pa
191a1(rnying rgyud): // rang tu gnas so// nor bu rin po che dag pa de yang mnad rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po rje rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chun po tshul
191a2(rnying rgyud): zhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya// rdo rje rin chen bdag po bzhag/ nor bu'i rigs ni chen po bri// rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas zhugs te/ de bzhin du mdzu ba mo gnyis kyi rdo rje lcags klupa dgug par bya'o// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra
191a3(rnying rgyud): bi b+hU tA ya thA ga bAn ti A kar+Na pa gang bri sarbata thA ga ta ma gr-i sa~M tras ma ben d+ha ma d+her mdzaH/ tri big A hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam mkha'i snying pa'i nar bu thams cad dang bcas pa rtsod pa yin no// hU~M la nas su ldang ba'i mtshan ma byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
191a4(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan cig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni
191a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus so// don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse myos so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so// gter men po thob par bya ba ldan do ches gyim 'og gi phyag rgyas so// 'di smos sam/
191a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen chen po'i sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so// rdo rje dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che chen po'i phred pas so// de bzhin gshegs
191a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang bsrung ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bsrung ba dam pa'i phreng bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbong bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kye spu'i mchog gi rdo rje rin gyen gyi cod pan gyi phred pas so// bde ba chen po rdo gsang ba pas bde ba

192a1(rnying rgyud): las thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs bsdus pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas lha la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad bcom ldan 'das las rang rang gi rjes su gnang ba mnos nas sems can thams cad la ba depa'i don yong pa bco
192a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhabs la phyag byas nas/ rang rang gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di rnams phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum pos gsol pa ni/ oM b+h+rU~M dz+haiM/ de nas dkyil 'khor bI ba ni// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// de pe
192a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su dngos grub phyir// gzhu yi se ral khar ldan zhing // mda' dang tsa sha ga thogs bri// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// bsgrub pa thams cad grub pa po// rtse gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis// pus mo lhar btsugs byas te// zhugs nas dam tshig bcings
192a4(rnying rgyud): nas ni// yang dag dgug pa nyid du bya// oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad kun gyis yongs bskor ba// dngos grub kun don 'ongs pa la// ci ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon gyis ni 'jug pa yis// slob ma thams
192a5(rnying rgyud): cad gzhug par bya// dam tshig mchog gi de nyid dang // gsang ba'i de nyid brjod par bya// gal te ma brtags la smras dang // 'on te ci skad bshad pa'i chos// 'dir ni kun du ma spyad na// rtse gsum gyis ni khyod snying 'joms// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa dang //
192a6(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// ming po gsum po 'di dag ste// nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di dag la brgyas pas// yang dang yang du rab zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa de// dngos grub thams cad thob pa ni// phyag rgya dag kyang
192a7(rnying rgyud): bstan byas nas// de yis gar gyi mchod pa bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i lha mo rnas sa kyis rang gi phyag rgya phul lo// hrIHhU~M ts+tshadz+haiM/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bya ba ni// grubazhi pa po sgo bzhi pa//
192b1(rnying rgyud): thig pade ba dang yang dag ldan// ka ba chen po bzhi dang bcas// glu chang bzhi yis rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su bzhin du// dkyil la khyod bzhi do tho bar bya// gong ma dor rdzogs bzhi po ni// snying po dang bzlas ga dag par bya// dbu' bo lag nasatshon mthogs//
192b2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub bya ba bskems dang bcas// de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin kun nas 'jug par bya// sring mo rang gi phyag rgya yis// go rims bzhin du 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas 'dug pa la sogs kyis// cho ga bzhin du mchod byas nas// gsang nga de nyi
192b3(rnying rgyud): rab grub pas// dgug pa yang dag bya ba yin// oM kA li ma nir de pro ta la me d+hA rA k+Sha si ba ra s+thA ma ya he ba ho pa/ ba ra he bri d+ye tI ma ya swA hA/ sid d+hi ke sid d+he stA ma a he/ phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis so// hrIHhU~M shrI Sh+yo// de nas thams cad dbab par 'gyur ro// dbas
192b4(rnying rgyud): nas gzhug par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs la/ mAn bsgrags nas gsang ba brjod par bya'o// sems can don la gang zhugs pa// gang du dkyil 'khor ston pa rnams// gal te gsang ba mi srung na// khyod kyis de dag gsang pa ra//
192b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin zas dang skom dang ro// chos kyis 'jig rten bde ba dang // chos min pas ni sdug bsngal ster// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// ci 'dod par ni mchod par bya// ci snyed pa dang ci 'dod bzhin// yul rnams
192b6(rnying rgyud): la ni brten par bya// de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis rang gi snying po phul lo// oM sarba ma hA tsakr-i pra brta ya da d+hA ya baM hU~M phaT/ zur bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// khru gang tsam du brkos byas nas// gyen dub bltas zho bri b+ha// bde la cho ga la sogs bri bar bya// 2
192b7(rnying rgyud): lo rab tu lugs byas la// yang dag dgug pas dgug par bya// me tog la sogs mchod pa dang // sha la sogs pas gtor ma bya// oM biSh+Ta tsakra A na ya sham par tsi ma tse ta traM su ra a d+hi ban ke sho hi/ sarba mA g+ha g+hA ti d+ha pa ma med d+ha hA d+ha swA hA/ de nas med/
193a1(rnying rgyud): // kyis 'dod pa'i sgyum thams cad grub pa yin no// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin du bya'o// de nas klu'i rigs bzhis snying po phul lo// phuH/ de nas de yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbrul gyi thig gis kun tu bri// klu yi gdengs na
193a2(rnying rgyud): mos 'khyud // mtshams kyi tshor ni mjug rtse mdung // de yi dbus sras 'don pa// gru yi rgyal po she Sha bre// shes rab can gyi gru chen gyi// rigs rnams thams cad bri bar bya// de nas ting 'dzin shugs kyis ni// khros shing 'khrugs pas 'jug par bya// dkyil
193a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor der ni rab zhugs nas// gdengs ka'i phyag rgyas dgug par bya// oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga br-i shrI k+kind d+ha ra she Sha Na/ I ya d+hI muHsa rba rA ga ku la A na ya hUM phuH/ sa ma ya pra be shA ya phuH/ sa na~M sA d+ha ya phuHg+huHphuHphuH/ de nas klu thams cad phuHzhes bya ba rlos
193a4(rnying rgyud): shing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas 'babs par 'gyur zhing 'thob po// de nas slob dpon gyis ri mo'i phyag rgyas dug med par bya'o// de nas brtsams te thams cad zos na yang bdud rtsi bzhin du 'ju bar byed de// 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu gar byed pa dang // dug thams
193a5(rnying rgyud): cad sreg pa dang 'jig pa dang za ba nus par 'gyur ro// de nas ci 'dod pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten drug gsum mo// gal te bden las 'das gyur na// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'di rtag gnas/ gal te
193a6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thob 'dod na// glog lnga brnyes par mi bya'o// ser ba bzlog par mi bya'o// sbrul ni gang yang gsang mi bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las bde ba chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga nus pa'o//
193a7(rnying rgyud): dram bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor ba cu'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje chen po me// ri rang riyi rtse mo ni// rdo rje rin chen 'od gsal bas// dri med gzi brjid mdzes pa la// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud kyis ni rnam par mdzes//
193b1(rnying rgyud): khakhyed rnams la gnas pa yi// rdo rje lha mo'i chags kyis mchod// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// rlung gis bstod pa'i dar dpyangs kyi// ba dan rdzil bu'i sgra sgrogs pa// drab mo yong me tog ga// phreng ba chen po btags pas bcan
193b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje kun gyis mngon 'dus byas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bsten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// nor bu che mchog
193b3(rnying rgyud): paT/ rdo rje chen po'i khang pa na// bde ba chen po bzhugs pa yin// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/
193b4(rnying rgyud): brtan phyir sems dpar bshad pa yin// mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa'i phyir ni rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa'i byin rlabs spong ba yis// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// de nyid rtag pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub spyod pa 'i rjes
193b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro yin// rang sems so sor rtogs sogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// bdud ni sangs rgyas rdo rje che// rdo rje 'chud chen de nyid yin// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs drag pa// de nyi
193b6(rnying rgyud): nor bu'i rigs dam pa// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba'i// 'dod dong thar pa de nyid yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan zhing snying ba nor
193b7(rnying rgyud): rtsub sems kyi 'du byed thabs// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bder ba sogs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// pad+ma'i lte bar zhugs pa yin// ba dzun mo'i tshogs pa
194a1(rnying rgyud): sna chags pa'o// dan ma ma rnams rgyas pakar// bdab can par ba grub dang // 'dang chags chen pa rnam dag ra// malus gdul kya na // dang sa brab thams cad bathab // bdag nyid lus pas sems da du// dang sa
194a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rab grub phyir// dam chog mchog gi mtshwa ba rnams// rnal bas kyang ni snang bar mdzad// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsar ba dang // rdo rje bsnyems pa yang dag 'chang // phyag tha thams cad rnam dag dang // rdo rjes sus dpa' mchog thab phyir// 'du
194a3(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje che// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// ye shes phyag car yang dag ldan// snying po chen po dam pa yin// gang gis bsod nams mi ldan dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma lus zhugs// don yod thogs med nyid mchog ge// dngos grub thams cad rnyeng
194a4(rnying rgyud): si dkar// bad ba chen padz+rad+d+hoH// gsang ba'i ma tsag skyed ma rgyag pad+mar// rangs kyi rnams cad sgrub ba yan// rtog pathams dadu ltung 'grub byed// zagam tha med ci dang po byung // bsod rnams thams cad ze mthob// gzacan rnams kyi bdam /

195a1(rnying rgyud): // bcas bskams pa pa// phyag rgya mchog gis rang nyid 'dug/ dkyil 'bar dadu lugs nas kyang // lan gsum dud paskod ba tha// rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun 'dug // dgad kasang bangang brjod par bya// \u0f7fma su la badz+ras/
195a2(rnying rgyud): ma ya s+t+waM a nu ra D+ho ma b+ha ba/ swa toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ dri D+ho ma thA ba/ su po Sh+yo mab+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga b+han a na di ni d+hen k+Sha hA/ ma hA su ma badz+ra satwa sa ma ya gu h+ya sa mA ya/ sid d+hi ma me pra ya ts+tsha oM ha ha ha ha sA/ de nas rab tu dag rabs rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya// oM badz+ra
195a3(rnying rgyud): dr-i rje sa me pa ke ma Ta badz+ra ka li kI lo ho// hU~M sbyar ba dzi Ni ban d+ha hU~M hU~M d+ha T+Ta badz+ra Ni d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye par 'dug ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub par mdzod cig ces bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa brjod par byang // sbyang nga thams
195a4(rnying rgyud): cad rjes chags par// ki li ki las thams cad nus// thams cad rjes su chags dran dang // rtag tu legs par mnyes gyur pa dag/ oM ma hA su khwa sid d+hi badz+ra satwa dzaHhU~M baM hoHsid d+h+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM sid d+hi hUM/ de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs
195a5(rnying rgyud): la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste// bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes rang gi ming brjod la/ snga ma bzhin du gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa bya ste// ci ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob ma dang lhan cig mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug par bya ning rang nyid kyang
195a6(rnying rgyud): de zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdagra bo dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang // phan 'dogs nus pa dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes
195a7(rnying rgyud): kyi las byed pas rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das te nges par rang nyid dang gi dam tshig gis rdo rje
195b1(rnying rgyud): slob dpon du gyur nas 'dug par mdzad do// las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa yang mdzad pa yin no// snying po 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro// phan cig bzlas pa cwa
195b2(rnying rgyud): byas pas mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dge ba dang / shes pa yin no// rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad ma lus pas dgo dra bar mdzad nas dngos grub thams cad de la
195b3(rnying rgyud): stsol ba yin no// yongs su sbyang ba dang brten pa'i don du ma yin no// bgegs byed pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal ster bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang shin tu brtan zhing shin tu dgyes pa rjes su chags pa/ shin tu rgyas pa/ dngos grub rnams
195b4(rnying rgyud): cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du sgrub par mdzad pa yin no// 'on kyang gang gis bris sam/ 'dri rab tu ga gam/ lanA cig brjod pa'am/ 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing
195b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang tsha 'di nyid la ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
195b6(rnying rgyud): cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus te thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes su chags pa las byung ba yin no// 'dod pa brten pas rjes su chags pa ste/ de mi 'dod pa ci ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams
195b7(rnying rgyud): dadu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsungs so// grub na bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster// sgrub pa'i dam chog 'di yin te// 'di ni kun gyis 'da' bar dka'// sdig pa chen po byed
196a1(rnying rgyud): pa'am// de bzhin dkyil la bar mamapang ba// lan cig gnas pas rdeg sbyangs pas// mchog su' bras ni grub par gyu// rtog par gsungs pa mang dad pams// gzugs pams su ngan bsgrums na// rkang ba yang da thogs pas /
196a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad nyid phyir bdag pa grub// gang la gzug brtan med pa dang // glegs pam med par 'gyur na yang // yi ge hU~M thams cad dang // bris te bdag sgrub pasgrub par bya// zhes bya ba dan yid cing dgas pa med pa ngos zung ca rdo 'chang ben pas gsungs /
196a3(rnying rgyud): de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir// las kun sgrub par 'dod pa na// dkyil 'khor thams cad thog btab nas// mtshon ma'i phyag rgya bri par bya// dang ngo ba rjes zhugs nas brjod par byaste/ chags pa chel thogs rtse// rdzogs pa chelas bad rje//
196a4(rnying rgyud): brgya las rdo rnga bsan// rdo rje las ni phyag rgya'i byung // skye gsung thugs kyi ji yi// gzugs brnyan rab tu stor bA yis// phyag cha thams cad bshang bste// dam tshig 'dang bar dka' ba'o// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis che// sangs rgyas
196a5(rnying rgyud): sogs// yang dag bkrus par gyur na re// mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur// ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya la// bka ni 'da' bar dka' ba bre// de bzhin rgyal ba stan gyis byung // phyag rgya 'da' bar nus pa min// sangs rgyas nyid ngam 'jang //
196a6(rnying rgyud): ltar bskal pa bye ba yis// thob rten de ltar phyag rgya mcho// bsgos pa tod la 'thob// tsau skar gdul bye'i 'jig dz+nyAnA ni// de bzhin dngos grub gsungs pa yin// de yi thabs ni phyag d+ha ste// dngas grub thams cad byed par chog/ de bzhin chog rgyas pa
196a7(rnying rgyud): nga // dnga'i thub rnams cad gang ma 'o// denas dang po'i kyil 'khor gyi gseng ba'i mchog gi phyag rgya cing ba di yin te/ sor ma thams cad kun sbyar nas// rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// sar midang cings pa las// rdo brtsams par yang dris pa /
196b1(rnying rgyud): rang bsdams pa nang dun// mdzubya ma mthab yang dag sbyar// g.yas pa yi nim za ba brtag/ bcugs patsor byung ljags kyu 'dun// mnga' lta bskas pa bcings nas ni// dbus pa'i brdungs pa nang drug nas// man dang bsnyams pa de sa ba dod // ra
196b2(rnying rgyud): bde 'a dam pa brtan// mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'o rtse// mig 'bras ltar sbyar 'dzin pa'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og tu ni// mthe bong gis mnan pa tsir par bya// rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dra ba// srin lag mthe'u chung kha bye ba// bskor nas pus mor bzhag pa ni/
196b3(rnying rgyud): bo'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// gyen du gtor dang thung du zhugs// mthe bo sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang // bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying gAr bzhag pa dang // yongs su bskor zhing dgor pa'o// kha las gyen 'byung ba
196b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang // mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis dang // g.yon pa'i mdzub ma'i g.yas kyis bzung // mdzub mo'i mthe bo bcing ba dang // mthe bo tha ma'i nang du gzhag/ khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas don yod cing thogs pa
196b5(rnying rgyud): 'di dmas kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba/ mchog tu gsang ba/ bla na med cing / bla ma'i lus kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nus so// de la bde ba chen po'i 'ji rje dbus ma las/
196b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje se mo'i rtse mo mchul sogs par gzhag pa dang / 'khor lo rab tu bskar ba dang / rdorje nor bu dang ci ltar 'dod pa'i dang sa grub kun du byed pa rnams kyi rdo 'chang chen po dang // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rin po che dang mchog gi dngas grub po/
196b7(rnying rgyud): 'drernams rnamag 'bras kyi lasas// gangs pa dang gaman pa'i migagos pa ltas pas thams cad rjes su chags pa'o// mig 'bras myo 'dzin pas ni dpag dang // gzug pas thams sad gtsug pa'o// 'thong bas 'tshong ba'o// brnams pa meng pa
197a1(rnying rgyud): // dbang du bya'o// rdo rje kI li ki las dbus ma la tsum pa na dang / 'khyung pa dang / btsir ba dang / rol pa dang / dbus ma dang / mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar brdeg pas mthong ba dang / rol pa dang / btsir ba rnams kyis thams cad la rol pa ste/ rgyang
197a2(rnying rgyud): dang mi rgyu ba thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyi bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no// ci srid 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo la yang rol par byed do// rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang / gyen du bteg pa dang / myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams
197a3(rnying rgyud): kyis brten pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nang du gnas pa dang / 'chag pa dang / thams cad za ba grub pa'o// rdo rje bskor bas g.yo zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod par byed pa dang / btsing ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun
197a4(rnying rgyud): lhan cig dgug pa dang / mgyogs par dbus ma'i rdo rje dril ba rnams kyis khro bo thams cad 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub bo// mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams
197a5(rnying rgyud): kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyi mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyis lha'i bu mo thams cad kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad la nye bar sbyar ba'o// rdo rje lcags kyu ma la/
197a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad do// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / las kyi dngos grub grub pa'o// don yong
197a7(rnying rgyud): pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pas yid kyis 'dod pa grub pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes rtags kyi rtse mo g.yo ba las thams cad do// skye gnas g.yo bas kyang de bzhin no// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i
197b1(rnying rgyud): las byed pas dngos grub thams cad sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mig mi g.yo bar byed pas las thams cad bsgrub par byas na thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rang gi phyag mtshan rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dang
197b2(rnying rgyud): po nyin re lan cig tu// phyag rgya chen po'i snying po bzla// rdo rje nye ba'i snying po yis// phyag rgya thams cad nges sbyar bya// thams cad don yod grub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog phyi ma// sgrub pa'i don yod dam tshig ni// snying pos skad
197b3(rnying rgyud): cig dngos grub ster// rtsa rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med// dngos grub mchog ni de bzhin du// bla med ye shes grub pa'o// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom
197b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni/ pang pa g.yon du dgod bya ba// zhabs kyi pad+ma ci bder bri// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// sku ni drang por 'dzin pa bde// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems pa yang dag 'chang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo
197b5(rnying rgyud): rje yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dang // dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya'i rjes 'brangs nas//
197b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen por rang nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhing pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bshad do// rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi po 'di las byung ngo // mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu'i phyi rol du mngon par
197b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs pa'o// mthe bos 'khrung pa'o// mthe bo gnyis kha phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyis dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren cing srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam por sbyar la rtse mo so sor kha phye bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi bsgreng ba'o// brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa'o// de bzhin du
198a1(rnying rgyud): mtshams rnams pa ma pa ma bskar bsas// rlo mas dang brnams pa brgya byasas// 'a mchog ga // dbyan nga byubar bsngom pa// yang sogs das rdzog rtogs ga/ ngas rtson pa dog byeng da/
198a2(rnying rgyud): de nas chos kyi phyag d+ha ni// ho bad d+hi d+h+r-ig b+h+rUM/ de rnams kyis kyang dngos grub thams cad skyelci ba'o// de nas las kyi lhag ni/ 'orje ma tshung rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o// g.yon pa'i rje bsnyems pas g.yas pa'i bu rgyar stod pa'i tshul gyis ting gar brdung bar byas
198a3(rnying rgyud): pardo rje bsnyems pa ste/ rab tu dga' ba brtan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o// mda' gzhu stong pas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o// 'og tu 'khyud ba'o// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'o// bsnyems pa gnyis stod pa'o// sgeg pa dang bcas mtha' ma la sogs pas
198a4(rnying rgyud): bkrol bas glog 'gru ba'i gar g.yas su yongs su bskor bas mo tog la sogs pa'i ka pra ta'i thal mo spyi bo nas phab/ rdo rje thal mo bkrol bas de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o// rdo rje gar ni nang gi mchoms la'o// rdzogs pa'am ni mtshang
198a5(rnying rgyud): baT/ yang na ci ltar rnyed pa bzhin// me tog mchod la sogs ma yis// dngos grub mchog stsol thun mong yin// dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba'o// 'di rnams kyang don yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams so// rdo rje khu tshur kyis bdud rtsi'i chu
198a6(rnying rgyud): bzla'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ 'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// g.yon mtheb mdzub mo'i skye gnas su/
198a7(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa'i mthe bong rtags bcug la// btsir na byed pa ster ba'o// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa des// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'jug par bya// yang na sems dpa' gang la 'dug/ de der myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma'o// rang gi khru
198b1(rnying rgyud): tA kyis rdo rdo rje'i bdud rtsa'i chu blangs nas chu'i rgyun des/ dbang bskur te 'thung du bcug na dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// dang bsgyur brnams cad kyi sa?n tshod dang labab pa dang / na med pa dang / dngos klub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyung ngo //
198b2(rnying rgyud): gdon dang / drug dang / lhang drug dang / maM khang 'grom dang / thug rgyal sogs pas gnong ba byed pa'i mdzem so// rgyal mo thung gis ni ga dang mchod pa 'bul bar bya'o// de nas mdzad pa nyid nga gar byas so// do gra'angs pa 'ong sa dab
198b3(rnying rgyud): lo sbyar ba gar gyis so// ngos su tshur yongs su bzung ba// rdo rje bskyed pas rdo rje mtshon ma la sogs pa bsgreng par bya skye/ mthor sgeg ma dga' bang rje gsang ba'i bad pa dang bcas pa pad la dang ldan g.yo bas phyag 'tshal ba // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang byas
198b4(rnying rgyud): pas d+maga' dathams cad la sogs pa'i bye pa dang snang bde ba thams cad sti dngos grub snol ba yin no// rdo rje bsdams pa btsod pa rang gi snying gar bde ba dgro'i nang kyil 'khor dkrol bra la dro sems dpa' bcwom pas gu dang rdorje ping kyis gye du bteg la rim pas dang 'i
198b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du zhugs nang mtshi garnams par mi gyur ro// rdorje sems dpa'i sbom pos dkyil 'khor la phyags na dematshig nyams par mi gyur ro// / de nas pas kyi phyag tu'i rgyung de/ bad bachen pardzu rgyul dang pral ba dang / snying gur bdag pa zab tu
198b6(rnying rgyud): sa dang bar babar ba 'byung bar ste/ ngamani pa rgyal ba can rnams kyis kyang 'jug par smras pa// snying gAr bya ba bcas par/ pab ba su bstsu phy-i bar bya// rang gi slongadang yongs sa gangs sa gang pa smos pa ga
198b7(rnying rgyud): sdig par ga// rin gnasasu pa ga byung bar ba'i par byung // nga bye sa kyi dang sung ngas nga ma phyis pa las babyed pa'o// mya gtus par bya// sal ga par byur// ga sa
199a1(rnying rgyud): nas// ma pa sa sa pa ga pagapa na sa na gyur// das nga byag/ ga pa rgyu bya/ nas ga / khas pa pa ga/ yangasas ga/ 'a babasas da
199a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa'i mdzub na 'jig sam ba// mdzan mo ldang par byu// mam nga sa su n+d+ha// leg sus kyi da pa par// dang po shing ngas pargyud par byang // de rnam par 'byung ba ba sa// ning yongs su nong namang tha 'i byen
199a3(rnying rgyud): bzlabs gnas pa'o// de nyid kyis nam mkhang la rdeg pa'o// g.yo zhing 'dzums pa'i mig gis phyag rgya macings pa dgrol ba'o// mnan chung gi nir bras rig par byang // mdzub mo cheshes pos thabras kyi song po rde bar bya skye bza' ba ma yid kyis gnag ra byed
199a4(rnying rgyud): mas sbyid sreg pyod pa'o// rab tu dga' ba 'jo gdang par dgrol bar bya'o// rkye theg med pa'i// mthe rdung gnyis skye gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya rdul bar gyur// t+pa la ga dang tham mnyam par srung so ma bdan kyi tshul nga 'byed bar bya // rdo rje b.las pas lags pa
199a5(rnying rgyud): pa mdzub mo mtho bong mnyam por gye ba dang bzug pa bsnor nas dul bar bya'o// rdo rje bsnams pa rab tu brdung ba'i mtham sa pa rig par hU~M'o// dang po'i rje srin snang ba ra// madz+ra ba mos char babyed por bya'o// mdzu ba mos brtog par // rdo rjebs pas bzlog par bya//
199a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do// mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o// mdze'u chung rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo// mdzub mos sa 'og nas chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje sa la bzung nas g.yo bar bya'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa
199a7(rnying rgyud): rtse mo ba'i'i 'od zer gyis me sgeg ston pa'o// mdzub mos rlung skyed pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo'i rtse sos me long dang / rol pa dang / nam mkha' la rdo rje blte ba dang / steng du bkor bar bya'o// rdo rje'i mdangs shang drung thams cad dang / dag sa
199b1(rnying rgyud): sa la su / du / na na 'gyun sun sa da smra/
199b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma sa sa
199b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa ma 'a sa su
199b4(rnying rgyud): pa ngas rnyi dbye ga pal ba kyis su ma na pa pa byas pa gyug/ pa byu la/ 'du tshu nga mig parnam par thu// sa ga bar gyur// ma
