199b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa // du ma pa sa cug na sa nas su khyod
199b6(rnying rgyud): na pa nga dashAng gan par gyu// rnab ca sa sug ba // sgrigs dul / sa sbyin ga/
199b7(rnying rgyud): rje nga ma ma pa su / mapas mang mi ngas kyi du mang ni su gagagasas su kyi sa
200a1(rnying rgyud): // rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no// mdzub mo phyir rdzogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje snying gar badz+ro hoM zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o// de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje sgom zhing ma hA sa ha haM zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta thA ga to&ti bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bshad do//
200a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje khu tshur bcing ba ni/ mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pabacing // mdzub mo bcug pa gnyis kyis brgyadan// mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni// mthe bong gnyis kyi/ bsgyur ba// dmachog chen po rdo rje mchog/ khu tshur dngos grub mchog gu stsol// ngong khwa
200a3(rnying rgyud): brtags// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni/ phyag rgya chen po rnams ni ta thA ga to&haM zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o// dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam pa'o// rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'o// mda' la sogs pa
200a4(rnying rgyud): bcing ba ni de bzhin no// las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba'o// lcags kyu ma bzhin no// khu tshur gyi khyad par rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa dam tshig gi khu tshur te/ de gnyis su byas pa de
200a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o// 'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang mdzod
200a6(rnying rgyud): spu dang snying gar bzhag ste bskor zhing bskor bas mkhur tshos dang / gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang sbyin pa'i tshul bya'o// g.yon pa snying gar bzung ste g.yus pa'i mdzub mo gcig gi
200a7(rnying rgyud): sa la reg pa'o// g.yon pa'i kho bo'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du mngon par rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du myur du thob pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas brtan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo // // de nas rdo rje
200b1(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi thag na chog rgyas pa'i chung de/ 'jug par phyag rab tuduga'abrar rdo ba'i dgraklu pa'i phyags tud do// phyag tu chen po rnams sang nga bzhinan// dmachog ni 'og tu rang ba sdams pa'i snor ma thams cad 'bar bya'i nang duman nga da ma po na dudu chu
200b2(rnying rgyud): 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o// gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no// chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin no// khu tshur gyi khyad par ro// rdo rje u ts+tsha gyis mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bo// dam tshig las byung ba nid bzhin no// de nas las kyi phyag
200b3(rnying rgyud): d+ma yang sa smrams/ la ga shings rgyu da dag gyu ga / da ga rdzog dzin na // ma mi du
200b4(rnying rgyud): bair byen// he d+he rang gong pas bzhang par bya// skye gu rje bsams pa sna rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen pa'o// / de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi \u0f88\u0f90k+ShaT+Ta dzI kA rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdodza'i mAdzub mo gnyis pa la de'i steng gar gzhug pa ni rdo //
200b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen pa mi sogs pa'i phyag na thams cad rnying bzhin no// dum tshig gi khrid par dang khu khrur gyi grang bar ro// kha 'brim pa'i thal mo las mthe ba dang mthe rlung babye bas 'dabum pa'i ba'i bdu chen po'o// thams cad pabacing pon ci sgrub pazhin no// khyi
200b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzab mo gnyis bkrag le sratha pong mnyam par brdzang la dbus ma gnyis kyi rab drug shibs pa dang bcas pa bzhag pa sad gtam sa byas pa pad+ma 'i tshur ro// de nas las kyi phyag rnarnams ni/ pad+ma med po'i tha shang ba'o/
200b7(rnying rgyud): deni nga 'i slebs pas par bya'o// denyi song sa thams cad 'byabs do// nyid dri'i gnyis gnyis kyo gag// de nyid legs par byang ba'o// ngabyed dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par byung // den g.yon par
201a1(rnying rgyud): gnas su mab po'i rtags bcug pa 'o// / de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi mo / rgyas pa ni/ rngon thal mo rab tu brgyad zhing mthe bo mnyam po la mdzub mo bklag pa bzhag ste dpral ba'i mdzod sgra'i phyogs su ba'ag na dbang bsgra
201a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad gsol ba'o// phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no// dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bo rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o// gzhan rnams ni de las byung
201a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro// de gnyis su byas nas rin po che'i khu byor ro// de nas pas kyi phyag rje rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o// kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam po kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o// dbus
201a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i nor bu'o// mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o// 'og tu gtor ba'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o// rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod lha'i phyogs su bzhag ste/ mdzub
201a5(rnying rgyud): mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o// mthe bo gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go// des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang
201a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab tu bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang rgyab dang logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha mu la sogs pa bkrol bar byas nas/ phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud pa bya zhing dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum
201a7(rnying rgyud): gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lnga ba bzhin no// de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon par kham por dang g.yas su meda' bstod pa'i phyag rgya'o//
201b1(rnying rgyud): dmachog gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis su ku rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o// ci nas skar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// dam tshig ni gung ma
201b2(rnying rgyud): srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung dang srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par la
201b3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no// lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o// // de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g.yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang / dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste lha ma yin thams cad kyi sku ma tham
201b4(rnying rgyud): cad don yod par bslab pa'o// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bo gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol du phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o// gal
201b5(rnying rgyud): 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// krung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdung pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sbeng skye bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyis rtse mos brdeg par byas na dug thams cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang kun las bsdus te 'ja
201b6(rnying rgyud): pas ngag thams cad 'jig pa'o// 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang 'pho ba dug med par bya'o// phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyad do// / de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das bde
201b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje hU~M mdad rdo rdo rje'i rigs la ro// pad+ma chen po na pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo nar
202a1(rnying rgyud): nanang bu'i rigs sa// de nas gsung ga phyug rdzun/ sman pa'i klu'i la mas ca nul rnams rnas sa 'i bu'i na thanas sa blangs ta nas pa na rdzog nas dpa 'idags 'ad tu dag pa'o 'dug ga/ byu
202a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis shin tu g.yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byung ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste/ rigs thams cad dgos pa'o// sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hUM gi spyi phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdorje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo rje'i rigs so//
202a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyi dag pad+ma'i rigs la ste thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'o// chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la ste mchod pa'i nor bu'o// de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin
202a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs la'o// srung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o// // de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga
202a5(rnying rgyud): 'od zer gyi phreng bus rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang bde ba chen po'i rdorje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs lnga'o// rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rdo rtse bzhi pa rdzo sa
202a6(rnying rgyud): khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o// pad+ma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o// // de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon
202a7(rnying rgyud): mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa sbyar ba'i mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po/
202b1(rnying rgyud): ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go// gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying ba'o// thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i'o// / de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin
202b2(rnying rgyud): ma mchu'i sgos so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phra mos byon
202b3(rnying rgyud): gyis brlabs te/ dam tshig tsam du lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ngo // khro gnyer dang /
202b4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba byas nas shin tu ma 'gal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / rengs pa dang / nyal du bcug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i/
202b5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub skad cig mas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rigs la'o// btsums pa med pas brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o//
202b6(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni/ nyin re mngon du lan cig tu// snying
202b7(rnying rgyud): po rang nyid bslab pa ste// rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pas// phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ni/ snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmed du byung // ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis//
203a1(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i snying so gas ba 'a// don yong thogs med gsang ba dang // rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du// bsod nams med pa rnams la yang // dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la// steng du
203a2(rnying rgyud): 'di sbyin mib+ha// gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni// gal te dngos grub yid 'od 'dod// gang gi khyim du gnas myung ba'i// phyag rgya sngags 'di dge bste// gzhan gyis me thub mi sad cing // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// dum bu gnyis pa
203a3(rnying rgyud): sngags sum gyi rtsa chung rdzogs sa// sems can thams cad ba de don dang // bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyi// sras btsas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus// bde ba chen por bskub dang // chags pa chenapa
203a4(rnying rgyud): rnaMm da pyir// shegs pa thams cad bslus pa'i rgyud// sems dpa' gyen po bshad du gsol// rnam rtog meng bu'i chos rnams la// 'dir ni pa gang zhig 'arjod// snying po zhes ni gang bshad pa'i// ye shes byung ring lci zhin// dkyil 'khor
203a5(rnying rgyud): zhes ni brjod pa ci// der 'dug yon tan ci dang ldan// rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyang par dang // gzhan yang sgrub pa ji lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// 'di yang ci ltar de nyid gung // thog ma tha ma med nyid dang // rab tu dga' ba ji ltar
203a6(rnying rgyud): dang ma' rgyal 'a ma man// de bzhin nyid ni gang shig yin/ sprin ga sa gsusarje man na rjod// sa rje nyid na// de bzhin // sa m+b+han+tas rnams byung nga / rigs rnams
203a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur// rtog pa rnams kyang bsgrub pa dang // rdo po'i snyi po'i de nyid / steng pa phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams// bsad nams med pas
203b1(rnying rgyud): ta 'thag nga kyang byu sa zlas// matag sa dang ma mdag/ danams kyi nga snyam gyu// rjud pa yang na wA bya// gsang ba'i ma kyang pa gang dan// su byu kun zhugs na// sa gan
203b2(rnying rgyud): star thub// don yod thog med dngos grub kyis// de rnams ji ltar grub par 'gyur// gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin// 'di nyid du ni gang gis 'gyug// bde ba chen por bgru ba dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// gsang ba di ting gsang du ni
203b3(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams la kun be shang gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba ba tu 'bru'i tshig gas na nas// zhal rab tu bzhang de bzhad pa chen pos dematshig chen po thams cad kyi kho na nyid kyi do rje rnas/
203b4(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i rnam par gnon pa mang nga nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud kyim 'di gsungs so// de lnga rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ nam tog med pa'i ting 'dzin las// sems can don ni yongs su brtag/ des na brtag par bshad pa ste// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir/
203b5(rnying rgyud): de yang dab chen pa rjegasung ba'i dkyil 'byo ni 'di nahU~M// sa la mi gA'i gnas dris sa// de sbyin pa zhes brjod pa// de yid macig do rje bams m+bu byed pa'o// de la dkyi' la khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyu // ci myang gnas do
203b6(rnying rgyud): ra dun// ji ltar 'jig rten ci lta bu// 'khor ni dag par byab hUM// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor 'di// de nas dkyi 'byor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par sbyin pa'i rgyud ni/ rdorjes nas sogs sems dpa' yi// 'khor ba sa kyil 'a'adzo// zhus
203b7(rnying rgyud): da / jig shi'i ba'angade da gro// de nas rigs thamam byed kyi long ba'i byed par mi rung // rdo rjemabar po btags pa dog/ thugs kyi pab long ma ngo// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo bzhinadu// bad+ma 'a nga brgyad ni byam// de nas kyi
204a1(rnying rgyud): thams ca zla ba ba'i na // dkyi 'byu rtag pa byus nas // nang ga ris par zhugs byab// kyil nga ga rgyu/ gas dum badzad \u0f7f// don sto rje mas dpa' nyid kyang no// sangs rgyas la sags 'ab ba ba// than
204a2(rnying rgyud): cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mchog/ sems can 'byung phyir sems dpa' ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags// de nas dam tshig chen po'i di khon nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' nga che// kun tu bzang po sran
204a3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das de bzhin// de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni// thog mtha' med pa thams cad ni// nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas// nam mkha' skyeb skye me dpyir// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no// de nas
204a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ rab tu dga' gyir nyon mongs te// 'gro ba thams cad bde 'dod pa// de la bde ba rnam dag phyir// srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan byung // de nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni// chags pa kun
204a5(rnying rgyud): la chags pa che// 'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed// chags pa 'bar ba dri za yi// snying po phyag na rdo rje'o// de nas yi ge hU~M gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni/ glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod// rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung // thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i phyir//
204a6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs// de nas yi ge hU~M gi bzlas pa'i don gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni// myur du thams cad rjes chags pas// dngos thub thams cad rjes su chags// rjes su chags par byed mchog ni// snying po'i bzlas pa'i don yin+dan// de nas rdo
204a7(rnying rgyud): sems rgyud ni// glu rnams ci ltag za ba ni// bsdus nas kun du 'jug pa na// rdo rje thog ni brtan gyur pa// de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ thams cad bdag nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gi bdag nyid la yang
204b1(rnying rgyud): gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni// myur du thams cad la yang zhugs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ 'dod las chags pa dga' las bde// bde las sdig pa sdig las sdug/ sdug lus ting 'dzin shin tu brtan/
204b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de nyid// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nir bu'i rigs mchog bshad// den
204b3(rnying rgyud): mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni// rang sems nyid ni bdud
204b4(rnying rgyud): nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin// rang gi sems ni 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung // de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// rtog pa kun la grub bya gang // rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//
204b5(rnying rgyud): de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas dang po'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste// ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog/ dngos grub chen po'i bde ba ster// de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang
204b6(rnying rgyud): sngags dang / reg pa shes pa sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang // phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang // bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che// bdag nyid dam ni bsgrub bya ba// de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub
204b7(rnying rgyud): che// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir// de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi dngos grub grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni// ci yang rung ba'ang thal
205a1(rnying rgyud): a cad// sems dpa' char pa bzhug nas ni// nyin nab bzhir ni bsgyur bangar bya// de nas rlab dpon nyid kyi sgrub pa shes pa'i na / ban gzhin pa rjon ma// gsung ma chag dam chog pang byed du/ ba pa stong nga bzungs
205a2(rnying rgyud): te// bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bsrur bya// de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje can lamachad pa kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar// rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste// dmar po pad+ma rdo bu seM// de nas
205a3(rnying rgyud): dbul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdzogs pa'am ni mtshang ba// yang na ji ltar rnyed pa ni// rdo rje gang sogs mchod pa yis// rtag tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dus kyi mchad pa shes pa'i rdzid de// drug ldan la sags snyan pa'i grwa// gni thams pa
205a4(rnying rgyud): ci 'dod pas// rdo rje 'byed ma la sogs 'grol// mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// bzlas pa'i don gyis ma badzod kyang // mchog gi zab pa 'grub par
205a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// dkyil 'khor la ni mazhugs kyang // tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs kyi// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni// sdigapa kun las grol bar 'gyur// de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i hU~M shes
205a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gyur ni/ chags pa smad par mi bya ste// rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ste// bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che// 'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur// de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ dri bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas// mchog gi dngos
205a7(rnying rgyud): grub ba sgrub par bya// rtog pa kun la rnal 'byor 'di// tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed// bde ba chen po rdo gas pa'i rtog pa rgyal ba chen po 'ardorje rini po cherin po che las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i tshig rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'ad stod pa
205b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskung ba'i rdo rje na pa zang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gzigs pa'i yags kyang bang phyug ga rdo rje'i pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snga chags pa'i mdza /
205b2(rnying rgyud): phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams brtan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'a
205b3(rnying rgyud): lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs// de srid sems can gdon par mdzad// mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can// sems can don ma
205b4(rnying rgyud): baman// de byor sems dpa' dam pa rnams// 'khor ba skyid du 'khong bar zhugs// sems can don ni mngon par bzhed// thams cad dag pa'i mdzag chos can// de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul bas// sems can don ma mdzad pa ste// 'do na
205b5(rnying rgyud): grub dngos grub mchog/ dus kun du ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'chang men la sogs pa// 'di ltar bsod nams nam sbyin gyis// kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis// rang gi las gas mdzad mi spyod// dkyil 'khor la ni ma thugs kyang // sreng pa 'di
205b6(rnying rgyud): 'grub 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba la sogs kyis// sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad// kun nas dus kun thams cad la// dngos grub thams cad rabastsol 'gyur// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po// srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// de phyir bsgrub bya
205b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzi bshad bya// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thab// lugs ma'am ni brdungs pa'am// ri mor bris pa'am 'dus byas pa'i// phyag na rdo rje'i sgra gzugs ni// ci bzhin bshad pa de rab gi drug
206a1(rnying rgyud): bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rkang nga /
206a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin// dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che// 'dis ni rtag pa thams cad la// phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas// dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub// phyi nas ma bsgrubs grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo
206a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am// gang dang der ni gnas pa'am// thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi
206a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa'am// yang na mchod pa ci bde bar// byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na// mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob// de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya
206a5(rnying rgyud): chen po mnyam gzhag ste// rang gi snying pos lan cig bsrub// brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags// shin tu gyis gyur bdag po grub// de nas yi ge hU~M gi glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan// ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa// dri za dang
206a6(rnying rgyud): po blangs nas ni// ye ge hU~M gis grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyud ngo // / de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag/
206a7(rnying rgyud): rgyu bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'icom ldan 'das thog mdang tha ma med pa'i phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje tshas ma// shin tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// gzugs
206b1(rnying rgyud): 'du sa na du du su du na sa mas sa sa su gyu nga// ska sa
206b2(rnying rgyud): shes thogs pas kyang dang sasus dpa rgyal zhing kyang yin pad pa can po bas ngas kyi kya 'as ma dzapa rtsol sa cid po sa kyang 'dug par midus ni myi byed par gyu / rtog pa tham sa nga ban 'di sa phyi
206b3(rnying rgyud): sa dug su mas dang bying ning su ga/ na na sa na ra bya na kyi ma hU~M ga byungs//
206b4(rnying rgyud): di'i kyi thabangs so// smra pa di che na byang / gan kyang dung gaslas pa ba nga ngagag 'i di ma pa'i du sa
206b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa nas pa na 'ad nal ga / cid tsun da na ma da byu ni rkyen du 'dudu phyag rje'i gyi/ di thab cad pa pa kyil na pa na ba la rgyal
206b6(rnying rgyud): sa da na sa du ga
206b7(rnying rgyud): sa kyi sa sa na du
207a1(rnying rgyud): ma sa mam pad yod kyis 'dod pa yang bab pa thams ca thab pani 'a dang ban pa na ba/ tu nga nga sa smra ga dung zhes thu yodapa nga
207a2(rnying rgyud): rloms pas so// thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma'o sa pa dang / dA ltar byung ba shAms nga mdzo 'i mege chags pa'ang/ dngos pa sduchags pa pa ri sa dkyisan po'i shes par ba tu 'dug pa ning de bachen po drang thams cad ma khyen pasas
207a3(rnying rgyud): krog dang chang ba dang thog dbapa pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sbyin gzhig pa ni 'di ba chen po'i rdo groza ba'i stabs so// sa'i 'og thams cad las spang ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i dbyes du 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / rgyu mang pa'i gnas lang chu'i dngas
207a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dang zhes du len pa dang / mun pa chen por snang ba chen pa'i steng pa dang nye bar 'an pa dang rlung thams cad la bka' slob dang bar man pa dang nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i drangs pa thams cad mthong ba dang nye bar 'on pa ni dang chen po rda rje bye
207a5(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug mas so// thams cad gzhos pa dang rings pa dang dral ba dang chags pa dang gnyid ldog par bya ba dang rgyas gang ba pa dang ltung ba dang spongs pa dang gas pa dang phyir ldog pa ni bde pa chen po'i gtsug pa'i rdo rje'i phrag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dbus
207a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang gzhug pa dang dbab pa dang bcing ba dang bkrol ba dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ltung ba bslang ba dang 'dren pa dang bran du byed pa dang mngag gzug bka' bskob byed pa dang thams cad gyur drang ba dang phar btang ba dang gsad pa dang ske gas pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang dbang du
207a7(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad sgrub pas so// rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang / mchog gi dbang 'asrur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thams cad/
207b1(rnying rgyud): rjes su chags pa la sngags pa'i bde ba dang / yid bang ba thams cad rab tu gzug pa dang / mchad pa chen pa thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad lung du grub pa'i chog rgyas pa ni bde ba chen pa'i rdza mchog gidangos bub kyis // de ladrang du can dran na
207b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o// 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya/ rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong pa yongs su
207b3(rnying rgyud): sbyangs te gdong mar dgrol bar bya'o// bdag nyid la kun du bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o// gtsug tor dang phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o// snying ga dang yid kyis rgyab dang phrag pa dang / skye bo dang dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje bu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba
207b4(rnying rgyud): bcings lag cha bya ste/ mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dbyangs bya'o// snying ga dang dbral ba dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor gzhag par bya'o// dbus ma'i dar mchog go// khyab pa'i gyen bu ba bltos pa'i dbug pa dang
207b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa'i gdong gis lta ba'o// 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing zlos pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lhubs rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o// lta bas 'phrog par bya'o// dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o// yongs su bskod nas dpral bar bzhag ste/ dbus ma'i
207b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed ma'i snying gar bzhag ste dbus ma rdo rje'i lus ni 'di lta ste/ snying gar stong pa dang skyed pa dang 'ching bya dang gar byed du bcug pa dang mgrin pa gsal ba dang rdo rje rtse mo brjir ba dgra pa dbub pa dang mgrin pa gsal
207b7(rnying rgyud): bye de cings pa phyung du bral ba dang bsrung ba deng byab pa'i lam // b+hir ba kha skyor bskyed pa'o// nyin ze zhing snga ro la du lan cig lus yangs su sbyong ba dang / mgrin pa gas pa pa 'angag dang snying gang gzhag pa dang phyag rgyal ltung ste/ nyin de sde rol du lanacig dag
208a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad la kun du bskor bar bya'o// dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i'ardo rje'i ltabs so// dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang dbab pa sbyin pa dang 'bar ba'i mastan byed pa dang thabang dan/
208a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang rlung gi tshul dang nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang sen mo brud pa dang mig 'degs pa dang btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang ltung ba dang slong bar byed pa dang /
208a3(rnying rgyud): tshun rdeg pa dang rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so// dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' stong pa dang lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang rtse mo bskyong ba dang gdu pur bcing ba dang myur du dgrol ba dang song mo mnyam por myur du
208a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang ltur bar byed pa dang 'og nas bteg pa dang g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang tshur 'dren pa dang phar gtang ba dang g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang /
208a5(rnying rgyud): las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba byed pa'i las dang snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang dang dbyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang snying ga las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su spang ba dang gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so// bde ba
208a6(rnying rgyud): chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun// sems can thams cad snar 'grub phyir// don yong
208a7(rnying rgyud): bru kru tshul ba'o// dkyil 'khor dag 'asun // sdig pa'i las ni gan badzin// de dag kyang nagrupa gyur te// bcings pa kyis gyis sdig byang phyir// gang zhigal ma nyid kyis sun// btsun 'grus ldan ya mamyong gro// dkyil bar mang pa
208b1(rnying rgyud): can gang // slob dpon nyid byin ma brgyuzlas dang // de dag grub mchog rdo rje ma// rdorje slob dadan nyid du 'gyur// ngan yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i// bcangs pa na ma gyis sgra dgrub byed// bsam pa thams cad sangs rdzogs pa'i// mchog gi dngos grub kun /
208b2(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog/ bde ba che las yang dag 'byung // dag cing shin tu grub pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo // de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni// skal ba ci bzhin snyeng
208b3(rnying rgyud): pos grub// rang gi bdag nyid nges sbyar bya// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba chud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
208b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis
208b5(rnying rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab rjid spro ba dang dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no//
208b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yis// chos kyi dbyings ni slob mchog/ rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi// chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grubaskyed// rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'byeng gi theg pa ni// yongs su mthar thug
208b7(rnying rgyud): nus pa men// e me'o mngon zhe na sems can dang // le lo can dang las kun ldan// thugs rje dam po'i rdo rje khyod// byang chub sems ni bla na med// bde ba chen por bsgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa// rab tu sgrung
209a1(rnying rgyud): nas gyu su sa smras sa
209a2(rnying rgyud): mas par ga / yang ba nga gi ga sul / du
209a3(rnying rgyud): dgan/ ba min chog ga ma tsug gas pa'i/ na na// gad nyid kyi bgyid// sem don du rnal pa 'amadag cid// rnam par smra ga dong pa yo te// rtog pa 'o na bgags
209a4(rnying rgyud): sa tha'/ mini na pang// 'tsha da 'ag sa ma ra/
209a5(rnying rgyud): bdun pa dunabapa// 'du rten po kyang nu sa// bde'i niti ci khyor ba// dam ba gsheg pa zung ba na gas pa byed te/ pa 'du ba'i gaspangapa pa ma pa ba da /
209a6(rnying rgyud): du myu ga na / smra dus
209a7(rnying rgyud): byin pa bskye sa pas ga na 'a zugs kang shing pa'i tsha 'dri 'di sri 'i rjes med zung pa dpa thams pa ming rjes bu kyi nga ga pa sa rdzog pa ba 'dang dubam med la ma pa bya bya /
209b1(rnying rgyud): dbang gis ma gru ba pa rnams kyang mchog ngas pazab par byed pa dang matsog tugasang pa dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang bzhes byapa brtag pa'i rgyal ba dbang phyug rgyan po'i chen po rgyud byem ga sa pa/ de nas dog pa'i gnas nyam pa dga'o// nab bang grang ba na/
209b2(rnying rgyud): tra gargyas// / min chen 'od mdzes rab tu gsal// dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyan// zur bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa// blo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan// kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// rdo rje lha ma'i tshogs kyis mgyod// gA li phyogs ni thams cad dang // /
209b3(rnying rgyud): gyad kyi ni mjoms rnams su// zlab phyed ni rab tu gnas// rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa// rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog/ dar 'phan dril bum+b+ha sgrogs pa// drab me long tog me tog/ me tog chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje kun gyis
209b4(rnying rgyud): legs sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje che// rdo rje rin chen mchog bya ba'i// rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni// bde
209b5(rnying rgyud): ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang ni// brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya// brtan par
209b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa las ni rdo rje 'gyur// sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sangs rgyas de nyid do//
209b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje drug po mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdorje nyid kyang hUM// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs ched po// de nyid bad+ma'i rigs dag wa~M// de nyid nar bru'i rigs bzang ba shad// da nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid// 'dod dang grob pa nyid ni//
210a1(rnying rgyud): dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum nye// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// pi g.yo thams cang mchog de nyid// bstan pa sa pa nod chen po// rgyab sems kyis 'dus byas pa// thams cad bred pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa'
210a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba stsol// sems dpa'i spel krung bcas nas ni// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa// rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor// bde ba chen po grub don du// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag kyis
210a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'dul bya'i don du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa// rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya// bstims bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // phyag rgya kun myer grab mngon du// rdo rje sems dpa'
210a4(rnying rgyud): mchog grub phyir// dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po// bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba// ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan// snying po chen po dam pa ste// gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa'am// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa'ang // don yod thogs pa med mchog
210a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka' min// bde ba chen po rdo che// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan// dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster// rtog pa thams cad myar grub byed// thog mtha' med srir drang por 'byung // mchog dang dang po zhes byar bshad// cho ga kun
210a6(rnying rgyud): kyis ni ci 'dod dang // chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar// rjes su chags par bgyi'o zhes// ci bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'dug/ nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskul po dang por bcom ldan gsungs// hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras
210a7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa// rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa// skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin chen gyis thog mar// yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung // ci ltar 'gro ba rab grub ces// bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris// de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas// rdo rje
210b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang grol ba ni// 'byin dang sgrol dang ston pa po// byed pas tshig ni 'di// dgasol// thugs bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams// chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di ni de ltar grub par 'gyur// de yi tshig degs na nas
210b2(rnying rgyud): ni// rgyal ba dang nyid kyis gsungs pa// byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha// khyod ni thabs chen nyid yin no// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// ma thas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshung sa med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// srings sa
210b3(rnying rgyud): can rnam rtog pa// de srid byang chub srid pa che// byang chub sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis// de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor// dang po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ ci bzhin tshogs bsgrubs pa nyid// de nas bcom
210b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de ni// bde ba chen po grub phyir dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// gtso bos mgon la gsol ba btab// bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/ bde chen myur du grub byed pa'o// de rnams kyi ni
210b5(rnying rgyud): bka' gsan nas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to// de nas rab tu bshad byab// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad pa'o// thog mar dam tshig gsum thab
210b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon rang phrag rgyas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya// rtog pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin// dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i// chu 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin// dngos grub chog
210b7(rnying rgyud): rnams cad la// rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas// cho ga lhag gam mtshang yang // 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog/ bla na med cing mnyam med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/
211a1(rnying rgyud): mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni spyad byas la// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin// dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang // me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis// ji srid pa dang me dod par//
211a2(rnying rgyud): mchog dang por ni brtag par bya'o// mchog gi dang por mtha' yas mchog/ bla na med cing dpe med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog/ thog ma med mchog rtag pa ste// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid
211a3(rnying rgyud): rten pas// lhag dang mtshang med kun gang // mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' ni// 'di ni dbu mang rnam brtags pas// phyag chu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// de yis dbus mang rnam brtag nyid// de sa dbus su pad+ma'i gzugs// sra bar bcas pa rab tug na// snga chags
211a4(rnying rgyud): pad+mas yang dag khebs// thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin// de nas skad bu gnyis 'gyur du// byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste// nam mkha' kun gyi tshad yin phyir// gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas// tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin// mi mnyam med pas zer bzhig
211a5(rnying rgyud): dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi rtababs bzhi// ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin// khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag // gzungs rnams lhums mchod pa'o// rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// ganga' bas
211a6(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa rje kyog su mchog/ dum sa mchog she ban 'gro// rlung gis bstod pa tu tshogs pa'i// bdun byer btags dz+wa la swA sgyogs// me dang ba shes rtag me tog// byang chub yan lags ga nga // drab ma song ma rton DA// po tog zung ba'i rgyan gyis bskor// kwan krung
211a7(rnying rgyud): 'khyer bde ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes bshad do// bod pa chen po'i gzhal yis khang // dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya// zer pa chen po 'grong khyer mchog/ kun mchog de ni legs bris nas// 'og ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam//
211b1(rnying rgyud): na na du la/ du sangs su/ sa na/ na / na tun da/
211b2(rnying rgyud): su
211b3(rnying rgyud): sa/ / ga'adu su su
211b4(rnying rgyud): sa / / / gyugs/
211b5(rnying rgyud): ti 'dang pa dag ste/ ma / zhe
211b6(rnying rgyud): sa
211b7(rnying rgyud): phyi sa masmin gyi sas myi rdzog thabs 'o sa pang shi'i dzin pa// jig bri bya nga / du ma byasachum/ 'dus tha shes na/
212a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra g+ha hoH// dam tshig 'di ni thams cad kyis// dgongs shi brtag pa nyid du 'akrA // wA mo la sogs tshogs// dngos grub kun la/ khyung bar 'gyur// gsol ka ba dang g.yog zlal// rga ma pogawAn pa'o// de nas da
212a2(rnying rgyud): mchog la sogs pa// mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas sra// dza hU~M ba~M ho// zhes brjod bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog/ bdag po lan cig yang dag da
212a3(rnying rgyud): sa byungs / g+hab+h+yaH/ mahA thA la 'a grus ma sku la/ arba da la la/ thatha d+ha ra k+Sha ma dz+ra blo zlab/ suta the nab/ thub rgya thab/ b+hag stan da di nas te/ sarbab tu skye zlas d+ha/ a she ta la bre sha yas ma khyed ba /
212a4(rnying rgyud): nga mi/ i mri mu drA pa di dzaH hUM ba~M ha~MH/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyidang gshegs// bkug cing bajug la shin+da tu brtan// dbang du gyur nas rab tu thub// ces bcom ldan 'das dmatshig chen pos gsungs so// rdo rje thob
212a5(rnying rgyud): dpon rang ka ni// 'od zeng kun du ston la sogs// mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni// ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni// rdo rje thal mo khang gyes dbul// bum pa gang dag kyi snyed pa'o// me tog la sogs kyis kyang mchod// 'dar
212a6(rnying rgyud): tso nor dril btags pa// ma mas kyi char ni gzhag par bya// bum pa spos chus gang dbul// rdo rje rabacas pas byin brlabs pa// lhag ma pa ni yongs su bzlas// de la 'de ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i de tshog gi su bslab pa ni 'di yin te/ hUM ma rna
212a7(rnying rgyud): a mo g+has ma yi ga med g+hi ma g+hoShi \u0f7f/ sarbe sa kha sa san sa d+ha das rusu ru/ dz+haiM ho// 'di 'an nye shu rtsa gcig yangs su bzlab la/ bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bsgrer bar bya'o// bas ge tor bya ba dang / 'brung bangs kyang sdug sngal thams cad pas
212b1(rnying rgyud): dang bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas 'khor lor ma khrugs kyang // rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing // rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon rje// rdo rje can gyis dang byin rdzob// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rdzob dpon/
212b2(rnying rgyud): rang nyid lus byas dris legs byugs// ci snyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing // me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo// rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas// gnas te mgon la phyag
212b3(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya// de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni// de kho na nyid lan cig brjod// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// rdo rje chen po nor che ba// ye shes chen po las chen po// de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod// de na
212b4(rnying rgyud): tog sil ma ni// mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin// dang po sha ra la sogs pa// bstod pa glu ru lan cig blang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/ dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che// dga' ba
212b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dga' chen po// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// thams cad tha
212b6(rnying rgyud): cad byang chub che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes// rdo rje hU~M mdzad yi ge hUM// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal// 'dod chags chen po bang chen nyid// 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten
212b7(rnying rgyud): gsum mchog khams gsum pa// brtan par dang byung gisal ba ste// rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa// rgyab rab mchog thob mdzad pa// srid pa 'khor ba skyod mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can// mdangs ldan dad par thams cad gnas/
213a1(rnying rgyud): snying po phyag rgya stong dmachog/ de nyid bden pa mchog pa skye// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos dang las ni khams chen po// dam pa'i chos te las mazlog bdag/ byang chub sems ni rab spyong mdzad// rdon khrob kho ba che// dus mtha'/
213a2(rnying rgyud): ltar 'bar 'dul ba po// 'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog/ drag po drag nyid zad mngon pa// thams cad dag pa pad+ma che// shes rab thabs te tshul chen po// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha' yas
213a3(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i don// 'byung po thams cad gnas chen po// 'byor pa thams cad gnas 'byor pa// dpal dang gtso bo rgyal po ste// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// dad pas khyed la bdag
213a4(rnying rgyud): brten bgyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di// nyin re nang par rjod byed dam// chos kyi tshig gis lan cig brjod// dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur// gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod na// dang por nyin de dus gsum du// bstod
213a5(rnying rgyud): na sdig pa las des grol// zhing dag pa ni grub par byed// rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel// lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis// dngos grub thams cad ska' bzang byed// phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed// dngos grub don yod yon tan can// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
213a6(rnying rgyud): ma pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni// rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod// rang gis phyag rgya sA lan cig ni// rang gi phyag rgyas bcing pa te grub// de nas lha yi chu dang ni// de bzhin sku mchog gis dbyung bskur// rang nyid rdo rje phyag rgya la// snying po 'di ni snang par bya// de la
213a7(rnying rgyud): niji sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ suM ma hA sra ba badz+ram thAm b+hi/ Shokan nIHma g+ho d+hu mi/ sarba badz+ra a d+hi ba ti sI dr-i mithA pa ni d+hA nA mam ste blag pa na/ maHbadz+ra d+ha re swa da ka thAM/ maM hA ba tra satra/ o b+ha zlab sa/ de nas rje dbang bskur ba// phrag na rdo rje meng 'don pa//
213b1(rnying rgyud): na stobang pa dang// 'dod du ni nga thab thar// sa kya ni 'do // ga'adab bsgru sa// rlungag sa dza pa sas// phyog bad+ma da // donam khas 'ang // gas pa dun// nga/
213b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin slob dpon// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub che// phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che// d+hIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che// las rnams thams cad dbus la brtag/ mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// kun byed dngos grub thams
213b3(rnying rgyud): cad ster// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gcod pa dang phran 'dogs rdzas// thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog/ kun rig pa dang kun gyi gnas// 'dod pa thams cad la rabasbyor// phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug ze// lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun// bsgo ba thams
213b4(rnying rgyud): cad rtag tu byed// sems dpa' kun ni rtag tu mthong // tshe 'di nyid lnga 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan// dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por// rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon
213b5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab cing 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje mchod yin snying gar bskor// bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni// mgo
213b6(rnying rgyud): pas yang dgra phyag bya ba// dngos grub thams cad grub byed yin// dkyil 'khor du ni rabazhugs la// bad+mor ba lda na gsum byas nas ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'gro ba kun la'ang grub mdzod brjod// de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis// bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/
213b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug/ de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug/ slob mi'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni// ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas slob ma bcug nas ni// dga' ba chen po 'di brjod bya// rab kyis
214a1(rnying rgyud): rab ba de bstan pa yi// rdo rje sems bdag deng gab ma dang // ngas pa tog phreng ni// spyi bo pa ni srung pa dang // 'dudu ma tog babs gyur te// lhag padi ltar ning ba 'brab gyur// nga nas sbrul chugs na// nga 'an dang rang dab pa srung /
214a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chen po rdo rje// byi la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod// oM ma hAswa pa badz+rI/ badz+ra a b+hi krAn hU~M/ a d+hi s+m+R+YuM mi/ mthubadz+ra / hU~M badz+ra nA ma bi tI T+Ta maH/ gang la rdo rje maung gang zhig yin pade ba rtse zhes bya ba'i ska dang sbyar bar byed// ngan pa m+b+hi byin pa phyag rgya
214a3(rnying rgyud): bslabs nas/ ltar mngon pa 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' choga' ste// gang 'dri dang grub pa de la// de nyid rje sa ni mi tshig nyid// 'dug la sogs pa'i chog pa dang // 'jig rten pa rje ste chags dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das rnams
214a4(rnying rgyud): thams \u0f7fde rang gA so mas ni// rgyas pa nga na rab tu rdzag// 'dil rab tu 'drug rgyas gyis// mi tshugs pa dang mi rtog pa// nyid du 'a gas dbyung ring // byed pa cad po dz+raM chu skyed// don 'dzi snod dang na// man 'di ma du bsgrags nas kyang /
214a5(rnying rgyud): chos dang mgyog+sa ni// nga nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bsgru'o// nga la 'di ni mnang grub pa'i rdo rgyas dbang bsgyur nas brjod par bya'o// 'di rdo ny-i byi myal ba'i rje// tsu gangadas na skyeg par byed// dri mchog skye man 'grob par 'gyur// dngas thun rje du
214a6(rnying rgyud): sa nga chog / la ti kyi la ba ma mthong smras// skye bo 'dug nang gas pa 'ga'o// nga pa mi ngas pag mer po y-i// dal 'di ni kho na nyid nga de tshi zhigs pa'i chog ba tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' mi pa'i sa ste dang ni// ma Sh+Ta/
214a7(rnying rgyud): dag brtse// du nga ba bdag nyid// ma tshu bdin pa dag gragags dzin sbyin nyi byin pa'i dang pa'i rjod pa rgyag/ bco drin gapa tshul par mad/ srid na kyis dag nyi kyi
214b1(rnying rgyud): thal byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin// de ba sring pa rnam par dgra pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam chog chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ sred pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // rtsa klu bsngal rtsen
214b2(rnying rgyud): po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i mchog gi dam
214b3(rnying rgyud): cho ga chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs// bsod na mar byin rlabs sgrub byed pa// dngos grub kun gyi
214b4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug mchog/ rgyun du sems can don byed pa'o// de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du kyis// rang gi dam tshig me zer bde srid bsten par gyis// de ni 'gro ba myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur// de nas byed kyis brgyad dang
214b5(rnying rgyud): khams dang gnas pa dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par bstangs pa bas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs// ci 'dod par ni leg sa mchod cing // rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag pa ni mchod de gyung
214b6(rnying rgyud): dedes rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni// rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis// slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod// rlo pa kha zas gnas pa dang // glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin badrag/ yang dag mchod rdzas s+thir byung bya// dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil
214b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// // de nas bsgrub par zhed bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o// 'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni// srid par gnas shing srid par sangs// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub
215a1(rnying rgyud): rtag tu sems can kun do byed// 'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa// de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas// dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur// 'dul bya yin pa bsod nam sna med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// rnam pa
215a2(rnying rgyud): kun du mthong sogs kyis// sems can don byed mi nus so// de bas chung chen las grub pa// sangs rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin// mthong la sogs pa sems can don// nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yin// 'dod chags chen po bde pa che// srid pa'i nges pa dri na med// nam mkha' mtha'
215a3(rnying rgyud): yas sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa 'am// bsod nams med pad me ye lo can// de yang kun mchog grub pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas don yod
215a4(rnying rgyud): cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// lugs ma'am ni brkos pa'am// byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi// dang po'i sems dpa' brtags nas ni// mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya// nyin re zhing ni dang po ru// de bzhin lus
215a5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan gyur pas// dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkrug ste// phyag rgya chen po rab byin brlab// rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po rang // rdo rje hU~M ni grur blangs pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya// rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin du// mchog gi dang po rab tu
215a6(rnying rgyud): dgyes// gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni// ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrag/ 'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro dong ldipa// dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub// kun mchog dang po'i dbang phyug yin// phun sum tshogs kun bdag thams cad// 'dod chags
215a7(rnying rgyud): chen po bde ba che// thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa// rtag par kun du 'dul ba'o// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin// rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas
215b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa// kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/ kun rig dngos grub thams cad ster// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang
215b2(rnying rgyud): phug chen po'i dbang phyug che// gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing brjod// rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar// rga dang 'tsho ba med par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// sangs rgyas/
215b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems nyid 'dod// dngos grub ci ltar 'dod pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// phyi ma'am ni 'jig rten pa// rtog pa kun bshad cho ga dam// rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu// dngos grub thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyi// dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni//
215b4(rnying rgyud): 'chang bapa che rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs// de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag la// rang gi snying pos lan cig sgrub// dr-id+ha su to b+h+ya sa~M rak+ta/ su bo sit+ta ta la gu/ de la ci star yi ge hU~M gi glu blangs pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ r-i d+hi ta
215b5(rnying rgyud): sogs kyis brgyan ldan// tsa nus pa dang ci dga' dang // gar+b+he la sogs glu blangs pa'i// yi ge hU~M gis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi// mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de// gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na// de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur bas// rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la// yongs su mi skyo bar
215b6(rnying rgyud): du bsgrub// de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// dam tshig phyag chub cings nas ni// sa ma ya ste zhes brjod la// rang gi snying gang rim bzhin du// phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yongs su ni skyo'i bar bsgrubs
215b7(rnying rgyud): mcho nga lan sogs pas rnams ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'chad chen nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni// dam pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po don yod par 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
216a1(rnying rgyud): // de nas rtag pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub ci byud ni/ nyon re zhing dang por len cig phrag rgya bsgrub par ngan yod pa dngas gru ba thags pa med par bshad par bya 'o nas bcos ldan 'das kyis ga/ sungs so// thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / dgrang
216a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so// bde ba dang yid bde ba dang phun sum tshogs pa dang dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde' chen po'i rdo rje chos kyis so// tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang gzi byin chen po mngon par 'phel
216a3(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba la ni dad pa'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// dpal chen po dang skal ba bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po ni rdo rje grub pas so// stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang / chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs/
216a4(rnying rgyud): che bas so// rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pas so// thams cad du yi ge dang gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod
216a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bden pas so// dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang zos pa dang spro ba dang zil gyis gnon par bya ba la na dang po'i rdo rje dor yod pa'i bden pas so// sgyu ma thams cad dang bde ba'i mchog dang lung bskyo ba dang lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje rmad du b+ha
216a6(rnying rgyud): pas so// gter thams cad dbyung ba dang nod dbrog pa dang rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa pa 'bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur pas so// yul thams cad dang skye bo dang grong khyer dang / nags dang chu bor nye bar longs spyod pa sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so//
216a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad las sngonam byung ba'i lha yul dang rin po che dang / bzlas dang btung ba dang g.yog 'khor la sogs pa stsal te/ nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pos so// skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'brul sogs pa sbyin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po dbyung ba dang /
216b1(rnying rgyud): snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so// chu ba dang men+ta pa'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang btung ba dang rang rjer gzhug pa dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so// dngos
216b2(rnying rgyud): grung thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzim pa dang rdo rje la sogs pa mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing ston pa/ mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro
216b3(rnying rgyud): ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang sbom pa dang du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang bcing ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis so// lha thams
216b4(rnying rgyud): cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po 'ardod lha'i bdag bos so// thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so// gnod sbyin pa
216b5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang pas thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang 'jug pa dang mchod pa dang bsgrub pa dang las thams cad la nges par byar bar bya ba la ni dang por
216b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya bo dang brtan par bya ba dang bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so// dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang bslab pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so// las thams cad rab
216b7(rnying rgyud): tu bsgrub pa la/ rnam par mi 'jigs par bya ba dang brten par bya ba dang grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa 'i ni dang po rdo rje las kyis so// rdo rnga thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing po dang dbang du thub bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad dbyu
217a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa pa ni dang pa'i rdo rje sems dpas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byab bsgrub pa la ni dang po de bzhin gshegs pas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang
217a2(rnying rgyud): gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa 'am// sdig pa thams cad byas pa'am// rang gi snying po ma bslabs pa 'am// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// ma bsgrubs par thams cad
217a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub po// don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o// / de nas dang po'i snying po ma bslabs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgya skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna
217a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// don yod pa dang thogs med pa// bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu// las kyi rab 'byam 'di dag ni// dngos grub skad cig gis grub bye de// 'di lta ste thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang /
217a5(rnying rgyud): zhi ba dang bde legs su bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar kyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi ldeg rgyas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang dam tshig dang dngos grub bcing zhing bsrung ba sde ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so// nyin gsum pa
217a6(rnying rgyud): dang nyin bzhi pa dang slar zlos pa dang rtag pa can dang khyab 'jug gi rims thams cad bsal pi la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so// gdung ba thams cad dang gnod byed dang nad dang mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so// dug dang /
217a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar ba dang dbab pa dang bgyid pa dang bza' ba dang bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so// gdon thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dmachog 'dzin du gzhug pa dang rab tu gdul ba dang / bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o//
217b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad la bcing ba dang thar pa dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gdon las thar bar bya ba dang shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i
217b2(rnying rgyud): lan gyis so// sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so// thams cad dbab pa dang / bskyod pa dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang thams cad bden par slar gzhug pa dang / pra sen
217b3(rnying rgyud): sa cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang gsad pa dang ltung bar bya ba dang bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang rmongs par bya ba
217b4(rnying rgyud): dang gnyid log par bya ba dang gsad pa dang bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang gzhig par bya ba dang dbang du bya ba dang ltung bar bya ba dang gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so// khro bo thams cad
217b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba dang bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang 'jigs pa las thar pa dang g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so// sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang char chen po dbang
217b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang rlung dang char pa dang glog dang ser ba bzlog pa dang dro ba dang grang ba bsal ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so// rgya ba dang mi rgya ba thams cad rjes
217b7(rnying rgyud): su chags pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang rtse ba dang pas thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so// lha thams cad dbab pa dang glu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang 'byung ba dang ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la
218a1(rnying rgyud): ni/ rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so// rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug
218a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad las rgyal ba dang dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so// mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang dngas
218a3(rnying rgyud): grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub dam pas so// // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i
218a4(rnying rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan cig ni// phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub byed// snying mchog ldan cig bzlas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya// de yi rjes la nyi snying po// las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// don yod grub pas las rnams
218a5(rnying rgyud): nini// kun la shin tu 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khor dag kyang ma mthong ba// ma bshad pa pa'ang rab 'grub 'gyur// rtog 'dir 'jigs pa yod min te// 'khor lo med la brgya byin
218a6(rnying rgyud): la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
218a7(rnying rgyud): po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can du brtan phyir dang // sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med//
218b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te// mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo // mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin skur gang /
218b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams cad ma dag pas// rang rig las kyis dag ma 'gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni gsod dka'i phyir// rang gi las ni skyeng don du//
218b3(rnying rgyud): btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che// byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul// sems can la phan bsod nams can// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems
218b4(rnying rgyud): can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms mi mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs// byang chub sems mchog khyod spros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//
218b5(rnying rgyud): de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu khyon gyis// 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung // de yi khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dgra bsgrubs/
218b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la// de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// 'dus nas gsol ba 'de bas mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po// sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol// de ni sangs rgyas
218b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sra gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// yang dag spros te 'di gsungasango // oMt+ma waM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas no// byang
219a1(rnying rgyud): chub snying por byin gyis brlabs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can kun la bde don phyir// rtag pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dgyes
219a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor po yang dag bri// 'khor po lte bar sangs rgya ba nyid// 'dzum pa'i choms ni mi snang ba// s+yA te sa ma ya ste// oM sid d+hi mAM zhes brjod dgod// mdun du bdud las rnam rgyal bar// mdzad pa'i sangs chus yang dag waM//
219a3(rnying rgyud): su ma kyi
219a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+hama?/ byAdz+nyA karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ sar+b+ba badz+rI/ rAt+na badz+rI/ pad+ma bA d+ho/ bi shwa ba dz+rI/ mtshams kyi chang ni rdo rdorje dang // rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o// mtshams rnams su yang lhatsho// phyogs kyu la sogs sgo rnams su'o//
219a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin sum tsa lta bar// 'khor lo doni brtag par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying gar bcing // gdon du de bzhin bskor bar bya// me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rig// me tog bcas te snying gar bcing // bsam pa g.yos pas gdung bar
219a6(rnying rgyud): bya// mgon lha mgo bos phrag byas la// bskor ba lan gsum byas nasA ni// zhugs nas me tog 'dor bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dkrug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du thub dang dgug pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni
219a7(rnying rgyud): 'di yin te/ oM ya kA ro mu khaM sa rbad+ha mA d+hi la hu tre twAd/ de nas chog ji bzhin du// ston la me rtog se la mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub pa bsgrub phyir// dgro ba'i gon la de nyid brjod// de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni// thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur//
219b1(rnying rgyud): tu sa sa/ ma / da la nam / sa / sa na /
219b2(rnying rgyud): mdog tugadug/ bzod pa'i bal mos khor lo'i// maud byu nas me byung ba// srab babyes nas dngos ba kyang // rnyog bzhi rab bshang bya// ngas la bcom ldan bdud la logs// rnam pa rgyu'i babs par gyi// zla ba 'di la cigs ma gyis de
219b3(rnying rgyud): 'dra'i sgrib pas 'grub par nga byud// sgra gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par// ye shes bu chung yongs bzung po// rdo rje'i tshig gis chog bzhin// bzlas brjod stong phrag zin byar// mdor na 'brus ni rtogs pa ni// ci 'dod dngas grub pasacad dang // che
219b4(rnying rgyud): 'di la sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gur 'di la the tshom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// brtan pa ma /
219b5(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de nas ba cig sgrub pa'i nang ni/ snying gang rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste// sa sa ya hU~M zhes brjod la// 'bros pa rjod 'dram gyis bslabs nas ni// dngos gra thaM ma cing thob par 'gyur// denas las me phyog tu thams cad du pa'i hung ni/ brdang
219b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'ing cig bting te// chos kyi dakhor pa rab du bskor// ma chung sa mi sems can don bya nas// las hU~M byug rgya drug tu 'grub/ rabab ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi dngos grub kyis cog sgrub pa'i gyig rgyas pa'i do/
219b7(rnying rgyud): rnaMs ma bsgrubs dang ma grub pa cog/ las rnam par 'byem par ste// trig pa dun se las tshogs pa// gi ris pa'i dri rab ba shad bya// 'di sa skyed thams ci dang byung na dang na pang shan byad dang drag thams ca dang sbyar ba drug dang gshod byed dang / gangs rgya
220a1(rnying rgyud): ga da sa da skang da da na bya dang grangs gas mas su nga /
220a2(rnying rgyud): bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so// che dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang khadog dang gze byin chen po dang mdangs dang stobs dang spro ba dang brtson 'grus dang dpal dang skas pa bzang po dang bsod nams dang ming dang snyan pa dang grags pa dang dran pa dang blogs dang
220a3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa dang rtogs pa dang stobs dang ting nge 'dzin dang phung po dang 'du byed dang sgra dang gsung dang thugs 'phel ba la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'bras dang bsem gtan
220a4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab dang ye shes dang stobs dang babs dang rdo rje dang bsgrub pa dang gzungs dang sa dang spyod pa dang so so yang dag par rigs dang sangs rgya ci chom pa 'dres pa dang chos dang las dang ma tshogs pa'i bya ba dang sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i'ado dang srung nga gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje chen
220a5(rnying rgyud): thub pa pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i chog spyod du rdzogs par bye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sa dang sa na/
220a6(rnying rgyud): nu rol pa ston pa dang mngon par byung ba dang dka' ba spyod bstan pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang 'dud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad char gcod pa dang / 'jig rten
220a7(rnying rgyud): gzung lam dam par rgyal ba da / skyelas babs pa / sa byin pa'i byi kyis chub pa dang gdag pa mas byed 'dra ba dang dus pa la ra tu pa dag dang / ngan thothabs cad 'a sed don pade me rnams kyi ston par mad pa dang rtag pa thams cad bye
220b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba dang de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rdo rjes so// ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems pa mngon brten pa// de
220b2(rnying rgyud): lta byang chub spyong sogs kyis// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// de ni yod bsod nams dam pa yi// pas kyi rab 'bum sgrub byed pa// cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed// rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin par bya// dkyi
220b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o// // de nas sna tshogs las chen po// khyab bdag rdo rje 'don chen
220b4(rnying rgyud): po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ sems can kun pa rjes ston mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pas// gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i// rang gi dang sems spyod pa yis// zhibs sems can kun gyi don// gdul ba rab tu bsrub mi nus// sangs rgyas
220b5(rnying rgyud): kun gyis bslab bya ba// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin// gang tshe bde gshegs sems can dron// dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa// de tshe nyid kyi dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rje gsol po btang // sems can thams cad dngul mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa btab/
220b6(rnying rgyud): ud+hiSh+Tas ma laM kro d+ha ni sum thA t+pa lA badz+ra tAM/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsan gyis// phyag na rdo rang nyid na tsaM// grwa gsung rdzogs kyi rdo rje la ma// sgrar byung nas ni mdun na gnas// lho che rgyal po'i sku yis ni// sems dbang stsal krung gis legs bzhugs// dbar ba'i rtses
220b7(rnying rgyud): 'od kyis gsal ba// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che// drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing // dbar pa'i rdo rje cher ba bar pa// rnam par 'phro bas sreg pa 'dra// 'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni// bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra// dang
221a1(rnying rgyud): po jo tho gnyer bcas// rdo rje chog 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ de rdo rjen por dang nyi ma snarang 'bar 'a zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam chis// sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad// 'jig rten largyas cing 'jig rten gsung// thams dad /
221a2(rnying rgyud): mig pa shi tu / na rapa bye/ rjes tu thugs tsun// de ni gra sta ma ma rdzo/ nyan dag sa pa/
221a3(rnying rgyud): da// den kun rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams ca 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub yang bsnyen mdzad// sems dpa' kun gyi zabapa chen po// dam pa ya ni zugasasu chud// de nas ng+ge 'bar pa'i mchog/ 'bangar pa'i grang ba 'jugs pa mdzad//
