221a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rgya bya gzugs pa'i zhab// zhal ras khro dang brngas pa yin// g.yon brgya bas ni legs par bzhugs// spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste// dbus gyen du brjes shing gi yo// kun nas 'khying cing 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal dbyor che// mkha'
221a5(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams// phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad du ni 'bar ba 'khrug/ rgya ba spyod bskal pa'i me lta bur// 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// yang dag
221a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa lags bskul tI// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor// brtsig nas byams can sun ngan dang // bstan pa thams cad 'thub pa'i phyir// ga rten gsum bdag de rnams dang // rgyu'i sems med byas// den rdo rje da rgyam ma
221a7(rnying rgyud): nam cigs yeng du rgyun na// de rnams la thugs rje yis// tsho sre gas pa po gsung // oM mr-i hrI sa ba ti / hU~M kye+e sh+ya pa mats+li/ dang cu ba thams ca da sbeng bar// de nams gsum pa thaM nga ni// mas ci du ni pa ni ga
221b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing // rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes brtul// de nas rdo rje badzin khro bos// 'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing // nga yi dmachog la gnas zhes// sna tshogs pa la bka' rab so// de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di pa zhig lags/ bcom
221b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ni zhing la// gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyed kyis de mtshig kyi 'dra ba// zhes pa bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rnyil pa// 'di nasangs rgyas rnam grol ba// gdod kyis rdo ni gnod sbyin na// dkon mchog
221b3(rnying rgyud): gsum dang de bzhin du// ngal skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// 'jig rten gsum pos 'di thos nas// tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// bskul pa'i me dpung lta s+t+wa ma~M// 'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par brtsams// de rnams kyis spros pa/ bdag cag
221b4(rnying rgyud): gis ni sangs rgyas rigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig/ gnod sbyin bsgobs ci zhig bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas// khro ga nyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas// de nas khrog nyer thams cad ni// rdo 'dzin pa'i rjes du myod
221b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa bsnyems brgya bcas pas// sprin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing // nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni// drag tu khros bcas pas smras so// de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus pa las rgyal ba ni 'di yin te/ hi/ de nas snying
221b6(rnying rgyud): de phyung bas// des rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang // dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskye nas// lag na rdo rje don mchog byas// rdo rje meng ni byin nas su// 'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin bzhag/ de nas rdo rje chen po mchog/ mngo
221b7(rnying rgyud): sa ni gsal btab pa// sems can kun la rjes stong pas// rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi romi d+ha// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag rje// de yi dbus su gzhag byas// sngon po 'bar ba
222a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs bzang ba// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrugs pa'i// rdo rje gsor par mdzad la
222a2(rnying rgyud): brtson// de yi dngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang // ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin po// mtshams su mda' dang kha T+wAMg/ 'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'drin// rdo rje'i rigs ni ste tshogs pa// dbar
222a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni// thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu// dang po rdo rje phyag rgya ba dag/ gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste// bsamar ro rdo rje rgyal po ni// rdo rje lha mos yang dag bstod// rdo rje chen mo sgeg mche// bzhi par
222a4(rnying rgyud): mkhan ma la sogs// rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyi// khro bo rnams ni lnga pa la// drug par rdo rje po nya mchog/ gnod sbyin srin po king ka ra// dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs// gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad// phyi yi dkyil 'khor da dI bas rnams su// mdor
222a5(rnying rgyud): na snying po gsum la sogs// sbru la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad// legs par bri ba'am gzhag par bya// mtshams su lha mor rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni ske dbus su'am// rdo rje lcags kyi sogs khro bcas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gying ni// go rims dang rna
222a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang // cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya// khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang // khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas 'dud// de nas khro zhing slob dpon che// rdon can mchog ra'u zhugs pa// rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub// hU~M mdzad rang tu sbyang bar bya// bsnyems dang bcas pas rgyang
222a7(rnying rgyud): nyid// de bzhin khabs 'dul ba lo// rdo rjeng chad chen dkris pa yin// gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de nas me ton blangs nas ni// zlos pas bdag po chel gtor// rdo rje 'bar po'i lcags kyu ches// yang dge bar ni dbug par bya// maM ma hA badz+ra dz+ha la ldan ldan
222b1(rnying rgyud): sgru na \u0f7f/ sas AH/ sa// sa hU~Ms rnas spyos/ sa / sa / rdzogs ga pas/ @
222b2(rnying rgyud): blangs nA dkyusol bar mdzad// de nas las gyes pa'i sgra'o// mAtsan ma rnams kyang ltung bar 'gyur// glul te slob ma pa sngags pa// snying gi dbab ba zlab rtse// den padzi d+he da kye// phyag rgyas sto ma gzug par bya// btsug da pa dang po'i mas dpang y-i// 'dzin
222b3(rnying rgyud): snying po brjod par bya/ hU~M rA pra hU~M Ni biT+Ta/ hU~M badz+ra nu la~M yA pri dz+yaM ti/ matas trA~M ba dz+rakauSha~M ts+tshits+tsha ha~M/ ma~M badz+ra sa ma la p+na sha maT/ rdo rje bugs pa dad rnaM mdu rnyeng dadi la gri dang ngos nags pa ste/ rdo rje khro ba'i srang ba // de nas 'di rnams kyi phyan myo don yong ba'i rdzogs pa
222b4(rnying rgyud): mang bya/ shin tu grub bsta seM dang rolagadun pa rnams sems can mngon par na sa ga ba rgyas pa rnams bskul b.rabya'o// oM badz+ra krid+ha simid d+ha par mA mo n+ti shA hi/ hU~M badr-i Sh+Thi ho ba TI ga mi d+hu badz+ra ka pA la pa m+me ga te pra rul N+Di d+hi ba nI b+de Ni/ hr-i paT+Ta ke / rdorje khro ba ma par
222b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma la nA TI ga bzlas te dgod pa'am bri bar byung // bcom ldan 'das dpon N+Di k+Shi snying pos bcugs su gsol na// dzo gru ba rnams ts+tshed la don yod pa'i dngos grib 'grub par 'i gyur ro// da nis du mtshig brjod par bya ste/ sems can mang pa bde phyir dang // bstan pa thams
222b6(rnying rgyud): cad 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni// 'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig rten
222b7(rnying rgyud): gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la/ rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa la bsgrub par byos/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gsang pa dang
223a1(rnying rgyud): 'a ra gyum// gang la bya bad+has pa na 'du byu don ga drug pa dzin par shes par can// des cha bar byed pa'i rnaganas ba zla pa/ shin du sgyu ba sa byas na shin d+ha sgrung pa da// gdug pa rnams sla yang gnad pa sa
223a2(rnying rgyud): byed do// de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang // dring tshigs ni kun gyis kyang// ma tshugs pa dang mi sod par // tshe 'di nyid ga 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'dir smrab bshad bya ste// ci bzhin su ni dge 'dun du// rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni// bkres stong phrag brgya pa'o// us
223a3(rnying rgyud): tshong nam ni sems dpa' che// rdo sems dpa 'di mthu ma mchog/ ngom bro bo rgyal ba mchog/ nas dang tshib med par 'gyur// gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'du'o zhing // sangs rgyas kun pa 'di mchong byar// 'jig rten gsum na legs snga zhing// phyis kyang 'jigs pa med pa dri
223a4(rnying rgyud): dgyur// de nas de pon nyid ci snying po sgrub pa ni/ 'gre dpa yang na 'dug pa'am// 'gro ma nyal bar byed pan// ci lta da ltar 'bum ba zlas na// tsha de nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang rtag kun// 'dod pa ces kyi 'gro'ong zhing // dngos grub \u0f7f/
223a5(rnying rgyud): gyi dbang phyug blag// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyi sa mchod pa drang // rang gi ti rnams kyi bsten// gdug po thams cad rjes 'dul zhing // gang la 'jigs pa med par rgya// zhes brtsam nyan 'dus khro ba'i rgyal po chen pos gas so// de nas phyan rtse
223a6(rnying rgyud): dam pa sgrub pa ni/ ci bzhin dus su phyag rgyab cing // bdag nyid sa par bsregs nas ni// srid 'di nyid du chen po'i// dngos su pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshib sgrub pa ni// bdag ni thams cad gsang ba zhes// brjod rdzing daphyag na rdo rje yis// dam chog rgya
223a7(rnying rgyud): bcings nas ni// bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'thar// de na sa las rnams drub pa ni// las rnaMm ma pasgrub pa ni// rnam pa pani ning byung cir // things byed pa ra min// rdo rjelas nyid thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen mchog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / denam ma
223b1(rnying rgyud): krung rtsu pan// rje ma ga rgyal thog// pa napa nas// ga na cand bya// ded s+ho/ thams cad bsreg pa dang / bad+ma pa dang / gnog pa dang / rangs par byab dang / gnyid yog pa byu ba dang / rgyas bdab pa dang / rdungs pa
223b2(rnying rgyud): na pa / pa dang / / nga dang/ rnam pa gnas pa dang / ras sa drun gang
223b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sprob bya ba dang / gas pa rgyab shi hU~M ma da kyis so// thams cad dbug par byed dang / nges par bkod pa dang // bskyed dang / gang tsud gzhug pa dang / len du gzug pa dang / brgyal du gzug pa dang / rtser gzhug pa dang / has+ya zhes dgang dug tsug
223b4(rnying rgyud): dang / d+h+ri ba dang / 'a dug zhan pa ni/ 'on cub dun ma / dang / 'gas par byung dang / bzlas dang / ngari do mar bya ba dang / dra gzhu pa dang / rang nyi bden pa byedang/ 'chi bdang/
223b5(rnying rgyud): bu byu ba / gang cu ste thub / kyi kyi na / dadang / gtsun pa dang / dang ba dang / zas na gru bya dang / bdi par snang byab dang/ mngon pa dang / bad na par
223b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang / dus pa yin byer shings myi ton dang nas ni pe bya 'i sbyin da / 'brumams cad grang rig par ston par bye dang / rim me dpa/ lhang dug dang / gdon dang / drug dang / mkhal tshus l-Is n+ta bu dbya ba dang/ gang 'a
223b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang / phyogs dang / metshe mo mi dang / dkyi pa bcing ba dang / shin tu bsrung bdang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / tha~M por bya ba dang / bsgreng ba dang / dbang dubyab la gi zlab chen sna chags kyu //
224a1(rnying rgyud): n+ya// ba ban cad sgralar byas dang / bla gdon par bya ba dang / gan tu rjes su 'byung bar byung dang / dran paskrag pa dang / myaba'ang byam masags pa gang narnams cang btul ba dang / bdud kyang bung thams dag nom pa dang / ma ma rnams 'dus ba dang / badz+ran
224a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs rnam par gtong ba dang / gdug pa rnams kyi gcad pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa lang dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu zang po dbang du byab dang / nor sbyin las na thams ca da brog pa dang / d+ham rnaMs sram mnan nas dpa la drang ba dang / b+ha'i bu mo gan
224a3(rnying rgyud): ma da kyi 'a bya dang / ba na pa rdzogs pa dog pa dang / dem byed ci gcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar gyi ba dang / rgya 'jug ga 'dong / dbang tu ci po pa sarnam pa ma bdang / 'di pa bang rgyag me yang ga'i mang thog pa dang /
224a4(rnying rgyud): dang / byang chu chen po bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca sa nyes par bya ba dang / dbug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam chog gis bcing ba dang / dbang skyes bsgrub pa pa ni rdorje blon chen po rgyal po dam pa'i da ba kyis so zhes kyang gsungs so// lan
224a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pas mchog grub pa// zlog pa'i rtsa snying bzang lan cig/ da yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad dgug pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po dri rgyal po la sa rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tung bar bya'i rtog pa'i tshag rgyas pa // / de nas ti
224a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni// rnamau dag mchog gi chos nyid las// sbyin ngas gzigs dbang chen pon// rdo rje sems dba'i gnonar yon// gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du// rang gi/ rin po rjeng snyed na// sangs rgyas kun // dngas med pa sa ni thabs yin no/
224a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs kun ba sags pas// ma dag sems can khams rnams ni// de rnams la ni rab spyod par// skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni medang mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchod// rang nyid dazang po snyoms

225a1(rnying rgyud): snaH/ sas rgyas su ni brgyad po bri// rang gi tIng 'dzin pa d+ha'o// ting ngeng ngan pa rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs phyogs su// sangs rgyas lnga so byas rigs kyi lta// zhi ba phreng med du tshangs pa// 'dod pa gzugs ning dz+nyArtan// sobang byung /
225a2(rnying rgyud): zhing mgrin 'degs pa// rtem grin lcags kyi bsgyings nas ni// chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya// de nas bad+ma'i snying pa ni// sarba ta thAg ta pad+h+r-i \u0f7f hU~M badz+ra pad+h+ra/ he bat+sa/ pat+sa bi/ ho da d+hA ni rAng // de nas mtshams rnams su ni// hU~M pad+h+weHt+ti shA d+h+r-i/ he sa d+ha bi shA pad+da s+t+ri d+h+waM/
225a3(rnying rgyud): maT hrIHpad+ma bad+d+ho hUM a ho pad+ma a shA/ kra ma kra ma hU~M dzaH/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga rnaMs pa byas nas ni// pad+ma chen po me tog bcas// ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin// las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya// oM baits+tsha
225a4(rnying rgyud): yaH/ ma nu sa na~M shud+d+ha ma hA satwa// d+hA tu sa ma ya s+yA tra/ rA ga dI pany+dza ye/ tsit+ta me sarba d+hi meSh+Ta d+hI nIt+ta me sarba d+ha me hu dz+ra ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgyags na nas ni// dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa 'grub// de nas mdzub mo lcags kyur bcid// chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drang /
225a5(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki shwa ra pad+me ha stA/ ya hi shrI g+h+ra~M ma me badz+ra mu drA a si byas be saM ma ye ba d+ha dr-i shi ka naM/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsha d+hi ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma me/ mA hA badz+ra d+ha ra s+t+wa~M/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po mA rdzog/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa ra nyid gyon// 'dig rten kun mchog 'grub 'gyur ba'i//
225a6(rnying rgyud): ti 'dzin tshig nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams// gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// dngos grub thams cad ston pa yi// ye shes dag ni bslab pa bya// ting don snying po 'di yini// sgrub pa chen po gdong nas byung// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyu ga nyid// go ma
225a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am// gdug pa rnams kyi nang chud pa'am// gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni// pad+ma chen po yongs su bzung // dus dang stobs ni ji bzhin du// nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya// chog 'di las tshe 'dim/

225b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mtha' yas mchog/ tshwa 'di nyid 'a thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya sgrub pa ni// phyag chu bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos pa tshad po nyid thobabo// dmachig das tso mchog gis te// dman pas mchog phyag rgyas sa/ sgri pa ci po 'i drud go/
225b3(rnying rgyud): de nas dngos grub mgrub pa'i// ting 'dzin las ni 'dren ma dag/ dang por ti 'dzin grub pa ni// ma pa bzhin du ba bshad bya// 'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa dang rmi la ma ngan pa dang lhas ngan pa dang lams dang 'tshe ba dang nad 'gro ba dang nyon mongs pa dang dus ma yin pa 'dzi ba dang /

225b5(rnying rgyud): dang khrag dang bdi ka nang de 'dus pa dang ma zhu ba dang rims dang sbyar ba'i dug dang dug dang mdzod dang brum bu phra mo da g.yen pa dang rkang shu dang / sman dang chu'i dmu rdzing dang mtshan par rdol ba dang sha bkra dang zad byed dang khrag zad pa dang / khu bzad pa dang / rdad thams cad dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang gdo nga phra
225b6(rnying rgyud): mnarnams gso ba la ni/ pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so// thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang chos dang go cha dang / gtsug tor dang gtsug zung dang mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor dngas dang nam mkha' dang rdo rje'i gdan dang byung pa chen po dang rje ra ba de ze 'bar bya bal ba ba
225b7(rnying rgyud): dang rdo rje dang bo don yod pa la sogs pa dang sra dbum yongs su bskor ba dang phur dbus gdibo pa dang zas dang btung ba dang gos dang rkyen dang phyag rgya dang bsrung ba la ni pad+ma chen po thams cad srung bas so// tshe thams cad deng stobs dang kha dog dang gzi brjid dang mdangs dang lad tsho dang brtson
226a1(rnying rgyud): // dang smra ba dang nad med pa dang dpapa dang skal pa bzang po dang nor dang 'byung nga dbang phyug dang 'byor pa dang dngos grub dang blo dang rnyed pa dang bkra shis pa dang ming dang grags pa dang snyan pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dam pa 'grub pa lA ni pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so// dpapa
226a2(rnying rgyud): mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin// ting
226a3(rnying rgyud): dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs// drag po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas// kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung // ti zla dang ni gza' skar can// nam mkha' nyid du gyung pa yin// de nas rin rjen ting 'dzin ni// nges par dro can du 'arjod// \u0f88\u0f90/
226a4(rnying rgyud): sa nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ljang sngon bai DUr+ya mnyam mdangs// rdo rje rin chen bsnams dge ba// nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di// mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting 'dzin la ni rnam gzigs pas// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag
226a5(rnying rgyud): byo nyid// sangs rgyas thams cang+ga swa sA bcas dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje rin chen de yis ni// kun rig kun gyis dbang bskur dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas// shis pa rjod pa 'di gsungams
226a6(rnying rgyud): oM sa rba badz+ra satwa a d+hi pa ti s+tha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi b+hu b+hu ba waH/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing // legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas// rdo rje tsaM chen che de las// chos kyi gtso bo dbyung bar gyur// byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni// ci rigs par ni kunang ba dang skur
226a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nis // slang yid dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs// bdag shegs kun gyi byin parlabs pas// rdo rje rin che byen med// shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog/ dngos grub gas la par rtog pa gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen pa pon/
226b1(rnying rgyud): na mamakha'i 'khor lo na ma mkha'i mdog/ nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang // gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri// de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni// bdag nyid thams cad dgyes pa gzhag/ dag pa'i baiDUr+ya mdog 'dra// 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug/ g.yon pa
226b2(rnying rgyud): rinar chen thugs kar stod// g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba// de yi ngos su snyems dpa' mchog/ bzhi po gsungs bcas dam pa yin// dbang bskur ba dag gter nyid dang // nor bu chen po bla myed dang // 'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs// rang gi mtshan mas
226b3(rnying rgyud): mchod pas ni// de la de dag kaM snying po 'di yin te/ badz+ra satwa dzaH/ badz+ra rat+na hU~M/ badz+ra d+harma baM/ badz+ra karma ho/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad de/ oM pra Ni badz+ri ti phaT/ oM badz+ra pI ti hi hi/ oM tsan+ti ma Ni hoH/ oM badz+ra ma hA ma he haM/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis
226b4(rnying rgyud): nI// cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs la// mkha' skyes la ni bgos phyag bya// pa thugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yaM// dam tshig dam pa brjod par bye// khyed ni num mkha' las byung ba'i// thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin// oM e sid d+hi byung byung
226b5(rnying rgyud): t+ya sid d+ha swAH/ sid d+hi ma hA badz+ra tA/ ba bya hrad+hA ta~M/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang // phun tshogs kun la shin tu ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// tsos bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so// de
226b6(rnying rgyud): nas nor bu khu tshur can gyi b+ha gas byas dgug par bya'o// i b+hA rA ya hrI dzAM/ b+hu ba pra'i shu hU~M swA hA/ kr-ih+NA ba~M ba ba Ta Ta sid d+hi hi hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan myur du ni// byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni// 'byor ba shin tu g.yo ba la// don ni rab tu 'grib par 'gyur// de nas slob mas phyag
226b7(rnying rgyud): na// me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug/ bcug rnaMs de ny-id mchog snying ngo // bden pa lan cig brjod du gzhug/ de des 'byer ba'i mchog brtag pa// dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod kyi// 'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams// 'de bar gshegs pa
227a1(rnying rgyud): thob// de nas de phyir byu ba bshad// rdo rje ni chen rgyal mtsho bgis// dpas med zlos pas bgrub bya zhing // bdi yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la// 'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi dang phyug rlung // rga dang chi ba med par 'gyur//
227a2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no// phyag byang spang pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin du las bslab pa ni dngos grub bla na med pa yin no phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa nyid de'i spyad do// / de na de kyib pas rnam/
227a3(rnying rgyud): pa byam nu ni ngam pa dang / dngos sru chen po zin phul// tsam ci bzhi sa ba gang cu// 'a du ste 'byong ba thams cid dgug pa dang gtsug pa da cing ba dang dbang bya ba dang de sron pa dang bsog pa dang yin pa da 'dren pa 'bregs par gtongs pa 'byi pa
227a4(rnying rgyud): 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang spyad pa dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad pasgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bslang bas so//
227a5(rnying rgyud): dpal thams cad dkrug pa dang gzug pa da ci zi dong dab bya bar 'brog pa dang bsas pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'dugs pa dngad gtong pa dang gi zheg pa dang 'phen pa gas pa dang ngengs pa dang 'dzis pa dang ste ba skyed pa 'i nye dang 'artso ba kun tu
227a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya sa dang 'byor pa thams cad bslab pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug mo dang bcing ba dang dab du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag
227a7(rnying rgyud): padang yin pa da dzin pa 'i thugs pa dang gting pa gdog pa dang ban pa sa da sangs par mjig pa nga byung ba nga mying ma na 'de ba dang du byeng ba par dadang pang gyi pa bya ba sa kyang du sbyo che bco nga thung 'dra
227b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so// mchod pa thams dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'bugs pa dang gtad pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang // 'degs pa dang
227b2(rnying rgyud): 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang spyad pa dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrub pas so zhes kyang gsungs so// sems
227b3(rnying rgyud): can thams cad bde don du// rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba// rang gi rgyal mchog lan cig bsgrub// yi ge tra~M ni sbyar bar bya// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje na chen gyi rtog pa'i chog rgyas pa'o//
227b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// cho ga bzhin du bsgoms gyur zhing // sems can dron phyir tshogs bzhugs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//
227b5(rnying rgyud): rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mi mnyam pa yis bsnyen gyur na// dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro// bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten gyur na// bdud rtsi nyid du ngang 'gyur ba yin// 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa// zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gti mug khyab
227b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug brten mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos kyi sa bsten pas gsum mchog ste// chos min bsnyen pas ngan song gsum// 'dod chags spang
227b7(rnying rgyud): rgyo byed par bshad// zheng rgyal po'i byed par bshad// gti mug don ni srub byed ces// kun tu gsing pa'i ming yin na// nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum du ba tu bshad// nga ni 'dod pa gcig pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung chen
228a1(rnying rgyud): de nas gsum po 'di yi mchog/ spyad phyir rdo rje srang 'don pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dgra nyid// bdag nyid pon byung ba yin// kang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i// sangs
228a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas byang chub stod ma yin// de rnams spyad phyi rabacom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs ni gsum po 'di mang nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa ste sogs rgya// 'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug rje// dkyil
228a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor de ni gseng snying po// rang gi rang grub phyir rab 'bul// oM l+yA b+hu ba swaH/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo srungs bzhis ni rab bsrungs pa// pa khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi na ma nyid dang ni// dkyil 'khor gzhu
228a4(rnying rgyud): mi dbyibs can la// sbrad rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid// bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni// go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// legs par bri'am gzhag par bya// pus mo gnyis kyis bzhugs la der// rtse gsum dmachog gis mtshan pas// zhugs te dam tshig/
228a5(rnying rgyud): bcings nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// oM b+hA ra b+hu ba swaH/ swa d+hi nA ma swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// byams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la// de snyed pa yi gtor ma phyin// slob dpon
228a6(rnying rgyud): tu zhugs pa yis// slob mthams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas n-i/ mtshig mchog na sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag/ snying po sdod zin la smras sam// de skad sbas pa'i chos rnams ni// gab te 'dir na ma
228a7(rnying rgyud): sbyang ngam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung dung ste// ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni// nam yang bzlas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di rnams sbom pa slong // yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ba dang /
228b1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rlob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya slabs nas ni// de la gar gyi rjod pa dang // 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo se ngon/
228b2(rnying rgyud): sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum byung do grub tu// slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad// kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs// brtan par byed pa'i rgya yin no// dga' dang zhag dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa jing ngas srung ste
228b3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig la rten kun tu bzhad// tshogs pan ma lha mo rnams// zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan b+hair dang // rtogs don bong du chu bya'i phyir// de rnams byin snying po dang // dkyil bar
228b4(rnying rgyud): dang tshig bzhud/ hUM hU~M / dkyil 'khor bzang po sgo bzhi pa// srad du gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya// mtshams kyi thig ni kA pa che// bzhi po dag ni rim pa bzhin// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi po dag ni de bzhin bya// rang gi snying po brda pan/
228b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi skor ni phyogs par bzhag/ skal bzang lag nar pa khri mtshon// sring mo phub can rdib mo// phag mo lag na gter nyid de// grub pa mo ni bsnyem pa dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas// go rims
228b6(rnying rgyud): dgu rlung bzhin du/ zhugs nas de bzhin chog padzin// sgron pa mags pas mchod par bya// hU~M nyid gsang bar ba bsgrub pas// de na nas dbyug pa dag tuH// oM su ma ga ti ma pa hid+ha ne/ ra~MH sa mA d+hi/ mas hU~M nu ra ShA ba/ bar g+ha sa mi R+Sha ta ma da/ seMng
228b7(rnying rgyud): rgyalusu mthun su // des su nim sa/ ba dun migs // des su su su / sa sa na 'dus bya/ yin// ga dag ma'i rjod

229b1(rnying rgyud): 'an// zug po sngal rnams cad sa byi rdzog/ sems can kun la 'de ba'i phyir// gdon cing dri byung ba byung ba \u0f7f// 'dod chags na nga gti mug rnams// nyos bya kyis dug tod byung // gdan dang mam stsogapa dang // ma
229b2(rnying rgyud): yang ni 'gram yin// de nas gadrug pa ni ni// dz+dza/ zlar ban la gro bzhig/ gdo gyi dkyil lakhor gas // de dbus da gdon rdzogs// tshig rgyas pa dag par bya// de nus pa ga pa bzhin zhugs nas// deci
229b3(rnying rgyud): dIng ngon pa zhugs na pa ni// khrom pas nang ba g.yon pas mnye// de nas gdon du rim sa rdeg pa// dmyal ba thams cid rtag d+ha n-i// sdig parten pa byed pa yang // rdongs rab tu rig par 'gyur// zhes bcom pa sims da
229b4(rnying rgyud): grisus so// ga bsngal thams cad pas 'don pa'i rgyud do// de nas ston pa ra// phrin pachog nga lhag dam pa yis// sems can ku don da sa rdzu byi// dkyi'i bor rnams pa gsungs ba yin/ dal hU~M bad+mo di yin / oM
229b5(rnying rgyud): denas 'di gsungs badzin// rdzo ga dpang rtag dam pani// gzugs can gyis ni bad chog gi// dab phrag dam pa mdzad pa min// bang bzhin pa sa khyi / ga ci 'dra ldangapa grang pa// rje rdzog mi
229b6(rnying rgyud): 'drel pa'i rnam pa yin// de nas gang b+h+ri kyil khor che// dam pa yang dag bya shang rgya ste/ bran marjo ts+tsha tshogs rnam par rgyal// phrin mchog dang daphyug dam pa pa// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi bus su chog pa nin// rdo sems dpa' rnags/

231a1(rnying rgyud): sa gas pa/ so ga ba po// mtsha pa na btum da/ ga gnan pa ba ga / dang kyib drugs ga nam dzug s+ho// rlub dag da rnamasas to// myi byas gan sa nga ku du dad/

231b1(rnying rgyud): tu gsang bas gsungs pa yin no// de nas 'a sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste// sdig pa tsho la dgang ba dang // sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// de dag yang ni sbyar 'grub 'gyur// nyis re 'am ni phreng/
231b2(rnying rgyud): 'aman// de bzhin po ni re re la// ci mngon mngon 'dad 'grub par bya/ ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// rus la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni// mchog tu rtog pa'i thar pa thob// brjod pa dang /
231b3(rnying rgyud): bcas zla ba'i 'od// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang ni bzang ldan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyelas pa'i mchog 'cha dang // g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa/
231b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten// rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku// gsang ba chen po dgod par bya// dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni ut+pa la 'dab
231b5(rnying rgyud): lter sngo// rdo rje pastims ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag/ g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin// rdo rje ki li ki li ma// dbus kyi dang lha dgyes par spro// de yi logs
231b6(rnying rgyud): lardo rdo rjerje// ming 'an gsor ba la brtson pa// bskams pa'i phyag gis yong pa 'byung ba'o// chu srid rgyal man bskyed dang bcas// de yi lags na bzhad dang bcas// mtsha pas bdag pa'i rdegapa// sangs rgya sa ngan chen dbang bskur ma gyur// ba
231b7(rnying rgyud): cad sprin gyi phyag rgya gzigs// rang la bdag ni thugs gtad pa// zung du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o// r-i sings 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchad pa dang ni brtags pa yis// mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob// ces ba
232a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// mchog tu dga' bdag pa dam pa'i dngos grub 'grub// gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba yi// rgyal ba'i ngas ris chen po 'di// thams cad
232a2(rnying rgyud): gzigs pa rnams mchod pa// chen po yis ni dpal 'dir rol// 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram// yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po
232a3(rnying rgyud): yi// ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan// dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i// bla phul bas mchog gyur ba'i// rdo zla 'i mcho sogs dang // klu dang rol monam 'phrul ba// me d+ha bsgos stsogs dang sbyor ba// mar mer skyong byas pa
232a4(rnying rgyud): mchod// bang pa sum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mazlog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi d+he ga pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor me zhugs kyang // rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nos// rdo rje kun 'tshod sngob dpon
232a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgom// ji snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// rje tshogs gos kyis yang dag bkrub sa// phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// me tog spo ma dung dri spong bcas// rdo rje grwa ni
232a6(rnying rgyud): dgu gis// gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya// de la mchog tu gsang pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug pa michog tu gapang pa'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu thub pa 'di yin te/ dngos bu'i kun gyi bde snyoms dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan pa de chen
232a7(rnying rgyud): mchod/ bde bdam pa'i dngos subagyis// rdo hU~M baM hoHrab tu byung bar mdzod// rab tu thugs tegayon po las// rdo rje'i rigagis mgon la 'dung // g.yon pa bsgrungs pas cung song bad// ba spyod cing mdzes pa'i mig brnams pa// de la mechog tug
232b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa dpapa dang tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal pa'i me tog gisil mdor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te// mchog tu bde 'di sems ni ril par ldan// sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud/ hoH ha
232b2(rnying rgyud): mgon pa snyem pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol// de nas me tog sil mdor// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpa' dmachog gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'
232b3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ oM/ sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis brgyan// lha yi cod pa na dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas// rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya trA~M hU~M/
232b4(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyis oM ni gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje can gyis phyir/
232b5(rnying rgyud): brlabs 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag
232b6(rnying rgyud): yang // gang gis sgrub po dam pa dang // sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur// lugs ma'am ni brdungs ma'am// 'dus byas pa'am bris pa'am// dang po'i sems dpa'
232b7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gsal nas// de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin// rtag tu rdo dril 'chang zhing // dngo grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thams cad dkrug dang mchod pache// bdag byin rlabs sogs bsgrub rnams so// de la ji ltar mchog tu gas ba dam pa'i dpal dmachog
233a1(rnying rgyud): gas kyi dngos rnams nga gag pa na ste/ rang rtag sul spyong bya bas// thams pa dang thug par sbyor ba yis// yang lagam tshogagis ro byas// gar bya zhing ni dbug padus// denas de dag shegs pa sa
233a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsung ba'i dam tshig gi pu'i marjod pa ni 'di yin te/ rdoHmchog dang po'i rdo rdo 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar po rtogs rab tu dga' ba khyod pa dag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs// hU~M mchog rdo rje las de mchog tu ming khung zad med srid pa rab bsgrub pa de dang yin
233a3(rnying rgyud): bde dam tshig bdag la de dgub mdzod// ba~M mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyu ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal ba kyi// hoHrab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig/ rtag par
233a4(rnying rgyud): bdag 'phel nam mkha'i snying po khyod// hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa pyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste// rab tu dga' ba mchog bdag po// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig
233a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// mchod pa kun mchog sgra rnams kyi// mchod de sngags pas klu rnams kyi// rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
233a6(rnying rgyud): cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i gru'i mchod po ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin/ bde ba chen po gas pa mthong bdag lA
233a7(rnying rgyud): bstan sbyar gyi// sbyang dus sar mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gseng ba dam pa'i dpal// dmachog gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen pa kyi ltar yin// rang sbyang skyor ba bzhin du// phyag rgya na gyis/
233b1(rnying rgyud): spyod nga// tid ngan pa bachagags na/ 'ang tid bsrungs te stong ba'ang// dam da bzhin ga thogs pa mas cad kyir tshig gi dngas byar byed kyi brngubs pa'i gas ba chen po dam pa'i dmachogs/ dang byar da rlog tu byu 'ad na
233b2(rnying rgyud): yinams par sgrub bam da/ zugasapa ma ma pa macig/ mams dpar du rgya pazhin// ngas ma ma dang ba ga rtsub ma da// banab cig+sa ngo ma rten pas/ dbang snag rjen paskrag pa'i na/
233b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur mchog bdag ba mdzad// nyes pa ma mdang rtag pa byed// 'dod rtags kyis narjes rtsigs pa// 'ad cigs rkyen pa dbra batsho/ bcom ldan nyid kyis du bamed// gan tu ga pa sbyin gyi mcho/ gdod nas spel pa de bzhi gshegs
233b4(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang po ldan bdag nyid// byang chub sem sa par byadag grub ngod// dngos tha badzin pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po sgrug pa'i sgra// grub pa'i rkyed pa snang bas// rdorje pa skems bdag padag mdzod cig/ dpal mchog dang po bcom ldan spyong /
233b5(rnying rgyud): gos den dang / pos brjod// don bye pan gyi martog/ dbang rnan pa nyid 'bye 'gyu// zhes byab rdzog ga na nyid kyi mchog tu sang ba'i chen pa mchog tu grub pa cwo spyan 'dus rdorje chang gi sa gsungs so// da bachog 'ang mi 'i
233b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' yang dgartogs// kun macig dngos sub can pa mi// dbang kyi nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o// blan nas 'od zer sngon sogs dang // sam ston pa'i mad byung dums// rdo rje'i tshig gisang di lba pas// rlom tsha bur na mas mthong bar 'gyur// gla
233b7(rnying rgyud): che// dngos bu ba dbang phyug pa de rnams kyi// myung dung gis byin zlangs pas/ slob dpon kyis thob bo// zhes rgya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi dang po sa gsungs so// de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam ga gas
234a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i spa ba pa byud ci ltar yin/ rang lharnal 'gyur ji bdun du// lha kun bdag nyid rnams kyis// rang lha'i rnal 'byung bdag nyid kyis// rang lhag lha nyid bslab par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dang /
234a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gros kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub pa
234a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// rdo rje kun mchog su rnams kyis// klu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams dpas// kyaid
234a4(rnying rgyud): rol mo'i cho ga ni// dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya// 'di yis rtog pa thams cad la// rdo rje 'bebs pas rab sad pas//
234a5(rnying rgyud): rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad pani 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol mo'i cho ga mchog tugs dang mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de rjes
234a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ci bzhin// ji snyed pa dang ci bde 'as// mai tog smos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa'am skyed mos tsha la sogs su// bdag nyid kyi dod rang bsgrubs nas// ji snyed rkyen dang blos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag bklubs// me tog phreng bcas kha ma/
234a7(rnying rgyud): lugs ma'am ni brdungs pa'i ma// 'dus byas ma rnaM ma thog// dang po'i 'khor lo mdun na// chog bzhin du zugs gsor nan// ma dzi dzinarje// rdo rje dril bur be sang pas// thams cad dbug dang mchod pa // bdag kyi sa
234b1(rnying rgyud): dun// na du'an dag bsgru stan/ don ngas dang nga // da ba dang sgrub// thams dpa 'a' mas da byeng// 'das pa man 'dug pa'am// rab tu gang ngam ba'am/ nga da pa na dang da/
234b2(rnying rgyud): byar de dgazhin gtsug/ gas pa jog gi 'khor po na// ga sogs kyi mthod na ni// ji bzhin ni rdzi bsgyur bya// 'dis ni 'dod pa can du sgru/ 'bru nga 'do da nga 'dod 'dra// dzas bdun gyid bang phyug 'jun// gag mang
234b3(rnying rgyud): byar// rdorje sems dpa' grub chen po// phyag rgya kun byed bang thug padag/ bran lani tsa mi zini/ mngon thams cad 'di/ ni drub pa dang mi 'ad cing // thamasa'i byed cing byin// sems na ldan //
234b4(rnying rgyud): smra/ sa/
234b5(rnying rgyud): bani 'an pa/ rgyas mas byed du 'bung 'gyude kyi mingag tu sa shes dag ba'i myi/ drug brda ba shin na med pa'i dra gra ba cu'i/ chog gi rgyal margyan bablang ngas zhing zhigangs du sbyin na te/
234b6(rnying rgyud): de mi ba dbang phyug rten pa da sa nyams myong // zhes byab bcom ldan tad su rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po la lcags 'i chen po dam pa'i dpel dmatshig gsum ngos bu ba thams cang ngagabu pa dang / ma rnying bu chen pa dang /
234b7(rnying rgyud): byin pas 'ar ba zimam gas ri gtu / gnasus pad kyis bdag sa pa ma mas 'u su 'du kyi sargya rung su ga sa
235a1(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang ba kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'dri na rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa'i lha na gcig pu nyid// zas byab 'thub par 'gyur ro// da ltar mchog turdzas chags
235a2(rnying rgyud): dka' ba pad+mar ba che// mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgred pa gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid de nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal
235a3(rnying rgyud): mchog dang bI las/ dga' ba chen po'i dbul rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
235a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho gu rgyas pa rjes su gzung ba bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar de zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan cig brjod pas
235a5(rnying rgyud): sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo gtsit+taM ud pA da yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mI 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang
235a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyod par byas nas ni// snying gar rdo rje rab bzhaganas// sur tA sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ho/ snying pos rdo rje tso bder bsgrub// 'di yis rdo rje bsgyung ba na// 'dod pa na las 'brub byar
235a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de nyid bskul bas myur dun// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// kun mchog da sa sri chen po byed// rdo rje sems dpa nyid du 'gyur// de bya mchog kyang ldan 'i rjesems dpas gsungs sa// gar bya jir thal mo sbyar// gos kyis gdong na
235b1(rnying rgyud): g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'ad dngos grub sems dpa' yis// slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug/ phyag rgya gar la dbabs pa'o// dad sgra mo bskrad par bya// de nas gdang ga rags
235b2(rnying rgyud): dgrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar phyin// de la rdo rje chen po'i mna'i chus dbang bskur te/ 'di ltar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sres
235b3(rnying rgyud): par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong sbras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nad na gnas// dad pa med pas bzha gad snod// zhes byas pa mna' bsgrag go// de la sangs
235b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i chog ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje chu yis dbang bslar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA sa ma ya a d+hi pa tI g+h+nAM oM b+hi khyim ma hA badz+ra d+har zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lab
235b5(rnying rgyud): sbyin par byani// 'di ni sang ste rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje'i tshang gi rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de bzhin ga shogs pa thams cad kyi// byang chub mchog gi sems chen po// yongs su mi spang rtag tu bsgrubs// shin
235b6(rnying rgyud): tu gsang ba de 'di yin te// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bA d+hi d+hi shrI badz+ra nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ye s+t+wa~M wAr b+hA ba sIH/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por spang bar bya'o// de'i ming de yang ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro// de la
235b7(rnying rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ the ga mtha' mid pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bstims tshul bdag po'i bdag/ zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i
236a1(rnying rgyud): gag / 'ab da pa sha par bya na na pa gyur// 'das na gyung pa 'du/ bdas pa na ma ga sung g+sa dus na gshegs pa na kyis na gshe 'a yang dag par bral bar bad du
236a2(rnying rgyud): dring pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag/ rang bzhin gyis ni sring bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin// mchog tugasang pa'i tshes nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa mdzad par bya ba'ag bya
236a3(rnying rgyud): che dbul bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad kyi de khon nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro//
236a4(rnying rgyud): nga nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gasdang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya'o// de la 'di ni dang khyod kyi// sring ba de shin tu myur bar ni// smyig bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde bu dam pa'i thabs// \u0f7ftshig 'di ni rtag
236a5(rnying rgyud): nga pa'i bangs mi thams dal/ da pa smin 'dzin du// rangs kyis sto bams// bdag dang 'jam mitshang ba// dba'i gshegs brnams ca kyibla nam pa'i mcho ga tugasang pa'i za badzin pa'i ya na thong gas tu ni bya

237a2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ci skyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pas 'dir dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bsgrub pa dang rjes su bsgrub pa rnams
237a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings thams cad brtan par gyur pa nyid kyis/ 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs
237a4(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi
237a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs de byung ba mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni lugs
237a6(rnying rgyud): pas kyang // sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // khyod rnams der nyid legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di las ni// slar 'chi ba ni yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// ces kyang mi 'jigs ngos par gyis// srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa na// srid

237b3(rnying rgyud): kun ma tshungs bla ma yis// slob dpan la ni gang spa ba// de ni sangs rgyas kun spad pas// rtag tu drug bsngal thong 'gyur te// rimapa da dug dang sbyar dug dang // mkha' 'jo rnams kyis gcos pa dang // gdon dang log 'dren gtum po mos// bsad nas

237b5(rnying rgyud): ra mi 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshig slob pon+da ni// sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang // rang srog gis rtag bstan bya na// longs spyod g.yobs smrab ci dgos// gang gis bskal pa bye bar ni// gangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson lda

238a2(rnying rgyud): dang rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob
238a3(rnying rgyud): dpon dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs bya ste// zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang phyir byed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams
238a4(rnying rgyud): cadade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no// phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid/ bla na med pa yang dag par
238a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o// zhes bya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba// rnal 'byor kun dang rjes skyong ldan/
238a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste// mangs pas mchog tu brtag pa'o// zhes bya'o// de'i chu gang yin zhe / gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dem tshig yongs su bzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrab
238a7(rnying rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o// de'i phyir gnas ska
238b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing gsad par mi bya'o// ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gas
238b2(rnying rgyud): 'ablan med pa'i theg pa chen po 'odas tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la bde bar gzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o// bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams lan tsho ngaskyod pa yin no// lta ba log/ pa dang rol du stegs pa dang / nyan thos pa
238b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no// ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so// sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so// gang gis kyang khyed kyi lus ngag yid kyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med
238b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis// dam tshig 'di ni 'dra' dka' ste// sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
238b5(rnying rgyud): dpas mchog tu bden pas gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la dgongs pa yin no// de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis// rang gi dam tshig mi zad pa de ster bstan par gyis// de ni
238b6(rnying rgyud): pa m+bAr ba de rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis// de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gang dang glu// rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa// rdo rje bra ma chen pos de phul nas// rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par b+ha// myos byed myos
238b7(rnying rgyud): bral ba snang ba ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis// rlung ngos mo tshog sogs// ci bzhin rjes 'gro bzlas pa bru// ring gas tshogs blangs pa yi// klu dang rol mogar rnams kyis// sgra tshogs phyag su'i mchod pa dang // rdo rjesams dpa' la mosogs/
239a1(rnying rgyud): sa 'du // dag sa das smrabs/ sa / na su dran// ma su ska dang sa/ smra gsas na// dadun
239a2(rnying rgyud): pa du / dri bcim ldan 'ad mardzug dpa sa // sna su shegasu pa ma gyir/ da la 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyam thamag/ jig/ rnams // nga bu seM sa dbang na pa
239a3(rnying rgyud): rje lci ba'i do// zhes bya pa gsum sa// dang ga ming rnying ba'i gud da do/ mig srabs bya to// rang gami chag smram mi pa de// men cu ga shegs pa pan kyiyin// nga mjugatugs mdzu bu'i mthong bani/ ngo rjel du ma nyim sa thos
239a4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ben pa rgyu pal// phyogs rdzogs sa // gis nas gyu// de na ga tu ga tugs brjong ba sbyi mdzod ni/ 'dzin dang / sa sa dang /
239a5(rnying rgyud): nis// yongs su pasko bas dang mchong bya// de nas mchog tu gsung ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod sbyi ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogasu na'i// rtog pa thams cad nam 'grub pa// gtu rgya phyag mdzan byag tu bye// gang zhig gang dopa yin
239a6(rnying rgyud): phyi// dedzin rlung las byas pa'i/ d+hami ga na gyis// rdun pa gas gleng rnam // dkyil la du gang dadagAng bstan pa// da ga da pasos// ga ni
239a7(rnying rgyud): /
239b1(rnying rgyud): zhug smra/ sa su sa dun / / san sa du
239b2(rnying rgyud): rnam sa nas pa da na sa gas
239b3(rnying rgyud): ga 'a ba sa / sa gci ma nas maldan das dpa sa shi mas tsugs du ga ni/ mas ma gyis bub dus
239b4(rnying rgyud): dga' ma cig ste// 'dri babyen pa rnyan ning mthub gsal gyur mi// ma mi rtogs nas mang du phyogs shing myur zlangs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi rig kyi g+ha d+ha byas pa'i dmachog gi la shing 'dzi pa'i cod pa ni/ rdorje thams dngo
239b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa // ngang ni rten med/ gangs byas// la byeng 'du spyor// dem 'dzug sa thams ses myo tshugs pa 'angasapa'i / nga gzung gimi 'ang ma da/
239b6(rnying rgyud): zhi pa maspyod // 'dimi gdus // 'dreg du zhing pa'i dngom lu // de kyi gas thams cad kyim ga tugs ba ga dag pa du 'i'aphang bye ma sum pa me pa'i ga
239b7(rnying rgyud): su yin sa su san na na tshu su
240a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dmachog gi 'dug pa rdorje'i sgra'i marjod pa ni/ dbang bsgyur thams cad dbang phyug dmang sa// yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchod// kun na thog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal sgreng ba las// rkyen ran chen dpal bdag legs mchod byar// /
240a2(rnying rgyud): nus ming po gsum gyi ni b+hu b+hu ba swaH/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi/ hrIhU~M shrI d+d+ho/ de nas bla'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni/ phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje gru'i mdzod pa ni/ sadza maM ga maN+Dal
240a3(rnying rgyud): tsata ba ma 'du zhing nyan med sa/ trA sh+'u la/ / po hU~M// de nas 'ams cad kyi mchog dang phyug dam pa'i dkyil lakhor chen po'i 'jog tu gseng ba'i cig gi bu'i song bani/ lceladra dri thedag pa'i dkyil 'ang dardza
240a4(rnying rgyud): 'od kyis sgra ni rnam par mdzes// la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka phye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bang // la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa// la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin
240a5(rnying rgyud): pa// la par gdul bya rnam par sbyad phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs// ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub gyur cig/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje bu
240a6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te// dngos drub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jung // mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzaHhU~M baM hoHrab tu grub par mdzod// de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla
240a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dam pa dpal rgya mtshig bla na med pa'i mchog tu shan du gsang ba'i rdo rje klu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje klu'i mchod pa'i glu dang gar gyi tshogs ci ltar bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas/ so sor rjes su
240b1(rnying rgyud): bong du nas bya dang / dang dang gshegs pa thams cad kyimachod tuman dugs nga blan ma pa'i dobya ba nam tu bya rdzogs pa dang cig ca pa brtso pa chos tu shi dus byabya 'i khyab padagasrung // rdzogs pa di'i ban/ pa dang byas nga
240b2(rnying rgyud): na chog tu tshogs rkye dog// rnamya tshong ngang tu bar brtajug/ zhe tu bzhin gag bcom ldan 'das do sems dpas gsungs do// de snang dpa' mchog nga rtog pa'i tsheb byas pa pa ba rgyad tshogs / ga cigs 'do 'om kyang po sabya
240b3(rnying rgyud): nis na pa bya// gang gis tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan bun khris bsnyen pa// mthog gri dngos su pa kyi da ni dpes yang bya ta rang su byong/ de pyodang chag tung da da deng bye dang// phyog chog tu bste// gang chogags ci
240b4(rnying rgyud): dngos bu thims cad sbyang sbyang byed// gang nig gong ljang mchog dgyes par// zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams de// shin nam rtog gi 'dod ba yi// dngos grub dbang phyug pa de nges thob// gang gis dngos grub mthob dang // bsod nams phyi tshogs med pa rnams/
240b5(rnying rgyud): rdorjem khong mchog tu bzhu sa na// sgrub po 'dir nang bzla 'arjer/ la dz+hi rjes pa sa dpa' 'a tsho/ bsags kyis mgrub dang / na pa'i snying pos brgya ba byas kyang // mthub 'di zhugs 'thub par 'gyu// dpal brdzogs po ba da
240b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin snang chub pa y-in// 'i rgyag bathugs nas // daci papa'i mas grub payis// de brgyas rgyu rnyen// de ska rtsog tug // 'ad sa 'dri pa sa/
240b7(rnying rgyud): sa nga // su sus 'dun/ brji gis ma na payang // ga pa sa du bya// kyi la'ing myo tshugs sa kyi gyu// nga pa lungadu/
241a1(rnying rgyud): du grub par 'gyur// grub min yang dir cung zad med// dngos grub las dang 'de de bzhin// dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur du// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dag la mchog
241a2(rnying rgyud): dang po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos
241a3(rnying rgyud): dang dge 'dun te// dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i// ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya// go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog/ go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan// rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang // pad+ma rin chen 'chung ba'o//
241a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo de ni brtags nas su// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas na// sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di yin te/ oM b+hU kha~M/
241a5(rnying rgyud): khyim mam yang na nags tshal lam// snga ma bzhin du bkun nas ni// mtshon rgya mchog gi cho ga yis// thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya// de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpad de bzhin gshegs// lha ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'dir dag
241a6(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das bston// ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas// brtan zhing nges pa'i go cha bgos// shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog/ go cha la sogs 'gos pa yin// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes// dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa yin// srid pa shin du grub pa yi//
241a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad mchog/ ces byang ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o// de nas mchog tu gas ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni/ thams cad nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang
241b1(rnying rgyud): nya masbyor ba'is// kun mchag mnyam pa nyid dugasal// zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ de nas ngam tshig chen pa gsum su thom pa zhes bya ba ni/ longs slong dun la langs spyod pa// rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na// dag dang chog gsang ba /
241b2(rnying rgyud): pa'imachog/ bdag gis byashes pa kyang macad// sa bya ni gshegs pa na pa khyong bri bang // tham gyi drug 'di mi ni// mid par ba tharnams kyang // bza dzin pa yang bya ba byabyer// gra dis grang cing pang 'a /
241b3(rnying rgyud): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo// de ltar brjod nas/ snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcu gnas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// da nas rdor 'dzin slob dpon gyis// rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni/
241b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis// slob ma thams cad mchog tu gzhug/ longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang // dkon mchog gsum po la phul ba// 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan rnams la// mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu
241b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i cho ga'o// / de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni/ res la bcom ldan bri bya ste// rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni// rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar// cho ga ji bzhin mchog du'o// de yi pad 'ang ba gcig bzhugs pa// de
241b6(rnying rgyud): 'od kyis 'khor lor sten// gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor che'i// mkha' 'gro ma rnams logs la bri// dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang // gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba// gsum po dkar dang lta ba ste// bzhi pa gser ltar dri med pa'o// rdo rje gtul po'i dbang phyug zug/
241b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ba T+wAM bsgreng dang bcas// rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar// de yi logs la mtshan ma gtod// rdo rje byangab 'jug mardo rje'i// 'khor lo gtong ba de bzhin gzhan// rdo rje dril bu ba dan nam// de yi logs na g.yon bsnyems ma// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yis/

242b4(rnying rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ pad+ma'i thod pa las bya ste// de yang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pas na/ rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'o// de nas 'dir phyag rgya bcing bani/ sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar// kun mchog rtse mo dang brngas pa// mtho bo rdo rjes bkab pa ni/

242b6(rnying rgyud): gtum pa dang ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brlag nas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum mu lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu rtag pa'i srung dar yang
242b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung // chos kyi jil phred grol ba rgya// dang phyog gini rtseg cu cher// byin gyis brlangs nas snying po'in// rdo rje la sogs tho pa'i ga byung / rje rjem mas
243a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rnganal 'byor dbang phyug grub// rdo rje can gyis byin rlabs 'gyur// bud me rnams kyang 'babs gyur nas// ston pa rdo rje phab pa yis// rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin// rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur// da la than
243a2(rnying rgyud): mar re zhig rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu zlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag 'bebs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khon
243a3(rnying rgyud): na du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges pa sbyor ba ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po shin du khro ba 'bebs pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs shing 'jigs par
243a4(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sman gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdzas su chags pa dang dgug pa
243a5(rnying rgyud): gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang 'bebs par nus pa'o// thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge'i don dang / lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje dadud rtsi la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gdug pa dang drag po dang
243a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu gtum pa dang ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams cad dang gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ de dag kyang thal bar rdzog par 'gyur na/ dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod cing thogs pa med
243a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la dgo shingad mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po thabs shi ma drag po 'di'i man ngag gi bathas pa ni/ sna'i dbugs thab nyid kyis bden pa 'ardo rje tshig gis grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod ba'i las thams
243b1(rnying rgyud): dbyi dngos grub sa tshogs rnams la dam pa'i ma chag tu grub pal// sbrid nas mchog tu gas pa'i rdo rjerna la 'gyor gyi dbang phyug ma'i lha chen po rnams kyis bshad par bya lta/ de la thog ma pa zhig rdo rje chen pa 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang mda' gtad pa
243b2(rnying rgyud): bya ga / dang tu byas sa pa'i ba rgya'ad mas cad gru par ma nga ba zhig pa dnga'i tsam chung pa ya byung kyi gi rigs pa rgya bcas btab ma kyis thams cad la rgyas 'a bas pa yang pa dang / don mdas sa med pa dngasu bas
243b3(rnying rgyud): las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i g.yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o// hrIHgnyis pa ni rdo rje chen
243b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'a pa'i ba bar ba mtshig ste lanazhes bya pa'i snyam te/ byas da gzhin pa'i 'arjod pa'i sa 'dam pa'i blan du dag mas zhing / dga' byin pa dang sgra gyi pa rkyeg tu 'dus bams cad bla bar dab sum nas 'thad pa la ma
243b5(rnying rgyud): ga 'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs
243b6(rnying rgyud): tu bab nga // de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya ga gi maben pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje dag gi zla ba'i 'bras pa ni mid kyi 'dzud pas dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa la/ hUM/ gsum bani rdo rje chen par 'ad dpa'i me 'bar nga thal
243b7(rnying rgyud): bar rdzog pa zhes bya ba'i rtse mo chen rdo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang ba d+h+r-i ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang bsgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pas sprin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro ba'i lhan te/ rdo rje chen po'i rdo bo kI li kI la khro bo'i spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad grub par mdzad pa'o//
244a1(rnying rgyud): 'adz+ranas bya ba dang / thamasas su su stos bya ba tsam gyis dadra dathams cad 'dums pa dang / ngan ma kyang zags pa med pa 'dangs thub bams cad dang / yus tu rgyagasu ngas la dgongs zhing mchag tu grub papa// na pa na
244a2(rnying rgyud): nang nga ba'i me'abar baba' bar drug par tha'atshang ba zhes thapa di yin rnams pag sasub dag kyi byud ba ma dad 'drug pa dang chos de'i dzin gi ngas te/ do tul 'de ci narje pa pa thugs sa mas cid kyi pa ma //
244a3(rnying rgyud): la rdzug pa mags dang gang ba dang don pa dang thag mas cas btabapas bathams pang spong ba ma dad pe/ ra kyi seMsapa med pa da sa thas mas cad kyi tshopa pa ga sa shi ma ga nga // na com ldan 'das su ma da
244a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa dus da/
244a5(rnying rgyud): nasu ma pa kun gyi gnas srubs kyi// dkyil 'ar 'di la btsugs pa// mchog ginam gyi// dang mams cad pa 'a // den 'do na ston pa das gamigs drug tu ga pa yin te/ tharje dkyil dbang nam
244a6(rnying rgyud): la 'bang du na da par bya/ du nas bams pa ben ma sa byang dun pa bdu ci/ 'a phra ga de dam migs rten na nga // de rtags pa kyi la 'dza // bdag pa nga ni brtsub ba das car/
244a7(rnying rgyud): na bcas pa sa// de thab marnams gzugs// da' dag shes kyi'i 'i gag cid marnams 'das dag nas/ rgyas brnams kya
244b1(rnying rgyud): lda da ga sa sa kun ma sa mu/ sa
244b2(rnying rgyud): na na pa / sa / / / na sa su/
244b3(rnying rgyud): ga lag 'das / na rgya lan bya / gyu // nga phyogs sa rnag da / sbyin pa banag dang bgyung ni sa mye

244b6(rnying rgyud): su ga sa su
244b7(rnying rgyud): na bdag na sun brdzun pa / banas bya du
245a1(rnying rgyud): cad dbebs pa dang / rab tu grub par byed pa dang / thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang / slong bar byed pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni// khrag che na ga bung dang bcas pa// tsan+dan dmar dang sbyar ba ni// tshogs kyi nang du rabazhugs nas/
245a2(rnying rgyud): sa
245a3(rnying rgyud): pa yis// dngos grub thams cad tho par 'jur// nam mngang kun gyig sbyor pa yi// rnamam pa' tham sa cad ces brjod cing // rdo rje phyag tus btub pa yi// 'jig rten gsum yang bzang bar bya// dngas grub las dang de bzhin da/ 'di la dud meng ma 'dus
245a4(rnying rgyud): med// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grud kyis// dngos grub ma lus sgrub par 'gyur// don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed// sdung bsngal kun 'phrog dpal dang ldan// rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed// ces bya ba mchog tu
245a5(rnying rgyud): smras sa
245a6(rnying rgyud): btu dang ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis// rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar sogs// ji bzhin rjes 'gro 'di zlas pa bya// dade gsang tshogs blangs pa yi// grwa dang rol mo gar rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag kyi'i mchod pa dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal la
245a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// bud med tshogs dang bcas pa yi// mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang // ci 'dod pa ma longs spyod kyis// mchod pa byas nas rab tu bsgrub// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ni 'di bzhin
245b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dpyang ba sbyin par bya ste// 'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi// phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa nyid// rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste// sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'i// gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'i
245b2(rnying rgyud): khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba ni// dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o// zad pa thams cad zad 'gyur dang // 'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhing mthong bas mi snang 'gyur// gang nas kyang ni 'jigs med byed//
245b3(rnying rgyud): drag po dbang po nyid ba zla// nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs dkyil 'khor// khros nas yi ge hU~M tsam gyis// ma lus pa ni thal bar byed// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor/ mchog tu zhugs te mthong nas ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol te// khyed rnam
245b4(rnying rgyud): dang ni rab tu gnas// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// khyad par du ni ngan 'gro med// gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing // cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams// ston pa'i mchob tu gyur pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'i
245b5(rnying rgyud): drug tu yang ni bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no// byang chub sems ni sngar mi bya// dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang // slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de// sems
245b6(rnying rgyud): kun la phan phyir dang // theg pa thams cad 'dzub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul ba dag pa zhes// rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa dang // bdag po'i grogs po bu rnams kyang // phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon spyod kyis// shi
245b7(rnying rgyud): gnyid ni log tu gzhug/ rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// de la phul na 'bras bu che// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu byon pa nyid du 'gyur// de phyin bsod nams
246a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs yin te// tshogs pas dngos grub ma myog tu 'gyur// de rjod skye ba nas zu bdas/ ga pyir 'di sa rla bcugasas// dang cig thum pa dang nyam par// sangs nus pan gyi byed kyis brlas// sangs na ma da da
246a2(rnying rgyud): bris// dering khyed la dbang bslang bas// khams gsum ze'i rtsa 'dzid ci// stobs dpal mdzong pos snar ba yin// rdo rje dam pa'i bas mchog na la 'byor ma'i// mchog pa dmachi ga gsung ba mthong me ni// bdud la sogs pa'i sha pa po ngo
246a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs stor pob nas khyod grub yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mas dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po la srimachog tu gsang ba'i darjen pa 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog mchog tu grub pa'o// // de na sang pags pastan nas gcis
246a4(rnying rgyud): dbang byug gir rdzog tu gas bu 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chog ni/ ras la btsam ldan ci par bya// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyugs// klog gi 'khor ma yongs 'gyur ba'i// 'khor ba'i rnam 'asgril gar rnams kyis// pad+mal sogs phyag mdzong bri// thug rgyal bang 'o ltar
246a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// de yi legs ni thams cad la// khro gnyer ma sogs bri bar rtse// drag mo la sogs phyag mo tshan gzugs// padz+ra'i lha mo pad+mar bAHsa// dkyil 'khor der ni brtag byas na// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// tsho rnam mchog
246a6(rnying rgyud): gang gang gis// thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya// de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste// 'dul ba'i thabs kyis dag pa yis// rol pa'i gar ni mdzad pa yin// zhes bya ba ni mchog gi rdo rje ste/ ci ltar
246a7(rnying rgyud): badz+rad mar ngon// gnas kyi nyes pa sgra tshogs so// tshon gyi shes ngas mi gos pa// de badzin khams gsum dag pa'o// rjes bye ba ni mchog tu gsang pa'i chos nyid kyi dril bu'o// chog gang dang gang dag gis// 'grob rnams ni 'dul phyi ga
246b1(rnying rgyud): da da nga ba da // su da ga pa nga na na sud/
246b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad phreng rjod du/ nyim dkyil pang d+hi nang ni/ 'ab mi da drim / rdzing bu rgya dang badris// rnam 'didir 'dri ci// de brlab rtsig la gnas/ de ba' byeng 'ar gyur den/ dbang 'dradra dang dati
246b3(rnying rgyud): gsadang bdag rgyurgyud canag/ 'du ni dbyeb ma pa dam pa de'i// la'arab tu kyi // chog nas de nga ban / ngas rtog nini 'di 'ab//
246b4(rnying rgyud): shegs pa rnams cad mthong // rnamam pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das// bsam pa thams cad yong sa rdzogs mdzad/ de na 'chob kyirin bache'i zi dun/ bsam pa slab pa thams ca kyi/ nir byi ngas ma pa grub pa mchog/ dri do
246b5(rnying rgyud): da gabang ba sa// zhes ca// semam na gyi kyi papa snang rnas/ 'ad ti ga rnams / bal 'ams ca dbus kyi / zhes rgya dang tshig gamachog go// dpa ga di bami tshag
246b6(rnying rgyud): mas dang 'a 'byas/ sbyang dra ba dgadras par rdzogami byor mtshag ni zab pa mngo// de ltar gas 'i gyo ga 'dug+sas/ debadu rdzogs bye durgyas pate/ sob ga 'jumapa pa gyi pa dang ba
246b7(rnying rgyud): dpangar chub dang 'ang phyog bamasu ma cing chu pa chag sa// thabachen pas // grub pa'i cho ba ni / go sa dbang chub / ton pa kun brtsig du'i bung byeng / rjod yon pa'i ba // rig
247a1(rnying rgyud): byed rnams la// mthong ba la sogs sems can don// sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin// mthong med long ba de rnams ni// bsod nams med sogs rtags ldan la// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyurnam
247a2(rnying rgyud): ni// rdo rje sems sogs sems mchog gi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig mchog ni bcing ba ste// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// gang phyir sgra rnams bstan pa ni// de yi phyag rgyar grags pa ste/
247a3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub kun phyir de dag sprul// gang dag bzung ba tsam gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs mchog/ mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid// mchog tu bsdus par gyur pa yin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// gang phyir bsdus par 'gyur ba/
247a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// nyams pas 'jigs pas grub par 'gyur// ci sbyar rgyal po rnams shrI bka'i// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'da' dka' ba// phyag rgyags lnga ba kun gyis snang // 'da' bar nus pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas nyid dam
247a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// de ltar bskal pa bye bas kyang // thob par mi 'gyur myur du ni// ci ltar phyag rgya mchog bzung ba'o// ji ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni// de ltar dngos grub gsungs pa yin// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad mchog byed//
247a6(rnying rgyud): gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni// 'dus pa bde ba chen po rnams// rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis// byin gyis brlab pa brtan par mdzad// zhes bya'o// de nas 'di gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhas shing mchog tu phra ba dang / zab pa dang rgya pa bsam
247a7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu dag pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ mi zad cing zad pa med pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa/ shin tu mchog tu dga' ba ma lus pa'i bde ba chen po dang yid bde ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dngos gru' chen po'i dbang phyug ces
247b1(rnying rgyud): sa ga mi nga gru bams cad pa tshig da ba ba rnams kyis ra' dus dpar mnganas/ 'ad byu dgas papa na ma pa'i mchog gogs dgas bya ba'i na mamam gnangs dgazugs pa jug na cag byung bya
247b2(rnying rgyud): mang pa'o// de nas de bu ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyagagis bdag la sbyin gyis rlab pa bsgrub pa gcig pa'i tshig bre shed par bya// zhes thub maldan 'das rna rnas mas dngas gsungs s+ho// na du la rig// rtag ca med skyed pa ba rnas
247b3(rnying rgyud): gan gyi d+hag chung bachub po'o// bdag byin brla pa gcig pus 'brug/ ces bya ba namachog tu grub dag// dem sa chag tu gas pa bdag la khyen byas pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i tshogs tsug tu thu ban/ la ci mchog gsu tsho \u0f7f/
247b4(rnying rgyud): bdum pa'i khang par na// rdo rje la sogs thob bzang na// rdo rje can gyis byin brlab 'gyur// de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i bdagra la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i thog rgyas pa'i khyad pa shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu kun bdag nyid//
247b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sprir bdag ljin// phrag nA kun gyi rnal 'byor bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// sgrib po'i cho ga 'di las ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dge bsdus// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyag zin pa nyid byin rji //
