271a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang sa gsum sa// dang byang bu'ab myo na sa 'byed de/ byu gnas sa na yo // nga thob dag/ 'tho sa 'god pa nga// ma ma ma gags stsas// na sa pa shed pa de// bam mags ma ste// nga ma na
271a2(rnying rgyud): ga/ na sa sa / nga sa smra sna /
271a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ na sa ma myu sa sa du /
271a4(rnying rgyud): na nga jig she// gan du chen pa sa// na ci po ga pa'i// tshul/ ga sa/ ma 'a de bsasasums// sa sa ga sa gis// pad+ma mu dang mtshu pa// mam pa da brdzun
271a5(rnying rgyud): ngamam pa dpang nga bdag nyi// rnas pajigs kying nga drug nyid/ ni rnams myed/ ma tha // sems pan mams cad namade byer// 'a khyen pa'i dzig sa dag pa'i// ti yang na la shes su na sdus// she 'o// de la ma
271a6(rnying rgyud): ni/ bams ca mya' bcon sbyin // sems ca dzin / sa bris dang ga/ ngan sa // dbas nga da de// rgyal mtshun batshad pa na// ni sun gas rjeb pa// bam pazlam med
271a7(rnying rgyud): na / ma su su gyu/ sa yang /
271b1(rnying rgyud): zug matsun gyi po ninyid do// dung mchog ngos thab can po yi// dbang phyug chen po mtshon mche// gas lnga 'ide nyid ce// rdo ces zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag sa rgyan gyi len nyid shes pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cadas sargyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba can// ji rten bu shod
271b2(rnying rgyud): chos// no bu nor bu bsags pa'o// zhes kyang dbang bsgyur ba thams cad sa phyag mtshas sde pon nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo sems dpas gsungs so// nga la ji ltar thams cad dgrag pa'i rgyang yin zhen// rtog pa thams cad gsang rkyen gyi// rdo grags kyi dril bcas pas// bkrag rnyed nas rjes bsgrub
271b3(rnying rgyud): rdul nyid kyis bya ba yin// ji ltar mchod pa thams cad bcog yin zhen// rtog pa kun kyigs chen gyis// rab tu dgang bas mchod das ni// gra dang ral mo rnam 'phrul bas// mdzod de sparang yang rnal 'byor mchod// de ladi ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i ngamachog chen por ri
271b4(rnying rgyud): sa / sa du sa
271b5(rnying rgyud): sabya ba mchog drang po'i skyes bu'o// de pa ji ltar dang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhen// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog pa kun las bsrub bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha stor bas// de dag thams cad bslab par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa de rgyud de// rdo trail du 'dzin
271b6(rnying rgyud): gyur nas// rdo rdorje dril bur bsad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes bslabs pas// mchog dang las sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad ba med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhan// bsgrub pa ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// ma nas ri ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed
271b7(rnying rgyud): cad thams cad bza'// yangs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am// gang dang de du 'chag pa'am// dgod pa dang ni smra ba'am// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang la mgyur// de dang de ye dpor bya// mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis
272a1(rnying rgyud): ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos tham cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing rtsub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dadapas klog/ de ni theg kun dang bral bas// dngos srab kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyung// nyes bya ba dmachog rtsed po'i dra rbang+ga/
272a2(rnying rgyud): nyid do// de sa dpal mchog dang pa'i chog panyams mchog gi thamags pa// marta ba cugasang bsgrub pa'i chog pade badzab byad klub byer gas so// rdzi mchog 'don da cas pade ga shes sa sras pacas rnams kyis byed rnabs pa// ba can dam pa dzi 'arjod pa dag kyirnam gag
272a3(rnying rgyud): ma// dpal ga sas tug pa nga na// sa byu she rgyu // yangs chub sa pa 'i// zlaba'i sa so// ma //
272a4(rnying rgyud): chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu byung gnas ni// sman mchog 'byor ba'i dbang phyug 'don gso ba yin// mthang bas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod pa chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// namamakha' dang ma tshungs mchog gi da sung phel gsol//
272a5(rnying rgyud): dan sus kyang mthar thug byed par rnas pa zin// sems can rnams ni dman la zhan cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med cing sla ba byed la sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyi 'di ni mthar thag pa'o// gang gi khri la na 'di gnas gangags rab tu bslab
272a6(rnying rgyud): ba 'am// yang nang bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir slab byed// so sor nyams su myong ba'i mazla yis thams cad du// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje chang sogs su ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyar+ya la sogs thams cad 'dir ni de bzhin gsungs// de
272a7(rnying rgyud): ni thams cadasas nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnor mings// gang 'i rdo rje la sogs gzugs spyan la so/ pa// jis dong ba 'ang ga thams cad sgrub par byed// ra tu 'dod papa yi de hU~Mlas bris dang ni/ 'od pa ngos supa la phre rje
272b1(rnying rgyud): bar byar// tsam pornams kyis ma par snang bar mang dpa ni// gang sa spyon na dag kyi mang bur di 'gar men// 'di ni ges phreng ba dang ba sta ga na yang sa pan/ sa pas ngas tha ba kyi pas ba mas pa 'o// cad 'a' bang brtan sa nyi pa pa/ pa nga /
272b2(rnying rgyud): bar mdang pa yin// rtag ma ga chen gang gis ska byed pa/ de ba byung du par byed// nga ma tha brgyad pa pa thams ca dngas cis shing shi tu nye pa dag shin tu ban pa dang / shin du byas pa dang / rgyug du che byer 'drar ba yin no// gang shig chogagargyal ba skye ba byed /
272b3(rnying rgyud): thal ba thams cad ces shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po rdzo ba nas bde ba'ang bab// de kyang 'di la da cing klas par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs zhes bu bab+hi te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs chags// sras mthog sangs rgya rdzas
272b4(rnying rgyud): na leg so legs// rdo rje mchog zhi de re 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so lesra// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlab pa// rtag tu me 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsung nas ni//
272b5(rnying rgyud): sus dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i tshul po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// // thugs dam sa'i snying pa tho ljang du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen ba mar+d+ha kA la sha dang / sra
272b6(rnying rgyud): cang po gi thong man pa di gzha lanas pa zus te gta la nga/ mdzu ma rtse nga gyis// da na da nas tu bas// dang 'i marnyed pas pa tha sa// byang na na pa ba po dbab
272b7(rnying rgyud): bas bskur// 'de gyung kyi byang kya gas la de 'ing / nga ud ton / pa bcwa ba dang // log gcig nan mnyam mo// srang yang drud 'a da kyi 'grel sro dpon pan dag snying po bang pa thus rbe 'ad gram 'phelag tes ga na ngas/ dag par gyis pa'o//
273a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du// tan+saR+Sha da~M ma hA karmamA la na ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las kyi phreng ba zhes thab/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
273a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan phrin las ma lus pa'i bdag nyid/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po'i bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen de ni/ 'gyur
273a3(rnying rgyud): pa med pa rdo rje tha/ de bablo gshegs pa thams pad ci med pa'i bden nyid can de/ 'di sa jig tsun po ga nam par dag pa pa bang chen pa'i dang du skams par zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa'i 'ang ngu
273a4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dam tshig rdo rje dang / lus rdo rje dang / ngag rdo rje dang / sems rdo rje dang / ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / nam mkha' rdo rje dang / gzugs rdo rje dang /
273a5(rnying rgyud): sgra rdo rje dang / dri rdo rje dang / ro rdo rje dang / reg bya rdo rje dang / chos rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rdul snyed dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang
273a6(rnying rgyud): dkon sachog dpal dang / tshod paku med dang / don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid/ 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
273a7(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas/ rdo rje btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang bcas pa la bde ba dang mchog tu bde ba dang / bde bral gyi bde ba dang / lhan cig tu skyes pa'i bde bas
273b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i khams thams cad la khyab par mdzad do// khyab par mdzad nas yum gyi b+ha gar 'dus par gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrar shar pa ni 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / mthi ngag dang / dmar pa'i zhal
273b2(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / rin chen dang / dril bu dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri phyag drug na 'dzin pa/ zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba las gyur pa'i khro bo ak+Sho b+ha ba sbyar shar ba ni 'di lta ste/ dkar
273b3(rnying rgyud): po dang / mthing nag dang / dmAr ba'i zhal dang / rdo rje dang / kha T+wAM sa dang / rnge'u chung dang / du da mar dang / rgyu zhags dang / khyung gi khwa phyag drug na 'dzin pa/ zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
273b4(rnying rgyud): rkyen pos gsang ba'i sngags 'di nyid ste sku gsung thags rdo rje las byung ngo / pa dzAka/ badz+ra a kr-IrdzA r+tha d+hIHbadz+re dzaMka/ b+his brjod pa 'i thob a ny+tso g+h+rA pas rdo rje sems dpa' la thim par gyur ba las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdas
273b5(rnying rgyud): po/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje'i sgrar yongs su rdzogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / mthing shran dang / dmar po'i zhal can/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / g.yon na b+han d+ha dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu
273b6(rnying rgyud): bsnams pazhi khro 'dres pa'i skur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rdo rje dbyings phyag ma yang ston pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang gnyis su med par sgra la 'khril to// de nas yum rdo rje dbyings phyag mas 'di skad ces gsol to// chos
273b7(rnying rgyud): dang gang zag bdag med mkhyen// gzung 'dzin sgrib pa gnyis spangs shing // byams pas 'gro la thugs rtag rje// gdod nas don mdzad mthar phyin pa// pad ltar 'dam skyes skyon mi gos// mi gnas dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo//
274a1(rnying rgyud): bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod byung // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskrad do// stong gsum 'jig rten kun gnas pa'o// sems can tan
274a2(rnying rgyud): yongs spang ba dang // theg pa'i dam pa la ma thugs pa'i// dal 'byor nyams kyi sbyang ba dang // bdag shegs snang ba sgrag sung thugs// mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lor shar// rdza rang gsum gyi byer med // rlung 'dug bsgrub pa'i ma
274a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa rdzogs kyi 'khor ma mo// ka mu m+b+ha lce'i klud rten gsungs// gis gsol to// den sa sangs rgyas thams cad byed kyi pa 'dzor gyi bra g-i ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni sdang rdorjes 'di skad cus gsungs so// tshogs kyimacha pa
274a4(rnying rgyud): dam grong sri bstad shing // de nyid lda / daglegs gnyis 'angal pa'i rgya// sku gsum mthung byin 'gro ba don mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don gyi dbyim par bshad par bya// dri 'i dkyil 'am 'di dus su// dkyil 'khrur rnam bajug pa 'i/
274a5(rnying rgyud): las rnams bsdus pa'i phyi ma dang // bad+mad kyi mchod pa bshad par bya// de yang dkyil 'khor drug rjes pa// dus su tshogs dang gsal bkra non po bskyed// 'bar ba'i phrin las tshogs te mchod pas thim// dus kyi dus tshul tshogs
274a6(rnying rgyud): bsgos rgyal dang // ting 'dzin rdong hral tI da'i gnas 'brog dang // drub khrod gnas rdul mdzod pa'i byang chul dz+dza/ rdo rjeg+sa kyi 'khong drug tu shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// kAm ma le'i rgyud las/ chung 'byung ba'i na sle
274a7(rnying rgyud): gzhi dang / gleng bslang ba'i 'the ste dang zag// dedas bcom ldan 'ad sums// de dus kya kyi na// rgya byin gyis ba pa ste// dusargyas
274b1(rnying rgyud): slobang // gas rgyas par// zad pa pa'as byung sa// can rnam jug pa// ngas dang lda pa shes pa na// da' dus kyirtags 'gas// rdzu dru phyogs ga pa'o// 'dus pa sa /
274b2(rnying rgyud): byung dus 'dri da btugs/ rgyun du'am yang na tu gcig gam// de bzhin lag N+DIg spyad na ngam// bcub gi dang na bca lnga dang / bcang dmas su zung dung sri// deyang de lta bya 'on// 'diganyinanam na
274b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis b+h+rU~M// legs sa 'am lkug tsang ba 'khonag nyiste// dus 'ad ma pa ma thig rdzas na// dge spyang rnams la dres 'di gcag ga nas/ rgya la dus 'di mdzes pa tshogs 'du \u0f7f/ shA gni ng+ge b+h+ya
274b4(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i dus// de la 'khong dadas rgyang bstan pa'i rgyud// sras ni thabs kyi rgyud du shes pa'i dus// phung po khams dang ma chod kyi lnga la bang+tha m+b+ha// sang+yas nas rlig ma byang chu rnaman la dang // sprul ba nab mo ma'i tshogs rna pa /
274b5(rnying rgyud): lus la brten nas dbang la mthun bzhir bsgom// sgrib 'gag sangs rgyas gsal bar bshad pa'i chud// phrag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud nyid la// rigasu 'dzin su lha spun gyis grub pa'i dus// gzho lam 'bras bu'i dus shes rna
274b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// chun tu tshogs kyi 'khor los sangs rgyas mchod// bla ma'i dus dang ldan pa rab yin te// 'di ldan dus rnams kun las khyad par 'phags// gyi yi bla mas sgo 'dogs yongs su gcod// nang gi thams dang byu ye shes stong/
274b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thams ston gyis yongs su ston// mthar thug thams chos rnams de nyid ston// tha ma'i khyad par bzhi dang ma ldan no// dus kyi rgyal po nyams par shes par bya// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas mtshan pa la// kham
275a1(rnying rgyud): lugs rnam pa gsum rtogs pas// rdul 'byor dang lus tshogs 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus// b+ha dang yi gzig le rlung gi dus// las dang skal bar ldan pas rtogs par bya// dus rnams 'di ltar shes pa'i gang
275a2(rnying rgyud): zag rnams// rgyud skye bco brgyad tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub// ces gsungs so// kurma mA le'i rgyud las/ dus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi len ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag 'grob
275a3(rnying rgyud): don du sku gsung thugs yon tan phran las las phyung nas ched du brjod do// skal ldan mi dang 'byor ldan dang // dga' ldan lha mo tshogs te rnam gsum mo// skal ldan mi yi tshogs la brgyad// mi chung ba yi skyon dgu bsal// 'du ba'i yon tan drug
275a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa lnga// de yi sprod pa bstan pa dang // 'dus la brtag bzhis skyon rnams gsal// bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang // cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya// shes pa san sum tshogs pa dang // mi 'grub pa yi gegs bsal yan// de nas skyon
275a5(rnying rgyud): dgu gsal bar gsungs// sngags pas bsgrims te bsal ba ni// sdom la gnas pa'i dka' thub can// zas dang spyod lam mi mthun dang // lha spyod mthun yang nang mi mthun// phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can// 'dod pas mos dang zas
275a6(rnying rgyud): lA brkam// dad ming bsgom bsgrub mi nus pas// 'di dag bsal bar gsungs pa'o// yang 'di dag gsungs so// nyon mongs tshe chad ting 'dzin g.yel mi 'grub// dam du len dang spyod pa'i dam nyams dang // gnyis kyi mi 'grub ma snang
275a7(rnying rgyud): grol ma 'gyur// shes dang spyod pa'i de mchog cer gyur yang // za ba'i dmanyams mi 'gru bgegs pa che// gyi chos lags gra khong drug par chad 'byung // 'dod mos don ni skang 'jug sngags spyod rdzog/ sau mtshogs kyi
275b1(rnying rgyud): zad lhag nyams// mngad la los rbA 'azas 'grus bu med// phyir ston rnams bsal bar rgyal bas gsungs// phyi shAs rgyud 'di shes pas tshogs 'khor bya// de nas 'dug ma man tan drug ldan bsdu// ngang pa chel rdo dang brtson dgus ldan/
275b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' brtul che la yid ring rgyud la mkhas// gtong bod thos 'dzin me gsod pa ltar 'bad// thogs med 'jug nus ma grub mi gtong dang // brda' dang lan shes las la zhum pa med// rdzogs dang byang shes sum char bstan pa dang // yon tan
275b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa de dag bsdu bar bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// de yi spyod pa mthun pa ni// gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod dang // lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod 'dug/ sangs rgyas kun dang dgod mnyam sbyor// mkha' 'gro 'khor lo mchog tu 'bar// de yang brtag pa rnam pani ni/
275b4(rnying rgyud): slob dpon ma brtag grogs ma brtags// gzungs ma ma brtags gnas ma brtags// dngos grub mi thob las mi 'grub// dam tshig nyams dang bar chad 'byung // rdo rje slob dpon sgo ldan la// gsang sngags rgyud kyis dbang bskur zhing// lung dang man ngag
275b5(rnying rgyud): yongs shes pa// de nyid bcu dang ldan pa'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// las dang las kyi phyag rgya shes// spyod pa brda yi tshul rig cing // brnag par bya ba'i gzungs thub pa'o// ngan sems grogs dang 'brel pa med// mos sngan
275b6(rnying rgyud): dang ba'i tshig la bab// dogs pa'i 'du shes spangs pa yi// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung khang lci// dben pa'i ri bo ri yul nags// zhabs kyis bathags shing yid dang 'jar// lha mis btul ba gang yin pa// de ni bsgrub pa'i gnas su 'thad//
275b7(rnying rgyud): de yang bdud bzhi gzhom bya ba// mchod mkhan las mkhan sbyor dang sgrol// snod dang mi ldan gnas nor la// shes rab snying rjes mgrin na// nyams pa'i bdud dang las kyi bdud// lha dang srin po bdud rnams so// de yang 'di ltar rab tu
276a1(rnying rgyud): bar byung ni// 'chang mkhan snod ma rtog pa nyams pa'i bdud// kams pa bcol byed pa las kyi bdud// sbyor ba shes rab mdzin lta bu'i bdud// skol ba snying rjes mthan sbyin po'i bdud// bdud bda' smyon bsal dung ngan
276a2(rnying rgyud): bcom pa yin// bad+mad pa zhi ba com pas tshogs kyi mkhan pa rnams// tham slob mas byur sbyin kyang par 'phags// de la chog byed par thugs pa ni// tshig ni rdzogs byas shing // byang can rdzogs pa d+ma ldan// sngags kyi yan 'gA gas
276a3(rnying rgyud): shing // ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par ldan pa yi// rdul 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// sri zhu gus pas sgyu med slong dpon mnyes//
276a4(rnying rgyud): sa / na
276a5(rnying rgyud): mchog rab tu dben zhing yid 'thad dang // glang chen khyu mchog la sogs ni khro'i gdan// rtsag mtshan 'phan med ma yo rdzogs pa dang // gso ba'i zas dang rkyen bzlog sman rnams so// don dam gnyis su med par byang chub pa'i// rtags su zla dkyil rdo
276a6(rnying rgyud): yig 'brus mtshan// skur gyur phyag rgya gsum 'phro 'od zer las// lnga ste rigs lnga'i mtshan rtags bdun du bgrang // de la shes pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i sku// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can
276a7(rnying rgyud): du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// bstan pa drang ni nyed spen pa// ska
276b1(rnying rgyud): dang ni sgrub chen no// gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// chos su mi shigs srog 'dzin la// phyi rol 'byung ba lnga po yum// rtsa ba phu
276b2(rnying rgyud): po'i rlung lnga dang // yan lag rnam shes rlung lngar spen// lhag mar bcas pa'i lus nyid kyi// tshol dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob// rgyal sras de ni 'dod nas 'chi// rig par bcas pa'i tshe de ni/ de yi tshe ni bcu drug las// brgya brgya dag tu bskur nas
276b3(rnying rgyud): ni// bla med byang chub thob par bshad// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid sdang ba'o// ye shes chen po mdun nas kyang // de ltar mthong bar gyur na yang // rgyab nas 'byung ba'i ye shes ni// ma dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam
276b4(rnying rgyud): dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// mi 'grub pa yi gegs bsal te// ma dud pa dang le lo dang // byang chub sems ni ma skyes dang // the tshom yod pa can nyid ni// bsrub par bya ba'i gegs su 'gyur// 'grub pa'i dus ni rab
276b5(rnying rgyud): bshad na// zhag ni sum cu brag drug gam// bcu bzhi bco ljang bu drug gis// dbang bskur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bco lnga tshun chad kyi// skra lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o// de nas bde gshegs sangs rgyas kyis// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs
276b6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa// sgrub pa'i yo byad gsungs pa yi// brgyad dam bzhi yi bdag nyid can// sgrub pa'i yo byad rnam brgyad de// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang chog/ bro gar sogs kyi sprin phung la// hU~M dang shes pas rang spyad nas// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil
276b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor mnyes// bgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// dbang rgyan rig 'dzin mang ldan pas// tshe yi dam pa 'grub pa ste// gos lnga dag tu bshad pa ni// yo byad phyi ma thams cad dang // gos dang rkyen la sogs pa'o// dbu rgyan dang ni phyag gdub dang /
277a1(rnying rgyud): dpung rgyan snyan cha do shal dang // se modo dang me tog rgyan// byang chub yan lag bdun du bshad// bdag 'dzin gzhan rtog btang snyoms las// rang bzhin rnam par dag partogs// sgrib gnyis nyes skyon spangs pas
277a2(rnying rgyud): na// ye shes gos ni dkar por bstan// tshogs pa chags med spangs nas ni// thugs rjes thams cad chags med pas// dbang du khyer yang ma chags te// tshul khrims gos ni dmar po yin// bdag tu mi 'dzin byams pa yis// yan tan yi dang
277a3(rnying rgyud): gter chen 'phro// kun gyi de 'dod skong pa'i phyir// sbyin pa'i gos ni ser por bstan// gnyis med las kyi thul pa yis// ji ltar sprul zhing mdzes mdzad pas// 'gro kun dpe la dgod pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus gos ni ljang gu yin// chos nyid dang
277a4(rnying rgyud): la bcos su med// kha dog mthing ga bamyur du med// mi 'gyur mi shigs rang bzhin pas// shes rab gos ni mthing ga yin// de yi kha dog gos lngar bgos// de nas rgyan gyi chos lngar brgyan// thugs kyi shes bya ze'u ldi bcod pan dang // yon tan
277a5(rnying rgyud): gzi mdangs stod g.yogs dang // sku brjid tshul gyi chos gos dang // gsung thugs rjes chags slad dkris dang // mdzad pa gar gyi gtsang gos phu dung ste// 'di rnams rgyan chas dam pa'o// las rnams rigs bzhi mthun pa'i chas// de bas yung
277a6(rnying rgyud): dag mdzes pa'i me tog phreng // dam chos rnam 'byer dbu rgyan rin chen khring // phyag gdung sna tshogs las mdzad brtson 'grus ldan// rin chen tshogs sgras dbu rgyan dran pa'i ngang // snyan cha lus sems bsil byed shin tu spang // do shal ting 'dzin dbus
277a7(rnying rgyud): mchog phreng ba'i rgyan// bdag 'dzin btang snyoms sprul pa'i se mo do// byang chub 'od 'phro shes bya'i cod pan 'phur// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// byas pa'am ni blugs pa'am// brdungs pa dang ni bris
277b1(rnying rgyud): pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya btag par bya// dbu rgyan rigs bdag rnam snang mdzad// snyan cha mgur chu skad mtha' yas// phyag gdub phreng ba rdo rje sems// klu yi sgra rags rin chen 'byung // rkang
277b2(rnying rgyud): gdub don yod gdon mi pa// byang chub lcam dral rigs lngas sbas// bdud 'dul stobs mchog theg pa mchog gi rgyan// dpa' brjid mnyen lcag 'khril pa yum gyi rgyan// dpa' brtul ze byed ye shes thugs rje'i rgyan// mi 'khor byang chub
277b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rgyan du bstan// sku gsum theg gsum dug gsum dbang 'tshad sgrol// don dam bcud nyid chags tshul thugs rje'i rgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rgyan te rnam pa brgyad// 'jigs byed lags pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin// rnal 'byor bza'
277b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnam pa mang po ni// a mra smin pa grol bar bshad// 'bras bu chen po pa nas// rgun 'bru khyab khu ba'i mchog/ na li ker dngos grub mchog/ dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka/ a mra rgun 'brum pa na sa// na li ka ra a ru ka/ 'bras bu chen po
277b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par dag/ bdud rtsi 'bras bu yin par bshad// dkar rtsi dmar gyi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod chu dam pa'o// rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong bu dang // bza' ba bca' ba spyad par bya// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i btung ba ni// rnal 'byor pa yis btung zhing
277b6(rnying rgyud): mchod// chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad// rab tu rmongs pa sbrang rtsi'o// bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs// rgun chang dag ni bdud rtsi yin// glu ni tshig tu brjod par bya// dar dir dag ni sil snyan yin// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i//

282b7(rnying rgyud): na nga dun ci drug/ zhwa gzung brjid // 'di dris pa'i tags pa'o// sang phreng bya sa ga dang byed// gos pa ba da // napa gas dang ga 'ar gyu/ 26 nga shing ma
283a1(rnying rgyud): rtag gnyis kyi bar 'di dpyang
283a2(rnying rgyud): kha dri zhim por bya phyir spos// khar spang rtsis byug pa yis// a mra la sogs tshig gus byug/ sa ta ka ra'i mang la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bslu bar bya// yung dang rgyu phyogs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis mthun par kha
283a3(rnying rgyud): shun pa gro ba la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bza' btung phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas gru tshig dbyangs rnams blang / 6/ ta sa b+hu ra na sor sna rta// phreng nge ba dang dung nge pa// ta dra ba dang /
283a4(rnying rgyud): gau bA ma// bdag de'u dang lcang ka de'u/ 6/ glu drug dbyangs su blang bar bya// sna yi dbugs ring 'gro ba las// g.yas par me byung dmar la 'chor// gyen du 'bar bar 'gro ba ste// pad+ma rigs kyi gsung dbyangs kyis// snang ba mtha' yas dge
283a5(rnying rgyud): par 'ong// g.yon par rlung byung gnag la dang // gsegs la 'gro zhing rgyu ba nyid// las kyi rigs kyi grwa yin pas// don yod grub pa dgos por rol// gnyis kar de la rgyu chu klung dkar// thung ngu 'bab cing rgya ba ni// rin chen rigs kyi
283a6(rnying rgyud): yin pas// rin chen 'byung ldan dgos par rol// gnyis ka bur du nub pa'i rlung // thad kar 'gro zhing rgyu ba nyid// bde gshegs rigs kyi glu blangs pas// rnam par snang mdzad ded gus par rol// rtsol ba grwa yi dam tshig gis// mchod pa dam par
283a7(rnying rgyud): bzhes su gsol// kho na gnas pa srog yin te// nam mkha'i rlung ni kun gyi gnas// rgyu ba med cing 'pho dus 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' dkris par rol// glu tshig sba yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// tho gang 'du 'phro bya ba yang // sil snyan phyag rgyang
283a8(rnying rgyud): bshad pa rnams// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud lnga rgyud drug dang // las rnams thams cad bslab pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du ga byed pa// ma rungs pa ya'i rab tu 'grub// mas rnams kun pa mngon du 'gyur// 'dzangs pa
283b1(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi gzhir 'gyur 'grub// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston pa// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed pa// pi wang len pa'i tshul sbron cing // ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // ca te'u'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // rma rnga'i tshul
283b2(rnying rgyud): ston rnal 'byor pas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// rim gdon dug sel sdug bsngal sel// gnas gsum dag ni skad cig 'bebs// dpal rdo rje gling bu gar byed dang // dpal rdo rje pa/
283b3(rnying rgyud): wang bde bas rmongs byed dang // dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal sel// dpal rdo rje rje dza myes byed do// khaM ning 'jam pa 'khrur sil te// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // gu do gung dril ba'i sil snyan phreng // ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // ting zhes snyigs ma'i
283b4(rnying rgyud): sil snyan kA// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // ma gan sil snyan gar gyi gnas// ji ltar byed pa'i gar byed dang // di ro dar dir sil snyan spos// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // pau ti sil wAn me tog rnga// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // ti pi si
283b5(rnying rgyud): snyan me mar gnas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // de dri sil snyan dri yi gnas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang // 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// ji ltar sil snyan phyag rgya dang // lha mo rnams kyi gnas nas mchod par bya'o// ye shes lnga ldan b+ha na dang

284a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi mig yang gzhis bskam// zin las thabs mchog rin rten nang gis bzung // ra yi phyag rgya shes pan// phyir ni rdzas mdzod dpa bzhi 'das// ji ltar ngas shing rigs pa dang // rang gi sbyor ba rjes mthun pa/

287b6(rnying rgyud): ni srub par byed// 'dod chags myos pa'i g.yen spro ba// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dgang bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs blta// g.yas pa'i bzhin
287b7(rnying rgyud): gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ rab tu dga' bar bzhu zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang thar bar byed// spyi bor da mgrin gsang mthob/ rta mgo ljang ser kha dog
288a1(rnying rgyud): gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan nas// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag bya zhes bya'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma ma mu so sa mnan nas// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs
288a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad dga' bar byed// 'dod cha srabade pas g.yen spro ba'i// sgeg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dag 'bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchug po bar byed//
288a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// bde ba rgya cher ston pas 'dzum// dgyes pas ma mchu mnan pa ni// rin chen 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya yis// khams gsum 'dod pa ster bar byed// sha chen gyi na ro myang zhing //
288a4(rnying rgyud): mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro myang zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'a
288a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bde ba myong ba las myong ba// za ma zim blta ba rnam bsgyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i gar byas pas//
288a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor bas// blta ba ra bzhi bde bar gnas// blta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer
288a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bar bcas// blta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur// blta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas pas 'dzum// blta ba gsal la bde bar gnas// blta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni/ khros pa/
288b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sgeg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// rnyed bcas blta ba'i gar byed pas// lta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ blta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na maHswa sarba byAd+d+ha b+h+yaH/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya
288b2(rnying rgyud): la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grub// ru ru su rba rdol tiSh+Tha id+ha lo tsa ne/ sarba Ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dpang du byed// su b+ha gA sto ma hA na de bi hi ri/ yi ri/
288b3(rnying rgyud): ti/ ra~M ze les / spos ci mug rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i bdag kya sbyin pa'o// oM Sh+Da na na sAH/ chos cig rgyang pa pa 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bslab na// bud med gzhana'o/ smos cing gros// ga d+ha/ @
288b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// oM shrI badz+ra pad+ma b+har+N+Na b+ha mu kha/ yo sI shwa ri ha hai hi hi/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// byang chub rdo rje lum dral gyi
288b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gtso yis lce la sgrol// 'khor gyi chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gtso bo rang gi rigs shes so// de nas rigs can ma lus pa// dpa' bo dpa' mo brda' yis sprad// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par
288b6(rnying rgyud): bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa dgyid pa'i thabs// g.yas pa bdan gsum par bya// sri zhur bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dpal
288b7(rnying rgyud): kyi zil mo bskur// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa'i las byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon pa bzheg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgad na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams
289a1(rnying rgyud): gsus dag kyang phyag cang 'gyur// bal mo pa sla ba 'bras bzhin// sgo ldan rang gi steng gar 'arjid // mtha bongs pachung 'dabs bzhin// rgyas pa 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan lag thams cad de// sa la bskal
289a2(rnying rgyud): na na sa
289a3(rnying rgyud): yin pas// phyag 'tshal phyag rgya shes pa'o// dpa' bo khro rgyal byang chub sems// dpa' mo khro mo sems ma'i tshogs/ brda' dag bya ba 'di ltar bshad// chos rnams brda' ltar med rig bya// brda tsam len pas spa dApes mtshon// brda' yi
289a4(rnying rgyud): gsang bas gsang bsgrub phyir// 'grub rnams don 'di shin tu bcos// ko ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod chags sras yin te// gti mug 'dod pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag
289a5(rnying rgyud): pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang pa yis// rang gi nu ma rab bstan nas// mgo bo rab tu bsdu byas na// phyag byed bde 'dris pa yin// lag pag ron pa dkur brten na// phyag lan de ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa 'og tu bzhag pa
289a6(rnying rgyud): ni// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon pa'i ljin ma bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yi// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan byas// g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru// sbyor dang ldan pas ma nyes byas te// do ni rdo rje slong dpon
289a7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ de ni mtshan mar shes par bya/ g.yon gyi khro mo basbrengs nas ni// dam zhi ga so ltar bstan byas na// lus tshan de ni thos 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis rtags shes bya// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'gying pa yis// phag pa snying gar brgyad byas te// dbang mo chen
289b1(rnying rgyud): bstan nas// dbyes mdzar ba rab tu brtag/ chung gu rtse mor byas pa yis// nam zhig bskyod par mthong ba na// de rje rig ma rdul 'byor dbang // rdo rje brjor brtson par bye// sbom po na ma rigamathong ston na// de tshe sgron mo sbyin par byed// gal te shin tu mthong ston na//
289b2(rnying rgyud): ngod pa'i dargyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo sngags kyu drangs byas te// de tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de rmo nges par 'od byas te// gdan dun ni dmyal bar lung // de snyed rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyi ni rnam bsnyen na// de dzem rudu gro byas te// na
289b3(rnying rgyud): sa nadamatshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul nas// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda po phyag rgya shes pa'o// gzhan yang rab tu rgyas bshad bya// brda yi dam tshig ston pa ni// skye bor /
289b4(rnying rgyud): pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal 'ang ni ston pa yi// dpral bar reg par byed pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// sprin ma bslu ba gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda'// g.yas pa nam mkhar 'go ba 'grub// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ rang
289b5(rnying rgyud): nga rnams kyi brda yi rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa gyes pa bzang po'o// rnga bdag lnga reg pa'i brda'// g.yas g.yon gnyis pade bzhin de// g.yas pa pags par blangs pa yis// g.yon pa legs pa
289b6(rnying rgyud): sgriba'o// sna yi bu ka gnyis kyi brda'// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong // g.yon pa bdag la dri skrong ba'o// kyai ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag rgyad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa chang gi
289b7(rnying rgyud): yin// mche bag ras dang gdon pa'i sa// dmadum mthu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin du// brdang yi phyag rgyang gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po kA med pa'o// rtog pa tham
290a1(rnying rgyud): cad smra pa'i mchog/ snying gar ldan du 'dren pa ni// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda' 'grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa skye// 'khor ba shin tu srung pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda' sa phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// dngu mdzin
290a2(rnying rgyud): bslabs pa yis// chos kyi 'khor po chen po dkyil// rang gi dbang po bsgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda' yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/
290a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa skar du btang ba'o// dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yi// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// lha khyong g.yas ga
290a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcangs nas dgrol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams zong shig pa'o// parla gnyis rab tu bsdam pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu btson// g.yas bco
290a5(rnying rgyud): pa brtson pa'o// pus mo'i lba pa'i brda' dag ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu 'dud pa'o// pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi// brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bcing ba'i
290a6(rnying rgyud): b+hag rgya yin// g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa thams cad gnon pa'o// g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms// a ti pu zhes bya ba'i brda'// de ni phyag 'tshal zhes ston pa'o//
290a7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni/ phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o// dngos grub pas dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis me dkrub gang yang med// rang don las rnams gang bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// brda' yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// der dkyil 'a
290b1(rnying rgyud): cho ga bzhin// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgoms nas ni// dkyil 'khor grug nir lham pa la// bshang gci cho ga bzhin byugs nas// yid 'ong slob mas thig 'azung la// ngos bzhi dang ni gru bzhi dang // sgo bzhi par yang gdas par bya// dbus ni rab tu zlum mo la// thig
290b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// phyogs bzhi dang ni dbus lnga la// ri pra lnga yab yum bkod pa dang // mtshams su nang gi sems dpa' ste// klu chad byams pa la sogs pa// yab dang yum du bcas pa dang // bar khyams kun bzang ya' yum dang //
290b3(rnying rgyud): thub drug sems dpa' btu drug sogs// sgo bzhir sgo ba yab yum brgyad// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// le tshe dgu par mkhas pas brtag/ bar khyams gnyis dang ldan par bya// phur bu srad bu mtshon cha'i chas// thabs dang ldan pas
290b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom zhing brgyan// kham phor pad+ma mtshan ldan pas// dpal dang ldan pa'i yi ge bri// ye shes gsal ba'i 'od kyang dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsgom// A l-i kA yi mnyam sbyor ba// khA yi nang du 'dud par bya// de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams// yi ge Thamra
290b5(rnying rgyud): cad dgod par bya// kug bskyed dag gi ma sdug mar bya// yi ge ra ni lha gur bya// klad kor zla ba kham pa dang // mo ga gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya mi 'gyur de ma~M po ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ngo bor bshad// oM
290b6(rnying rgyud): swA hA/ oM ni bde gshegs kun gyi sku/ AHni chos 'dzin rnams kyi gsung // hUM ni sangs rgyas thugs rnams 'dus// swA yis yon tan yid bzhin 'phel// kA ni las rnams thogs pa med// rigs lngar chos dbyings sangs rgyas 'dus// yi ge dag kyang
290b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar byed// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal stor zhes// rab tu chags pa'i ma
291a1(rnying rgyud): smra / ba nga du / sa dan na/ sa su snang byung dus / sa
291a2(rnying rgyud): dang ba ma pa'i mdzad // rdzog pa pa sa ba byang // de mtha gtu byed// 'du rtags pa dpa' dag sa/ gas gakyis dang// theg pa sa las tha bar gyu/ dun pa jam na pa nga
291a3(rnying rgyud): sa dpal bdang sashes// bag ngoms gyis// ga parnyan 'as tha byung gyur// das spyod ngan par btu gangs/ tshog pa la ga pa lanas// gas pa ga zus // jig pa pa 'gru ba'i

291b1(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// rdo rna las rnams byed pa'o// bgyis byas gsod par gnyis ka yin// lcags kyu 'dzin par gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi rdul dang ni// legs so zhes zla snying gar bzhag/ dbang bsrung ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying gar nyes bstad par bya/
291b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa la klu mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yi ni g.yon par dbye// snying gar g.yon par ral gri mdung // mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yin// rdo rje gnyis pa kha nas dbyings// rdo rje gar bskor sgrol ba dang // thal mo 'gram
291b3(rnying rgyud): pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba'o// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'dzin// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin// klu shing chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin// rin chen nyi ma ut+pal 'dzin// khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje 'gyings pa'i tshul gyi ni// bsam pa g.yos
291b4(rnying rgyud): pas 'dud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar gyis bskor ba yin// rdo rje'u tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin gzhan// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yin// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa ni// mthe
291b5(rnying rgyud): rlung las te lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud nas mdzub gnyis mdud// rgyab gnyis dang ni brkyang ste mnan/ de nas 'di rnams bsgrub par bshad// rdo rje las byed mnyam pa'o// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying la goms par bya'o// lha mo bzhi yi las kyi rgya/
291b6(rnying rgyud): de nas brtul zhugs bsam bya ba// sgeg la sogs pa'i ro ldan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mchog 'di yis// bdag nyid la ni mchod par bsam// rdo rje'i thal mo mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam par bya/ de la dga' byed dbang bskyed
291b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// mda' yi tshul du gzung bar bya// nying gar 'bigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de yi las rnams thams cad byed// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kyang rung // bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed// bcing ba de nyid bcings byas te// rnal 'byor
292a1(rnying rgyud): nga cu sa// sman / da dab rnang // dedag sa can ku// na smad pa ngas pas ga na// na sa// ba sa gyu dag/
