292a3(rnying rgyud): tAM// rab tu bsdam phyir rdo rje bsnams// dam tshig phyagu r+b+ha thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las byung ba'o// de dag pa thams pa rjod ni// bsnams pa na med pa shad par bya// rdong ba sdams pa dram thas la// phung mo mu gu ljang mnyam ba sgreng // phung mo nang drug rkang sa pa
292a4(rnying rgyud): ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad// srung mo rin rkyen 'dra ba dang // gung mo pad+ma 'dra bar dgrag/ de bzhin 'dzub mo dgrag pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yi ni// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yis// demachog 'dzin dang phyug rgya rnams// dngos grums
292a5(rnying rgyud): rnangs 'ang dag brgyad// sgrubs pa gag rjes kyi// grang mo mer ma rab gyur te// tham dri ma mangs sa spyad// de rjesems pa'i bya// mdzubyam lcags par// 'gas rnas pa 'drang ni// rjesems dpa'i rkyen pa na//
292a6(rnying rgyud): me mo // sa ba gshibs su ma mi gnyis bcug/ kye ring rjems// de nyid thang po yin la gdong // mabe nang rnams ni ba rdo lnga byung pa'o// de la sri lag smin rgya gnyis// migs par ga shibs pa rtsal mdza do// de la di ba rna
292a7(rnying rgyud): de yi 'phyogs bzhad pa'o// ma bong gnyis kang mnyam par gnings// dzus pa ga sa ga dkrug pa dang // glang mo bsgrengs pa'i rtse mo dbug/ de nyid rdo rje ral gror// de nas sri lag mthe rung gzhibs// 'khor mo yin par bgad pa min/
292b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthe bong gnyis bkrol la// bkan te kha sbyor bzhag pa'o// mthe bong mthe chung che spang skye// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa// snying gar brkyangs te bzhag par// mdzub mo rtse bkug mche bskur// mthe chung bar ni mi
292b2(rnying rgyud): 'byar bya'o// mthe chung gnyis bar mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo snying gar bcings pa'o// snying gar mthe bong mnyam ste bzhag/ rab tu brkyang na phreng ba'o// thal sbar rtse mo kha nas dbyings// gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje bcings pa phur du btang // zal
292b3(rnying rgyud): ma sbya ba chen dgar// sa myong mags sa da pasams// rab tu brtsang thug pa'o// ma yang ba bkrag la byangs kyis // rol pa ma ba chung srung gsu ba skyed// 'gu gis yo stsob ste// grong bzhi kyi spyod ces n+ta// gsas cwa
292b4(rnying rgyud): pa klu shing 'dra// thal sbyar 'khor lo bya ba dang // lag gnyis pad+ma kha bye 'dra// ut+pal gyen la kha ga dengs bya// mdzub mo gcig po bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud par 'dor// mthe bong gnyis po mdun par bcings// rdo rje bcings pa mdzub mo
292b5(rnying rgyud): bsdams// yang na lha rnam so so'i tshul// bcings shing mkha' la dkrol bar bya// las dang thun mong nyid du bshad// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// sor bsnol bsdams padam tshig gi// sems kyi shes pa ldan pa las// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin//
292b6(rnying rgyud): nang gi lha mo'i phyag rgya rnams// gar gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa dang // pas drang dam tshig mtshams mtshams bya// sgo bzhi so so'i las dang ni// dam tshig phyag rgya la sogs pa// lha rnams spyan drang ngus na bya// dam tshig phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas bcom
292b7(rnying rgyud): sdang rdo rje gsal ba ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gdon pa 'ang/ 'gro ba'i ched du brjod de sku gsung thugs las byung ngo // cing dod khrus byas sna tshogs gos gyon nas// tshom bu'i gral bshams log 'dren mtshams bcad dang // brda' sgod dbye dang
293a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rgyan zas mnga' gsol dang // sgyu 'dug phrin gdags lan stsal ting 'dzin bsgom// kun drangs las la bzugs gsol dmachog bstan// phyag rgya lha mag tshogs gsod pa dang // rnam pa bcudrug rtsis mgor shas byas nas/
293a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pan phyi gas la bshad na// de nas ci 'dod khrus byas te// hrI zhim thun skyes bslabs pa ste// rnga tshogs gos ni pad+mo b+h+ya ste// dri zhim phreng bgadags par bya// amr-i ta rdzas khrus byas nas// lus bzhi'i rgyan dang rtswa lugs gos// thams cad
293a3(rnying rgyud): mangs par snang ba'o// dge skos gral rnams bsham par bya// wa dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshem thA wa yi lha bkod la// khro bo brgyad pa po oM badz+ra// 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas par bsgom// de bzhi dri rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs ni sngagasung thugs
293a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang ldan pa yis// tshom bu gsum pa'i lharnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te dugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// dam pa'i mchog ni dam pa yi// thib
293a5(rnying rgyud): la stong pa tshom bu brgya// rnam pa kun dang ldan pa yi// mchog rnams kyi ni dgod par bya// khro bo khro mo'i cho ga chen dang // pho nya bka' nyan phyag brnyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyi// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// bde chen longs
293a6(rnying rgyud): spyod chos dang sprul// dkyil 'khor spros pa bsgom par bya// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge las// chos bu spros pa bsgom par bya// khams kyi badrad rtsi chen po las// phyag rgya spros pa bsgom par bya// snying po rlung gi dbye ba las// rnam grangs spros pa bsgom par bya//
293a7(rnying rgyud): chags kyi 'khor lo grub pa rnams// rigs dang sbyang nas bral rnams pashams// log 'dren mtshams bzang rnam pa brgyad// bcol dang bsrung dang phyag mtshan rngam/ chos nyid kyang 'dzin mtshams// ti
293b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan// bcol ba'i mtshams ni khyed la rab bshad de// de yi phyag rgya bar rim 'khor ba yi// dpal dang ldan pa'i maN+Dal bcu bzhi la// zab cing rgya che gzi 'phags sgyogs skyong bzhi// thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyil chen
293b2(rnying rgyud): bcu// lha yi bkod pa rim bzhin spyan drangs te// thugs ka nas ni mchod pa rim bzhin gsol// de yi gtor ma'i bye brag bsten pa ni// bza' bci 'byor bu ram can// swa ti ka dang u lo pa'i// lag pa na rtsa ba 'bras bu dang // 'o thug dang ni 'dod pa ste/
293b3(rnying rgyud): de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya// de rnams nyid la ci mnyes pa// kha dog sna tshogs zhes bya'o// gang gzhan cung zad lhag pa ni// kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su// dngos po de dag nyid la ni// sna re las kyang mar byas la// gzhan dag las kyang ci rnyed pa/
293b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa gtor ma rgya chen yin// 'bras bu le ka li ka dang // sran chal til gyi pri ta ka/ lag pa na rtsa ba 'bras bu las// cung zad bdun las cung zad dang // me tog 'bras bu chur bcas pa// 'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor mde// gyi rol 'byung po thams
293b5(rnying rgyud): cad la// de ni 'byung po kun gyi'o// mchod pa pA lnga 'dir bshad pa// nya sha chang dang bu ram chang // bza' dang sa na ma 'i bu ba dang // dri dang me tog la sogs ldan// gtong ma 'di ni phyi ru bshad// de nyid rnam grol phung po lnga nyid du// mchod pa snga wa
293b6(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin dbul bar bya// ting 'dzin mthur ldan rnam grol gzi byin can// shes rig grags pa tshul khrims 'khor gyis bskor// mya ngan 'das pa bdud rtsi ro yi bcud// ye shes gong nas gong du khyad par 'phags// lhan cig g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar
293b7(rnying rgyud): bsngo// bde ba'i stan la lag na rdo rje yi// bdag nyid bcu po tshul du phyung nas ni// phyogs kyi lha rnams so so'i gnas gnas su// dbang ldan gyogs nas gtor ma tshul bzhin 'bul// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon
294a1(rnying rgyud): rtsi gaH// dbang bdag gdan gyi phyogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyug kyang 'tshal// dbang po rdo rjeng chung ba'i sa// wA yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shAr+ya phyogs gdon tshogs bcas pa la// mchod cing bstod
294a2(rnying rgyud): phyab kyang 'tshal// me ste bsreg bya len pa'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar lho me lha'i tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ lho phyogs
294a3(rnying rgyud): gshin rje'i tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ bden bral phyogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// zhugs pa thogs pa chu yi
294a4(rnying rgyud): lha// yang dag bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs klu yi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// cho ga bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung lha 'khor gyi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang
294a5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na dbyug to thogs// nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi lha ste sa yi klu// sa 'dzin dang ni lag chen dang // dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas
294a6(rnying rgyud): la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha mang thams cad dang // nyi ma zla ba gdon gyi gtso// gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// zab cing rgya che gzi 'phags po// chos myong rgyal po rnam thosasas// btsun mo
294a7(rnying rgyud): sras dang blon por bcas// mngags pa'i phog ji snyed rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// gzhan yang de yi tshul mchog tu// chos skyong rgyal po yul 'khor srung // chos skyong rgyal po 'phags skyes po// chos stong rgyal po sngan mi bzang
294b1(rnying rgyud): oM ma/ a ma/ ma a/ a la/ yang/ oMg A ya/ yaT/ mar+tha a yA/ yo ba/ mag+na oMsa?/ iT/ sra dang ldan pa'i sgring po badzod// bral 'byor srung ba'i nags pa'oH// mtho' chung ga stas grags pa'i chog/ 'phags byas pa la ba'o// @
294b2(rnying rgyud): gshibs mtheb bsgreng maze'u chung zhags// mig mi bzang ni rdo rje'i rgya// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mor b+ha// rnam thos sras ni dbyug ho'i rgyu// mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs te bsgreng // brgya byin gyi ni rdo rje gdengs// g.yas kyi rtse gsum phyag rgya gdengs// me lha'i/
294b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya zhags thabs yin// g.yas kyang mdzub bkug gung tshigs gsum la btang // sgra 'dod dang ni me 'bar lta bur bya// gshin rje'i be con phyag rgya te// lag bsnol srin lag gshibs te bsgreng // bden bral ra la m+bi'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa khu tshung gung
294b4(rnying rgyud): mdzub ral gri'i rgyu// g.yon pas sta zur shubs su bzung // chu rtswa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas// lag g.yas mthe'u chung zhags pa'i mig/ rlung lha'i baM den phyag rgya ste// g.yod pa grung baphreng mdzub mo dgug/ su ler yi dbyug tan// bcings la nang bzlog marje
294b5(rnying rgyud): chung ba rkyang // srin lag gnyis pa rkyang chub tu bzhag/ dbang ldan rtse gsum phyag rgya ste// mthe bong srin lag mig tu bya// mthe'u chung mig 'bras so sor drang // gung mo rtse sprad mdzub mo rje gsum gdengs// 'og gi pad+ma rgyal rgya ste// lag gnyis pad+ma lta bur bya//
294b6(rnying rgyud): steng gi me tog phyag rgya ste/ khong stong mtheb gshibs spyi bor bsgreng // lcags kyu drangs nas slar bstod pa// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba ni// A ga ts+tsha dang A gats+tsha'o// rgyal chen phyogs gyong so so'i 'khor bzlog cing // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams
294b7(rnying rgyud): cad bsrung ba dang // dam bcas zhal 'ches khas blangs lha dag ste// brtan par brjod la tshul bzhin bsrung du gsol// bstod dang phyag rgya drag tu bstan pas gtugs// phyag rgya lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas la// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA sA d+hA
295a1(rnying rgyud): la kuna&N+Da/ zhes brjod na// chos kyi dbyings su bsgom zhing byung // rig thags rgyal ba stobs bzang nam mkha' mdzad 'di bzlas// na mAnasarba ta thA gzho ba hA su 'i b+h+yaHsa bak+kul san te/ war a ma gA ga na paM swAt+ma/ 8/
295a2(rnying rgyud): gas spyi bor sbyar nas pad+ma kha bye ba// ji ltar thog med bsam pa bzhin du byung ste spel// gzhan yang 'phags pa rgyal chen shugs ldan 'od kyi ni// sngags kyi mdo 'dis kyang gyen gyis brlab par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs le mdzub
295a3(rnying rgyud): mo bsgreng ba ste// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hU~M/ zhes brjod pas ni tha na chung na yi dwags yan chad la/ yul chen ma ga d+ha'i bre chen brgya brgya la// pha ma rgyal med par tshul bzhin spyod pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// 'phag pa
295a4(rnying rgyud): 'dud rtsi thal sbyor sngags 'dis byi na brlabs te// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'us mnan byas te// sor mo lhag ma rnams ni rtse gsum brgyad byas nas// oM a mr-i ta hUM zhes brjod thob pas yid bzhin 'byung zhing dag par 'gyur bar bsam// gzhan yang ye
295a5(rnying rgyud): shes skar mda'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis gtugs te// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mos gtor mar rab gtugs la// oM dz+nyA na a wa lo ki te/ na maHsa man+ta s+pha ra Na ra sti b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM// 'dis kyang so sor thob par bya ste brdzun par byas/
295a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rnam bzhir bstan pa gtor ma spyi'i cho ga'o// des ni gtor ma thams cad gtang zhing mtshams su 'gyur// de nas bsrung ba'i mtshams ni gcad par bya// rtsibs bcu rim pa barba ser ba'i// khro bo bcu dag phyung nas ni// hUM las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng // phyogs
295a7(rnying rgyud): bcu'i dkyil 'khor phyogs rnams su// rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de btab nas kyang phyogs bcu yi// phur pa'i phyogs nas char chan 'bebs// 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jug sgra sgrogs// dri zi'i phyogs nas klo grar ba// mtshams kyi snang ba nam nangs bzhin// ra ka sha'i
295b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs nas 'ongs pa ni// 'chi bdag gzugs can 'jigs 'jigs ltar// ral gri thogs shing sgra chen 'byin// sna chen mo la mi thod du// mi yi khrag ni 'thung byed pa// mgo sgra gyen du brdzis shing 'bar// sbyin thang char bzhin 'bab pa yis// sgrub pa'i las
295b2(rnying rgyud): rnams 'jig par byed// 'bar bya phyogs nas sems can ma// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can tha dad pa'o// pa ni'i phyogs nas lto 'phye'i bdug/ sprin dang bcas pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// srog 'don phyogs nas 'tshub ma 'byung // ya b+ha pho mos byung phyogs nas// dab
295b3(rnying rgyud): ldan phyogs nas tshogs kyi gzugs// steng nas mthu chen lha rnams 'byung // 'og nas sa 'gas g.yo bar byed// sgrub pa chen po sgrub chen la// 'di la sogs pa bgegs rnams ni// nam gyi phyed na 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bla
295b4(rnying rgyud): g+sa mam pas bdud rje 'jams/ rgyal phrag rgyal lo// shing rdzogs 'byung po badz+ra gyis 'dzul// skye phyogs gshin rjes tu kyi gso// na btsugs thami gdon rnams 'dzimasuM/ b+ha tsogs gnod byin kyiH/
295b5(rnying rgyud): kyi khro bo chen po yis// mtshams kyi bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod// khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rje 'joms// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal te// bdud dgra thams cad yongs bcom nas// bge sgra rnams thams cad zhi bar mdzod// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI
295b6(rnying rgyud): la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kA la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya te/ kA ya lA kA tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ khro bo so so'i meng nas phyung zhing gdab// de yang don gsum ldan par gdabu pa ste// mi dge ban+d+ha ye bgegs rnams mnan pa dang // phyogs
295b7(rnying rgyud): skyong 'jig rten thugs rjes bzung ba dang // mkha' dbyings ldan pa'i sprul pas don bya'i phyir// de ltar rtogs ldan nyes pa gting nas med// de nas lta ba'i mtshams ni rab bshad bya// zhi gnas lhag mthong nyi zla'i sran las ni// khro 'gos nyi
296a1(rnying rgyud): gdugs zer 'phro mtshan ma sregs// 'byon tshul zla ba'i bsil bas kun zhi nas// blta ba gnyis kyi phyag rgyas 'gros gnyis bzlog/ tsham rngams kyi ni mtshams bya ba// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro
296a2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// yan lag snying po rtse gcig dang // rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re
296a3(rnying rgyud): bskyod pas ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung // rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor nas// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chubazhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskyod byas na//
296a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen man na mchongs pas// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang // bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan//
296a5(rnying rgyud): sa na sa
296a6(rnying rgyud): rdorje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs chus lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu ldan dang mA ma ke// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyangs kyi dbang phyag ma//
296a7(rnying rgyud): srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing // sangs rgyas ma yin bgegs med do// gsal la mi 'gyur ting 'dzin mtshams// de la gzhan gyis 'jig pa med// de la bge ga kyis mi tshugs so// 'jig las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// ba
296b1(rnying rgyud): btsam gyis gzhan pham mo// de phyir khyad 'phags ting 'dzin bsgom// phyag mtshan mtshams ni 'di dag gsungs// steng yang rdo rje'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par rdo rjes gtams// rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng
296b2(rnying rgyud): yang 'khor lo'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang 'khor lo'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par 'khor los gtams// 'khor lo'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang ral gri'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang ral gri'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par ral gri'i gtams//
296b3(rnying rgyud): gra'i mtsham+bu las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang rdo rje'i thob ste// 'og kyang rdo rje'i zo ba'o// par mtshams med par thobs gtams// tho ba'i mtshams lA ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang rgya gram bla bre ste// 'og kyang rdo rje rgya gram mo// bar mtshams med par rgya gram gtams//
296b4(rnying rgyud): sa san pas las ma'adi hU~M/ dzig// rig cing nyis ga// ba sa kyi sa da / gags sa las sa 'das/ 'ji / ba na / pa / man pa/ bdugs nas
296b5(rnying rgyud): she la phaT// lag pa gnyis bsnol khu tshur bcing // gung mo rtse sbyar mtha' gnyis bsgreng // phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te// rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje yin par bshad// g.yon pa lag pa srub pa dang // g.yas pa bkan nas thog tu bzhag/ sor mo phan tshun gcus te/
296b6(rnying rgyud): bsnol// mtheb gnyis log sbeng 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa shubs byas dku la brtan// g.yas kyi mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan// lhag ma gsum po ral gri'i tshul// glog gi tshul du bskor bar bya// lag pa khu tshur gcig tu bcing // tho ba'i tshul du g.yas
296b7(rnying rgyud): su bsgreng // brdeg pa'i tshul du bskor nas mnan// 'di ni be con phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi thal mo ni// rdo rje'i brag gis gtams par bya// bdeg pa'i tshul du rab tu brdeg/ log 'dren bgegs rnams gzhom pa'o// lag pa phan tshun bsnol ba
297a1(rnying rgyud): las// gung mo tshog bcag nang du brgyad// tha ma rtsa mo can dbya// gya gram phyag rgya dam po'o// lnga pos mtshams ni mig yel brtson 'grus bsgom// gnyis kyi rtogs pa'i ye shes 'phang bcad la// gcig ni sran gyi mthu dang ldan
297a2(rnying rgyud): pa bya// de nas bapar chad thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya 'di dag 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so// thabs kyi phyogs su ltung ba'i rnal 'byor pa// mtshan bcas smon pas 'jug pas lhung ba dang // mtshan nyid sna tshogs nyams kyis nyung ba'o// gang zag de la dus bzhir
297a3(rnying rgyud): bar chad bzhi// lam 'dug 'jig rten chos kyis bar chad byed// gnyen dus 'brel pa'i bar chad byung ba na// dad pa brtan po'i sbyin pa phra mos bsrung // bla ma mched lum grogs kyi bar chad ni// zang zing sbyin pas brtse sems 'phreng bas bsrung // lam zhugs
297a4(rnying rgyud): phyir log bdud kyi bar chad byed// rdzas kyis bsrung ba bla ma grogs gzhan la// rkyen la ltos pa'i sngags mdud rab tu gdags// ting 'dzin bsrung ba dri ba rab ni// spyi bo sna tshogs rdo rje'i rabu las// rkang pa thil rdo rje chen po'i sa gzhi dang // ci ba ma rdo rje'i
297a5(rnying rgyud): bar gnas pa dang // pags pa rdo rje'i gur du phub nas ni// ba spu mda' yi dra ba chen po ste// sen mo me'i rab tu 'bar ba'o// sngags kyis bsrud pa gnod mdos nga rgyal byed// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM// gr-i h+Na kr-ISh+Tha hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoH
297a6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga wAn bi d+yA rA dzA ya hA phaT/ sems bstan bdud stobs 'phel ba'i ngar chad la// bar du gcad pa'i bdag dang bar gcod bdud// bar chad gsum ka sems dang kla mar shes// rang bzhin med par shes pas bsrung ba yin// sams brtan ting 'dzin ma
297a7(rnying rgyud): shes bar chad bdud// lte sgog kla yig gnad du bsnun byas la// srin po rlu tra mi 'tshams par chad 'byung // ting 'dzin do shes bsam gtan gegs kyang sel// bar chad do shes bdud dang skyon nyid yon tan shar// de nas brda' sgo dbye ba ni// kun gyis sangs
297b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yas mar ma mdang // brkyang phyug byas pa'ang ska dag sbyangs// mnas rnam bkun ldan pa// lha dang klub dab na rdo rje'i mchad// sngags mtshams kun nas 'gyul pa'i dpal// gsal la brtan pa'i rnal 'thor pa// mtha'i 'du shes nyer bugag s+ho//
297b2(rnying rgyud): bda' dang gar gyis mtshon nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi 'khor lo na// rnal 'byor spyod mchog phyag bgyid do// de ltar brda'i yis sgo phye nas// phyin chad mi tshig smra bcad nas// bda' tshig smra bar bya ba'o// las rnams brda' yis kun mtshon bya'o//
297b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyun chas gsol ba ni// slob ma kun gyis me tog gtor la brjod// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po 'dir 'dus kun// dbang rnams rim pa bzhin du rdzogs pa dang // so so nyid kyis mkhyen pa'i khyad par las// bla mar rtsib rnams la mnga'
297b4(rnying rgyud): gsol phyir// gus pa'i sri khrus me tog mngon gtor na// de bzhin mkhyen pa mdzad cig dgongs su gsol// rdo rje rgyal po dgyes shing bzhugs su gsol// rang bzhin mtshan mo'i dus ni 'di nyid du// rdo rje tshogs mchog dgyes par bsrub 'tshal
297b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// rdo rje rgyal po chen por mda' gsol bas// mkhyen pa gsal zhing byin rlabs bskyed pa dang // bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gzung du gsol// yum chen kun tu bzang mor mda' gsol gyis// gtso bo yab dang dgongs pa bstan pa dang /
297b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba mi shes ma rig mun pa la// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa bstan du gsol// dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// legs nyes tshar gcod mkho na gtsug sbyang ba dang // 'gro ba mi shes ma rig mun pa la// lha dang mi yi chos rnams
297b7(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// ston pa 'chang pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// dam chos gsung rab bdud rtsi mang po dag/ ljags kyi dbang po'i steng du bkram nas ni// legs par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ 'don gir skyes bu chen por mnga' gsol gyis/
298a1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can nyon mongs rnams// byams pa mchog gi thugs rjes bzung nas ni// mnor 'dus pa'i tshogs su khrid la smon// ging chen dpa' bo chen por mnga' gsal gyis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems
298a2(rnying rgyud): can nyon mongs de// thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // 'og min gnas mchog dam par bsngal du gsol// rdzu 'phrul spyan gyi bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// rnal 'byor spyi bgegs spos bgegs gang lags pa// ye shes spyan gyis thams
298a3(rnying rgyud): cad gzigs nas kyang // ma nor mngon sum gtan la dbab tu gsol// phyi ging stobs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// phung la dam zhing gtsang sbra legs pa dang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mched la stobs pa dang // khams gsum yongs kyi thong na mdzad du
298a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// pho nya rkang mgyogs chen por mnga' gsol gyis// nyid kyi dgos ched dang du mi blang zhing // bla ma rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyi ba dang // mched lcam yongs kyi dgos ched bsgrub tu gsol// mched dang lcam dral gsan cing dgongs su gsol// dza gang
298a5(rnying rgyud): gnyid kyi dbang du mi gtang zhing // lha dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom pa dang // 'job pa sten zur ma dag par 'dren du gsol// me tog dor la mnga' gsol te// slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad gsungs// nga ni za byed chen po rnam par 'jigs pa'o// bla
298a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i bla ma chen po he ru ka/ khams gsum za byed nga yin pas// khams gsum ma lus yongs bskal la// dug gsum zad par rab byas te// srid gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// chos nyid dam tshig las mi nyams// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnan par
298a7(rnying rgyud): bya// brjod nas gdan la 'dug par bya// de nas rgyud 'jug phrin gdags pa// ko chos mthun pa'i byang chub chang dang sbyar// gsol ka pas drangs 'phrin yang 'di skad gsol// ho phyogs bcu mtha' klas sangs rgyas zhing khams na// rab 'byas
298b1(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho kun nas 'dus byon pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por lhun grub pa'i// mched dang lcam dral rgyal ba rgya mtshor bcas// thogs med mkhyen cing sgrib pa mi mnga' gzigs// thugs rnga chan pa'i rang can nyid gyur cing // 'gro mgon skyabs chen rtse
298b2(rnying rgyud): gcig sta gon gnas// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sgor zhal 'ches la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ru 'dus pa las// mi rtog ma lus thams cad gsan dgongs gsol// do nub dus chen byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir// chos nyid nam mkha
298b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' mnyam gzhal yas khang // rgyu 'byung smin byed dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa na// bdag cag skal ldan mi yi tshogs rnams kyis// 'byor ldan tshogs kyi yo byad 'byor pa dang // 'os dang rigs pa rjes mthun
298b4(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi yis// dus bzhin 'byung ba'i zhal zas zla rdzogs su// rgyu med dad pa mos pas 'byor tshad bsags// bdog tshod drod sbyar srid pa'i longs spyod rnams// rgyal chos mnga' thad khungs phyung lha yi lugs// 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas nas srid zin
298b5(rnying rgyud): bkod// gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po 'di// mnga' thang mchod pa'i rkyen du grangs mang bsngos// mchod pa dngos su sbyar ba zho nam srang // grangs 'di tsam zhig nam mkha'i skur ltar bkram// sa gzhi rtsi shing bzhin rje skye zhing 'dod// rgya mtsho'i rnga rlabs ltar ni
298b6(rnying rgyud): khyab cing 'khrug/ nam mkha'i sprin gtibla khu blangs char pa 'bab// chu bo'i rgyan bzhin 'bab pa'i mchod pa rnams// dngos su 'byor dang sna tshogs yid kyis sprul// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod pa dang // dus gsum 'phags pa'i thugs dam bskul ba dang //
298b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas 'gro ba'i sems can bskal ba dang // phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam paskrad bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba rlabs po ches// bdag gzhan don rnams mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// rgya mcho gang bzhi'i tshul du 'bul zhing mchi// thugs
299a1(rnying rgyud): rje chen pas dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// de la skabs dbye gnang ba'i lan 'di stsal// tshogs kyi zhal zas rgya sbyor lon bdag gis// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa la// skal ldan mi yi tshogs pa rnams kyi ni// 'byor
299a2(rnying rgyud): ldan yo byad tshogs kyi rdzas rnams kyang // rgyu med bka' yang dang bas rab bsogs nas// mos pa'i 'byor pa'i tshad kyis phul ba rnams// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas bde gshegs dang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi spyan du bshams// dad pa'i shugs
299a3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par 'bul lags na// thug rjes dgongs nas thugs dam pa zhes par gnang // oM AHb+h+rUM a la la ho// de nas ting 'dzin bsgom pa rnam gnyis ni// sngon du dam rdzas byin gyis brlab pa dang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin dang lus brlab// rdzas ni dza gad
299a4(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas rnam pa gnyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu mi gzhug skyon// dngos grub mi thob skyon yod nan tan bya// dkyil 'khor 'khrul pa'i spyod rnams bsal ba'i phyir// dang por dza gang byin gyis brlab par bya// bum pa bzang den gnas pa yis// de yi dbus su
299a5(rnying rgyud): bsam bya ba// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yi// hUM gi 'od zer reg pas ni// dri ma spangs shing rnam dag pa'i// rdzas ni hU~M gi rang bzhin du// sbyor ba spos ni gdab par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du yang // kha dog dkar po mi
299a6(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa// sa gnon phyag rgya gnas par bsgom// der ni dbang po rdo rje yi// phyag rgya bcings nas bstan par bya// der ni phyag rgya bcings pa las// bcom ldan ma ni dkar sham mdog/ sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan cing // rdo rje phyag bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur/
299a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyor te// rjes su chags pa'i chags med kyis// gnyis ka zhi bar gyur nas su// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// gyur nas bum bzang yongs bkang ba// de yis 'bar ba lta bur mthong //
299b1(rnying rgyud): de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng // ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i// mAM ni 'od bcas rnam par bsam// de las 'od zer rtse rnams su// bcom ldan ma ni sngo ba sangs mdog/ yid dbu'or ba mdzes pa'i zhal// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba yi// zhal
299b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// mi bskyod cod pan gnas byas la// phyag drug rdo rje 'khor lo dang // ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsdams// g.yon pa 'gying bas dril bu dang // rin chen dral gris rnam par mdzes// rgyal mo rnam par byung nas ni// phyogs bcu'i
299b3(rnying rgyud): chu khams byin gyis brlab// 'bar ma de ni slar gshegs nas// yi ge sa bon bcas par ni// byang chub sems bzhin zhu bar 'gyur// sA ma kI ni rnam par bsgom// mA ma kI ni de nyid kyang // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// shes rab brtul zhugs
299b4(rnying rgyud): can gyis mchod// de nas sbom po dbang gi dbul// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// der ni mchod bcas dang dmigs nas// bdag gi lce rtser hUM bsgom bya// de yi sngags ni 'di yin no// oM mA ma ki bi ki ri ki ri/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha swamAM/ de ni byin gyis rlob
299b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // btung ba gnyis ka'i sngags shes bya'o// de la dam rdzas byin brlab pa// de yi thabs ni 'di ltar bya// ban d+ha bcud yangs bzang ba la// 'khor yug snod bcud 'jig rten 'di// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i phyir// thams cad mchod pa'i
299b6(rnying rgyud): rkyen du bzhes// mchod pa'i rgyu rkyen 'di la rten bcas nas// 'jig rten khams mang thams cad na// srid pa'i longs spyod 'byung lnga yi// dngos can thams cad khams gsum gyi// mchod pa'i rdzas su phyin brlab bo// de yang mchod pa'i mtshan nyid lnga//
299b7(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs gsum gyis// de bza' rgyan lngar snang bar bya// mchod pa'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid sa nyid gnas// gzugs su 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin// mchod pa'i 'bras bu go 'byed pa// 'byung ba chos nyid nam mkha' nyid//
300a1(rnying rgyud): mtshang pa gsal bar stob pa yis// 'bar ba rdzu 'phrul lhag mthong ba// mchod pa kun tu dgyes pa'i shugs// khyab par byed pa bskyod pa'i rlung // mchod pa thams cad ma lus par// rgyud zimatshams pa zhi gnas rban/
300a2(rnying rgyud): de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bzed byar snod ni yum lnga'i mkha'// gtor snod chen po'i nang du ni// bcud kyi 'jig rten mchod rdzas dang // gzugs kyi phung po'i lha bshos ni// spyan gzigs sman lngas bsdus pa'i rkyen// tshor ba bde sdug gnyis ka min// nyams
300a3(rnying rgyud): su myang ba bdug spos dri// 'du byed sna tshogs yan lag rnams// 'dod sred byin len me tog yin// 'du shes gsal bar byed pa ni// mchod pa'i mar me kho drug 'bar// rnam shes lung du ma bstan pa// rkyen nye bar bskul ba'i bag chags ni// so sor
300a4(rnying rgyud): 'grub pa'i dri chu lnga'o// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// sbyangs pa hUM dang ldan pa ni// rtogs par bya phyir AHbsgoms te// 'bar ba oM zhes bsgoms byas la// yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku dang gsung // 'gro 'du'i rim pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan ma ma byung bar du
300a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de la phyag rgya gnyis bstan te// gtso gzungs lnga ni grub par dmigs// de la bdud rtsi kun 'byung ba// mu tig dri med khu 'phang bzhin// de steng hA las rgya gra ma 'byed// khro ba'i sa bon hrIHdang ldan// de yis 'od 'bar sngags pas blta//
300a6(rnying rgyud): ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzla bar bya'o// lag pa bkra shis gsang mtshan pas// pad+ma'i snod de gnan par bya// oM AHhrI/ badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM tha a/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya// pad+ma phyag mtshan rgyal po'o// sbom po dang ni dbang gnyis kyi/
300a7(rnying rgyud): bsil 'dos bon gnas pa las// dbus su drangs nas bza' ba dang // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba gsum// kA ya wAka tsin+ta oM AHhUM/ dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// de bzhin gsheg pa mnyes bya'i phyir// dga' ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// sa ngas
300b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de// bcud kyis len pa'i gter gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhon// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// de la mtshan mo zhugs gyur nas// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rnal 'byor bde mchog rnam pa yis// mchod pa'i
300b2(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas thams cad la// sna tshogs bsom zer nga gram pa'i kha rgyan dang // kun tu khyab pa chu yi rgyan// khebs par gtibs pa bar snang rgyan// rtag par 'bab pa rlung gi rgyan// skye zhing thon pas gzhi yi rgyan// sdang ba lnga po 'di nyid ni// mtshan nyid lnga yis
300b3(rnying rgyud): mchod par bya// rnga swa cad te'u pi wang dang // gling bu dung dang kar ko ta// gaN+DI chos rnams sna tshog dang // glung da de'u tshigs dang bcas// snyan pa'i glu dbyang sna tshogs kyis// snyan gyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskrad gyur cig/ gang
300b4(rnying rgyud): smras na sa sa/
300b5(rnying rgyud): bdug pa dang // bsregs dang bcos dang sbyar ba dang // rlangs dang dub sna tshogs kyis// shangs kyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskrad gyur cig/ bza' dang bca' dang btung ba dang // bshos dang zhal zas sna tshogs pa//
300b6(rnying rgyud): kha dang mngar dang sbyar pa dang // cha dang rtsu ba dang lan tshwa'i ro// ljags kyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// sras bcas 'khor gyi thugs dam bskang // lha dang mi yin bza' dang // gos dang rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang // rin chen mchod pa dbu rgyan dang // dpung
300b7(rnying rgyud): rgyan do sha la se modo// dang dbyangs pa te'i sham bu dang // snyan cha mgur chu bla mod // skra yi mchod par bzhes su gsol// dga' ldan lha yi longs spyod dang // 'byor ldan mi yi longs spyod dang // 'byor ldan 'phrul gyi yo byad rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por
301a1(rnying rgyud): bzhas su gsal// 'phags pa thugs dmu 'askang gyur sdug/ 'acu ma gdan dang man ga dang // gsal dang go 'byed skang po'i rgyud// dbang po ches byung rgyal ba'i bka'// phyag rgya chen po gsung ldan pa// chos kyi tshod par bzhes su
301a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// ma lus thugs dam bskar gyur cig/ bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin rnam pa bzhi// ting 'dzin snod brgyad bdag gzhan sras// dang por stong pa byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje'i rnam pa dang // gsum pa rgya las byung ba ni// snod kyi gzhal yas brgyad kyi ltar//
301a3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pas// bdag gi sras su sangs rgyas rnams// rang rig bde ba'i cha dang ni// cha shas dum bu'i phyag mtshan dang // chen po lnga las slar rdzogs bya// rigs mi 'grub cing lhun grub phyir// gsol gdab dkyil 'khor rdzogs par
301a4(rnying rgyud): byas// dbyings las ma g.yos dbyings pas sa le ba// yongs la snyoms pas snying rje cir yang 'char// mkha' ltar go 'byed sprul pa 'byung ba'i rgyu// dang bar stong pa byang chub sems// gnyis pa sa bon du gyur pa// gsum pa la ni gzugs sogs te// bzhi pa
301a5(rnying rgyud): la re yi ge dgod// lnga pa 'khor rnams gdon par bya// sna yi dbugs rings 'gro ba'am// snying ga'i sa bon 'bar ba dang // b+ha gar ling+ga bzhag pa'am// dbyings las ye shes chu bur ltar// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang// 'byung ba lnga dang ldan
301a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// grub pa sngags rnams rtsa nang du// gsung gi yi ge yin par 'grub// lus khams bcud kyi bdud rtsi las// srung rdzogs sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom// snying po drung las thugs kyi dgongs// rlung gi sgo dang bsdu ba yis// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag
301a7(rnying rgyud): rgya'o// gnas grags 'ang bzhis sris dang // 'du gnas phung po'i 'i kho dang // gdul bya sprul pa lazhi po dang / mthar rkyen 'bras bu'i 'i khro las// dkyil 'khar ma lus thams cang 'thab// rang bzhin mcho ga dkyil 'kha' bskyed// de nas
301b1(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// lhan gas na gsol dang spyan yang drang bar bya// spyan gsan gsol phyir se grol gnyis kyi sgras// yab bum 'phags pa thams cad sngags kyis bsdu// oM sarba ta thA gtas pa ri wA ra badz+ras mA dzar+d+ha/ a phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na// rgyal ba
301b2(rnying rgyud): gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas// bla med lha dang lha mo dang // grub pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi yab// sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de bzhin sprul su thab drug dang // mthu chen po
301b3(rnying rgyud): zo mo dang // pho nya 'jig rten skyong bar ldan// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ dpa' bo chen po'i mthu rnams dang // thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bdag
301b4(rnying rgyud): la byin gyis brlab mdzod cig/ bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mabu// nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su
301b5(rnying rgyud): gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ pho brang gzhal yas sprin gtibs bzhin// rgyan gdugs sku tshogs mdzes lhab lhub// spos mchog dam pa dang sang sang // rin chen sna tshogs sgra sil si la// sil snyan sna tshogs phyogs bcur drangs//
301b6(rnying rgyud): tA la'i skye shing gser bco 'khril// nyi zla ba d+ma dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag bzhugs kyi pho brang na// dges so bcom ldan gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen po yab yum dang // byang chub rdo rje lum dral dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs chen da
301b7(rnying rgyud): lha dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thugs dang 'thad pa'i gnas 'di dra// byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes mdzad cig/ de nas spyan drang 'di skad gsung // rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// dus gsum
302a1(rnying rgyud): ba ba dgashegs pa'i bshes tanato// rlung na sum sa byung gdamags// 'a/ mad byagagagags panas pa// can pa lags ldan 'ad pa// nyims pa snad pas pa ma dbang // ya /
302a2(rnying rgyud): gis brgyan cing bklubs pa'i mgon// mchod gnas dpal zhing dam par gshegs pa gsol// rin chen dbyig ltar shin tu mangs pa // mnyam nyid ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar dag/ 'thong ma lus bskal bar dam bcas la// bka' drin pas spyir mad
302a3(rnying rgyud): gshes su gsol// chags rab don phyir ma lus dbang du spyad// rtogs pa ye shes zar lam 'dren pa'i dbul// chu skyes kha 'bras 'gro ba'i yid bsgyur ba// drag po'i don phying mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// ye shes mtshon chen drug gsum cad nas gcod// dan
302a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes sprul pa phyogs bzur 'gyod// phrin las rnam pazhes 'gro drug bsngal ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i don gyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// shes rab dbying ma'i rigs kyi yum lnga'i dang // chos dbyings ye shes nam mkhar gsal ba dang // gas
302a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i longs spod rdzogs pa'i rang // thabs kyi phyag rgyar rol cing gshegs su gsol// rtogs pa'i ye shes rigs kyi phyag rgyad snang // thags kyis marmongs yin las mdzad pa'i rtags// thugs rnga'i stod pas yon tan mthar phyin pa// sems dpa' chen po mchod
302a6(rnying rgyud): rnyeng gshegs su gsol// phyi nang gnyis kyi lha mo mchog ma// phyag rgya bzhi pi ye shes gsal ba la// gar dang phrag rgyas rol cing dges mdzad de// gtso mchog thugs dam bskang phyi gshegasu gsol// ta kr-ita lo rgyal gdug pa gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir// brag rje'i
302a7(rnying rgyud): kyis phyogs skyong zhabs kyis gnon// dang phaT gyi 'jug sgra ldi nga las// brjod pa'i dus zab pa 'byung zhing gshegs su gsol// gan las phyog bzhi'i ye shes bzhi yi rang // byams dang snying rje dga' ba ting snyoms // zar pa
302b1(rnying rgyud): dgung d+hAngs la dgod// sgo myong ldan 'dren mtshad kyis gshegs sa gas ma// sku gsung rdugs las sprul pa 'am nya mo// phrin las rnam pa'i rdzogs par mdzad 'tshal gyi// ya shas skar ltar 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dam tshig rdzas dgongs
302b2(rnying rgyud): mchod cing gshegs su gsol// de nas zhi bsdus spyan drangs pa// yod med stong po shin tu rnal 'byor mdze// nam mkhang bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang
302b3(rnying rgyud): dpal khyod bdag/ hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA k+Sha rba ti kadz+r-i h+ya ho// sa ma ya ho// rtsa sngags phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa spyan drang ngo // phyag rgya bzhis kyang spyan drang ba// thugs rje lugs kyus thugs kyi chung bsgral zhing // byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas
302b4(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs te// bka' yi lugs sgrog pho nyas gnas stobs la// bdeg shugs bzhugs shing rnam grol dges pa bskyed// oM badz+ra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba maN+Da la/ badz+ra t+ya s+ya ma ti kram/ ts+tsha ba~M hoHphyag rgya bzhis ni spyan drangs pas// gzhal yas nang du byon
302b5(rnying rgyud): par bsam// las kyi phyag rgya las la bzhugs gsol ni// rin chen seng ge'i gdan la yang dag nges bzhugs pa'i// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sran
302b6(rnying rgyud): slad las la bzhugs// stobs kyi glang po'i khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing // rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sngun srad las la bzhugs// rdzu 'phrul/
302b7(rnying rgyud): rta pe khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing // rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mer bcas pa sman slad las la bzhugs// dbang gi rma bya'i zil yang dag nges bzugs
303a1(rnying rgyud): ma ma sa/ sa / du ma/ na shA gag/ ma du dag ga / glang/
303a2(rnying rgyud): dag g.yog dang 'byo rdzas// d+ha brlu pa'i smon la mardzas su gang sa ma du// 'dig tan skyem rab nas la sman m+bu las la zugs// ngag gi 'du byed rgyag tupas// mtshal ba dang byis lnga le// lab zlam ba rnags sa gas pa
303a3(rnying rgyud): thas lag// na ma ga/ sa thos pa yis/ ga // bu kyang pa/ dzu babad pa /
303a4(rnying rgyud): 'ja na mas nas thags bka// mi thathung bya ma 'khong 'bar// tha 'dul 'bums kyil gas la zhi // 'khril ba'i tshul du chos la bto// oM jig/ 'ju zhems nas phyogs/ byen// swA~M skyed ci meng rje lags la 'a// nyi ma 'a
303a5(rnying rgyud): mas su 'phel// btud ma pa'i ma mAl gi spang lta// lce bre nga/ bzlabazhings nas rdzas su ga ste// hrI sbeng rje meng dang 'bar// brtul 'thams thil gas la zhing // 'jil ba'i tshupa gyis chos la brten// hUM ba ky-i// 'dra ba'i gas napa
303a6(rnying rgyud): kA ba na// rlung skang cim d+hi gagapal zhing // nyi ma 'bral lasas 'thil// btud de 'dzus pa'i mdapa kyis bste// tI tha~M / 'bru 'i nas hwags // / swA bslad rtsa ma ngon pa ni// !sa la 'brasas de la ga la zhing // 'brel ba'i rna
303a7(rnying rgyud): gyis chos la ba rtan-i// sa N+ye/ 'bru bri zas nas thugs/ ban// nyi ma las su ba// dad+hang de ma pa'i phreng / kyis // ta ha~M/ 'brub brims nas rdzogs kar bkun// me bsgyi yong brje ba// na sa 'dams lag
303b1(rnying rgyud): zhing // btad 'jam pa'am dngas kyis pa la// ma Ar la// 'bru ba ba smras nas nags ka byagan// rgya bslad tsam nga la gsil 'bar// nyam 'brul las sa 'brel// btu dang 'dum pa'i ma dngas kyis bak+Sha// dz+ha d+hag dati/ 'brub gnas nas jab
303b2(rnying rgyud): kar bka na// hA bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// hA pra dz+nyA hU~M ka/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum
303b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdangs kyis blta// tAM badz+ra ra ti/ kun bzung mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum gyur mnyam rdzogs dpa' mo'i dkyil// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// hUM hUM hUM/ badz+rA tsit+ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ pi wang sdang ba ltar
303b4(rnying rgyud): byed pa// lha yi thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ni kr-i swA hA/ go cha 'dzin pa ltar byed pa// lha min thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne hUM trAM swA hA/ gseg par 'dzin pa ltar byed pa// mi yi thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mra ne suM swA hA/ pra ti chos 'chad phyag rgya ni// byol song thub
303b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne praM swA hA/ rin chen sbom bu kha 'byed ni// yi dwags thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ me 'bar chu blug lag gnyis ni// dmyal ba'i brub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne ye swA hA/ sa snying rin chen myu gu 'bar// gzugs ni sgeg mo me
303b6(rnying rgyud): long 'dzin// k+Shi hi rA dza la/ hU~M lI sne sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ nam mkha'i snying po ral gri 'dzin// dri ni rin chen phreng ba ma// d+haM A gar+b+ha ya/ traM mA l+yaM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ spyan das gzigs dbang pad+ma dkar// ro ni pe wang glu len ma// hrIHpad+ma pa dam/ hrIHgI ti go&haM/ phyag na rdo rje rdo rje
303b7(rnying rgyud): 'din// sgra ni phyag na gar byed ma// dzaM ku ru pan+d+ha hrIH/ a naM ti rA ga yA mi// byams pa phyag na klu shing 'dzin// 'das pa dpyi ni spos me ma// mi d+ha ra Ne sA hA/ dza b+hA ba za be ga/ snying sel chos kyi 'khor lo dang // da lta dbyangs ni me tog ma// ts+tshi nep+pa raM b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM put+pa
304a1(rnying rgyud): pa6/ za pa rkyen sam 'don// byung na tu rnams// rgyas dang ya/ ba pas / 'ang mdapal pha gan anA thA// ma 'angs dgra nab pa// ga ga// gshi ma na nan/
304a2(rnying rgyud): pa 'phyar// 'gugs byed lcags kyu phyag na 'dzin// hUM ya mAn ta kr-ita~M phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA krod+haM shwa ra~M dz+wA la ni hri phaT+Ta/ rnam par rgyal brdo rje gnon// 'ching mdzad phyag na zhags pa bsnams// hUM bi Sh+Thi ta bi ta badz+ra/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA lod+hI hwA
304a3(rnying rgyud): dA la ni hUM phaT/ rta mgrin phyag na thod sprul banon// sdom byed phyag na lcags sgrog bsdams// d+hi pad+mA d+ha kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA pad+mA d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+ha la ni hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa chu tham bsnams// ces mdzad ma ni d+hil zla 'tshal// oM pradz+nyAnA~M kr-ita
304a4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+hA ra mahA kro d+ha shA ri dza lA ni hU~M phaT/ phyag d+ha'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyila'i khor thigs dam bskrad gyur cig/ rgyal sras mchod pas mnyes gyur nas// mthar phyin dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM ba ro rje na oM// oM badz+ra
304a5(rnying rgyud): oM ra 2 hUM/ oM / oM sra mo b+hi sa~Md+d+had+ha/ rdo rje rgyang bcang pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yi shes 'jug/ ri gsog rdza bas dpapas// yid ni g.yo med par gnang // de rkyen 'byung ba'i rga cings pas// ban
304a6(rnying rgyud): la phan byed par 'gyur// dam chos byag rdza gyur pa ni// chos kyi dbyings por rab tu bskor// mi 'jigs mchog gi phrag rgya ni// sems ca ldan pa'i 'jigs sbyin// las kyi phyag tu 'di rnams kyis// nga 'dod pa jam sngaranas// ma lus lus pa med
304a7(rnying rgyud): par 'grug// de nas sems dpa' bcu drug go// las kyi phyag rgyas las rnams bzhugs/ dngas rbe/ dz+ra// 'bigs pa // mchog tsho bas lag// mo 'jigs pas mang la yin te// mtha
304b1(rnying rgyud): skyed pag/ sa // g+sa// blugasas/ sas na par bya / []// ga sla ga sa gas/ / na mahA/ nA
304b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags dag pas pad+mo ste// nyon mongs dgra gcod ral gri'o// dkyil 'khor tshol du 'khor lo ste// tshig tu brjod pas sgra zhes bya'o// oM badz+ra karma hA/ badz+ra rak+Sha ha/ badz+ra yak+Sha hA/ badz+ra san d+hi hA/ sna tshogs thams cad rdo rje'i phyir// mi tshugs bsrung bas go cha'o//
304b3(rnying rgyud): par sbyor bas mche ba ste// bcings pa'i tshul gyis khu tshur ro// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis// dngos grub ma thob par du na// las ma grub kyi bar dag tu// brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni// bde chen dbyings nas rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs shing // thugs brtsed ldan
304b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes gdung ba yis// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang // ma bsgribs spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// rtse gcig 'dud pa'i rdo rje lham dral la// kun nas byin gyis rlob cing skyob pa dang // mi gnyis don kun dngos grub mchog rnams
304b5(rnying rgyud): kun// bdag la sprul cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhUM swAhAHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa mA ya ho// sA ma ya hUM/ tiSh+Thabadz+ra/ bsdus nas mnyam skar gzhug pa ni// ye shes 'khor lo sgra gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmang po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyar
304b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM tsakra sa ma ya oM// gsung bugs yon tan phrin las bzhi// 'khor lo'i tshul mchog bzhin du sbyar// lha rnams kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rang gi snying gar brtan par bzhag/ las dang dam tshig phyag rgya yis// 'khor tshogs
304b7(rnying rgyud): yan chad ma rdzogs na// gtso ba rigs lnga dag la 'dus// de nas phrag gi phyag rgya yis// rigs lnga so sor phrag car gsungs// ma skyes rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni// dmigs med shes rab yum gyi ngang du gsal// thugs rje'i bye brag sna tshogs cing yang
305a1(rnying rgyud): snron// de rje sems dpa' ma lartaga'anala'o// rdzus spyan ma mkha' bzhin dung byur med kyang // gzugs sku' 'tshan bzhin dus sor gsal// thab sa dang shes rab ma rdzog sa mnga' brnyas pa'o// rigs su bang ba ga tu/
305a2(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skal phyag 'tshal lo// tsor yang sprul pa'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo// mdzes ma'i sku mchog 'gro ba dril la mkhas//
305a3(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar po brang bde bar gshegs pa'i yum// shes rab thabs kyi gcol mnyes mdzad ma// rigs kyi yum mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mkhas thugs rjes ye shes sprul pa'i sku// rang rgyud rnal 'byor dag pas grub pa'i sa brnyes
305a4(rnying rgyud): ma// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// sems dpa' sems mya rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms kyis// nyon mongs log par lta po'i dgra rnams 'joms// gshin rje gshed po ma sogs
305a5(rnying rgyud): po bzhi// rko ba yab sum rnamal phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pA to// pra hrIts+tsha ho// a la la ho// de nas rigs lnga brdzas phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal ni// mi bskyod pa ni ye shes tshe// rdo rje dbyings kyi mchod chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil
305a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsum// gsang ba gsum la phrag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal ni// rnam par snang mdzad dag chen po// rdo rje zhib dges pa che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ rdo rje'i ston la phyag 'tshal lo// rin men 'byung ldan phyag
305a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal ni// rin can rgal po rab tu zag// rdo rjem mkha' drim med// dngos gnyis dag pas dri ma med// gsang ba gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos la phrag 'tshal ni// rgyal chen rdo rje sngar mthe' yas// dam par mi tog rdo rje'i mdza'/
305b1(rnying rgyud): klu bzhin sa paste// rdo dza ga la g+sa// 'phrul 'o// las pa'i gas pag nal/ na tha masas sa na// bsas thams cad ga gas pa// dag pa nyi sa byung // rdordzag pas la wAn
305b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub mchog dngas gnon dang // hrIn+ta gtor mnyam gzhasu mchog sbyin gyi// phyag rma mI nI ba~M b+h+yaHsa nas// ting 'dzin b+hag d+ha sngags chog ldan// a t+ta prats+tsha// taH brtanan ro mam+be/ ma hA lkog pa ti ma mA lA na// de nas lha mogar
305b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs ni// skangs tshul gar sngags tshogs bcad sbyar// oM mra d+yat+yA ma d+hA mang+ga sha s+ya / ra ta mAn+ta mA pe d+d+he/ i sa dat+te sa d+ha sro Tas myo // oM s+'ur+yA ta ma sh+tsa d+he ts+tsha// rdo rje lcags kyi me nga byings bral byed thugs rje'i dang // byams pa'i nags
305b4(rnying rgyud): pas 'a don las la gzhug/ dga' ba'i lcags sgrog 'khor ba dzi si brtan// so sor chos ston btang snyoms dril bu'i dang // oM su ra ta badz+re mardod+ha sa to// oM dur ti dz+ra b+hI yoM dz+wa la ya/ oM mUr ta badz+ra mdza d+ha/ oM su ra badz+ra ga d+hiH/ yul med sems rtogs mos
305b5(rnying rgyud): blud dam rtseg ma// bdag stor ma gyis gsod byed phyug rgya'i sgra// bri ba gnyis rdzongs byed chos kyi phyag r+b+ha ma/ srid pa gar rgyal smye btso byed mas// d+h+r-its+tsha skyes pra ya hUM/ d+hA pA la~M swAg+sa sa s+ho// ky-i gau te/ oMn+di ti d+hag sa ma~M// shin tu sgeg pa phyegazi brji 'bar /
305b6(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin dran chen zeng bya 'bang // dbyangs snyan yida'i phyog ldan 'dir// gzugs mngos pa skyed pas phyogs bachung na rnaM// chu be mabai sha/ hU~M phy-iSh+Ta A be shwa/ pad+ma pa swa ga r+m+ma/ tog na // byi na kyi tshim byed bri bsrung rnams// bzhi mdzes ngan chen mang
305b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro// 'o dgas la 'phros pas kun tugs pa// bdud rtsi 'i grol ma pa'i dbyung ba// de das 'dor pa'i tshod pa'o// grwa yi ye ges can 'dis mchod// bde ba las 'khrung sardo tshul // dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyed// gang du dang po rnam par

306b6(rnying rgyud): ba pa myed par nga// yi bad kyi hU~M/ da bye sa ma par mA m+b+ha'i babin// blan sa gas dpang tha / rtog pa'i lags pa/ da ma/ 'jig ga/ grangs khye kying byugs

307a1(rnying rgyud): 'bral// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta lA ts+tshe pA Sh+T+rI hrI dzAm byas rba dra skad Na sa ma ya hUM/ yan lag kun 'byung bdud byed// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sbyin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
