307a3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// trAM/ bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyun se mo do// a/ bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gar gru tshig bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu
307a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul// ma b+h+rUM trAM hrIHa/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te badz+ra swa ra pra marba ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a b+ha te/ sa myak+saM bud+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ ma hA bad+ha bgro/ ma hA bo d+hi tsa t+ta dz+re/ ma hA
307a5(rnying rgyud): d+hi man+do ba saM kra maN badz+re/ sarba karma A pa ra na be sho d+ha ning rdo swa bA/ gzhal med rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs// ku gyi dang ni gsan 'gag dang // dang ding dpe ni sil snyan dang // yo byad dang ni ting 'dzin dang // lag stongs phyug rgya mthun par bya// lag gnyis sil snyan brdung ba
307a6(rnying rgyud): dang // dung dang gling bu 'bud pa dang // lag pa gnyis ni rnga ya ba g.yab// bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang // khu chung gnyis ni rgyal mtshan bya// 'byon tshul bskyod pas pa dan 'phyar// tshen 'gye tshon lhag phran ltar// bskyod cing mtshon bye phreng ba 'gyed/
307a7(rnying rgyud): 'gag yod rjod mi grol byas pa// g.yas pa yi ni lha bshos dbul// lag pa bla 'og gnyis bzhag ste// khang pa brtsegs par bzhug gnas bya// gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang // gdu bu do shal dpung rgyan dang // rna cha khams lnga rnams su bdag / de dag
307b1(rnying rgyud): gdugs kyi tshul byas la// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzug/ bsam gtan tshul gyi lag pa dag/ nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor zhing // sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i// bla de rnam pa sna tshogs byung // sor mo gar gyi phreng ba las// bskyod pas
307b2(rnying rgyud): sprin chen 'phan rnams gdags// gar gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis// grwar ni pad+ma'i phreng ba zi// lag pa dril bu'i tshul byas la// dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas brgyan// gsang sngags 'di yi cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu gsil ba dang // sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya/
307b3(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra g+hAN+Te ra Ni ta/ pra ra Ni ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sarba bud+d+hak+She tra pra tsa li ni/ pra dz+nyA pa rA mi tA nA da sas+thA we/ badz+ra d+harma hr-i da ya/ san+to Sha ni hAM/ de la sgo 'angar dbye ba'i bya// phyag rgya mdzub mos mdud pa dkrol// de nas mchod pa kun 'byung gi// phyag rgya bca' ba 'di lha /
307b4(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub kho rang gi// g.yas kyi sbom po gzhug par bya// bdag nyid byang chub sems bsgoms la// kun 'byung mchod pa sngags 'di 'bul// oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dza me g+ha/ ut+pa te s+phA ra Na i maM ga ga na hUM swA hA// mchod pa sprin gyi phyag rgya naM//
307b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi lag pa bla sa 'og/ sprin ltar btang ngo mchod par bya// sprin bkod yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba yi// rgyal srid dag gi mchod pa ni// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs bskangs la//
307b6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// traM rat+na pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ brjod pas 'khor lo rin po che// rta mchog glang po btsun mo dang // blon po nor bu grangs med pas// bdag nyid 'khor los sgyul rgyal
307b7(rnying rgyud): bsgom// rgyal srid mangs pa med par dbul// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // zin las lnga yi mchod pa ni// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dge dang sdig pa'i las sprad pas// thams cad sangs kyis mdzad myod do// las
308a1(rnying rgyud): wi chod par bzhes su gsal// oMs rbata thAg tA ka rba thA dzaH/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// gzugs la sogs pa 'dod rnams dang // chags las gyur pa'i bde bad // sangs rgyas rnamastsa la phral krur nang //
308a2(rnying rgyud): darje na chen 'dra bar 'gyur// oM sarbata thAg tas na d+hag ta spang d+he/ rnam 'i ba'i mna'abras 'jig rtenan// snang 'a srid pa'i gzugs rnams ban+d+ha// phyag su sna tshogs dkyil 'bor la// skam N+Dig phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// oM sarba twa thA ga ta
308a3(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rnam ma kha'i mtha' zas 'jig rtenan// chags pa ning rnams// thams pa ma seMs lpags kyi chog/ gzung latshod chos ni tshod pang bzhis// ma~M san+ya thA ga ta wA hU~M \u0f7f/ rnam ma pa'i mtha'akhrab 'jig rtenan// mas panan
308a4(rnying rgyud): kyi sems rtog rnams// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag sde tshogs la// dmigs pas dam tshig mchod par bzhes// oM sarbata thA gtas mad+hi b+hU dza hrI/ phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam rkyor ni// yis dang don chen gcig tu bsdu// nyon mong pa lci yi mchod pa ni/
308a5(rnying rgyud): sring gsum sems can thams cad kyi// 'dod chags spod pa'i las rnams kun// thams cad yab l+h+wam gnyis med sbyor// sbyor ba'i mchod par bzhes bu gsol// sid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// zhezhi sdang spyod pa'i lus rnams kun// rdo rje/
308a6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi mdzad snod de// sgrol ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// gti mug skyid pa'i las rnams kun// bde gshegs rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// rtog myed mchod per ba zhes su gsol// snying gsum sems ca
308a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// nga rgyal spyod pa'i las rnams kun// rin chen rigs kyi mdzad sprod de// ting 'dzin mchod par bzhis su gsol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sag dog spyod pa'i las rnams kun// las kyi rigs kyi mdzad spyod
308b1(rnying rgyud): de// dam tshig mchod par bzhes su gsol// oM mu nu ha la pany+tsa pU dzA swA hA/ de nas phyag rgya drug las ni// 'dod yon lnga rnams dpral bar bya// mdo dang rgyas dang bsdus par ni// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// ting 'dzin pa drug pa rnam
308b2(rnying rgyud): na rgya dang/ / sa/ /
308b3(rnying rgyud): phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzad nas// rdo rje'i gdan la bklags su gsol// oM badz+ra A d+ha ra mAdz+ra me g+ha sa ma wa dz+dza/ de nas a r+g+haM bags su gsol// de nas bcug spos dbul ba ni// ting 'dzin mchog gi rang bzhin las// dri yi bajug pa'i lha
308b4(rnying rgyud): zas 'di// bdag gis dang bas 'bral lags kyi// ba zhes te dngos grub sal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga te d+hU be pra dza ya s+pha rA Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas me tog dbul ba rje// byang chub yan lag mchog gi chun// kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'dra/
308b5(rnying rgyud): bdag gis dad pas dbul lags kyi// bzhes te grub mchog stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra puSh+pe pU dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mar me dbul ba ni// shes rab mchog gi rang bzhin las// snang zhing gsal ba'i zhun mar 'di// bdag gis
308b6(rnying rgyud): dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te grub mchog stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta bA ga ta badz+ra A yo ke b+ha dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas dri chab dbul ba ni// rnam dag tshul khrims rang bzhin las// khrum kyi yon mchog dri 'di dag/ bdag gis dad
308b7(rnying rgyud): pas dbul lags kyi// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra gar+b+he d+hu dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas ska bshos dbul ba ni// mya ngan las mchog rang bzhin la// bcud len tho mchog zhal zas 'di// bdag gri dang
309a1(rnying rgyud): pas 'bras lagyus s+ho// tu zab pa dgasapa// sa ga na sam yon/ gags pa ma rnas sa gas nas// mdzod pa cad pas nasu nga chu/ bye pa saman na
309a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad zhi// oM badz+ran pa A r+g+haM/ dz+wal nam gsum shes bya ste// lha rnams la ni dpral bar bya// de snying bcom ldan sde tshogs pa// sangs nas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// oM badz+ra d+hU pa a dz+dza/
309a3(rnying rgyud): rnam gsul shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// di nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// oM badz+ra shab+da AHhUM/ ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs
309a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin// oM badz+ra bA Ni AHhUM/ reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// me bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes so// oM badz+ra swam+me swA trAM/ gaT
309a5(rnying rgyud): sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni spang bar bya// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgos// rigs kyi grol du rnam par bsgom// gzhan yang rgyas par rab bya ste// mchod pa dbul bar bya ba ni// lag pa gnyis ni bsnol byas nas// gung mo gnyis ni nang /
309a6(rnying rgyud): du bkrag/ rgyab sbar madre bong ngo sbar te// mthe'u chung de spang gung mo ni// spyi bor btsugs la dbyangs kyis dbul// dbyung ba kurda la nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga po ste// nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur
309a7(rnying rgyud): tsog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga gan pU dza badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ bdag gi lus dang srid pa yi// zhal zas rdul phran bzhin lhags te// 'dod yon lngadu gyur par bsam// de nas sor mo gzhan bsnol te// mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse slong de// gdong gi zang
309b1(rnying rgyud): lan gsum bskor// d+hu gzugs ni lag gnyis ma long 'dzin// gzugs mdzes spang pas phyogs bkur ga 'o// shi tu zhig pa'i gzib cing 'bar// gzugs kyi lhamo stan la them// oMm+b+ho ra ti au// rang gzugs dam tshig dag gsu mchod// da/
309b2(rnying rgyud): 'og sor mo gzhan bsngol la// mdzub ma gnyis ni rtse spad la// tshig pa dang po nang du bcag/ mthe bong gnyis gzhibs tshogs mar bkun// dpral ba'i thang kar bsnol nas bcu'o// sgra yi lag gnyis pi wang skye// bde ba'i sgra snar phyog ban+d+har swA sa?/
309b3(rnying rgyud): da sa ldan med 'dage'i nga// ba~M/ / ra din ci rjo byas sa// de / ga// ba mi gnyis nas sbyo ba skyed// byang ma rdzogasas sa yangs bskye/ bas
309b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi bla rab tu bsgreng // dri ni lag gtis sngos bsnams te// spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa mo// kun tu tshimA byed dri bsung thim// dri yi lha mo shangs la thim// oM ra ti badz+ra AH/ rang dri dam tshig mchod par bsam// de nas lag pa gnyis bsnol te/
309b5(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis ni so sor bsngal// tshigs bklag pad+mo 'dra bar bya// mthe bong gnyis bsnol mdzub mo gnyis// drung du btsugs te kha zang bskor// ro ni lag gnyis snod bsnams te// bcud pa na blo mchog lnga brgyar 'phro// bdud rtsi bsil dro'i rnam pa'i
309b6(rnying rgyud): dbyangs// ro yi lha mo ljags la thim// oM Ad+ya dar dzi/ rang ro dam tshig mchod par bsam// de 'og sor mo gzhan bsnol la// gung gnyis gzhibs bsgreng snying gar bskor// reg ni rdo rje yongs 'khyud ma// mnyen 'jam reg bde 'khrel khyab
309b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor// kun tu sbyor ba'i bde bde// reg gi lha mo sku la tha ma// oM dwe Sha ra ti hU~M/ rang reg dam tshig mchod par bsam// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug rnams kyis// mchod na sangs rgyas sras bcas mnyes// de nas nan tan sbyor skal ba'i// mchod par ma
310a1(rnying rgyud): padatha' ba \u0f7f// rigs ldas pa'i brten ni// zheng badren pa'i rgyal bak+kor zhing // chog rnam gsum rgyu la chags nas// thabs dang shes rapa gnyis myed pa'o/ gsung ba mchad pa 'ad baning ngos// sed gsum thong
310a2(rnying rgyud): can thams cad ci// sems kun yum mi mkha' la bsdu// yab yum byang sems dbang bskur nas// sun tu 'od kyis bkod de// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bsgral nas// srid pa'i 'khor ba kun stongs pas// srid pa'i sems can ma lus kyin// bdag
310a3(rnying rgyud): sras sangs rgyas rigs lngar bskyed// thor ba'i mchod pa 'di skad 'bral// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pa'i dang nyid las// byang chub sems srin sgrol mar 'phros pa las// sangs rgyas byang chub tan thos rang rgyal dang // bdud dang sa steg 'gro ba mtha'
310a4(rnying rgyud): dag ni// bsras nas mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// su gsums la bkod pa mnyes pa'i mchod pa yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU badz+ra swa thA wa At+ma ho&haM/ oM bde chen yum gyi b+ha ga r+b+ha// khams gsum sems can ma rmas pa// 'dod
310a5(rnying rgyud): ga skye sa / ga gas sa sadu zhugs pa 'phrug sa ba pa
310a6(rnying rgyud): pU dA yA pU trA ya dz+haiM/ bdag gi lus las byung ba yi// phyir long oM las 'dod yon mchod// nang 'dug hUM gi dngos grub phen// khong gnas a yis chos slar rtogs// 'bru gsum su gsung thugs su bskul// sgrol ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol/
310a7(rnying rgyud): tan bi ti ti pU d+hU yai pU mAMHhUM/ las dang mchod pa lan rer// sgrol byar mchod pa lnga gas bya// rdzogs nis 'khor gyi lha mo dang // sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin bsten// de nas thabs dang shes rab tu// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya// rdzas
310b1(rnying rgyud): rbad las byed thags rnams pa// gdon min pa'i bka' ba sanas// las dang mdzad pa'i dus sun// las dang mchod pa'i dus 'grub byir// thog rdo na tham bsgom// dkyil du yi ga ta bkang la// mthar ni sngags car lag 'thun// ma
310b2(rnying rgyud): sarba pra d+he \u0f7f/ bkad nas bsgom par thub ste// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// thabs kyi rdon chen po dang // shes rab bad+mar rab thar bas// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// bad ba'i bsnyen pa mchag
310b3(rnying rgyud): bde nye// bde thal sgrub dang ldan gyis che// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba yi// mchod pa dam pa dbul ba ni// thabs kyi snying rje chen po yis// sems can ma lus ngan du dbul// shes rab stong pa chen po yis// chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs par
310b4(rnying rgyud): 'bral// sangs rgyas mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ oM sarba b+hu dza me gu pU dzA ya pU trA ya d+h+waM/ de nas bdud rtsi sman gyi ni// mchod pa dam pa dpral bar bya// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// rigs ldang dam chag lnga
310b5(rnying rgyud): dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i// drug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// thams cad bdud ci'i rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems ni bdud rtsi che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// gapur shel gyi sgros por dri//
310b6(rnying rgyud): gtsang da me med pa'i dri med rtsa// rin chen me lta ra 'ab ba'i tshogs// ma lus bsdus pa'i thi bA le ste// gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang// gnyis su med par mnyam gror ba// 'chi med brjid rtsir swA yan// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi gsos/
310b7(rnying rgyud): srid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// thugs de ma dbyings nyid sprul ba'i mchog/ srug sung thugs kyi dang nyid 'di// bdag cag dadapas 'gyur lags ni// bzhes te kun tu dgas mdzod la// bral bas ngas grub bdag la/
311a1(rnying rgyud): stsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a pra hrIHto// shrI bany+tsa khA ti khA ti/ rnam snar mi bskyod rin chen mtha' yas grub// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba yab rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod dbul// thugs rjes bzang/
311a2(rnying rgyud): dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bzang mo spyan dang ma ma gos dkar sgrol// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba yum rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// chos rnams
311a3(rnying rgyud): rnam dag ye nas lhun grub pa'i// bya ba byed dang yid chos rnam dag la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bde gshegs yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// phyag rgya'i tshogs
311a4(rnying rgyud): mchog sems dpa' bcu drug la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes bcer dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sems dpa'i thugs rjes rol pa'i dbyings phyug ma// shes rab sku mchog sems ma bcu drug la//
311a5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub rtsol// 'gro ba'i dpal du gyur pa'i byang chub sems// sa snying la sogs sems dpa' brgyad rnams la// nam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod
311a6(rnying rgyud): 'bul// thugs rjes brtsed dgongs dbang dang dngos grub rtsol// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar la sogs// mdzes pa'i sku mchog sems ma brgyad rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rjes brtser dgongs
311a7(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dngos grub rtsol// thabs mkhas thugs rjes cing 'dul der ston pa'i// thub drag la sogs sbrul sku thams cad la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bskal ba me ltar
311b1(rnying rgyud): 'byur ba'i grod dkyilan// 'jig byed khro bo chen po bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtse dmardzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rjes brtser dgong dbang dang dngos grub sgrol// zla bo'i skal gnyis med sman sbyor ba'i// ye shes gzhal las srom bzhi rnams la// rnam dag 'drang byang ma rdzas mnyes
311b2(rnying rgyud): mchod 'bral// thugs rjes bcer dgongs dbang dang dngos grub srol// sdom pa gnas shing rig 'dzi grub pa'i tshogs// lha dang lha mo gyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor la// rnam dag bdud rtsi ma rdzas mnyes mchod 'phrul// thugs rjes brtse nga go ngas dang dang dngos grub sgrol// drug
311b3(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyad gcod khams gsum 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso bo la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dab dra dang dngos grub stsol// tshe dazla sngon nas las kyi 'phro mthun pa'i// rgyal rde zla kAr zhing rdo rje mched lum
311b4(rnying rgyud): la// rnam dag bdud rtsid dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes pa rjer dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar mi 'bral ba'i// dam tshig gzungs kyis zin pa'i mched lham sgrub zlal// rnam dag bdud rtsing ma rdzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs
311b5(rnying rgyud): rjes brtsed dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// g.yo med khrel brtson dam tshig lhur len pa'i// snying dang 'dra ba'i slob ma lcam dral la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// phyis 'byung kun langs la
311b6(rnying rgyud): bstan// bsdus nas mtshan brjod 'di ltar 'bul// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dang // yum chen sangs rgyas spyan gnyis la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // yum chen kun tu
311b7(rnying rgyud): bzang mo la// da mchog mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// bral ba'i dngos srang bdag la stsol// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dang // yum chen dahA kA ma ti// dmachog mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// bral ba'i ngos grub bdag la sgrol// com ldan snang ngam tha' yas dang // yu
312a1(rnying rgyud): bza' dkar mo la// dmachog mchog gi mchod pa 'thal// thal ba'i dngos grab bdag la stsol// bcom ldan don yod sgrub pa dang // yum chen dam tshig rgol ma lalA// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'phrul// phul ba'i
312a2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub bdag la stsol// de bzhin yid chos thab drug dang // sems dpa' sams mu bcu drug dang // sgo ba yab yum la sogs la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'phrul// phral ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// dbyings nas bskul bas
312a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i sprul pa 'phro// rigs kyi 'dul ba'i phrin las so sor mdzad// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub don du skong // de ni rin chen gsang ba'i dngos grub yin// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor las byung ngo // de nas rdzas kyi dngos grub blang ba ni// ye shes rgyal po'i sku
312a4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag spyo cig/ lce yi dam tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje can gyis hU~M bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga ru sbyar ba 'di// zos na byang chub thob par 'gyur// oM kA ya sid+d+hi oM// AHbAka
312a5(rnying rgyud): AHhU~M tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas phung po rnam lnga yi// mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni// de nas yang dag rab gsal ba// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag
312a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad gsal bar mdzod du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par
312a7(rnying rgyud): mdzod// oM b+hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad nyams su bstar bar mdzod// oM hUM/ lha mo'i phyag rgya'i gar stabs kyis// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// 'de bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bsod nams can du de bdag 'gyur// byin gyi rlabs kyis
312b1(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs nas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// spos ni ting 'dzin phung po'i mchod par 'phrul// me tog rnam grol phung po'i mchod par 'bul// mar me shes rab phung po'i mchod par 'phrul// dri chu tshul khrims phung po'i mchod par 'bul//
312b2(rnying rgyud): bshos rnam grol ye shes phung po'i mchod par 'bul// de dag bdag gi lus las byung // sman ni rnam lngas 'phags pa mchod// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs la bdag gi lus/
312b3(rnying rgyud): zatha ma bshad dang gcibs mchod// ma hA bany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ de nas lha rnams lus la bcud// reg pa'i mchod pa dam pa de// 'phags pa rnams la dbul bar bya// bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas kyi// sangs
312b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// badz+ra min+ta su ra s+t+waM/ pU dze badz+ra zhes dbul/ lus sman drug gsum mchod par bya// sha dang khrag dang nus pa gsum// rnal 'byor pa yis lag brims la// dus gsum mchod par dbul ba ni//
312b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med// 'dod chags mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gsung gi dngos grub sbal du gsol// ma hA rak+ta kai ni ri ti/ 'byung po'i rus pa mar bas zhim// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// zhe sdang mchod pa 'di
312b6(rnying rgyud): bzhig la// thugs kyi dngos grub phyal du gsol// ma hA rak+ta keng ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Da la kha raM khA hi/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod pa 'di bzhes la// su yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA tik+Sh+Na la daM khA hi/
312b7(rnying rgyud): dpal chen 'khor bcas khrag la gyon// dpal chen 'khor bcas sras la skyon// dpal chen 'khor bcas shal spyon// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'byung po'i rus pa mar bas zhim// 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med/
313a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// srid gsum sems can thams cad ni// 'dod chags mchod par bzhes su gsol// zhe sdang mchod par bzhes su gsol// gti mug mchod par bzhes su gsol//
313a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams kyang kyi// gsung gi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ thugs kyi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ sku yi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ dus gsum rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// gsung gi dram tshig bskar gyur cig/ thub kyi das
313a3(rnying rgyud): tshig sang gyur cig/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs dgra chen bzlog tu gsol// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// dang po gsum la lan gsum nyid//
313a4(rnying rgyud): bdun la nyi shu rtsa gcig la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bgrang ba'o// gong ma'i don yang 'di ltar shes// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gsum// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bur shes// dug gsum re re dag la yang // dgu phrag dag tu dbul bar bya// thams cad zang par bya phyir zhal
313a5(rnying rgyud): gsol// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnam gsum bstab pa ni// srid gsum dug gsum dag pas rgyal ba'i sgra gsung thugs// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'gyor sku gsung dam tshig skong // 'gro ba yun ring dug gsum bskul ba'i phyir// tha ma'i bskul ba gsum de nyi shu gcig/ rtsa
313a6(rnying rgyud): gcig lnga ru bgrangs na brgya rtsa brgyad// de nas dug gsum smon lam gdab pa ni// dug gsum mchod par dbul ba yis// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dug gsum bag chags dag gyur cig/ dug gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// rgyud rnams
313a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus mnyes gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dam bskrad gyur gyig/ bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob gyur cig/ de nas drug gsum rang bzhin legs shes bya// D+ha ni gti
313b1(rnying rgyud): mug 'dod chags zhe sdang gsum nyid la// ma rtogs khams gsum 'byor ba'i 'bras bur snang // gti mug ma rtogs 'dod chags skye sdang gus la// rnal 'byor lam mchog rgyud pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob// de nas dbang po reg bya'i mchod pa ni// dkyil 'khor
313b2(rnying rgyud): lha rnams dgug pa ni// gzhug dang dbang du bya zhing mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra aM ku sha sarba maN+Da la waMH/ oM badz+ra bA shra sarba maN+Da la hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta sarba maN+Da la bi/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Da sarba maN+Da la hoH// nyams kyis lcogs na mngon sum gyi// 'gyur ba'i bar du dkyil 'jor/
313b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi dang sbyar// lha rnams lus la gzud pa'i phyir// reg bya'i mchod pa dam pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// bo la ka ko mnyam sbyar zhing // skad cig ma ni dang po la// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed par bya// de nas skad
313b4(rnying rgyud): cig gnyis par ni// mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes so// thig le 'bar ba'i drod kyang 'char// de nas skad cig gsum pa la// rnam rtog bral bde'i ye shes ni// thig le g.yo ba'i drod ces bya// de nas skad cig bzhi pa la// thig le brtan pa'i drod ces bya// lhan
313b5(rnying rgyud): cig skyes pa'i ye shes rtogs// de ni mchod pa dam pa yin// kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa ni// srid bkod yongs su bsngo zhing 'bral// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes bya'i phyir// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' klas pas// kun
313b6(rnying rgyud): bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM sa man+ta b+ha dra ga ga na kha~MkhaM swA hA/ bstod pa glu yi mchod pa ni// rol mo ye shes gla yis 'i stor// mchod pa mjug spang rol mo ni// ye shes glu 'di blangs la dbul// dbang po'i spyod yul rang bzhin dngos po med// rnam dag
313b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin sdug bsngal sel// dam rdzas dag pa lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga chos lnga gsung lnga rang bzhin dbyer mod bsam// de rtsir dag pas dag pa nyid mchod cing // chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim par 'bul// dri med rnam dag nam mkha'i
314a1(rnying rgyud): na tu su / kun dus// du du ma
314a2(rnying rgyud): sa / sum
314a3(rnying rgyud): gas / sa na sa
314a4(rnying rgyud): na sa/ zhu sa rnye gas / das pa na sa nga na
314a5(rnying rgyud): sas sa // ma sa na byud // sbrul 'i nga nas / ma rnam sa sa
314a6(rnying rgyud): na / ba sa/ pa zugs / galdanam pa
314a7(rnying rgyud): slo
314a8(rnying rgyud): tshig kha shas chad dam/
314b1(rnying rgyud): sa rnam rnags// nas tugs gnon// mu na pa ga nag nga// btsun brnas pa rdzogs pa // bcwa sa sa thAs// da gagasungs su ga // rna /
314b2(rnying rgyud): sanyam nyid migs mnyam nying mjug gi ma nyid can// thugs dag nyid 'a ba'i drug bcwal sal ba mad// ya tsun ma pa' yas dngas thabasams kyad ma // rje me sa kyi sa sa nyid ma sa ga pa//
314b3(rnying rgyud): pha pa'i tshal 'ang cid med de// de ba ni rnam mkha' dang yang bldan du khyod mu sbyin/ dngos grub ma pa' yas mnyam nyid dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams pas pang sgrol// rgyag tu ma med pa'i thugs rje'i thugs las
314b4(rnying rgyud): thung // smon lam thub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub nga tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par byung // rmad myed tshwa dang thul bas shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i// bde ba gshegs pa'i gongs
314b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa ba rnyes pa kyang // khams gsum gan la dngas grub mchog grol mang ba // thugs rngu'i spyod pa mi ga yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// oM ma tog ni tu bzang ba'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'gang mcho bya sa
314b6(rnying rgyud): pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchon stsol mdzad// mgon po drus gsus sgrib pa srid par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos thab dam pa bdag la stsol// mchod pa rnams bzhi shes bya ste// thug 'tshal thal po ra
314b7(rnying rgyud): padang // de bzhin byams dang kyid rje dang // maN+Dag badrug pa 'jig rten ni// ser mo las byung ma tog rnams// skyob pa na sang bral ba bya// yan lag sun 'byung drug rgyan// bcings nas byang chub sems pardzun te// so song mgon po rnams
315a1(rnying rgyud): cad la// de yi sras rnams thams cad la// de yi sras rnams nan tan bya// mthe bong srin lag sbyar ba ni// bkra shis pa zhes brjod pa ste// de yi rdzas rnams kun blangs te// dpral ba snying ga lte ba nas// mgon po sras rnams rim
315a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbul// rdo rje bu tshur bcangs nas ni// brjid pas mtha' nas gar bya zhing // mnyes par grol ba'i thal mo yis// pad+ma'i phreng bas dbul bar bya// skabs su bab na khu tshur yang // rung zhes b+ha la mchod byed dus// rjes su yi rang thal mo sbyar/
315a3(rnying rgyud): las la gzhug pa'i tshe na ni// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// byams pa snying rje bsgom par bya// de nas bstod pa'i glu 'di blang // rdo rje che mchog log 'dren mang po 'joms// phan dang bde mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i gtso// rmad byung phrin las sna tshogs
315a4(rnying rgyud): mnga' ba'i lha// rang byung khyod kyis grub mchog stsal du gsol// stobs bcus pha rol dpung rnams 'joms pa po// dpal chen log pa'i dgra rnams rnam par 'joms// rngam chen gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ba// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol//
315a5(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i rjes 'brang ni khro mang po'i tshogs// 'gro la phan mdzad pa de gshegs bsgom pa la// gnod byed bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhom pa dang // mthu rtsal byin rlabs dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// ma myos
315a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rang bzhin chos kyi sku// 'phags mchog khyed dang dbyer med tshul gzig ste// dngos grub yul dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje che mnga' bar// yo ga rtog sgyu ma'i tshul gyis gsol 'debs na// dus la mi 'da' rdo rje'i dam tshig
315a7(rnying rgyud): can// ye shes lha khyod bdag la byin gyis rlobs// ma rig bdag gi lus dang ngag sems kyis// bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te// kyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thogs med thugs rje can la bzod par gsol/
315b1(rnying rgyud): de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i// don gyi mchod pa 'bral ba ni// rang lus rnam par mi rtog par// bshigs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom// de lta bu yi chos nyid kyi// mchod pa 'phags pa rnams la 'phrul// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul
315b2(rnying rgyud): te// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid sangs rgyas par// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun las 'das pa yi// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa rnam par rol// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes mchod pa thams cad don yod par bya ba'i smon lam 'di
315b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// smon lam rgyas dang bsdus pa yang // dkyil 'khor gsum gyi khog 'dir ltos// mkhyen par gsol dang mchod 'bul gnyis// mi mthun par ni gnas kyis bcos// phyi rabs sgo bzhi rtsis 'go lngas// ngas ni khyed la gsal bar
315b4(rnying rgyud): bstan// mkhyen par gsol dang mchod 'bul gshegs// las bcol smon lam gdab dang la// phyag rgya yak+Sha'i mche ba ni// gtor ma la gtug sngags 'di brjod// oM e shad+d+haM/ pe sha tAM/ sa ma ya b+haSh+Tha hUM/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hrAM/ dzaHhU~M Sha hoH/
315b5(rnying rgyud): oM pra tIts+tsha ho// ho ye nas spros pa med pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa na// dus gsum gshegs shing bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa thams cad kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes bye brag kun
315b6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul zabs su// bcom ldan rdo rje sems sogs te// rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa dang // rigs mchog gzungs kyi yum dang bcas// rgyal sras 'khor du sems dpa' tshogs// sems ma'i dkyil 'khor la so
315b7(rnying rgyud): pa// ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug can// thabs mkhas pa yi bdag nyid kyis// mkha' 'gro rang bzhin rnal 'byor can// ngo bo nyid spu ma lus rnams// so so'i pho brang bzhugs gnas nas// gzhal med khang nas sku bskyod gshegs// phyogs bcu'i
316a1(rnying rgyud): zhing khams mtha' yas nas// rab 'byams ma lus kun 'dus shing // 'byor pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// grub pa'i mched lham rgya mtshor bcas// thogs pa med par rab mkhyen cing // sgrib pa mi mnga' don gzigs
316a2(rnying rgyud): pa// thugs rje chen po'i dang gyur cing // 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs sta gon gnas// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sgo 'dir// zhal gyis 'ches pa'i thugs dam gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gtogs pa yi// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor bcas pa// khyed rnams
316a3(rnying rgyud): gsan cing dgongs su gsol// ho rnal 'byor mchod pa sku gsung thugs// rdo rje las byung rin chen 'dra// byin gyis brlabs shing mchod 'bul bas// ye shes rgya mtsho'i spyan ldan rnams// dus gsum bzhugs la mchod par 'bul// de dus byin gyis
316a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa dang // mchod cing nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang // rgyu 'byung sbyin byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod// bdag cag skal ldan mi tshogs rnams// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs bshams pa// 'byor ngos rigs pa rjes
316a5(rnying rgyud): mthun rnams// rnam bzhi'i sgo nas dus bzhir 'byung // zhal zas zla tshigs rgyu med pa'i// dad pas bsogs te mos pa yis// 'byor chad bdog drod sbyar ba 'di// srid pa'i longs spyod rgyal chos kyi// mnga' thang byung khud lha yi lus// 'jig rten
316a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor yug bcas pa 'di// sred bkod gtan pa med pa yi// mchod sbyin mang 'brang mchod pa'i byed// dpal na phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// kyal ba rgya mchor bcas rnams kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang // kun ta bamang po'i mchod pa 'dis
316a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga yi// lha mo phrin las rgya mtsho rnams// gar gyi sprin lung bzhin gyur te// nam mkha'i gza skar bzhin du bkram// sa gzhi'i rtse shing bzhin du thon// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar 'phyo zhing kyang // sprin bzhin gtongs nas char bzhin
316b1(rnying rgyud): 'bab// rgya bo'i rgyun bzhin dus gsum 'byung // phyogs bcu'i rgyal brgya mtsho yi// zhal du drangs nas bdag longs spyad// mnyes mchod phog nas dges longs spyod// 'dod yon lnga ye mchod phul bas// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams//
316b2(rnying rgyud): dug lnga rgyud gnas bag chags byung // rgyud lnga'i sems can rnams ni sgrol// gnas lnga'i 'bras bu thob gyur nas// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i thugs dam bskang // 'bras bu bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i// sems can ma lus thams cad kyi// sku gsung
316b3(rnying rgyud): thugs dang yon tan las// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// 'bras bu thob par mchod par 'bul// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// mthol bshags bzod par gsol ba ni/ bdag cag tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i
316b4(rnying rgyud): skal ldan rnams// dang po gsang bsgos khas 'ches te// dam tshig gnyen po mngon par mnos// chag nyams zhig ral gyur pa dang // rtsa dang yan lag dam mnos nas// bka' bzhin bsrung ba rngo ma thogs// bsrung ba'i dam tshig ma nos pa
316b5(rnying rgyud): las// gti mug ma tshor dbang gis ni// bde dang sdug bsngal rkyen ma bzod// sgo gsum nyes skyon me shor bas// bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud bsregs pas// skyon bral mtshan mar ma phyin te// bsrung ba'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// spyad
316b6(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i dam mnos nas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sran chung bas// rang sems ma dad dbang gis ni// gang zag spyod pa dman pa yis// lags 'jigs pa'i rkyen ma bzod// dpa' los sgyu sogs phyi tshul gyur// las rtsal tshad mar ma gyin pas//
316b7(rnying rgyud): spyad pa'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// dang blang dam tshig mnos pa las// bka' yi gzhung bzhin ma gyur te// rtogs bzhan pa'i dbang gis na// the tshom ngan spyong gyon ma bzod// srub rdzas mthun rkyen dang malon// spyod pa mi mthun bsrung
317a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'phangs// 'jug rtsal tshad mar ma phyin pas// dang blang dam tshig nyams pa bshags// shes par bya ba'i dam mdzes nas// bden yid mchis de bral bas// mnyan sems yun bsring rkyen ma bzod// gti mug
317a2(rnying rgyud): shes par gyud pas// shes bya tshad mar ma smin pas// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// bslab par bya ba'i dam tshig mdzes pa las// dpa' btul brtul zhugs bsgrub la 'jug chung bas// bslab pa dus las yol
317a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gis ni// na tsha'i sdug bsngal rkyen gyis ma bzod de// bslab pa'i lha babs pa las 'phang gyur te// khyad par rjod rtsal tshad mar ma gyin te// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo ba shagra// mi spang ba yi dam tshig mnos pa las/
317a4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dbyings gcig par// ma rtogs dbang gis gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i blo// kha thag gyur te bzang ngan rkyen ma brjo// nyan thos lta bur gnyis su 'byed rtogs pas// gnyis su med cal tshad mar ma byin te//
317a5(rnying rgyud): spang dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshag/ mi smad pa yi dam tshig mnos pa las// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal dregs pa yis// gzhan du rtog pa'i phag dog dbang gis ni// 'jig rten 'dod chags bstod smad rkyen ma bzod// rang bstod gzhan la smod pa'i
317a6(rnying rgyud): las bgyis pas// gnyan par blta ba'i rtsal tshad ma byin par// me spad dam tshig nyams par gyur na bshags// mchod par bya ba'i dam tshig mnos pa las// rgyang phan chos kyis bsdus pa'i dbang gi ni// mkhyen gsal gang ma mnyes par ma bas
317a7(rnying rgyud): pas// bdag nyid dman par ma mthong chen ma bzod// mchod sprin thams cad dbang du ma chud pas// mnyes bya'i mchod partsal tshad ma byin te// mchod pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// bdag gi ma yin pa'i rdzogs bsten dang
317b1(rnying rgyud): khyud mi gcig pa'i bsod nams 'dres pa dang // le lo dang ni snyoms las dbang gyur nas// gzang gtad bcas nas gzung 'dzin ma bshigs pas// sgrol dang sbyor gnas byin gyis ma brlabs par// ting 'dzin yun thung thugs rje'i gnas ma gyur// ye shes babs pa'i
317b2(rnying rgyud): lha srung ma 'phangs 'gyur// gnas skyong man ngag tshad mar ma thos pa// rnam par shes rgyud tshad mar ma phyin te// nyams pa brgyad po 'di mnod sems yid bkod// lus sems 'gyod pa chen pos mthol bshags na// bzod pa chen pos gsol po tshangs par mdzod//
317b3(rnying rgyud): de nas phrin las btsal ba ni// bdag cag sgrub pa 'dir 'dus rnams// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa la// bar chad byed pa'i sdang dgra dang // sbyor ba chu dang gnod bgegs gsum// zhi dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// mnan dang bzlog dang spor zhing spar// 'dul skal phrin las
317b4(rnying rgyud): gang gyur pa zhes// tshar gcad grub par mdzod du gsol// dngos grub gsol ba'i phrin las ni// yid la brnag pa'i 'bras bu rnams// ji ltar 'grub cing gsol byang la// dris bzhin 'bras bu thob gyur cig/ de nas smon lam gdab pa ni// bshags skyong 'di rnams
317b5(rnying rgyud): brjod tsam gyis// tshor ba dang ni ma tshor ba'i// nyams pa thams cad byang gyur cig/ tshor dang mtshor nyams pa rnams// phyin chad byed par ma gyur cig/ gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas// slan chad phyir la mi ldog pa'i// sems dang mi 'bral bar gyur cing // shes
317b6(rnying rgyud): rab rno zhing dbang po gsal// ye shes dang gyur sems can don// ma lus byed pa'i mthu thob nas// skyes pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du// slob dpon bka' drin lan ljon zhing // pha ma'i drin lan rjes su bsgrub// man ngag snod dang ldan gyur cig/ tshe 'di dang /
317b7(rnying rgyud): ni tshang rabs gzhan// skyon brjod thams cad dang bral nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi// yon tan tshad bzhin thob gyur cig/ dus kyis mnar ba'i sems cad rnams// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus bapa nas// bden pa'i tshig dang bral ba rnams// dam tshig nyams
318a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon can dang // lhan cig skyes skyon drabs 'brel// dam nyams nyes pa tshe 'di dang // gzhan du ma smin thal byung cig/ sngon chad bskal cing sprad do 'tshal// ye shes chen po'i rang gis bsgral// thugs rje gdung ba'i shugs kyis
318a2(rnying rgyud): bskal// rgyud byang gnas kyang stobs gyur cing // snga rabs dus tshor 'das pa rnams// thugs dam nyams pa kun bskangs te// ye shes bla ma'i sa non nas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gral thob ste// rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang khyad par la// ye shes gom pa 'dor
318a3(rnying rgyud): byed cing // sa bcu zil gyis rab mnan te// sngon gyi thugs dam 'brel pa yi// 'grol cing brtse gdung shugs kyis ni// bdag gi sdong dang grogs gyur cig/ sku gsung thugs ni mi zad pa// rgyan gyi 'khor lo thob gyur cig/ ces ni zhe sdang rdo rje yis//
318a4(rnying rgyud): phyir blarnal 'byor blo sbyar gsungs// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i thugs mnga' bas// phyis 'byung blo mthun dgongs nas gsungs// karma sA le'i rgyud 'dir ni// mchod pa'i phud nyul chen mos ni// lha mo brgyad sogs 'dod pa yis// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams thas
318a5(rnying rgyud): cad la// ting 'dzin ldan pas mchod pa mchod// nyul les 'thongs dang ma 'byongs blta// de phyir mkhas pas spang bar bya// mkhas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa// kun gyi bya ba'i las ma yin// zhes gsungs so// barma mA le'i rgyud las/ thim pa'i dkyil
318a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag chen pos/ kho bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gcong mdzad pa'i phyir/ rnon po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di// 'gro ba'i ched du dgo
318a7(rnying rgyud): nas gsungs so// don rnams gsal phyir bco lngar gsungs// snying rje 'byung ba sngon gyi gleng gzhi dang // bskyed dang bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang // dbang bskur gnas bsung gshog bskyed rdzogs pa gdon// ma drang mnan dang spyan drang bstim pa dang /
318b1(rnying rgyud): las dang brtan pa zhug tu zhing gdan la dbab// de la ste rje chen po 'byung ba ni// sbom po gnyis ni bur du bstan// mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu mdud// gung gnyis rtse sprad srin mtheb brkyang // sa 'og sa bla bar snang nas// he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro bsdu/
318b2(rnying rgyud): srid pa spyi bcings dpral bar bzhag/ thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shang si ta sarba satwA na/ sarba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Tha ma ma swa b+hA wa shu d+ho&haM/ de nas gleng gzhi 'di gsungs so// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ni// bdag nyid chen po rtag
318b3(rnying rgyud): pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ste// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur// shin tu khro zhing gdug pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las//
318b4(rnying rgyud): khro bos de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro ba'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pas ni// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// khams gsum 'di dag glos ci dgos// rdo rje
318b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam spang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal// de nas bskyed par bya ba yang // hUM bzhi 'phros dang 'dus pa las// yi ge hUM dang klong gyur te// hUM nyid bdag la rang thim pas// hU~M shrI he ru ka hUM a
318b6(rnying rgyud): brjod pas dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdag nyid gyur par rab tu bsgom// klong de yum pa rab thim pas// klong kro trI shwa rI sa ma ya de pi ta na sho d+ha ya/ brjod pas rang gi yum nyid du// kro hrI shwa ri ma ru gyur// he ru ka ni lnga sogs pa// hUM dang ha he phaT rjes pas/
318b7(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin gyis thos par bzlas// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par// d+hU dang tsa las 'khor lor gyur// gtum chen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar// sna tshogs khro 'byung 'od 'phro bar// ming gsum bsreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes
319a1(rnying rgyud): 'bar// 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen pa// hU~M ral pa mun rnga'i cod pan 'bar// phyogs bcu babengs pa'i gshog pa gdangs// nyi ma thod sbrul mang po'i gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// rngam pa'i ngoraro 'byug stong
319a2(rnying rgyud): ldir// phaT raM dz+wa la hUM brjod cing // 'phos pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// khros pa'i rdo rje me chen po// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs pa 'bar// tsakra gaT riraM hUM raM 'bar// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// so sor rang sngags
319a3(rnying rgyud): khri 'bum zlos// skra ska dang ro drag por ldan// hUM hUM ha ha phaT b+ho las// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas// nr-i yi tsit+ta za zhing rgyag/ tir rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dre bas// rang gi stan dang lag char ni// rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri
319a4(rnying rgyud): dang // ti ra gsar snying bum ril 'phen// so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su// rgyu de drug gnas pa'i sems can dang // ma rungs gdug pa thams cad kun// dzaHhUM baM hos bkug nas ni// lan gnyis lan gsum zhab du bstim// de nas bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni// tshe
319a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul bzhi yi sngags brjod do// hU~M hU~M hUM hrI/ hUM bi shwa kro d+ha maN+Da la ha la ha la phaT phaT phaT/ rigs lnga'i zhal nas sngags brjod pas// bdud bgegs ma lus rab tu 'grel// he ma hA ru dra/ k+ShiM twa~M karma badz+nyA/ ma hA de ga/ ma rba pra/ hU~M dz+dza tra~M/ zhes pas zhabs kyi 'og tu gzhug
319a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa dbang chen thog ser 'begs// tsakra hUM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen rdo rje thog ser 'bebs/ 6/ dbang chen 'khor lo'i thog ser 'bebs// tsakra oM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen rin chen thog ser 'bebs// NAM kra tAM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen pad+ma'i thog ser 'bebs/ tsak+Shu hri b+h+rUM/ dbang chen
319a7(rnying rgyud): ral gri'i thog ser 'bebs// ts+tsha \u0f85hA b+h+rUM/ zhes pas lus de gshegs dral byas// b+h+yas bya'o/ ge 'khor lo dbar// rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul// dpa' bo khro bo 'jigs bcas pas// rig sngags don la yang dag sbyor// khrag gi rgya mtsho'i d+hI rA bris tshi li li/
319a8(rnying rgyud): dang rma yin nam
319b1(rnying rgyud): rus pa'i tshogs kyi phung po khral la// rdo rje zhing chen dri dang bsung+ku se bsung // mthong thos rngam pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang rol// rak+ta dza mur+tha dz+wa la maN+Da la dz+dza/ ko ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Da la hU~M/ Shi ma~M hA tiSh+Tha dz+wa la maN+Da la d+hi/ kha kha la sho ta a pa la ko// 'chi ba med par thog
319b2(rnying rgyud): gdon pa// rdo rje'i srog ni rlung lta bu// yang dag bsgral ba rdo rje che// skye shi med pa'i sa pa 'god// badz+ra d+hA dza/ rat+na rA dza/ pad+ma rA dza/ karmad+ha dza ta thA ga ta rA dza/ de nas rang dbang rang la rdzogs// bum pa cod pan ming dang ni// rdo rje dril bu rgya nas blang // lam bsgom 'bras
319b3(rnying rgyud): bur gyur pa yi// brda' rnams ston pa'i dbang yang bskur// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang // bde chen sku gsung thugs byin brlab// dbang bskur ba yi sngags 'di yin// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hi/ oM ma hA AdaR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma
319b4(rnying rgyud): ko&ti/ oM ma hA pra t+ya be k+She Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tI dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+yA thA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA k+She ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ki&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA lAka badz+ra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba
319b5(rnying rgyud): ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba a t+ma ko&haM/ de nas gnas ni bsrung ba yang // tsa ni dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang // was khams bdud rtsi lha yi rgya// sngags kyi yi ge gsung yin te// thugs ni snying po rlung ngu gnas// gnas bsrung ba yi dam pa'o// de nas
319b6(rnying rgyud): gshog pa bskyed pa ni// rdo rje lta bu'i nas 'phang gcod// rin chen gshog pas mchod rtsin gtong // ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du spyad// de nas rdzogs par gdon pa ni// phyag rgya bcas te sna bu ga nas// yungs kar gzhi las thams cad rdzogs// srog dang rtsol
319b7(rnying rgyud): pa las byung ngo // dzaHhU~M baM hoHshrI he ru ka a gad tA yA A gdA ta ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ bar+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ badz+ra DAk+ki ni na ne/ shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+hany+tsa ka hU~M phaT/ de nas/
319b8(rnying rgyud): rorab zhag/
320a1(rnying rgyud): mthang mthun pa ste// mthung rnam pa gsam yang du// rnaMs la bdag tung nganapas pan// gang dag bdag 'dzin partag/ mya 'bras 'dab A kan+ya// d+has gsas gyur kyang lus ngag yod// khams gsum nga gnas 'khor ba
320a2(rnying rgyud): su smran su
320a3(rnying rgyud): dusus na/
320a4(rnying rgyud): sa tog / ga mi / ga
320a5(rnying rgyud): 'dag pa gang pa thabs gnos/ da da rtson sa sa/ nas pa sa bdag 'di kyi kyis gnas/ ldan sa
320a6(rnying rgyud): sa page stobs ma dpa drugadapas can nobasas gan pa'is// bdang bdag sa 'du
320a7(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa btag tu ngag pas nyi/ pa mdos pa la 'a kyi sa / pa nyid byedags dngamakyis// mas pa de 'dags so// mig semams da
320b1(rnying rgyud): gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cing // rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi// thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang // thabs mkhas pa yi byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad bsrung bar mdzad// 'gro ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog/ gson po bde bar bar gcod pa// bdag
320b2(rnying rgyud): dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsod pa'i gshed po ni// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi dngos grub mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa des// kha nAM thod dbyug mi bzad pas// gshin rje bcom nas gsad par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrIHhe ru ka ma hA badz+ras
320b3(rnying rgyud): duSh+ka na/ sa ma ya mu dra pra b+hany+tsa kra ha na hUM phaT/ bdag po gdol pa drag po yi// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// lag pa g.yas g.yon ma thig ma ni// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod gnyis// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// de yang cung
320b4(rnying rgyud): zad bsnol ba'o// thal ba'i mdog la spa 'grengs pa// khong pa nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang// yan lag rin chen dur khrod rten// shes rab dgra s+thAs gshag par bya// dgra sta'i phyag rgya ha ha zhes// khong pa gshegs nas de nang du// b+h+rUM rat+na kha ta li byi hUM/ zhes
320b5(rnying rgyud): pas khang pa gzhal yas khang // gnyis su med par bsam par bya// de nas de nang 'jug pa ni// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdeg pos band dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba ni// yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye// hU~M phaT ma
320b6(rnying rgyud): tra ru dra phaT// de nas lcags kyi phyag rgyas btab// rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni// 'khor bcas khang par 'jug par bya// to tsa byad to No byang / ma nu da ra/ ud mad da/ shrI kA la la ye to tsa b+hang / pad+ma rak+ta da raM/ ung+ga da daM/ badz+ra da raM/ badz+ra ma hA mAM sa da raM/
320b7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i sngags de brjod nas ni// ha ha haM zhes brjod pa yi// sngags des sgo gnyis gcad par bya'o// de nas spyan yang drang pa ni// ye shes sman gyi spyod yul nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs//
321a1(rnying rgyud): gnas 'dir la lus gshegs su gsol// e h+ye ti b+ha ga wAn/ chu hU~M ba toH/ tsa lu ru lu/ rmA saN+Dot+tamar+the ti dr-i bya ho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM shrI he ru ka/ oM e badz+ra A ra li/ hrahraH/ de nas bstim pa 'di skad gsungs/
321a2(rnying rgyud): dang pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshung gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i dang las kyang // gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// brags rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje rdzogs
321a3(rnying rgyud): bdag dbang dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba dut+pan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra pe sha phaT/ A be shra a/ shrI/
321a4(rnying rgyud): he ru ka hrI phaT/ dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ shrI he drag pa hU badz+ra swa bduSh+TAn/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra ban tsa DA hUM phaT/ de nas las lo gzhag pa ni// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas
321a5(rnying rgyud): rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ke ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn/ sa ma ya ste/ a pa staM ba ka hUM phaT/ de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis// brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing // ye shes thugs/
321a6(rnying rgyud): rjes de dag la dgongs nas kyang // mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog rnams kun// paMdag la stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na/ sa ma ya ti/ k+Sha ya lAka tsit+ta/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas lha ni gtsang la dbab
321a7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// cho ga yang ni 'di skad gsungs// dam tshig pa la bzhugs pa yi// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dmachog tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// grub pa mchog dag ma su pan// phra gsung bregs dang 'gal ba'o// oM
321b1(rnying rgyud): byAdz+ye shrI he ru ka sa ma yat+te/ oM badz+ra ma dza zas ma la hUM/ oM badz+ra swa bya dr-i shAs ma ya phaT// sgra gsum phyag rgya 'ab bshad bya// phag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar// mthen drang gung mo rtse skad nas// phrin lag gnyis ni rab tu bsgob// badzu
321b2(rnying rgyud): por bkug/ thod pa skam po'i phyag rgya'o// snga ma bzhin du gnas pa la// srin lag mdzub mo'i nang du gzhug/ thod pa rlan pa'i phyag cu'o// lag gnyis sgrim pa ltar byas la// thod pa tshal zla'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa mdzub mo zlum por bya// g.yon
321b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdzub mo de la gtad// g.yas kyi mthe bong g.yon pa yis// mthe bong rgyab tshig dang por gtad// gzhan rnams thal sbar rtse thad pa// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya'i las 'di bca' ba yang // dmigs pa yod pas shes par bya'o//
321b4(rnying rgyud): de nas phyag kyang bya ba ni// he ru ka lnga la phyag 'tshal ba// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas gud stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug 'khor lo khyod la phyag
321b5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// bud+d+ha he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lun maH/ ye shes rdo rje sa nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra he ru ka ru lu ru lun
321b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen dbyings ltar nge 'dong kun bskang zhing // bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskul pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rat+na he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lu na maH/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad
321b7(rnying rgyud): ltar lu 'khrungs shing // lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags rgyal gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags pad+ma khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma he ru ke ha ha ru lurba lun maH// zin las rgya mthos 'gro ba'i
322a1(rnying rgyud): don mdzad cing // shes rab thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis brag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog ral gri khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// karma he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lun maH/ bdag med phyags bral don
322a2(rnying rgyud): dam thugs chung cing // byams dang snying rje dgra kun mi mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mi gnas mi dmigs chos sbyar dag pa las// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog gi skur ston pa// thugs
322a3(rnying rgyud): rje'i gzi ldan gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// bcom ldan// khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang gis khrol phyag 'tshal lo// / bros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dbang phyug sku la nyer
322a4(rnying rgyud): gnas shing // thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'gro ma// gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med rgya// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can
322a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul mo che// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyi grogs mdzad ma// gyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ban+da ni ka ra yA mi hUM/ a ti pu ho// pra ti dza haM a la la ho// de nas khro rgyal tshe rnams kyi// thim pa'i dkyil 'jar
322a6(rnying rgyud): rab bshad bya// mchod pa 'phul dang smon lam gdub// mchod pa bcu gcig dbul bar b+ha// phra men gar gyi mchod pa dang // sman gyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang // dngos grub bskul dang dngos grub blang // thugs dam bskang zhing bka' log bskal// ba
322a7(rnying rgyud): stobs skrag zil gtor ma bstod// phra men gar gyi mchod pa ni// phra men nyu le'i sngon tshul stabs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad dbyug thogs go rim// dam tshig dbyings mchog srul byed tse rim// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed phra mo hA// ma lus
322b1(rnying rgyud): thal zang na thags pat+tA lA// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mad da pran ste// dkrugs nas zhal drags la mdad \u0f7fs+thA nA~M// 'bar bas stang gsum steng byung tsaN+DakI// thugs rnaMs 'jig rten rjel mdang pra shaT+Ta// 'gro ba'i sdug pasngal gsod grangs/
322b2(rnying rgyud): ma// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sde 'joms b+ha g+ni ma// dur khrod bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms srig lnga// 'gro ba'i don grub las byed shA na ma// mgyogs ma snyogs pa'i las byed gr-i D+ha ma// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog kaM ka ma// yon tan yid bzhin bdag
322b3(rnying rgyud): hrIng+ga kA ka ma// 'gro ba'i don grub khrag 'thung u lA ma// badz+ra go rI ta/ badz+ra tsa rI ta/ badz+ra pa ma d+heH/ badz+ra be ta lI ha/ badz+ra brag s+t+rai ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da lI ta/ badz+ra lA ga nI ta/ badz+ra b+hasma rI ta/ badz+ra sid+ha mu khI ho/ badz+ra d+hA b+hI mu ShI he/ badz+ra sr-i ke la mr-i khI te/ badz+ra shwan ma
322b4(rnying rgyud): hi/ badz+ra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badz+ra kaM ka mu khI he/ badz+ra kA ka mu khI he/ badz+ra u lA mu khAM he/ nyon mongs gnas nas 'dren mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'ching mdzad phag gdang zhags pa ma// gnyis med dbyings su brtan par
322b5(rnying rgyud): gzhug mdzad 'jig rten lcags sgrog ma// ma lus rdul du rlog mdzad thal byed dri khu ma// badz+ra Arba te dza tang dza/ badz+ra mu khe hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu he// de nas sman mchod dbul bar bya// bla med dam rdzas rnam pa lnga// ye nas drug
322b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud rtsi ste// gnyis med dbyings su lhun gyis rdzogs// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// rtsu ba 'bum phrag bsam yas pa// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes
322b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyung drug sems can kun rtsol pa// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// thams cad daphred cing rdul 'a // sha chen mchad pa rin pa che// sadz+ra mo tog yang dag ldan// rdo rje chus bdud rtsi mchog/ gapur shel gyi spos pha rin/
323a1(rnying rgyud): den nan blag ltar 'bab pas// gnyis med la pa dartsal la bar 'dod// 'ag/ rkyen gyis brlabargyags la// da rba thAg/ thA k+Sha 9// dpral ldan padan na// phan d+ha nA nA/
323a2(rnying rgyud): shA rI dang // dpal chen bud+d+ha he n+ya dang // yum chen byad+d+ha kro d+hi dang // dpal chen raH he rba dang // ra d+hI thA rI dang // dpepa chen pad+ma hA rba dang // pad+ma krod+b+ha shwa rI dang // dpal chen be A te nu dang // da~M shwa krod+d+he shwa rI la// dam tshig mchog sa
323a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'bral// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// thal ba'i dngos grub bdag la sbrul// oM ni maHsi rbe ta thA ga ta a b+h+rUM pat+ti ts+tshi na// dpal chen ma pa me rdo rje dang // mtshogs dpeng phyag 'khor gyi med// thob mun pa bcu rnams dang // kham
323a4(rnying rgyud): chen mo bcu rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// ba zhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a r+g+haM r+tha tIts+tsha ha// gau rI la sogs bzhi rnams dang // prak+ka la sogs bzhi rnams la// da
323a5(rnying rgyud): chag mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod pa// phral ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsal// i na maHsarba ta thA bA ta oM d+hi prA d+hI dz+yoto// sa~M d+ha la sogs pa kyi rnams dang // gr-iD+ha la sogs bzhi rnams la// dmachog mchog gi mchod pa bra'o//
323a6(rnying rgyud): bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngas grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi prad+d+hAd+hata// d+hag dang la sogs bzhi rnams dang // dus gsum rdo rje sleb dpon dang // mched dang lham rdul sngar 'das la// dam tshig mchog gis
323a7(rnying rgyud): pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgas mdzod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la byol// namaHsarbad thA ga ti ma hA a d+hI rmA hrI b+h+yaH// yang ni mya rabs blo la dgangs// 'di skad yang ni bskur te gsungs// tshogs tshe tshogs bdag dpal chen ka
323b1(rnying rgyud): 'brar ba'i tshul pa khrag 'thub rnarnams dang // dpa' chen sba la gnyis mang ldan gyur ba'i// kro b+h+rUM pa rI 'bar ba'i yum rnams la// dmachog bdud rtsi dmanas mnyes ma chad 'brur// thugs ches dgangs dbang dang dngos grub rgyal// maHsan ta thAg
323b2(rnying rgyud): ar+g+haM prad+d+hets+tsha shrI padz+ra bA hi/ mthing ga'i mchag rnams rdo rje gsang ba'i \u0f7f// deng brtag ta nas 'byin pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// keT ri la sogs ma ma brgyad rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dmangs mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rdo ches dgangs dab
323b3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pashrI ts+yai hrI ny+tsa ste// za byed mgo brnyan rdo rje mtsho gsheg can// dam log bgegs kyi steng la 'dren mdzad ma// sid+ha la sogs phra men brgyang rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul//
323b4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub rtsal// na maHsan ta thA ga ta ad+hi dr-i ts+tsha hrI pa sh+ma \u0f7fti/ ti ra'i snying 'dren 'ching sdom dbang spyad ma// rtag dong la sogs sgom bzhi rnams la// de mchog bdud rtsi dmardzas mnyes mchod 'bral// thugs rje rjes
323b5(rnying rgyud): dgangs dbang dang dngos gral stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya bA Sh+Ta shrI bar+d+ha khA ha~M/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i glong dkyil na// 'jigs byed chen po khra ba'i tshogs rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyis mtshang 'bul// thugs rdo rjes dgongs
323b6(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pra tIts+tsha hrI bsu khA ti// blo rgyal sgra la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum// snyems ma la sogs khro mo'i tshogs rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dem rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs/
323b7(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dngos bu bkrol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ad+hi pra Sh+ma shI la grwa d-i N+Di/ dpal gyi 'khor tshogs badz+ra A nga li// mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro ma sring rgya mtsho la// rnam dang / bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyis mchod 'bral// grags rjes btsor dgongs dbang
324a1(rnying rgyud): dun / sa/ na pa nga grugs na bras su dun/ ga/ smam// ma gas sa sa // gas
324a2(rnying rgyud): ga ya ba ngas thab stsom// oMn sarba ta ga ta ma pa na d-i Sh+Thate/ sdom la gnas dang rig 'ang thub pa ga// lha dang kun ci gzugs bcu rdul 'azur la// nim dag bdud rtsigyi dpangs mnyas mtshad 'bru'o// theg sa rje
324a3(rnying rgyud): nga byab ma/ na ma hA/ dgagasus ma pas // pa na ba pa// smra sa //

324a5(rnying rgyud): 'a sa sa/ 'a ba nga ga sa

324a7(rnying rgyud): pa 'dzul/ mamam mi rdzog / nga tha za ba ba / la ma ma ga sa ma pa
324b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin rlabs mad paH// ny-i du ni bdag la stsal// lha mang mchog nardal// rardzacan gyis bskams te// bdud rtsa lnga ru snar ba na// zas na byang chub gsum thab 'byar// kA mA d+ha ya// b+hak+kas r+b+ba mA/ sad+d+hat+ma/ de nas grags
324b2(rnying rgyud): dam pa sang ba ni// hUM mdzad hU~M gi thugs dam pa sang ba ni// lung lor bcas pa'i pad+ma brtul// tshe 'dzin srog dang dmar chen dam pas bkang// pad+ma zil tig dri dang raka ba la// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pa a a mr-i ta// sha chen mkha'i lding shel spang gzus
324b3(rnying rgyud): kyi chag/ sman chen lnga dang tshing dbyi lang se// sgrol dang sbyor gyi bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyis// ha ru ma bdun tha men tshogs bcas dang // rdo rje slob dpon lha tshogs gtso mchog rnams// mched dang lha mjal bral ba'i ging ka ra// mchod par bzhes la
324b4(rnying rgyud): mnyes nas dam tshig slongs// grub mchog 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje mche ba'i rgya bcings te// gtor ma la gtugs theng rgyal bya// bar+d+had tsung yangs zab pa dang // 'khor yug gtogs pa'i snod bcud 'di// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
324b5(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed bka' ba zhog rol cing dgyes// srid gsum rtse 'joms tri shUl// khams gsum rab tu dkrugs nas ni// za byed chen po'i zhil du yang // thugs rjes 'gro don yud la bstab// 'gro dang mi 'gro snod bcud kyis// 'dzag
324b6(rnying rgyud): rten khyang rdzas kun zan// dngos por gyur pa'i gnas 'di kun// ngas bstab khyed kyis yud la gsol// kha khA la laM sha ta ba ga ta/ a la la ha// ma hA par+dz+dza a mr-i ta kha raM khA haM/ zhes pas ma hA de ba dang // bkang zlog ma yi mchod pa bya// rgyud lnga'i sems
324b7(rnying rgyud): na dug lngar 'bar// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// khros pa'i thabyed bzhi yis bshig/ wa ma kho chen po yis// thabyad khas pa bzhis bshigs nas// bag chags ma lus rnam spyar phyi'o// nam mkha'
325a1(rnying rgyud): ba ba kyang cig// gal sod gas byung la sgra bstam// k+Sha A // ngan pa byad chen po la// gal dga' ma lus 'das pa dang / kham gsusum mas dbar \u0f7f// dkribag 'thung can mog// ngam
325a2(rnying rgyud): khrag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor ba'i khrag zhag 'thung bar byed// ma lus 'dod la ma chags shing // dam tshig la sdang bskal bar bya// ma hA tik+Sh+Na dz+wa la kha raM/ ma hA rak+Sha mun+ta dz+wa la kha raM/ ma hA kaM ni ri ti dz+wa la kha raM/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen
325a3(rnying rgyud): po'i gnas brgyad du// khrag 'thung yab yum spyan drangs pa// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing men gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi a r+g+haM rgya mtshor dkyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs mchod dang // ma lus bsnams nas bzhes su
325a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// kha kha khA ti khA hi/ kha raM khA hi/ sgeg pa dpa' ba 'azigs su rung ba dang // dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // ste rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs te// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur nas ni// rnal 'byor longs spyod mchog 'di bzhes su
325a5(rnying rgyud): gsol// zla ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// mAM sa la sogs ro mchog dpa' bo gsal// ma tsa me tse rak+ta ru ti ra// nye ba'i snying po ma lus bsrub 'tshal gyi// dri med gzi ldan mchod mchog sbyor ba 'di// ye shes lha tshogs rnams kyis bzhas su
325a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// rnam dag sgrib spangs srid gsum sgron thal ba'i// ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' ba// bcom ldan pa de gshegs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor can// khro bo'i tshogs chen ma lus thams cad la// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum//
325a7(rnying rgyud): shes rab lha mo rigs kyi yum la sogs// rnal 'byor grub dang rig 'dzin thams cad la// 'gro ba'i don phyir phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nam mkha' mnyam pa dang // bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis rab brgyan pa// yid
325b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin sumachog yon tan mtha' yas gtar// shes rab dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad dang // phyag brtan 'acu 'gro rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig mnga' bo tshal// dgyes pas rol pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhis
325b2(rnying rgyud): shig/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi khA ti/ de nas klu drug bstod par bya/ bruM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od bye k+Shi ma 'bum gyi gA bi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzang yag za byed che ho// d+haM/ rngam pa'i ro 'jug stong snga
325b3(rnying rgyud): tug tshom ri rab 'bum bkyil sbyar// a la ha la'i gang rgyangs che// byug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yong brgyan// hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig
325b4(rnying rgyud): laM ho// dri khro bo'i rgyal po spen chen po// thos pa'i dkyil 'khor cher chen 'babs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i thig le tshe ho// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdag po ste// bdud kyi bdud ste bcud rnams
325b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzums// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'dig zung ba// 'jigs byed chen po zag 'tshaH// rlung dz+nyA phrag chen srab bo// rdo rje rje brdzud chen po// rdorjes skye ban 'ab // rdo rlung ste 'thong mya to// denas smon lam gad papar bya//
325b6(rnying rgyud): ting spros pa med pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ldan// thun mong ma yin rnam par grol// ye shes chen po'i rol pa las// dran

326a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad du gsol// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// pho nya pho dang pho nya mo// ci bgyi'i bka' nyan thams cad dang // phyogs bcu'i gdung sob bde gshegs rnams// rdo rje'i slob dpon mched lham bcas// dgongs don
326a2(rnying rgyud): thugs dam rtse gcig tu// bka' gzhung bzhin du mdzad pa rnams// mkhyen pas byin brlab mdzad du gsol// rnal 'byor phrad kyi mchod pa 'di// chos nyid las ni chos nyid 'byung // kun rdzob tsam le brten byas nas// sprul par rol cing rnal 'byor
326a3(rnying rgyud): gyi// mchod pa longs spyod sbyar ba 'di// bdag nyid chen po 'khor bcas rnams// dbang gi 'tshal ma'i slad du ni// phud dang gtsang mar rab spags nas// dgang dang gus pa'i sems kyis ni// lha dang lha mo gar gyis blangs// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
326a4(rnying rgyud): gzhal med khang // chos dbyings mthar klas bkang nas dbul// gnyis med bde chen dang nyid du// dgyes pa chen pos lhun dgongs nas// ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang du rol// sku gsung thugs gter gzhes su gsol// mthol bshags dag tu gsol
326a5(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'dus rnams// gsang sngags gsang sgor khas blangs nas// dam tshig gnyen po mchos pa las// rtsa ba yan lag zhig ral rnams// shin tu gnod 'gyod mthol zhing bshags// bzod pa chen pos dang
326a6(rnying rgyud): bzhes la// tshangs pa yid bzhin stsal du gsol// dngos grub thob par gsol ba ni// thogs pa med pa'i shes rab dang // mi brjed gzungs dang mngon shes drug/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin rdo rje'i sku// g.yung dang tshe dang sku gsung thugs// mi zad
326a7(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni// dus 'dir 'thob par stsal du gsol// tshe 'dir mchog dang thun mong stsol// phrin las gsol bar zhu ba ni// yis kyi bdud dang mas kyi sra// mkhyen na srim du'i drung // bu che'i chungs dri ngan can// rnal 'gror dam pri
326b1(rnying rgyud): kag/ hrI n+das dbang dang drag pa dang // mnan thog las d+his 'jal ba dang // rdul ldan bzhin du bcom byas nas// sngang yang med par mdzad du gsol// sgrub pa'i bar chad ma dpung mdzad // danas bcom ldan 'das na sbya dza dag pa
326b2(rnying rgyud): bskul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam pa bcu yis rab tu bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang sman drang bstim mchod bstod/
326b3(rnying rgyud): bcu dkrug snang bskal mchod gnas su 'phang // rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed byung // yi ge b+ha las yongs su gyur pa ni// hUM rak+Sha shrI hi drug hU~M phaT/ rdo rje sri po dbu gu phyag bco brgyad// zhabs brdung ngur khrod rdzas ldan par
326b4(rnying rgyud): bskyed// e ka rdo tri badz+ra ma hA bo d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ gtso dang mdog mthun sgra la 'phel ba'i yum// yab phram gnyis med mkha' gsang byin parlabs nas// de nas khro bo sngags kyis bskyed pa ni// hU~MT/ hUM ta/ b+h+yo kog/ dz+ra dang / hU~M gr-i ts+tsha kong/ dzA ya/
326b5(rnying rgyud): dz+dza/ 'jab snre 'i rnams las// ngad 'dzis rdza y-i ba sum brje/ ngam lda nga mam la// dz+dzaHla dang trA las// ha~M thulas nis brji dang // ming cingams bye// denas ldan pa ba /
326b6(rnying rgyud): brdo dum gcig ca ni// bad+ma'i zag rgyad dpal bar bcings// zab shig gcer zur mchong zhing rgyug/ rdo rje drug pa shings nas sra// g.yab mo lngas ya gal bab \u0f7f// de nas dkyil khong gzug par brtag/ gzug pa'i dmatsha
326b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rkye ni// las tsa phyag rgyad mchagaH// rma brda'adas chag phyag rgyas bstim// mchod pa dam tshig rgyag rgya na// ral pa gar gyi tshe mngams kyang// rkyen d+ha'i phyag tung ba ba casaH// nga lnga rgya sha ta bi ga ta/ al la // ma hA ba d+ha mam+baH
327a1(rnying rgyud): kha ra yo gi nI/ kha ri ta ki ni// a la la ho/ b+ha ga wAn kha kha khA/ e mchos te e ma chos// e ma chos kyi don byung ba// chos don 'gag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// rdo rje rgyal por
327a2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// dpal chen ye shes khyad par sa bcur bzhugs// dbang phyug mnga' mdzad stobs bcus zil gyis gnon// dge bcus dregs byed nga rgyal sbyi nas 'joms// stobs bcus brjing gnon phyogs bcur rol pa
327a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid dang gis khro la phyag 'tshul lo// zos pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pra ho// // a la la ho// de
327a4(rnying rgyud): nas bstod par byang ni// sngags dang tshig tu bstod pa yin// tA krIm/ ta k+She ma/ ta ka ma/ got+ta ma/ kaka~M/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba y-i// 'od zer 'gro 'ad+ma'i klong da lan// gakhro mo rnams bzhugs pa// skrani cir yang 'gyur ba gzugs/
327a5(rnying rgyud): bla kham nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil bas sring rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khro gnyer sngar mig ni// log par blta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan// mche bzang yag gtsigs pa ni// skye bzhi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs/
327a6(rnying rgyud): byams pa'i 'od zer glog ltar 'gyu// sprul pa thog thog char bzhin 'bebs// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// tsham rngams chen po bdud la ston// kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad// dam tshig can la dngos grub stso lnga// 'khyil zhing rgyan yang
327a7(rnying rgyud): 'grel ba la// sems can chos pas the mi mnga'// ska las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags// de nas sgrol ba'i las bgyid na// mok+Sha mdun du bkug byas la// de nas 'dzin ging 'di skad gsungs/
327b1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// bstan pas 'dul ba'i snod ma yin// ma chags pas ni sdig re che// gsad pa kho nar bya ba'i 'os// lus kyi dbyung ba lnga po ni// khrag 'thung lnga yi zhal du bstab// sems kyi bag chags mi dge brgya// khro bo chen po
