327b5(rnying rgyud): sgrol// thugs dam nyid cis rgol ba la// ma byas bskul ba ci zhig 'tshal// bsgral ba'i 'dul skal lags pas bzhes// gnyis su med pa'i zhing du sbyor// oM badz+ra ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsu hU~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha da ma/
327b6(rnying rgyud): shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA yI he ru ka ma ha tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha btsahU~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri sarba duSh+TA na hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha be tsa hUM hU~M hU~M swAhA/ oM ma hA sUN+ya rad+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa re
327b7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ oM dr-i ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA sa/ sarba shAn te ka han dag phaT/ e d+hiHmu ta sam ta pad+ma ma g+ha kro d+hi shwa khA hi hU~M phaT/ oM ka rdza ma hA thA he ru ka ma hAnaN+Da sarba drathA da ta gtan da ha parbahU~M d+hu T+Te ShaT/ oM sarba a mo b+h+ra ma~M hA dr-i d+hA ShA ba yA /
328a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyis ba ga // shes pas bad+hAb pa dang // dal di da ladU rgyal// dadz+ha rma dkyil 'apo d+ha// bdag 'du pa d+hag zung rdzas la// thugs myo dang sa grab thob bya'i phyir// khams nA
328a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa bsgral bar gnang // pud+ma'i pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// chags pa'i bag chags zang byas la// gsung gi dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// pad+ma'i dbyings su sbyor bar gnang // rin chen po zang dkyil 'khor 'dir// nga rgyal rnam rtog zang byas la//
328a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// che ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par gnang // rgya gram po thang dkyil 'khor 'dir// zag rig rnam rtog zad byas la// zin las dngos brub 'thob pa'i rdzing// las rnams rgya mtshos sgrol bar gnang // brdeg
328a4(rnying rgyud): pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// rmongs pa'i bag chags zad byas la// sgra yi dngos grub 'thob bya'i glir// chos sku'i dkyil 'khor rtogs par gnang // zhes pas gnang ba sbyin/ de nas ging gis nok+Sha bteg/ mtshams med las kyis dmyal bar 'gro//
328a5(rnying rgyud): dAm nya mra rdo rje dmyal bar gnas// thar lam 'di las gzhan med pas// bde ba grol ba'i lam du shog/ ces pas bstab par bya'o// de nas sbyang bar bya ba yang // mok+ta'i lhas ni bsreg spad bya// lhag mthong me 'bar 'od 'phros dug gsum bsku
328a6(rnying rgyud): hU~M / mtshan ma'i ma bras brtson 'grus rlung gis gtor/ chags dran sdug bsngal ni gnas chu yis bkrupa// / de nas lus la dgang pa ni// yad+d+hi su d+hi b+he ru/ hU~M b+h+rUM mAM dz+haiMtrAM/ oM AhU~M swAhA/ spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa stong // lA b+hA
328a7(rnying rgyud): ni rkang mthil du'o// muM las 'od 'gros a laM rnam rtog bsreg/ muM raM a phaT/ hUM las 'od 'phros su yi rnam rtag bsreg/ hUM ri su phaT/ AM las 'od 'phros nr-i yaM rnam rtog bsreg/ A~M r-i nr-i badz+ra/ oM las 'od 'phros rje yi rnam rtog bsreb//
328b1(rnying rgyud): hri lang/ lcas 'phrong khros rnam rtog bsreg/ d+hir bri phaT/ thAlas 'dra 'bras bu yin ma tog bsreg/ hA da ngu phaT/ de ltar smyan ga tsa dgug pa// a drug 'od 'phros b+hA stang du// ta las 'od zerang rab 'phros pas// rdo rje rgya bram b+hag rgyas
328b2(rnying rgyud): gtug/ oM dz+dza kri k+Shi ti be dza ya s+pha ra s+phar hUM/ brjod pas phyag mtshan drug gi gzungs// skyes dbugs lus gnas drug nas 'byung // sgo gcod rigs drug phyag mtshon 'bar// khyed drug 'khor gnas mi gtong bar// rigs drug dkyil
328b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'de dbyings bsdu// nyams dang gang sngags mthong snang rmi// sems lus ngag yul bag chags rnams// gnas skyongs sum cu tham par spyad// de nas gnas gzhom yongs bsgral ba// muM bdag nyid bsam gtan rang bzhin pas//
328b4(rnying rgyud): le lo ga yang bzhi par byed// sbyong nyid rang bzhin rtogs bya'i phyir// lha rnams byang chub rdo rjes bsgral// hUM bdag nyid ye shes tshul mchog ste// nga dang bdag 'dzin dbyings su sbyor// me long ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// lha min zhe sdang
328b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes bsngal// AHbdag nyid tshul khrims rang bzhin te// las dang nyon mongs dag par byed// gsung rab rgya mtsho rtogs bya'i phyir// mi rnams 'dod chags rdo rjes bsgral// oM bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// rmongs
328b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gti mug zhi bar byed// chos dbyings ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// byol song gti mug rdo rjes bsgral// tri bdag nyid sbyin pa'i rang bzhin te// bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel// mnyam nyid ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// yi dwags pa
328b7(rnying rgyud): rgyang grobs skal// snangabadag nyid brtson 'grus rang bzhin te// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// bya ba don rnams bsgrib pa'i phyir// dkyil khams phrag dog rdo rjes bsngal// tri bi Sham+ba pa / pa
329a1(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaT/ sarba dun sa rba ka mAkle shad+d+ha phaT/ mtho mthas rba ti drug gte hu~M dz+nyA phaT/ pa tso ba tsos rba pro ta ka ga tita tu d+hu phaT/ da ta da ha sarban dka ga ti \u0f85 hu~M d+hA phaT/ rigs drug dag ga phyag mtshan la// sangs rgyal rigs drag phyag
329a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan bzung // khro bo bzlas bskal dgod pa ni// mgo la hUM mdzad chen po ste// dpral bar rnam par bral pa yan// Sha ru ta yA shrI ba te// khams ga/ sum lag pa g.yas par yin// g.yon par dbyug pa ston pa ste// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa snying gang bste// lci bar/
329a3(rnying rgyud): ya mAn+ta kasta// rkang g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yon pa mi g.yo mgon po ste// mtha ba la gsang bar bsdu// de nas yig 'bru bcu bkod de// bskyed cing spro bsdu byas pa yin// hrI las 'od 'phros log par g.ye swa pa bcom// thos pa'i dbang
329a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rdo rdo b+huk+Sha ra// d+h+r-i nAM/ d+haM kA ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ klong las 'od 'phros ma byin len pa bsreg/ yo byang dbang stsol gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// kro raM/ a pa ra do ta a b+hi Shodz+dza trAM/ raM las 'od 'phyos log par lta pa bcom// lce la dbang mdzad phran tshul mi ga
329a5(rnying rgyud): mgon// re ra~M/ Ar+yA a tsa la a d+hi \u0f7ftrAM/ klong las 'od 'phros srog gcod sgrib pa bsre// tshol dbang grol 'dig byed gshin rje'i gshed// klong daM/ yam+b+har+d+ha ta kA a b+hi ShiHhUM/ ta las 'od 'phros rngan gyi sgron rnams bsreg// ye shes dbang stsol dbyug
329a6(rnying rgyud): pa blon po can// tA r-i nI ladaN+Da a m+be/ dzi las 'od 'bros tha ma'i sgrib pa bsreg/ chos la dbang stsol hA ya grA wA dpal// hr-i / he ya sI la a ti'i d+had+haM/ tsa las 'od 'gros 'khye 'i sgrib pa bsreg/ sems la dbang srol 'dod pa'i jo bo kAl
329a7(rnying rgyud): tsar k+ki d+hA dza e b+hiSh+TiHhU~M/ yu~M las 'od 'phros dag rlung sleb pa 'breg/ las la dbang sgrol bdud rtsi dz+ha la// a / a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a b+hi Shir+thad+h+waM/ tha las 'od 'bros gnod sems pa bcom// rdzu 'phrul 'a la 'jig byed ngo bas /
329a8(rnying rgyud): ga pa
329b1(rnying rgyud): k+Sha raM/ ma hA ba la a d+hi Shiny+tsadz+dza/ pr-i las 'od 'bros brnab sems nyes pa bcom// smon lam dbang grol 'angam skyes su d+hA lI// b+hair/ ka ma li kut+kA li a b+hi Sha dz+yaSh+TaM/ de nas phyag rgya brgyang dgo de// snying la dkar mo gau rim// mgo la rkun ma byar ma/
329b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon rmongs mo pra mo hA// lag gA yon thal byed be d+hA k+She// lag g.yas gros mo suk+ka sI// rkang g.yas sme sha tsaN+Da lI// po mtshan gtum mo g+ha s+tha NI// kha la mtshogs sA sha nI// las 'od 'phros ma drin bag chags bsreng// go d+ha / tsaM la
329b3(rnying rgyud): 'ong 'phros log par blta ba bcom// tse hrI / pra las 'od 'phros ngag gi sgrib pa bsreg/ pra mo ta ri/ khaM las 'od 'thos log par len pa bcom/ be ta li raM/ gu las 'od 'phros log pa'i las rnams bsreg khyod spro pa ri las 'od 'phos log par 'cha ba bcom/ g+ha s+tha d+hi raM// li las
329b4(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros log par rtsol ba bcom/ tsaN+Da lI ra~M/ ni las 'od 'phros 'khrul rtog rtse gcig bcom// sma shA nI raM/ dur khrod gnas kyi ma brgyad kyis// log par blta ba brgyad bcom mo// de nas bod kyi gong bu de// spyi bor bsdus te 'di skad gsungs// gang
329b5(rnying rgyud): mchog thams cad stobs kyi so rngam// rnam rtog bag chags sregs shig oM mr-i ta// dam tshig las kyis sgrol cig karma // bde chen dbyings su sdoms shig mu tig baM// a tsan+da maN+Da la/ ma sun maN+Dale/ sa ma ya t+ta ra ka rma badz+ra/ badz+ra mu ti be// zhes pa
329b6(rnying rgyud): don rnams ma lus pa// lha mo bzhi la las bkrol lo// de nas bskal bar tha ba yang // de dang 'dra' bya ba ni// srid pa yongs bskal ting 'dzin yang // rnal 'gyur ba yis yang dag bye// lhag mthong me chen bskal pa'i bag chags bsreg/ rat+na te rbakar/
329b7(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus rlung gi bskal pas mtshan ma gtor// kam he ru ka ye/ zhi gnas chu yi 'azhal pas dbyings su bkrus// par+b+ba he ru ka khaM/ chol dbyings nam mkha'i bskal pas dbyings su bzhim// ba srogs gan ye/ gzung 'dzin sa yi bskal pas
330a1(rnying rgyud): phyag gyur ba sgrubs// badz+ra ta tsu ka laM/ kA ya thAH/ hoH/ badz+ras twA r+m+mAH/ rat+na d+hA / padz+ra d+hA / tA thAg tA dang / drag po'i las kyis bskal ba rnams// 'khor ba'i lam ma sgo bcud dngade// nam shes rdzogs bsdus nas ni// 'og
330a2(rnying rgyud): min bla med gnas mchog na// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems me dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phangs// khams gsum yongs bsgral de dus na// yongs la sbyar ba shes par bya// bde ba bzhis ni
330a3(rnying rgyud): kun khyab bo// de nas gling la 'di skad gsungs// khyod ni pho nya gi nga ka ra// ka tar sngon po 'di lor la// a b+hi ra dza gnas bstod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang skur cig/ 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// pradz+nyA tIk+Sh+Na d+hI/ raM gyis bsregra shi
330a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bsdus// hr-i raM/ rma dkyil bzhag ste ho yis g.yeng // a ho yi// phaT gyis 'phangs te dbyings su bstim// slar na phaT/ bde ba chen po'i gnas su bkod// ma hA su khar+dz+dza/ de nas ging gis 'di skad gsungs// mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhi
330a5(rnying rgyud): las// gzugs snang rtog pas rnam par bsgribs// bag chags ma lus kun sbyar gyir// khams gsum thams cad bskal bar bya// nga ni za byed chen po ste// sems can thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// ma grub
330a6(rnying rgyud): phyir yang gtub pa'i rdzas// ma rungs 'dod larab chags shing // dam tshig la sdang dgra bgegs rnams// snying rje byang sems ldan pa yis// ngo mthon stod kyis bsgral bar bya// pra be sha phaT/ sngags kyis brjod nas tsat+ta bzung // de rnams ti
330a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// bde gshegs gsang ba'i sgo rtse nas// rig pa'i me tog lha la 'phen// gtso bo bsgrub pa'i lhar babs na// lha yi dngos grub don du slong // don dam chos sku'i ye shes gzhug/ mtha' bral chos nyid skye po rtog sa// rtogs pa'i
330b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sngags la bstar// de yang rnam pa gcig tu yang // ye shes dbyings su gzhug pas gzung ba ster// sbyor ba ljags la bstar bas 'dzin pa spong // gzung 'don gnyis med don dam thugs su chud// rtogs nas sprul pa' 'gro dan phyogs
330b2(rnying rgyud): bcur mdzad// de nas 'di skad kyang gsungs pa// khro gtum tshad med byams par snang // gsod chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid ste// bsgral zhing bstab pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// nga rgyal dregs sems kun bskal
330b3(rnying rgyud): lha bdud btsam// gzugs ni bshig dral phung po'i rnam rtog bcom// sha za zug 'thung rus 'cha' nyon mongs bcom// de nyid ma skyes ma byung skye shi med// de nas ging gi tsham rngams 'jug/ phyag rgya 'byung ba'i tsham rngams chas// lha rnams ster
330b4(rnying rgyud): gsal phyug rgya bya// oM shrI he ru ka hUM/ a a a/ phyag rgya de dang 'dra ba ni// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang // bcu gcig phyag rgya bcings byas te// so so'i rung sngags 'di bzlas so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra gardza gardza hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+phoT hUM
330b5(rnying rgyud): phAH/ oM badz+ra ma d+hU bi dza yA hi nA han d+ha phaT/ oM ba dz+ra kro d+ha mI la da d+hA da ta da ta k+She paT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ya A n+ta ka pa tsa paH swA phaT/ a badz+ra krad+ha An+ta a tsa la ban+d+ha badz+nyA hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra lo d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu rba lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-i d+hi A pa N+Di k+sha Sh+Ta hU~M phaT/ oM ba krod+ha a rbe te tran bi ts+tsho su~M dz+hi \u0f7f
330b6(rnying rgyud): oM dzadz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ma hrIT+Ta b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ lag pa thal gyur gyen du bslang // rkang pa mthil spyir thur du gzug/ tshe sna chen bzhi yang bcag par bya// mgo dang mtshan mi snying por brtag/ rdo rje rje gcig rje dgra dang // bcu gcig tu ninam btags te/
330b7(rnying rgyud): 'di dri khrig 'theng chen po yi// phyag rgya yin par rgyal pos bshad// lag pathal thang gyen dung phreng // rkang pa phral nas brkyang 'brum pazhin// gom pa'i skabs kyis ga byed cing // rang drug phyag rgya yin// rkang pa'i 'brel ni mnan pa'i phung //
331a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ lag pa thal nas gar byed cing// mnan mtshangs stabs tha byed pa'i// stobs po che sa phyag rgya yod// rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas lnga 'khrud// lag pa gar stabs bskor nas no// thal modag par bdeb pa ni// rnam par gyur/
331a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis// mthe'u glang sen mo mthil du mnan// gde pa'i sbubs su bsgreng ba ni// dbyug skyon can gyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// brdeg pa'i stabs su gde pa dang // g.yon pa
331a3(rnying rgyud): dmyal brten pa ni// gshen rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yis// gdab pa'i stabs su gde pa dang // g.yon pas 'don pa ltar byed pa// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar nas kyang // gung mo nang du
331a4(rnying rgyud): bsnol bar bya// mthe bong gnyis kyang thal te bsgreng // spyi bor bzhag ste rta yi rgya// rkang pa g.yas pa thur du gzug/ lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bskyed// g.yon gyi rkang lag phyag rgya ni// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur
331a5(rnying rgyud): brten te// rkang pa bshibs te mchongs pa ni// bdud sde 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang // rkang pa brkyang bsgo mi byed pa na/ khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar ni// mgon po dpa' bos yang dag bshad// lag
331a6(rnying rgyud): pa g.yas gang thug pa dang // lus kyang drag tu gsig pa ni// ngo rje tha men ma rnams kyi// phyag rgya yin zhes 'dren pas bshad// de ltar tsha ma jam byas pa las// yig 'bru bcu las 'od 'phros pas// mi dge bcu rnams rnam par dag/ de nas tha men ma
331a7(rnying rgyud): babyung gyi// skyabs dang phyag rgya 'byon tshul byas// lag par brta ba brgyad bcom mo// de nas rtags dang ldan par bsgral// yu ma ni mdun du 'dug pa la// gnyis su med par sbyor bar bya// dang po bde ba bsnyen pa la// mchog tu ba'i bzhi bsnyen te// ngal
331b1(rnying rgyud): bA'i bde bgrub pa la// sgrub chen lhan cig skyes pa ste// mkha' dbyings grags kyu'i phyag rgyas drangs// yab yum byung sems dbang bskur te// dang por dag pa srabs// sangs rgyas spyan gyi bum dbang bskur// de nas gshar ba chu yin te//
331b2(rnying rgyud): kI yi cod pan gdags// de nas dro ba me yin te// gos dkar mo yi rdo rje'i dbang // de nas g.yo ba rlung yin te// sgrol mas dril bu'i dbang yang byin// thig le nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i sar bsgral lo// srid pa'i 'khor
331b3(rnying rgyud): los log pa'i lam// 'khor brgyan gcod mya ngan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags// gdan du 'khor los mtshan pa yin// An+ta tsakra hUM/ mnyam nyid rdo rje dbang phyug gis// stong nyid seng+ge'i sla baspags te// bdud bzhi rab tu bcom
331b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags// mi 'jig se ng+ge 'i khri la bzhugs// sing gadzam pa la bi ma la hir+t+ti hUM/ mya ngan mi 'da' rdo rje'i ngang // nyon mongs mi spang gos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// oM badz+ra padz+ra ston pa sha
331b5(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM/ zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas te// 'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug rtags// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas ni// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// oM s+'uHhU~M/ dz+dza a/ gdan rnams de yi steng dag tu// sngags bzlas rigs lnga'i sgrar
331b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed do// 'chi ba med par grog dran pas// rdo rje'i srog ni thung lta bu// gang dag bsgral ba rdo rje'i tshe// phye shi med pa'i sa la bkod// de nyid sras kyi dang por ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i khyod kyis stabs// thAbs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa'o// de nas ye shes
331b7(rnying rgyud): lngas byin pakru// rnam par shes pa'i tsho gas brgyad bskyung // sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lngas kyang dbang bskur la// ma lus thams cad lhar bsgyur ro// de nas bskur byas yi ge yi// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dbang bskur ro// de nas/
332a1(rnying rgyud): stobs gang dag gis ni// sha dang khrag dang rtsu pa gsum// khyer nas bsgrub pa 'di skad gsungs// khrag ni 'dod chags bde ba ze// khyod kyi zhe sdang gsal ba che// shan gti mug me rtog che// rgya ni drag gsum dganas
332a2(rnying rgyud): kyang // khams gsum 'khor ba las grol nas// 'bras bu sku gsum thob par mdzod// zhal du bstab po kha raM khA hi// de nas slob dpon 'di skad gsungs// da ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral par bya// gdul dka' ma lus dbul ba'i
332a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// de nas khog pa du dz+rod kye// gnas brgyad brtsigs par bya ba yang // skub chen la sogs gzhan mi bya// byas na zhag bdun khrag phyug 'chi// rtogs ldan skyab gnas dur khrod mnan// shes rlom 'phral sdang kun byed
332a4(rnying rgyud): pa// ma bdun za la ma zhag bdun 'chi// rnam shes tsit+tan da kAn// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi dngos grub mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngams pa des// zod dbyug chen po mi bzad pas// gshirdo rje btul te bsad nas su// ro yang lho yi 'dzum gling du/
332a5(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po brgyad du brtsigs// de ltar de bzhin bdag gis ni// pha la bus ni byas pa bzhin// 'di lus dur khrod gnas su 'bul// 'di yi lus sgying ma ga d+ha// dur khrod chen po bsil tshal du// ma mo chen mo go'u rim// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du
332a6(rnying rgyud): 'bul// mkhas la snying stobs che ba yi// dngos grub chen po stsal du gsol// 'di yi mgo'o phyogs kyi// sing+ga la li gling phran la// ma mo chen mo tse'u ri mA// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// mthong thos rnam par 'phrul bag gi// dngos grub dam
332a7(rnying rgyud): bsngal drugasol// 'di yi lag g.yas gang rgya mtshams// bal yul ni mun hU~M// du slong rkyen po'i rgyad du 'bral// lhag par zas kyi dngos 'byod ba'o// dngos thab dam pa phrul dugasol// 'di 'i lagag po ni nub mtshams//
332b1(rnying rgyud): rgalan bai t+tani// dra bathong zin po'i rgyan du 'phrul// phyagan rdo rje'i ma sa pas sgrol// 'dri yi nang g.yas cung shang marnams// lde 'i ru la na tsatwA thA// drang yod chen po'i slad du rtsal// yongs spyod 'khyod ldan dngos grub thal// 'di la drang
332b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon nub kyang mtshams// ka ni ka mthun phra mo hA// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// bde skyid ldan pa'i dngos grub sgrol// 'di yi pho mtshan byang phyogs na// u rgyan yul na g+ha sa ma ri// dur khrod chen po'i rkyen du 'bul// grub pa ltung ba'i dngos
332b3(rnying rgyud): grub rtsol// bzhag sha khog sha la sogs pa// thams cad lo ka'i dur khrod na// s+thA sha ni yi rgyan du 'bul// las rnams kun gyi dngos grub stsol// zhes pas dur khrod khang brtsig go// de nas phung po lnga po rnams// mchod par bye ba 'di gsungs so//
332b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// gzugs mchog glang po'i gdan khri 'bul// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa dang // stobs bcu'i dbang rnams rtsal du gsol// bcom ldan rnam par sdang mdzad la// gzug mchog seng ge'i gdam khri 'bul// s+ya yi byin
332b5(rnying rgyud): rlabs rgya mtsho dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yi dbang rnams stsol// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas la// gzugs mchog rma b+ha'i gdan khri 'bul// gsung rab rgya mtsho 'chad pa dang // dbang bcu'i dngos grubaskal du gsol// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung gad
332b6(rnying rgyud): la// gzugs mchog rta yi gdan khri 'bul// yon tan rgya mtsho'i byin rlabs dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dngos grubasgol// bcom ldan don yod grub pa la// gzugs mchog mkha' lding gdan khri 'bul// zin las rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang /
332b7(rnying rgyud): thogs med las bzhi'i dngos gru stsol// sa dang chu dang ma dor rlung // nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba lnga// sangs chus spyarba dang mA ma kI// na bzang dkar dang dam tshig sgrol// kun tu bzang po la sogs pa// rigs cigs mchod 'di 'bul gyi//
333a1(rnying rgyud): dgyur gzugs kyi dngos grub sgrol// de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas rnams// rang gis longs kyang spya par bya'o// dang po zhal zas lha la bskyab// dkris mchog nye bar rtsod pa yi// rdo rje bdung rtsi'i zhal zas 'di// pad+ma
333a2(rnying rgyud): ma med pa ltar// rgyal ba rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// zhes pas lhal dbul bar bya'o// de nas pa byed zhal nyam gyi// mdzod pa dag kyang bya ni// rnal 'byor nang pa'i zhal stong ni// khong pa den chen gzhal yas 'di// de na dkyil 'khor lha bkod la/
333a3(rnying rgyud): zhal yang hom khur bsreg khang du// ye shes che ba'i me sbar te// lce nI las su bya ba yi// lha rnams so so'i bzugs gnas la// lo ru pa rin chen gzhal yas khang // dbus kyi gtso bo nas brtsams te// lha yi dkyil 'khor rI ma bzhin du// bsreg khang pa
333a4(rnying rgyud): gnas spyan drangs te// lag pa rdo rje'i hom gzang dang // 'dod pa'i zhwa mo'i bsreg rdzas su// bdud rtsi'i hom du bstim pa'i tshe// so ni ye shes mes bcom nas// dkan dang lpags kyi dbang pod ngo // spyan drangs rang bzhin gang yid bstim// ma
333a5(rnying rgyud): pa bla med lam drangs te// khong pa rin chen gzhal yas khang // de yi nang du lha rnams mchod// ba kru'i phyogs su gzi brjid ni// me 'bang zin las rnam pa bzhis// 'gro ba'i don yang brtsam par bya'o// dkyil 'khor b+ha ni re re la// ging gis
333a6(rnying rgyud): bsreg rdzas gsum gsum bsgrub// bsta pa'i tshig dang sngags rnams ni// lha yi rim pa dag drang phung// bu gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes bya// de yang ngas ni khyed rnams la// rab tu gsal ba pang bshad na// 'bang ba'i bsreg khong na la hom du// pe
333a7(rnying rgyud): shes mche ba'i me 'bar te// 'og min lha yi gzhal yas nas// dkyil khor lha rnams spyan drangs te// dbus bad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs// lag pa hom gzang bsreg rdzas stong // dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// zhal du gyur ba'i tho bos la/
333b1(rnying rgyud): bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyi// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// dkyil 'khor lha rim zhal hom mchod// dbyibs kyi bzhugs tshul rigs kyi mdog/ mtshan gyi khyad par lha rnams kyi// so so'i rim bzhin bdag bsgoms te// mchod pa shes rab
333b2(rnying rgyud): can gyis bya// zhal zas kham ni ran par gtub// phyag rgya lag pa rdo rje'i gang // ho ma gzar bskor te zhal bsta pa tshe// lha rnams mtshan nas brjod cing bskul// 'brim mkhan g.yas brims lha tshogs mchod// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'grangs//
333b3(rnying rgyud): kun la phan pa'i sman yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yi// thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// phyi rabs kyis ni don bzhir shes// mchod pa'i gnas dang yon tan dang // ci phyir mchod dang mchod pa'i rdzas// mchod par bya ba'i
333b4(rnying rgyud): rdzas dag ni// rang la rgyan cing gzabs pa ste// rgyan lnga dag tu shes par bya// nang rgyan gyi yi chas rgyan dang // mdzes pa lus la bkod pa lha// gyi na rlabs sprul pa'i rkyen lnga'o// bza' ba rngam pa lnga po la// ye shes dbyings la bza' ba dang // dbyings ni
333b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes la bza' dang // dbyings dang ye shes bag chags bza' // thugs rjes 'khor ba'i sems can bzang // rngam zhal dus gsum bag chags bza'// rngam pa'i zhal du za ba ni// phun tshogs bzhi dang dkyil 'khor lnga// phun sum tshogs pa rnam bzhi ni// nyo ma
333b6(rnying rgyud): khung phun tshogs rnam dag zhal// ye shes phun tshogs choms 'bar me// mchod pa phun tshogs ho ma gzar la// bdag nyid phyan tshogs gtso bo che// dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga yod de// gsal bkra za byed thim pa gsum// las dang don grub dkyil 'khor
333b7(rnying rgyud): lnga'o// longs spyod mdzad pa'i dus su yang // byi 'khur mi bca' zos la phebs// zhi ba'i smon lam la sogs te// rigs lnga he ru ka yi mtshan// brjod nas mchod pa'i dus su yang // dur khrod mchog gi rgyan du che// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho la//
334a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po ste// gti mug sha yi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// dug gsum bag chags kyang byas nas// srid gsum sems can thams cad srol// sa gsum 'bras bu
334a2(rnying rgyud): 'thob pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skong // bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// sku gsung dngos grub thob gyur cig/ 'di yi dus na ti ra'i gnas 'phrog ma// zhing bcu stsol dang ma srol nyul ba
334a3(rnying rgyud): ni// sngags pas bsrems nas byas pa na// ngas ni khyed la gsal bar bshad// kar+Na mA le'i rgyud las/ rnon po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
334a4(rnying rgyud): 'di/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams la gsungs so// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor zhi dang khro// dang po spyan drang mchod pa 'bul// gsog 'jog med par lhag ma bzhag/ ho gsang ba'i don la gtogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams/
334a5(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi thugs dam ma 'da' bar// sgrub pa'i stong grogs 'dir gshegs shig/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ DA ki ni hU~M dzaHe A ra li hriM hriM/ hUM rngam dag chos nyid zhi ba las// thogs med bugs rje'i sprul pa 'byung // rang rang las kyi skal thar pas// sprul pa bsam yas
334a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'gro// 'ja' tshon mdog 'dzin rags las sprul// mi skam po'i gdan stangs na// thugs rdo'i sprul ba yang dag zhon// mthing kau ma 'gyod dpa' bo'i gzugs// sum cu rtsa gnyis kun 'jig cing // mi dzad khrag gis bkang ba dang /
334a7(rnying rgyud): kha T+wAM dzi thul gshol gri bsdams// rang rang lag cha sna tshogs ldan// dpa' ba'i gzugs cad tho mag bzang // oM dz+dza'i tshul dra mkha'i la 'gro// zas su sha dang zag dang ni// rkang dang tshol badzum sa// yang dag de nyid 'jig rten nyid// sa la
334b1(rnying rgyud): sa nga// na ga pa dang / pa nga dang// mabajug da/ nga na/ ston pa byung da/ su ca du/
334b2(rnying rgyud): pa / skye nam bar y-ig bzhing ma// ma pa thamam pa la// na nu brgyam ldan nu babyung ba'aM// legs dkyang sa la chags rgyal na// dga' pag nga shA da dag /
334b3(rnying rgyud): pa na// rnas rgyal gi dang dmar gyis// reg bcung gnyis dbas gsus / ts+li // mi nga pa byas pa/ mas padag ga 'du babyed pas// 'a rgya te/
334b4(rnying rgyud): nga / nga / na sa/ la lu / phyug
334b5(rnying rgyud): n+ta sa/ byang bdu tha bas pa thas// ga ng+gA thas sa thas nam // lces na pa 'angs par dan// brdzun pa bslang bstan byung ba// khas seMn 'gal ba ma byin di gamapa/
334b6(rnying rgyud): tshol ba'i bas kyis she// bcom ldan na chen byung ldan la// barba kyi kyang klu ba lam dang // rdzun napa sgyu yang ste// rlu drim pa na gA yin ni// mngan zung gnyis dpa' la bsil// khyud 'arnamams thas
334b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzig rtenam 'das par // bdun pa bsreng gyi// 'i a sa 'gal ba sa rgya gyid kyid po di nas sa// rgya brtsam pa'i sa gyis shis/ ma ldan ba thal / pa 'i sa
335a1(rnying rgyud): ma// 'dod pa mo dang nor bu bzang // bad na ma ni bra ma ltom// lnga yis mdun bur dbus la 'khril// 'jigs dbang glas su byas nas ni// bstan pa bsrung bar mna' bor bar// darung 'jig rten ma 'das pas// mchod sbyin bzang
335a2(rnying rgyud): po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ bcom ldan don yod grub pa la// gsod brtson gsal ba'i 'od 'chang ma// so zhag khrag 'jib bus bzang ma// dbyug sna sbrul lus gser mig ma// mdun zur bzhi dang dbus gsum la// drug 'khril
335a3(rnying rgyud): don klubasngas su byas// bstan pa bsung bar mna' bor pas// da rung 'jig rten ma 'das pas// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ shar nyid du ni bum lnga ste// nub tu dra sha gI ba'o// lho ru rnas par 'joms ma ste/
335a4(rnying rgyud): byang nyid du ni 'bod grogs so// mkha' la 'gro ba'i sgo ma bzhi// bcom ldan rdo rje me bskyod pa'i// zhabs bzhi'i 'og na shi bzhin gnas// nyi b+h+rUM pad+ma'i gdan du 'bar// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis po// bdud 'jig rten ma 'das che// sras dang gdan du
335a5(rnying rgyud): byas rnams kyis// mna' bor tshul bzhin las bya'i phyir// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// bcom ba'i las rnams grub par mdzad// sl-i ba n+ta kI ni a glang tA ya a gAd ta ya bad+hA ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba rba kaH/ sar+b+ba dzA d-i ni ni/
335a6(rnying rgyud): DAki ni ShA hi/ rat+na NA ki ni ShA hi/ pad+ma DA ki ni ka ti/ karma DA ki no khA hi/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum bsgom pa// gsal ba rab tu drag bab shad kyi// ma tha'i 'gro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang // lhan drang ba dang las la gsug/ zal gyis mnad dang phyag
335a7(rnying rgyud): dang // dbang du bsdu bar bya ba dang // dgos pa'i don rnams bsgrub tu gzhug/ dam tshig mna' bsreg bya ba dang // bdag gzhan bsung du gzhug pa dang // bdag dang mi mthun khro gzhug dang // dngos grub mchog 'dod 'khor du gtsug/ he ru ka yi las la
335b1(rnying rgyud): gzug/ kharnam ga pa dang rigs par ba sdug// TI lo ga dab pa yang ba// gzub tu mnan pa chog bya// kar+m+mam 'ong tud can 'drir// 'di dag rabatu gas la bar bshad// mkha' 'grom med kyi la 'khod na// blan ma'i thalas gom ngan/
335b2(rnying rgyud): bdun cu'i phyi rol dag tu ni// rdo rje dri chu'i dkyil 'khor bri// dbang phyug sa yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor basbed pa ni// mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po chen po ni// pad+ma he drag rub skyed// rdor rigs dam pa nyi shu dang // dbang mo nye thal
335b3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// mkha' 'gro khyo shug tshul du bskyed// de nas spyan drang 'di skad gsungs// he hu ka yi gnas bcu dang // drur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'brang 'khor dang bcas// drar khrod chen po'i gnas 'di rtsa// dmar kyi AH/
335b4(rnying rgyud): rgya mtshor 'khyil// zhing chen gsar rnying ti ra bcas// grong rus 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus gshegs shing bsnam du gsol// dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ shrI he ru kA k+Sha.A gud ta ya a gad ta ya/ phra ba
335b5(rnying rgyud): sha ya pra be sha ya/ bad+d+ha ya bar+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo hA ya mo ha ya/ badz+ra tra kir+b+hin+ti shrI ha ru ka hU~M phaT/ na tsa rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ eHhaM/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ A nA ya A nai yaM/ tak+Sha ko tak+Sha/ ma ma b+hi/
335b6(rnying rgyud): ru lu ru lu sbyar lI 'o// bau dz+riM/ brjod pas dbang phyug ma dang ni// rdo rje rigs dam la sogs pa// khro shrag re re dag la yang // 'khor ni sa ya thAgu bco brgyad// bco brgyad sprin phreng bzhin du yang // mdun gyi nam mkhar lhags pa las// so so
335b7(rnying rgyud): thag ba pa sas// dbacig la dris par // ma gyi / na / / ky-i/ phyin gyi// / gyi// gle / la g+sa/
336a1(rnying rgyud): man ta \u0f7f// bat+tikab+ho// la ya nyaMb+h+yo// mthus pa/ so// an+mAb+h+yo// war t+no b+ho// tsas b+h+re b+h+yo// su rgan po// wanar+b+hiH// badz+ra ma hAk+Shas+t+ri b+ho// tsak+sha lbi b+h+yo// saT+TA kaN+Tab+h+yo// lagrod dpyo// de nas las la gzhug pa ni/ Ta kai'i phyag rgyas bcings
336a2(rnying rgyud): nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya 'di bstan pas// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma po mo 'dra bar byos// oM badz+ra DA ki T+Ti/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kar+N+Na ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ bar+t+ta ya bar+N+Na ya/ nyo sha ya nyo sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/
336a3(rnying rgyud): sarba badz+ra DA ki nI rAM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ DA ki nI hUM dzaH/ nyer gnas zhi tshul las la gzhug/ gzhan yang las kyi phyag rgya dang // dam tshig phyag rgya las la gzhug/ dbang phyug ma yi gtso mo brgyad// de yi dam tshig las rgya ni// thun mong dag tu gar mchod bya// lag
336a4(rnying rgyud): g.yon rtse gsum phyag rgya bcas// g.yas kyi g.yog mos rtse mnan pa// de ni u ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa phyag rgya oM// smang 'don ltar byed tshangs ma'o// rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa'i rgya// mnga' bdag g.yog mo rtse sprad de// lhag ma mda' spro
336a5(rnying rgyud): lta bu 'am// yang na tri shul nyid du bca'// 'di gsum gang rung dga' bar byed// lag pa g.yas kyi mnga' bdag dang // g.yog gnyis g.yon gyi chang par bcangs// sil gsil ltar byas gzhon nu ma// yang na mdung gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon gyi
336a6(rnying rgyud): mnga' bdag la sogs pa// brgyad nas rtse bcum 'khor lo ma// lag pa g.yas g.yon bka' nyan gnyis// khar bcug mnga' bdag gyen pasgreng phrag/ khu tshur de nyid ma bshigs par// phur du mnan pa gshin rjem// lag pa g.yas ga yon
336a7(rnying rgyud): mnga' bdag dang // g.yog dang 'bring mo gsum bcangs te// seng ge'i rna ba brgya byin ma// phyag rgya de rnams byed bzhin du// gsang sngags 'di dang sbyar te bzlas// dzA yU du u ma bdi kad kad+ha rI/ dzA ya dupra d+hA NI ka ma la d+ha dwe/ dzA ya dra ma he shwa ri
336b1(rnying rgyud): shUl d+ha dI/ dza ya du kau mA rI shak+ti b+hA rI/ dza ya du na da ya nitsakra d+ha mI dza ya du bar nyid N+Da d+hA NI/ dza ya drA in+d+ra ya ni/ badz+ra d+ha d+hi/ dza ya du tsamur+d+ha tsitad+ha d+hi// dgos don phra mo yan chad rnams// bgrub tu gzhug par bya ba ni// gA yas g.yon gnyis g.yog lhag kyar
336b2(rnying rgyud): bcing // dkyu zhing dkyus la 'di skad gsungs// dgongs don sems can gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyod rnams kun// dgongs pa bsgrub phyir 'dug par byos// khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par// dam tshig 'dis ni 'gyur ta re// oM ba lin tor ba li te A kaR+Sha
336b3(rnying rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ de nas dngos grub mchog 'dod phyir// drung du 'khor du gzhug pa ni// g.yon pa'i g.yog g.yas bka' nyan gyis// skra 'byen tog cing 'di skad gsungs// khro bor mnyam gzhag gang yin pa// dam tshig 'di yang byar byas// khyod kyis de yi mdun
336b4(rnying rgyud): du ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod// oM badz+ra pa ta la b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M hU~M phaT/ de nas zil gyis mnan pa ni// snying gar thal mo bsnol byas la// sgra gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// pho brang dkyil 'khorang nga las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste/
336b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shwe he ru ka sarba dud+hA na sa ma yang/ ma rang pra pa ny+tsa ka/ b+hak+Sha ya d+hak+Sha ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya bi d+hA na sa ya/ he b+ha ga wAn/ bud+d+ha k+She tra stam+b+ha ya ka hUM phaT/ zhes pas de rnams zil gyis mnan no// de nas phyag dag bya ba ni// bdag med
336b6(rnying rgyud): phyog bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes dgra zun mi mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs khyed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal la// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can
336b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul mo che// ma srid byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ka ra lu ka sha ra ya ya na maH/ oM rAgs po ya ya na maH/ oM kha DA ga pra la ya ya na maH/ oM gar+b+ha dz+wa la ya ya na maH/ a hi pu ho// za ti
337a1(rnying rgyud): dzAd+ha// tathA brtan ka ma ma hA ya swA go rub te al la ho// bdag gzhan bsrung du gzhug pa ni// khu tshar bcabs pa'i g.yog gnyis bsgreng // gang zhig la la bsgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo'i bskabs bcings nas ni// sems can
337a2(rnying rgyud): gang la bslang ba'i phyir// de yi chub tu 'jug par bya// badz+raban+na trAM/ bdag dang mi mthun de dag la// de la wa~M na ga zhug pa ni// d+h+r-i ge phyag rgyas g.yog 'khyud de// spyi bor gzugs pa 'di gang bsgo// bdag nyid chen po'i dmachog ni// rin chen thag tu
337a3(rnying rgyud): bcings nas ni// zos nas gang la bltas pas ni// de ye mdun du de bzhin 'jug/ oM badz+ra ma la ad+b+ha paM/ de nas he ru ka yi nI// phyag rgya dbug pa'i las gzhug pa// 'dod pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas te// 'di dag bsgo bar gsangs pa'o// rdo rje
337a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gal te gsod par 'dod na ni// dgug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag par dgug/ oM shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na/ sa ma ya mu dra pra g+halu kra hU~M phaT/ de nas dbang du bsdu ba ni// rtag dong tu bcings 'di skad
337a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas yin te ye shes sku// ye shes sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// nga nyid yin te nga yi dbang // oM pad+ma ban+d+ha ba m+ba ka/ A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha la/ pan+d+ha ya bar+t+ta ya/ ko sha ya to sha ya/ sarba badz+ra d+ha
337a6(rnying rgyud): ni/ hr-i da yan ha ha hi hi A~M// oM AHhUM/ de nas dam tshig mna' bsgrag pa// mnga' bdag gnyis po bkug pa yi// gdong gis g.yog gnyis bkug pa yi// gdong du gtugs la 'di skad brjod// rdo rje rig po 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings
337a7(rnying rgyud): pa las// gal ta gang zhig 'das rgyar na// dmachog 'dis ni khyod gsod do// oM badz+ra a kar pri ta sa ma ya hUM/ 'di rnams spyi dgos rnam gnyis pa// gya nas rig pa dam pa las// sogs pa gang yin shes bya'o// de nas brtsa ba 'anas ni// ga
337b1(rnying rgyud): lha'i mthang 'gro ma la bsgrub// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// 'byung ba rgya yi cha rababapas// mkha' 'gro pAd+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde bathugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// ma mo sbyin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstin/
337b2(rnying rgyud): oM gurba kro d+ha ha ka/ dzA kro d+ha ka/ sa ma ya brang na/ kha la le shag sha pra ka s+ya ta.a tre pr-i ti sta s+tha ka ya hUM phaT/ de nas gtor snod pan+d+ha yi// phyag rgya bcas pas phyogs bzhi nas// nga teg ste 'di skad brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rdul pa rgya mtsho rnams// oMts+tshahaM
337b3(rnying rgyud): i h+ye hi tshud gshegs tshur skyon 'khor dang bcas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol// kaM la ki la ha ha dga' ba'i bzhad mos khong // bded drongs bder drongs a ko su ka shu pa ri// tiSh+Tha shi shi slob ma tshul cig snang bar mdzod//
337b4(rnying rgyud): rol cig dgongs shig 'dod pa taSh+Tha khA hi khA hi// b+h+yo sbyin no bskul lo da ra ha ra ha ra ha// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstab go ga ba la// thal ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// mAM sa la sogs ro mchog dpa' bos gsol// ma tsa me tsa rak+ta ru ta ri// nye ba'i bslab
337b5(rnying rgyud): pa ma lus bsgrub 'tshal gyi// dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod par sbyar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// ar+g+haM sbeng zhing dbang phyug ma'i// srog snying gzungs sngags rnams brjod do// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang // kha T+wAM ga gsor 'di
337b6(rnying rgyud): skad brjod// kha T+wAM ga kha T+wAM ga/ kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten bcas// nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pas// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro ba grub// dngos grub thams cad mkhas 'byin pas// mkha' la sgra makun blangs te// lus pa med par der zo zhig/ rgyas btab
337b7(rnying rgyud): rmongs byas bslang nas ni// gang dag byed cing rab tu za// gan+d+ha ho// gan+d+ha ra yi sgra yis sgrol bar mdzod// la lang mkhas pa'i gzugs can 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngams// la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi//
338a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni stong dag na// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis// malus lus pa med par sgrol// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen tshogs kun 'dus pa 'di la gzigs/
338a2(rnying rgyud): sngon med khro rol 'di la rol mdzod cig/ dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'dul ba'i dbang du grub pa'i cha lugs mi bzad ma// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gzi brjid 'bar ba 'di// bde ba'i spyod pa'i gnas nas bskyod mdzad cing /
338a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje pad+ma'i dbyings nas dges par mdzod// a la la to// ji ltar pad+ma 'dam la chags pa med pa bzhin// sdug pa'i 'ching bas mi zin rnam grol lo// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams// mnyes mdzod nyid
338a4(rnying rgyud): du bdebs bzhes su gsol// de nas kun gyis thob par bya ba ni// rigs lnga'i tshom bu gtor ma so sor 'bral// oM bud d+ha DA ki NI pra tits+tsha mAn ba liM hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha mAnA pa liM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI pra tI b+h+yo mAn pa lihrIHphaT/
338a5(rnying rgyud): oM kuN+Da thA ki Sh+Ti ba d+hi ts+tsha m+ban pa ye hra phaT/ de nas rdo rje'i mo gad 'tshong // dam tshig bse bar bya ba ni// gau tI'i bdu 'phral zhal gyi// b+hag rgyus gtor ma la gtugs la// oM ma hA kr-i d+ha~M shwa ri hU~M phaT/ brjod pas nyi ma'i dkyila'i 'ang gyi//
338a6(rnying rgyud): dza yi ge hrIHbsgoms la// rig 'dzin dngos grub lag pa yi// phyag rgya dag gis blang bya zhing // oM AHhUM uts+tshiSh+Ta brno a mr-i ta tiSh+Tha swa maM tAhrIHphaT/ sngags de brjod pas dam blang zhing // 'grub mi 'gru' dang rnam bzhi'i las/
338a7(rnying rgyud): gdapya rdo rje'i mo gdab pa// rdzogs pa chen po'i ltabs gzung // 'grub dad ma 'grub pra snyil// mngar dang mi mdor sbyar sgur po// tshe dang kha la sogs pa'i ro// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// rim pa nyid du shes par bya/
338b1(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug ma dang bdag cag gnyis// bu gra ma gcig tu bya ba'o// mkha' 'gro ma dang bdag cag yang // brags dmag cig tu bya ba'o// de nas mnan pa'i cho ga bya// drag pos ma lus 'dul bya zhing // mnan pa'i zas pa bab pa rnams/
338b2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug mal las bcol te// bkug la sa yi 'phang sgod dbye// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la// gtad cings yi 'phar sgo bcad// de nas gtor ma phyogs bkur gtor// gtor gzhong rnams ni kha sbub ste// gzhong pa yum du bsgom
338b3(rnying rgyud): pa yi// steng du stad+ma stabs 'gred bya la// las rnams sngon du grub par bya// dngos grub rnams ni dbang du bya// dbang ni brtan par bya ba'o// de nas slar yang nang du 'jug/ smon lam mchod pas thim pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'dir yang smon lam
338b4(rnying rgyud): yang // gdab cing dug gsum mchod par bya// 'di yi dus na dur khrod gnas nyul mas// phyogs nor mchod rdzas nyal bas na// lhag ma'i mchod pas tshims par bya// gtor ma yongs la khyab pa'o// legs par byed par gyur pa'i

338b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// spyi yi las bsras rnam pa bcur bshad bya// bshags kyong dngos grub gsol dang sngon lam gdab// rgyas pa'i gter bgo las ni dngos grub dang // dngos grub dbang ba dbang ni brtan par bya// lha gshegs bkra shis brjod
338b7(rnying rgyud): dang rdogad gsol// de nas bshags pa bya ba yang // tshogs pa nang du 'dus nas ni// dang la las kyi ka rmas bshags// de nas gang gis bshags pa bya// de nyid bshags pa bya ba ni// las kyi skol dmigs 'dir yul las// rngom
339a1(rnying rgyud): thogs pa'i mang blang bshags// de nas grogs pa nang bshags // g.yas g.yon gal la gnyis zas la// \u0f89\u0fa4dbyangs pamin mthun di skang thang // thams cad ma was mched ldamajal// bdag shegs
339a2(rnying rgyud): slob mang wang mnos la// mthun par spyod pa'i dmatshig pas// mnyam dang mi mnyas don gcig la// legs 'ong rnam par dbyer med dkyang // rnam par dag pa' namadu// gzhung las nyams pa ci mchis pa// rnam par dag pa'i bsum
339a3(rnying rgyud): pas 'byol// don gyis mi gnas chog gis bshags// 'dzin pa med pas bzod par gsal// rang bzhi na dag pas ba par grol// gcig gis bcigazhabs spyi bo dazeng // ngag gi khri zas bzod par gsol// tshangs 'ar gyur TIg ces
339a4(rnying rgyud): sang 'arjod// de nas kun pal bsres nas slob dpon pa// bzong bar gsol la 'di na dgaso pa// ba dpon dpapa dang zhan// 'phags pa'i sgra dang ba medad// bde gshegs rnams kyi gsung rab lung // rnabar brgyad pa'i man
339a5(rnying rgyud): dag byung // zlag phreng thags dang rdorje byung // zhal napa gsu brgal ba'i bzhi'o// gnyis me dgagi sa dang mnya me// bajig rte med pe ma rgyal// lus dag yid thag gnas rab tshul// bstan bag zung ba

339b2(rnying rgyud): bur cig/ srog phyag tu 'du 'thod// 'dzul la marnam mkhyer 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyan dang dag pa'i phyag tu ni// 'bang ba'i rgyal po rdzob med 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag byar// yid pazhin bu dang bcu kying nga brab// A li hUM lo'i drug
